GSP28msbh1-7u:6: tadarthāny eva sūtreṣv ity avagantavyam. nādhyāhārādibhir eṣāṃ parikalpanīyo 'rthaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8: tatra loke 'yam athaśabdo vṛttād anantarasya prakriyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ. na ceha kiñcid vṛttam upalabhyate. bhavitavyaṃ tu tena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9_0: yasmin saty anantaraṃ dharmajijñāsāvakalpate. tathā hi prasiddhapadārthakaḥ sa kalpito
GSP28msbh1-7u:9_1: bhavati. tat tu vedādhyayanam. tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate. naitad evam. anyasyāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11: ucyate - tādṛśīṃ{*1/3*} tu dharmajijñāsām adhikṛtyāthaśabdaṃ prayuktavān ācāryaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12: yā vedādhyayanam antareṇa na saṃbhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13_0: vedavākyānām anekavidho vicāra iha vartiṣyate. api ca naiva vayam iha [2]{*1 /4*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13_1: vedādhyayanāt pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedhaṃ śiṣmaḥ{*1 /5*}. na hy etad ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13_2: vākyaṃ purastāc ca vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhiṣyati{*1 /6*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14: parastāc cānantaryaṃ prakariṣyati. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. anyā hi vacanavyaktir asya purastād vedādhyāyanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15: anyā ca parastād ānantaryam upadiśataḥ{*1/7*}. vedān adhītya ity{*1/8*} ekasyāṃ vidhīyate 'nūdyānantaryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16: viparītam anyasyām. arthaikatvāc caikavākyatāṃ vakṣyati{*1/9*}. kiṃ tv{*1/10*} adhīte vede dvayam āpatati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17: gurukulāc ca samāvartitavyaṃ vedavākyāni ca vicārayitavyāni. tatra gurukulān mā samāvartiṣṭa;
GSP28msbh1-7u:18: kathaṃ nu vedavākyāni vicārayed ity evamartho 'yam upadeśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20_0: na tarhi vedādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ{*1 /11*}. evaṃ hi samāmananti - vedam
GSP28msbh1-7u:20_1: adhītya snāyād iti{*1 /12*}. iha ca vedam adhītya snāsyan dharmaṃ jijñāsamāna imam
GSP28msbh1-7u:21_0: tad ucyate - atikramiṣyāma imam āmnāyam. anatikrāmanto vedam arthavantaṃ santam anarthakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:21_1: kalpayema{*1 /13*}. dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanaṃ nāma. na ca tasyādhyayanamātrāt{*1 /14*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:21_2: tatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ samāmananti. yad api ca samāmanantīva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:22_0: tatrāpi - dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syād ity{*1 /15*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:22_1: arthavādatāṃ vakṣyati. na cādhītavedasya snānānantaryam etad vidhīyate. na hy atrānataryasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:22_2: vaktā kaścic chabdo 'sti. pūrvakālatāyāṃ hi{*1 /16*} ktvā smaryate, nānantarye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23_0: dṛṣṭārthatā cādhyayanasyānantarye vyāhanyeta. lakṣaṇayā tv eṣo 'rthaḥ syāt. na cedaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23_1: snānam adṛṣṭārthaṃ vidhīyate. kiṃ tu lakṣaṇayāsnānādiniyamasya paryavasānaṃ vedādhyayanasamakālam
GSP28msbh1-7u:25_0: [3]{*1 /17*} tasmād vedādhyayanam eva pūrvam abhinirvartyānanataraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:25_1: ity athaśabdasya sāmarthyam. na brūmo 'nyasyāpi karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā na kartavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:26: kiṃ tu vedam adhītya tvaritena na snātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:30: ato 'ham asmin deśe prativasāmīti. evam adhīto vedo dharmajijñāsāyāṃ hetur jñātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:31: anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ ity ataḥśabdasya sāmarthyam. dharmāya hi vedavākyāni vicārayitum anadhītavedo na śaknuyāt. ataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:33: anantaraṃ dharmaṃ jijñāsitum icched ity ataḥśabdasyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:34: dharmāya jijñāsā dharmajijñāsā. sā hi tasya jñātum icchā. sa punaḥ{*1/19*} kathaṃ jijñāsitavyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:40: kathaṃlakṣaṇa ity ekenaiva sūtreṇa vyākhyātaṃ codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti{*1/20*}. kāny asya sādhanāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:42: kiṃparaś ceti śeṣalakṣaṇena{*1/21*} vyākhyātam{*1/22*}. kva puruṣaparatvaṃ kva vā puruṣo guṇabhūta ity etāsāṃ pratijñānāṃ piṇḍasya etat sūtram athāto dharmajijñāseti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:43: dharmaḥ prasiddho vā syād aprasiddho vā. sa cet prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:46: athavārthavat. dharmaṃ prati hi vipratipannā bahuvidaḥ. kecid anyaṃ dharmam āhuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:47_0: kecid anyam. so 'yam avicārya pravartamānaḥ kaṃcid evopādadāno vihanyetānarthaṃ carcchet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:47_1: tasmād dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ{*1 /25*}. sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣaṃ saṃyunaktīti pratijānīmahe.

GSP28msbh1-7u:81: codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam āhuḥ. ācārya[4]{*1/26*}coditaḥ karomīti hi dṛśyate. lakṣyate yena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:82: tal lakṣaṇam. dhūmo lakṣaṇam agner iti hi vadanti. tayā yo lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:83: so 'rthaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunaktīti pratijānīmahe. codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:85: nanv atathābhūtam apy arthaṃ brūyāc codanā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:86: yathā yatkiṃcana laukikaṃ vacanaṃ nadyās tīre phalāni santīti. tat tathyam api bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:88: ucyate - vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate{*1/27*} bravīti ca vitathaṃ ceti. bravītīti ucyate 'vabodhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:89: budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti. yasmiṃś ca nimittabhūte saty avabudhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:90: so 'vabodhayati. yadi ca codanāyāṃ satyām agnihotrāt svargo bhavatīty avagamyate{*1/28*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:91: katham ucyate na tathā bhavatīti. atha na tathā bhavati{*1/29*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:92: katham avabudhyate. asantam artham avabudhyata iti vipratiṣiddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:93_0: na ca svargakāmo yajetety{*1 /30*} ato vacanāt saṃdigdham avagamyate bhavati vā svargo
GSP28msbh1-7u:93_1: na vā bhavatīti. na ca niścitam avagamyamānam idaṃ mithyā syāt. yo hi janitvā pradhvaṃsate naitad evam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:94: sa mithyāpratyayaḥ. na caiṣa kālāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare deśāntare vā viparyeti. tasmād avitathaḥ. tasmād avitathaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:96: tac cet pratyayitāt puruṣād indriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:97: avitatham eva tat. athāpratyayitāt puruṣād anindriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:98: tat{*1/31*} puruṣabuddhiprabhavam apramāṇam. aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt. aparasmāt pauruṣeyād vacanād avagatam iti cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:99: tad api tenaiva tulyam. naivaṃjātīyakeṣv artheṣu puruṣavacanaṃ prāmāṇyam upaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:101_0: nanv aviduṣām{*1 /32*} upadeśo nāvakalpate. upadiṣṭavantaś ca manvādayaḥ. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:101_1: puruṣāḥ{*1 /33*} santo viditavantaś{*1 /34*} ca. yathā cakṣuṣā rūpam upalabhyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:102: ucyate - upadeśo{*1/35*} hi vyāmohād api bhavati. asati vyāmohe vedād api bhavati. api ca pauruṣeyād vacanād evam ayaṃ puruṣaḥ vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:103: na evam ayam artha iti. viplavate khalv api kaścit puruṣakṛtād vacanāt pratyayaḥ. na tu vedavacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:104: nanu sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati{*1/36*}. pauruṣeyaṃ vacanaṃ vitatham upalabhya vacanasāmānyād{*1/37*} vedavacanaṃ mithyety anumīyate{*1/38*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:106: anyatvāt. na hy anyasya vitathabhāve{*1/39*} 'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavitum arhati{*1/40*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:107_0: anyatvād eva. na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasyāpi śyāmatvaṃ bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:107_1: api ca puruṣavacanasādharmyād vedavacanaṃ vitatham{*1 /41*} ity anumānam{*1 /42*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:107_2: pratyakṣas tu vedavacane{*1 /43*} pratyayaḥ. na cānumānaṃ pratyakṣavirodhi{*1 /44*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:107_3: pramāṇaṃ bhavati{*1 /45*}. tasmāc codanālakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ{*1 /46*} śreyaskaraḥ. evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:108: ucyate - ya eva śreyaskaraḥ, sa eva dharmaśabdenocyate. katham avagamyate{*1/47*}?
GSP28msbh1-7u:110: taṃ dhārmika iti samācakṣate. yaś ca yasya kartā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:112: yathā pācako lāvaka iti. tena yaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:113: sa eva{*1/49*} dharmaśabdenocyate. na kevalaṃ loke, vede 'pi -
GSP28msbh1-7u:116: ity{*1/50*} yajatiśabdavācyam{*1/51*} eva dharmaṃ{*1/52*} samānanti. ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:119: yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra iṣur ity evamādiḥ. tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity arthagrahaṇam{*1/53*}. kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:121: sā ca{*1/54*} pratiṣiddhā{*1/55*}. kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate{*1/56*}?
GSP28msbh1-7u:122: ucyate - naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyatayā vijñāyante. yo hi hiṃsitum icchet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:123: tasyāyam abhyupāya iti hi teṣām upadeśaḥ. śyenenābhicaran yajeteti{*1/57*} hi samāmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:125: nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:127: arthaś ca dharmo nānartha iti. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyam. tad evaṃ sati bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:130: na sūtreṣu. anyato 'vagate 'rthe sūtram evamartham{*1/60*} ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:131_0: tena caikadeśaḥ sūtryata iti{*1 /61*} sūtram. tatra bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:131_1: ity avagantavyam. athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ucyata{*1 /62*}

GSP28msbh1-7u:195: satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:197: idaṃ parīkṣyate - pratyakṣaṃ tāvad animittam. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:198: evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ hi tat - satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam. satīndriyārthasaṃbandhe yā puruṣasya buddhir jāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:199: tat pratyakṣam. bhaviṣyaṃś caiṣo 'rtho na jñānakāle 'sti{*1/65*}. sataś caitad upalambhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:201: buddhir vā janma vā saṃnikarṣo veti naiṣāṃ kasyacid avadhāraṇārtham etat sūtram. satīndriyārthasaṃprayoge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:202: nāsatīty etāvad avadhāryate. anekasminn avadhāryamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam. pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc cānumānopamānārthāpattīnām apy akāraṇatvam{*1/66*}. abhāvo 'pi nāsti, yataḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:207: autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya jñānam upadeśo 'vyatirekaś cārthe 'nupalabdhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:210: autpattika iti nityaṃ brūmaḥ. utpattir hi{*1/67*} bhāva ucyate lakṣaṇayā. aviyuktaḥ śabdārthayor bhāvaḥ saṃbandhena{*1/68*},

GSP28msbh1-7u:497: yadāsau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:498: ataḥ{*1/311*} pravṛttyāvagamyate nūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchatīti{*1/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:499: upamānāc copadiśyate yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:500: anenopamānenāvagaccha - aham api tādṛṣam eva paśyāmīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:501: yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣīta - dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:503: rudhyamānasyeva{*1/313*} me bhavatīti. ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:504: yad apy{*1/314*} ucyate - vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:506: na śakyam upāyam antareṇopeyam upetum. ayam evābhyupāyo jñātavyānām arthānāṃ yo yathā jñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:507: sa tatheti. tad yathā - kaḥ śuklo nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:508: yatra śuklatvam asti. kiṃ śuklatvaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:510: yac chuklaśabda uccarite pratīyate. tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:511: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati. apratīte 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva. na hi vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:512_0: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣa ity etat pūrvam evoktam. tad avaśyakarta[24]{*1 /315*}vye
GSP28msbh1-7u:512_1: 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy{*1 /316*} uktam eva. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:513: atha yad uktaṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:515_0: atrocyate - atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam āpīpadad iti{*1 /317*} paricodanottarakāle
GSP28msbh1-7u:515_1: 'pahnutya mohāntābhiprāyam{*1 /318*} asya vacanasya{*1 /319*} varṇitavān na vā are
GSP28msbh1-7u:517: mātrāsaṃsargas tv asya bhavatīti{*1/321*}. tasmān na vijñānamātram. tasmād vaiṣamyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:518: yad uktam - na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:519: mā bhūd vidhiśabdaḥ. svargakāmo yajeteti vacanāntareṇāvagatam anuvadiṣyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:836_1: chabdāt kaścid arthaṃ pratyeti. kathaṃ punar anityaḥ śabdaḥ. prayatnād uttarakālaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:836_2: dṛśyate yataḥ. ataḥ prayatnānantaryāt tena kriyata iti gamyate.

GSP28msbh1-7u:840_0: no{*1 /322*} khalv apy uccaritaṃ muhūrtam apy upalabhāmahe. ato vinaṣṭa ity avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:840_1: na ca san nopalabhyate. anupalaṃbhakāraṇānāṃ vyavadhānādīnām abhāve 'py anupalambhanāt.

GSP28msbh1-7u:848: mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:849: na te nūnam avagacchanti sa evāyaṃ śabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:853: tad ekasya nityasyānupapannam iti. asati viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvam. kāryāṇāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate 'nekadeśasaṃbandhaḥ. tasmād apy anityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:857: yakāro vikṛtir ity upapadiśanti. yad vikriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:862: api ca bahubhir uccārayadbhir mahān śabdaḥ śrūyate. sa yady abhivyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:863: bahubhir alpaiś coccāryamāṇas tāvān evopalabhyeta. ato manyāmahe nūnam asyaikaikena kaścid avayavaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:870: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. yad{*1/324*} uktam - prayatnād uttarakāle darśanāt kṛtako 'yam iti{*1/325*}. yadi vispaṣṭena hetunā śabdasya nityatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:871: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt prayatnenābhivyajyata iti bhaviṣyati. yadi prāg uccāraṇād anabhivyaktaḥ prayatnenābhivyajyate. tasmād ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:877: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - uccaritapradhvasta iti{*1/326*}. atrāpi yadi śakṣyāmo nityatām asya vispaṣṭaṃ vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:878_0: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt kadācid upalambhaṃ kadācid anupalambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:878_1: upalambhasya nimittaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ. tac ca saṃyogavibhāgasadbhāve sati bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:878_2: saṃyogavibhāgāv evābhivyañjakāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ. uparatayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ śrūyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:878_3: iti cet. naitad evam. na nūnam uparamanti saṃyogavibhāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:879: yata upalabhyate śabda iti. na hi te pratyakṣā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:880: yadi śabdaṃ saṃyogavibhāgā evābhivyañjanti na kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:881: ākāśaviṣayatvāc chabdasyākāśasyaikatvād ya evāyam atra śrotrākāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:882: sa eva deśāntareṣv apīti śrughnasthaiḥ{*1/327*} saṃyogavibhāgair abhivyaktaḥ pāṭaliputre 'py upalabhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:884: tasya vāyavīyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgā vāyvāśritatvād vāyuṣv eva kariṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:885: yathā tantavas tantuṣv eva paṭam. tasya pāṭaliputreṣv anupalambho yuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:889_0: tena dūre yac chrotraṃ tena nopalabhyata iti. naitad evam. aprāptāś cet [28]{*1 /328*}saṃyogavibhāgāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:889_1: śrotrasyopakuryuḥ. saṃnikṛṣṭavikṛṣṭadeśasthau yugapac chabdam upalabheyātām. na ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:889_2: yugapad upalabhete. tasmān nāprāptā upakurvanti. na ced upakurvanti{*1 /329*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:891_0: naitad evam. abhighātena hi preritā vāyavas timitāni{*1 /330*} vāyvantarāṇi pratibādhamānāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:891_1: sarvatodikkān saṃyogavibhāgān utpādayanti. yāvad vegam abhipratiṣṭhante. te ca vāyor
GSP28msbh1-7u:891_2: apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogavibhāgā nopalabhyante. anuparateṣv eva teṣu śabda upalabhyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:891_3: noparateṣu. ato na doṣaḥ. ata eva cānuvātaṃ dūrād upalabhyate śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:900: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - śabdaṃ kuru mā kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate{*1/331*}. yady asaṃśayaṃ nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:906: *{1/333: E1,5; E2,6: saṃvāhe (E1 gibt saṃvāhe als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:909_0: yat tv ekadeśasya{*1 /334*} sato nānādeśeṣu yugapad darśanam anupapannam iti{*1 /335*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:909_1: ādityaṃ paśya devānāṃpriya. ekaḥ sann anekadeśāv asthita iva lakṣyate. kathaṃ punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:909_2: avagamyata eka āditya iti. ucyate - prāṅmukho devadattaḥ pūrvāhne saṃprati purastād
GSP28msbh1-7u:909_3: ādityaṃ paśyati. tasya dakṣiṇato 'vasthito na dvau paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:910_0: ātmanaś ca saṃprati na tiraścīnaṃ{*1 /336*} devadattasyārjave. [28]{*1 /337*} tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:910_1: eka āditya iti. dūratvād asya deśo nāvadhāryate. ato vyāmohaḥ. evaṃ śabde 'pi vyāmohād
GSP28msbh1-7u:910_2: anavadhāraṇaṃ deśasya. yadi śrotraṃ saṃyogavibhāgadeśam āgatya śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:911: tathāpi tāvad anekadeśatā kadācid avagamyeta. na ca tatsaṃyogadeśam āgacchati. pratyakṣā hi karṇaśaṣkulī taddeśā
GSP28msbh1-7u:912: gṛhyate. vāyavīyāḥ punaḥ saṃyogavibhāgā apratyakṣasya vāyoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:913: karṇaśaṣkulīpradeśe prādurbhavanto nopalabhyanta iti nānupapannam. ata eva vyāmoho yan nānādeśeṣu śabda iti. ākāśadeśaś ca śabda iti. ekaṃ ca punar ākāśam. ato 'pi na nānādeśeṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:914: api caikarūpye sati deśabhedena kāmaṃ deśā eva bhinnāḥ, na tu śabdaḥ. tasmād ayam apy adoṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:918: *{1/336: E2: saṃprati sthitaṃ tiraścīnaṃ (E1 gibt: saṃpratisthite tiraścīnaṃ als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:922: na ca dadhyatrety{*1/338*} atra prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. śabdāntaram ikārād yakāraḥ. na hi yakāraṃ prayuñjānā ikāram upādadate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:923_0: yathā kaṭaṃ cikrīrṣanto vīraṇāni. na ca sādṛśyamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prakṛtir vikṛtir vocyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:923_1: na hi dādhipiṭakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kundapiṭakaṃ ca prakṛtivikārabhāvo 'vagamyate. tasmād ayam apy adoṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:928: yac caitad bahubhir bherīm ādhmanadbhiḥ{*1/340*} śabdam{*1/341*} uccārayadbhir mahāñ śabda upalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:929_0: tena pratipuruṣaṃ śabdāvayavapracaya iti gamyate{*1 /342*}. naivam. niravayavo hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:929_1: śabdaḥ avayavabhedānavagamān niravayavatvāc ca mahattvānupapattiḥ. ato na vardhate
GSP28msbh1-7u:929_2: śabdaḥ. mṛdur ekena [29]{*1 /343*} bahubhiś coccāryamāṇe tāny evākṣarāṇi karṇaśaṣkulīmaṇḍalasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:929_3: sarvāṃ nemiṃ vyāpnuvadbhiḥ saṃyogavibhāgair nairantaryeṇānekaśo grahaṇān mahān ivāvayavavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:929_4: ivopalabhyante. saṃyogavibhāgā nairantaryeṇa kriyamāṇāḥ śabdam abhivyañjanto nādaśabdavācyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:937: nityas tu syād darśanasya parārthatvāt // MS_1,1.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:940: tat parārthaṃ param arthaṃ pratyāyayitum. uccaritamātre hi vinaṣṭe śabde na cānyo 'nyān arthaṃ pratyāyayituṃ śaknuyāt. ato na parārtham uccāryeta. atha na vinaṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:941: tato bahuśa upalabdhatvād arthāvagama iti yuktam. arthavat sādṛśyād arthāvagama iti cet. na kaścid arthavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:942: sarveṣāṃ navatvāt. kasyacit pūrvasya kṛtrimaḥ saṃbandho{*1/344*} bhaviṣyatīti cet. tad uktaṃ sadṛśa iti cāvagate vyāmohāt pratyayo vyāvarteta mālāśabdān mālāpratyaya iva{*1/345*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:944_0: tadvad bhaviṣyatīti cet. na hi gośabdaṃ tatroccārayitum icchā. nehānyaśabdoccicārayiṣā.

GSP28msbh1-7u:952_1: śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ śakyate kartum. nirdiśya hy ākṛtiṃ kartā saṃbadhnīyāt. gopiṇḍe
GSP28msbh1-7u:952_2: ca bahūnām ākṛtīnāṃ sadbhāvāc chabdam antareṇa gośabdavācyāṃ vibhaktām ākṛtiṃ kena

GSP28msbh1-7u:961_0: pratyabhijānantīti{*1 /349*}. vayaṃ tāvat pratyabhijānīmo na naḥ karaṇadaurbalyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:961_1: evam anye 'pi pratyabhijānanti. sa evāyam iti. pratyabhijānānā{*1 /350*} vayam ivānye
GSP28msbh1-7u:962: atha matam anyatve sati sādṛśyena vyāmūḍhāḥ sa iti vakṣyanti. tan na. na hi te sadṛśa iti pratiyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:963: kiṃ tarhi sa evāyam iti. vidite ca sphuṭe 'nyatve vyāmoha iti gamyate. na cāyam anya iti praty-akṣam anyad vā pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:964_0: syād etat - buddhikarmaṇī api te pratyabhijñāyete. te 'pi nitye prāpnutaḥ. naiṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:964_1: doṣaḥ. na hi te pratyakṣe. atha pratyakṣe nitye eva{*1 /351*}. hy astanasya śabdasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:964_2: vināśād anyo 'dyatana iti cet. naiṣa vinaṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:965: yata enaṃ punar upalabhāmahe. na hi pratyakṣadṛṣṭaṃ muhūrtam adṛṣṭvā punar upalabhyamānaṃ pratyabhijānanto vinaṣṭaṃ parikalpayanti. parikalpayanto dvitīyasaṃdarśane mātari,
GSP28msbh1-7u:966_0: jāyāyāṃ pitari vā nāśvasyuḥ. na hy anupalambhamātreṇa nāstīty avagamya naṣṭa ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:966_1: eva kalpayanti. apramāṇatāyāṃ viditāyāṃ nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ. na hi pramāṇe pratyakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:966_2: saty apramāṇatā syāt. astīti punar avyāmohenāvagamyamāne na kvacid apy abhāvaḥ. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:967: na ca siddho 'bhāvaḥ. tasmād asati vyāmohe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:968_0: nābhāvaḥ{*1 /352*}. tad e[31]{*1 /353*}tad ānupūrvyā siddham. tasmāt purastād anuccāritam
GSP28msbh1-7u:968_1: anupalabhamānā api na vinaṣṭa ity avagantum arhanti. yathā{*1 /354*} gṛhān nirgatāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:968_2: sarvagṛhajanam apaśyantaḥ punaḥ praviśyopalabhamānā api na prāk praveśād vinaṣṭa
GSP28msbh1-7u:968_3: ity avagacchanti. tadvad enam api nānya iti vaktum arhanti. ye 'pi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:969_0: te 'pi na śaknuvanti śabdasya vaditum. ante hi kṣayadarśanāt te manyante. na ca śabdasyānto
GSP28msbh1-7u:969_1: na ca kṣayo lakṣyate. sa iti pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ sadṛśa ity ānumānikaḥ. na ca pratyakṣaviruddham
GSP28msbh1-7u:969_2: anumānam udeti. svakāryaṃ vā sādhayati. tasmān nityaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:979: yeṣām anavagatotpattīnāṃ dravyāṇāṃ bhāva eva lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:981: yeṣāṃ vināśakāraṇam upalabhyate. yathābhinavaṃ paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:984: tantuvyatiṣaṅgajanito 'yaṃ tantuvyatiṣaṅgavināśāt tantuvināśād vā vinaśyatīty avagacchati. naivaṃ śabdasya kiṃcit kāraṇam avagamyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:988_1: saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ śabdo bhavatīti. tathā ca śikṣākārā āhuḥ - vāyur āpadyate śabdatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:988_2: iti{*1 /355*}. naitad evam. vāyavīyaś cec chabdo bhaved,

GSP28msbh1-7u:990: sparśa-ne[32]{*1/356*}nopalabhemahi. na ca vāyavīyān avayavāñ śabdagatān spṛśāmaḥ. tasmān na vāyukāraṇakaḥ. ato nityaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:1002: yady apy autpattiko nityaḥ śabdo arthasaṃbandhaś ca{*1/359*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1003_0: tathāpi na codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ. codanā hi vākyam. na hy agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:1003_1: ity ato vākyād anyatamāt{*1 /360*} padād agnihotrāt svargo bhavatīti gamyate. gamyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:1003_2: tu padatraya uccarite. na cātra caturthaḥ śabdo 'sty anyad ataḥ padatrayasamudāyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1004: yato 'sya vyavahārād artho 'vagamyate. padāny amūni prayuktāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1005: teṣāṃ nityo 'rthaḥ. aprayuktaś ca samudāyaḥ. tasmāt samudāyasyārthaḥ kṛtrimo vyāmoho vā. na ca padārthā eva vākyārthaḥ. sāmānye hi padaṃ pravartate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:1267: yatas tato bhūtir iti bhinnāv imāv arthau, ubhayābhidhāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1268: kim arthā stutir iti cet. kathaṃ roceta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1269: nonuṣṭhīyeteti. nanu prāk stutivacanād anuṣṭhānaṃ bhūtikāmāntāt siddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1271: yadā stutipadāsaṃnidhānaṃ tadā pūrveṇaiva vidhiḥ. yadā stutipadasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1272: na tadā bhūtikāmasyālambho vidhīyate. yathā paṭo bhavatīti paṭa utpadyata ity arthaḥ. nirākāṅkṣaṃ ca padadvayam. yadā ca tasminn eva rakta ity aparaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1274: bhavati ca raktaṃ pratyākāṅkṣā. evaṃ yadā na stutipadāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1277: tadā stavanena. nanv evaṃ sati kiṃ stuti-vacanena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1279: mā bhūt tat. tadabhāve 'pi pūrvavidhinaiva prarocayiṣyata iti. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1280: vināpi tena sidhyet prarocanam. asti tu tat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1282: so 'va-gamyate stutiprayojanaṃ{*1/424*} tayoḥ. tasminn avidyamāne vidhinā prarocanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1283: nanu satsv api stutipadeṣu pūrvasya vidhisvarūpatvād vidhir abhipretaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1284: na vivakṣyeta stutipada-saṃbandhaḥ. āha - stutipadāni hy anarthakāny abhaviṣyan sākāṅkṣāṇi. bhavantv anarthakānīti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1288: pratyakṣaś ca vākyaśeṣabhāvaḥ. ato 'smād vidheḥ stutim avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1289: nanu nirapekṣād api vidhim avagamiṣyām. bhavatv evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1290: naivaṃ sati kaścid virodhaḥ. kiṃ tv aśakyaḥ stutipadasaṃbandhe sati vidhyartho vivakṣitum. vākyaṃ hi saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1291: dvau cet saṃbandhau vidadhyāt - bhūtikāma ālabheta; ālambhena caiṣa guṇo bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1292: bhidyeta tarhy evaṃ sati vākyam. atha yad uktam - na kriyā gamyate na tatsaṃbaddhaṃ vā kiṃcid iti{*1/426*}. stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1293: stutiśabdāḥ stuvantaḥ kriyāṃ prarocayamāṇā anuṣṭhātṝṇām upakariṣyanti kriyāyāḥ. evam imāni sarvāṇy eva padāni kaṃcid arthaṃ stuvanti vidadhati. ataḥ pramāṇam evaṃjātīyakāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1309: stutipadāni tu pramādapāṭha iti. tan na evam{*1/428*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1313: {*1/429*} yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarve te vidhipadānām arthavādapadānāṃ ca tulyāḥ. adhyāyānadhyāyate{*1/430*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1316: avighnārthe tulyam ādriyante. smaraṇaṃ ca dṛḍham. ato na pramādapāṭha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1319: *{1/428: E2,4,5,6 setzen Daṇḍa oder Komma vor evam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1321: *{1/430: E1,2,5,6; E4: adhyāyānadhyayane (auch in E1 als Fn., dort noch: adhyāyānadhyāyatā)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1328: api ca yaiṣānupapattir uktā śāstradṛṣṭavirodhād ityevamādyā{*1/432*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1329: sā so 'rodīd ityevamādiṣu na prāpnoti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1330: prayoge hi steyādīnām ucyamāne virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1338: yad uktam - vidheyasya prarocanārthā stutir iti{*1/433*}. tad iha katham avakalpyeta yatrānyad vidheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1339: anyac ca stūyate. yathā - vetasaśākhayāvakābhiś cāgniṃ vikarṣatīti{*1/434*} vetasāvake vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1340: āpaś ca stūyante - āpo vai śāntā iti{*1/435*}. tad ucyate - guṇavādas tu. gauṇa eṣa vādo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1341_0: yat saṃbandhini stotavye saṃbandhyantaraṃ stūyate. abhijano hy eṣa vetasāvakayoḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1341_1: tatas te jāte. abhijanasaṃstavena cābhijātaḥ stuto bhavati. yathā - aśmakābhijano
GSP28msbh1-7u:1341_2: devadatto 'śmākeṣu stūyamāneṣu stutam{*1 /436*} ātmānaṃ manyate. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1342: atha so 'rodīd iti kasya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. tasmād barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam ity{*1/437*} asya. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1345: tad rudrasya rudratvam ity{*1/438*} atra sa iti prakṛtāpekṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346_0: tatpratyayāt. tasya yad aśrv aśīryateti tasyeti pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa eva. upapattiś
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346_1: coparitanasya yo barhiṣi rajataṃ dadyāt purāsya saṃvatsarād gṛhe rodanaṃ bhavatīti{*1 /439*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346_2: asya hetutvenāyaṃ pratinirdiśyate - tasmād barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam iti. evaṃ sarvāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346_3: sākāṅkṣāṇi. kathaṃ vidher{*1 /440*} upakurvantīti. [46]{*1 /441*} guṇavādena. rodanaprabhavaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346_4: rajataṃ barhiṣi dadato rodanam āpadyate. tat pratiṣedhasya guṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1347: yad arodanam iti. kathaṃ punar arudaty arodīd iti bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1349: purāsya saṃvatsarād asati rodane, kathaṃ rodanaṃ bhavatīti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1350_0: tad ucyate - guṇavādas tu. gauṇā ete śabdāḥ. rudra iti rodananimittasya śabdasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1350_1: darśanād yad arodīd ity ucyate. varṇasārūpyān nindann anaśruprabhavam apy aśruprabhavam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1350_2: ity āha. nindann eva ca dhanatyāge dukhadarśanāt purāsya saṃvatsarād gṛhe rodanaṃ bhavatīty āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1351: tathā - yaḥ prajākāmaḥ paśukāmo vā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1352: sa etaṃ prājāpatyaṃ tūpuram ālabheta iti{*1/442*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1353: ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣo 'yam - sa ātmano vapām udakhidad iti{*1/443*}. kathaṃ guṇavādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1355: yad ātmano vapām udakhidad iti. etac ca karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyaṃ yad agnau prahṛtamātrāyāṃ vapāyām ajas tūpura udagāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1356_0: itthaṃ bahavaḥ paśavo bhavantīti. kathaṃ punar anutkhinnāyāṃ vapāyāṃ prajāpatir ātmano
GSP28msbh1-7u:1356_1: vapām udakhidad ity āha. ucyate - asad vṛttāntānvākhyānaṃ stutyarthena praśaṃsāyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1356_2: gamyamānatvāt. ihānvākhyāne vartamāne dvayaṃ niṣpadyate{*1 /444*} - yac ca vṛttāntajñānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1357_0: yac ca kasmiṃścit prarocanā dveṣo vā. tatra vṛttāntānvākhyānaṃ na pravartakaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1357_1: nivartakaṃ ceti prayojanābhāvād anarthakam ity avivakṣitam. prarocanayā tu pravartate
GSP28msbh1-7u:1357_2: dveṣān nivartata iti tayor vivakṣā. vṛttāntānvākhyāne 'pi vidhīyamāne ādimatā doṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1357_3: vedasya prasajeta. kathaṃ punar idaṃ nirālambanam anvākhyāyata iti. ucyate - nityaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1359: ādityo vā. sa ātmano vapām udakhidad iti vṛṣṭim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1366: virud vā. tam ālabhya tam upayujya prajāḥ paśūn prāpnotīti gauṇāḥ śabdāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1367: ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaś carur āditya udapanīyaś carur ity{*1/445*} asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ - devā vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśo na prājānann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1369_0: api diṅmohasyeti stutiḥ. katham asati diṅmohe diṅmohaśabda iti. ucyate - aprākṛtasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1369_1: bahoḥ karmasamūhasyopasthitatvād gauṇo mohaśabdo 'vadhāraṇāvakāśadānādibhir jñāpayatīti gauṇatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1374: *{1/436: E1: stūtam, lies mit E2,4,5,6: stutam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1378: *{1/440: E1: vidhar, lies mit E2,4,5,6: vidher}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1382: *{1/444: E1: niṣyadyate, lies mit E2,4,5,6: niṣpadyate; E1 (Fn.): āpatati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1387: atha gṛhṇātīti{*1/446*} sākāṅkṣatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ - stenaṃ mano 'nṛtavādinī vāg iti. nindāvacanaṃ hiraṇyastutyarthena yathā - kim ṛṣiṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1388: devadatta eva bhojayitavyaḥ. kathaṃ punar astenaṃ mano ninditum api stenaśabdenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1389: vācaṃ cānanṛtavādinīm apy anṛtavādinīti brūyat. guṇavādas tu rūpāt. yathā - stenāḥ pracchannarūpāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1390: evaṃ ca mana iti gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ. prāyāc cānṛtavādinī vāg iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1397: dṛṣṭavirodha{*1/448*} udāharaṇam - tasmād bhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nārciḥ{*1/449*}. tasmād arcir evāgner naktaṃ dadṛśe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1398: na dhūma iti agnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1399_0: sūryo jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti{*1 /450*} prātar iti miśraliṅgamantrayor vidhānasyākāṅkṣitatvāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:1399_1: cheṣaḥ. ubhayor devatayoḥ saṃnidhāne homa iti stuter upapattiḥ. dūrabhūyastvād dhūmasyāgneś
GSP28msbh1-7u:1401: *{1/448: E1: iṣṭavirodhe, lies mit E2,4,5,6 (und E1, S.40/17, zu MS 1.2.2): dṛṣṭavirodha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1406_0: dṛṣṭavirodha evodāharaṇam - na caitad vidma iti{*1 /452*}. tat pravare pravriyamāṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:1406_1: devāḥ pitara iti brūyād ity{*1 /453*} ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. abrāhmaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1406_2: 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ pravarānumantraṇena syād iti stutiḥ. durjñānatvād ajñānavacanaṃ gauṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1406_3: stryaparādhena kartuś ca putradarśanena. apramatā rakṣata tantum enam ityādinā durjñānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1408: *{1/451: E1,6; E2,4,5 (besser): stryaparādhāt; auch E1 hat diese Lesart im Kommentar}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1413: śāstradṛṣṭavirodhe udāharaṇam - ko hi tad vedeti{*1/454*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1414: dikṣvatī kāśān karotīti{*1/455*} sākāṅkṣatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. pratyakṣaphalatvena stutiḥ. ananvakḷptivacanaṃ viprakṛṣṭakālaphalatvād gauṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1420_0: tathā phalābhāvād ity{*1 /456*} atrodāhṛtam - śobhate 'sya mukham iti{*1 /457*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1420_2: prajāyāṃ vājī jāyata iti śeṣaḥ. mukhaśobhā vājimattvaṃ ca guṇavacanatvād gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1420_3: śobhata iva śiṣyair udīkṣyamāṇam. kule saṃtatādhyayanaśravaṇān medhāvī jāyata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1427: anyānarthakyavākya udāharaṇam - pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnotīti{*1/459*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1428: pūrṇāhutiṃ juhotīty ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. ya u cainam evaṃ vedeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1429: tarati mṛtyum ity{*1/460*} asyākāṅkṣitvāc cheṣaḥ. phalavacanaṃ stutiḥ. sarvakāmaphalasya nimitte sarvakāmāv āptivacanaṃ gauṇam. asarveṣu sarvavacanam adhikṛtāpekṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1434: phalasya karmaniṣpattes teṣāṃ lokavat parimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ syāt // MS_1,2.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1435: anvāruhya vacanam idaṃ{*1/461*} yady api vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1436: tathāpy arthavattā parimāṇataḥ sārato vā phalaviśeṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1438: *{1/461: E1, S.49/6: pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnotīti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1441: abhāgipratiṣedhād ityādāv udāhṛtam - na pṛthivyām agniś cetavyo nāntarikṣe na divīti{*1/462*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1442_0: hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya cetavyam ity{*1 /463*} ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. pṛthivyādīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1442_1: nindā hiraṇyastutyarthā. asati prasaṅge pratiṣedho nityānuvādaḥ. yac cānityadarśanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1442_2: babaraḥ prāvāhaṇir akāmayata iti{*1 /464*}. tatparihṛtam. arthavādākṣepeṇa punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:1442_3: utthitam idānīm arthavādaprāmāṇye tenaiva parihāreṇa parihariṣyata iti //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1445: *{1/462: Tait.S. 5.2.7.1, zitiert in ŚBh ad MS 1.2.5}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1450: vidhir vā syād apūrvatvāt, vādamātraṃ hy anarthakam // MS_1,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1451_0: iha ye vidhivan nigadā arthavādās te arthavādās te udāharaṇam - audumbaro yūpo bhavaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:1451_1: ūrg vā uduṃbara ūrk paśava ūrjair vāsmā ūrjaṃ paśūn nāpnoti ūrjo 'varuddhyā iti{*1 /466*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1451_2: kim asya vidhiḥ kāryam utāsyāpi stutir iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1453: vādamātraṃ hy anarthakam. vidhivan nigadeṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu phalavidhiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1455_0: tathā hy apūrvam arthaṃ vidhāsyati. itarathā stutivādamātram anarthakaṃ syāt. stutaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:1455_1: cāstutaś ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ. api ca ūrjo 'varuddhyā iti prayojanaṃ śrūyate. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1455_2: ca - praśasto 'yam artha iti kaścic chabdo 'sti. lakṣaṇayā tu stutir gamyate. śrutiś
GSP28msbh1-7u:1461: na ca śabdenāvagamyata iti. laukikāni vākyāni bhavanto vidāṃ kurvantu. tad yathā - iyaṃ gauḥ kretavyā devadattīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1464: anaṣṭaprajā ceti. kretavyety apy ukte guṇābhidhānāt pravartantetarāṃ kretāraḥ. bahukṣīreti ca guṇābhidhānam avagamyate. tadvad vede 'pi bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1467_0: naitad evam. loke viditapūrvā arthā ucyante bahukṣīrādayaḥ. teṣāṃ vijñānam eva na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1467_1: prayojanam. ataḥ praśaṃsā gamyate. aviditavāde na śraddadhīran pūrvavacanād iva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1467_2: viditatvād eva ca prarocayante. vaidikeṣu punar yadi vidhiśabdena na prarocayante
GSP28msbh1-7u:1467_3: na tarām arthavādena. jātāśaṅko hi vidhiśabde sa tadānīm. atha vidhiśabdena prarocitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1468: kim arthavādaśabdena. api ca vede vyaktam asaṃvādaḥ. ūrjo 'varuddhyai ity aprasiddhaṃ vacanam. ūrgvā udumbara iti hetutvaṃ cāprasiddham. yasmād ūrg udumbaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1469: tasmāt tanmayo yūpaḥ kartavya iti. ūrg udumbara ity anṛtavacanād anyad asyānṛtam iti parikalpyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1472: uktam asmābhir vākyaśeṣatvam - vidhinā tv ekavākyatvād iti{*1/467*}. nanūktam - phalavacanam iha gamyate na stutir iti. yad iha phalavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1474: avihita audumbaro yūpo 'sti. tatra phalavacanam evānarthakam. stutivacanaḥ śabdo nāstīti cet. iha phalavacanena phalavattā pratīyate phalavāṃś ca praśasta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1475: tatra phalavattāyām ānarthakyam iti yo dvitīyo 'rthaḥ praśaṃsā nāma sa gamyate. lakṣaṇeti cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1477: lakṣaṇāyām apy arthavattā bhavaty eva. lakṣaṇāpi hi laukikī. nanūktam asaṃvādo vede,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1478: na hy ūrg udumbara iti. guṇa vādena prarocanārthatāṃ brūmahe - gauṇatvāt saṃvādaḥ. kiṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1480: evam idam api prītisādhanaśaktiyuktaṃ praśaṃsituṃ{*1/468*} praśaṃsāvācinā śabdenocyate{*1/469*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1481: śakyate hi tat pakvaphalasaṃbandhād ūrg iti vaktum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1489: vidhiś cānarthakaḥ kvacit, tasmāt stutiḥ pratīyeta, tatsāmānyād itareṣu tathātvam // MS_1,2.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1491: apsujo vetasa iti{*1/471*} apsuyonir aśvaḥ kartavya iti vidher aśakyatvād ānarthakyam. tatrāvaśyaṃ stutiḥ kalpayitavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1492: śamayitrībhir adbhir aśvasyāvakānāṃ ca saṃbandho yajamānasya kaṣṭaṃ śamayatīti. tatsāmānyād itareṣu tathātvam - tatheti yāvat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1493: tāvat tathātvam iti. kiṃ tat sāmānyam. vidhyasaṃbhavaḥ stutisaṃbhavaś ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1497: prakaraṇe saṃbhavann apakarṣo na kalpyeta, vidhyānarthakyaṃ hi taṃ prati // MS_1,2.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1498: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ stutir iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:1503: sa daivatatvāyeti{*1/472*}. yadi stutir darśapūrṇamāsayor eva śṛtaḥ stāviṣyate. tathā saṃbhavann apakarṣo na kalpyeta. apakṛṣyate ity apakarṣaḥ. vidhipakṣe tu yatra nairṛtaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2239: tadā vyaktir api padārtha iti na śakyate vaditum. kutaḥ. ākṛtir hi vyaktyā nityasaṃbaddhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2240: saṃbandhinyāṃ ca tasyām avagatāyāṃ saṃbandhyantaram avagamyate. tad etad ātmapratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2241: yac chabda uccarite vyaktiḥ pratīyata iti. kiṃ śabdād utākṛter iti vibhāgo na pratyakṣaḥ. so 'nvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate. antareṇāpi śabdam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2243: avabudhyetevāsau{*1/631*} vyaktim. yas tūccarite 'pi śabde mānasād apacārāt kadācid ākṛtiṃ nopalabheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2244: na jātucid asāv imāṃ vyaktim avagaccheta. nanu vyaktiviśiṣṭāyām ākṛtau vartate. [83] vyaktiviśiṣṭāyāṃ ced varteta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2245: vyaktyantaraviśiṣṭā na pratīyeta. tasmāc chabda ākṛtipratyayasya nimittam. ākṛtipratyayo vyaktipratyayasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2246: nanu guṇabhūtā pratīyata ity uktam. na guṇabhāvo 'smatpakṣasya bādhakaḥ. sarvathā tāvat pratīyate. arthād guṇabhāvaḥ pradhānabhāvo vā. svārthaṃ ced uccāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2252: atha ca daṇḍaviśiṣṭo 'vagamyate. evam ihāpi na tāvad ākṛtir abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2253_0: atha cākṛtiviśiṣṭā vyaktir gamyeteti. naitat sādhu ucyate. satyaṃ daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2253_1: nābhidhīyate. na tv apratīte daṇḍe daṇḍipratyayo 'sti. asti tu daṇḍiśabdaikadeśabhūto daṇḍaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2254: yena daṇḍaḥ pratyāyitaḥ. tasmāt sādhv etad,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2255: yat - pratīte viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ pratīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2259: na gośabda ākṛtivacana iti. na ca yathā daṇḍiśabdo na daṇḍe prayuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2260_0: evaṃ gośabdo nākṛtau. tadartham eva nidarśitaṃ kevalākṛtyabhidhānaḥ śyenaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2260_1: tad evam anvayavyatirekābhyām asati śyenavyaktisaṃbandhe śyenaśabdoccāraṇād ākṛtivacana
GSP28msbh1-7u:2260_2: iti gamyate. na tu vrīhyākṛtisaṃbandham antareṇa vrīhivyaktau śabdasya prayogo dṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2260_3: tasmād ākṛtivacanaḥ śabda ity etaj jyāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2270: na kriyā syād iti ced arthāntare vidhānaṃ na dravyam iti cet // MS_1,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2271: atha yad uktam - na kriyā saṃbhaved vrīhin prokṣatīti. [84]{*1/633*} na dravyaśabdaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2272: ṣaḍ deyā iti anyadarśanavacanaṃ ca na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2282: prokṣaṇaṃ hi dravyasya kartavyatayā śrūyate. katamasya. yad yajati sādhanam. apūrvaprayuktatvāt tasya nākṛteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2283: aśakyatvāt. tatra vrīhiśabda ākṛtivacanaḥ prayujyate prokṣaṇāśrayaviśeṣaṇāya. sa hy ākṛtiṃ pratyāyayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2284_0: ākṛtiḥ pratītā satī prokṣaṇāśrayaṃ viśekṣyatīti. tenākṛtivacanaṃ na virudhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2284_1: evaṃ ṣaḍ deyā gāvo dakṣiṇā iti dakṣiṇādravye saṃkhyāyāḥ prayoktavye gāva ity ākṛtivacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:2284_2: viśeṣakaḥ. tathā - anyam iti vinaṣṭasya pratinidher anyatvasaṃbandhaḥ. tatra paśuśabda
GSP28msbh1-7u:2284_3: ākṛtivacana ākṛtyā viśekṣyatīti. tasmād gaur aśva ityevamādayaḥ śabdā ākṛter abhidhāyakā iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2289: uktaṃ samāmnāyaidam arthyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ tadarthaṃ syāt // MS_1,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2293: viśvajitā yajeteti{*1/639*} samāmananti{*1/640*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim udbhidādayo guṇavidhayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2295: ubhayathāpi pratibhāto vākyāt - udbhidety eṣa śabdo yajetety anena saṃbadhyate. sa kiṃ vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃbandham upaiti{*1/641*} - udbhidā dravyeṇa yāgam abhinirvartayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2296: uta sāmānādhikaraṇyena - udbhidā yāgena yajeteti. dvedhāpy etasmin pratibhāti vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2299: uktam asmābhiḥ samāmnāyasyaidam arthyam. kaścid asya bhāgo vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2303: yathā - vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti{*1/642*}. kaścin mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2305: yathā - barhir devasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādiḥ{*1/643*}. tasmād udbhidādayo 'mīṣāṃ prayojanānām anyatamāya prayojanāya bhaveyuḥ. tatra tāvan nārthavādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2306: vākyaśeṣo hi sa bhavati vidhātavyasya. na ca mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2307: evaṃjātīyakasya prakāśayitavyasyābhāvāt. pāriśeṣyād guṇavidhiḥ - udbhidguṇatā yāgasya vidhīyate. kutaḥ. prasiddher anugrahāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2308: guṇavidher arthavattvāt pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvāc ca. na caiṣāṃ yāgārthatā loke 'vagamyate. na ca vedena paribhāṣyate. ato guṇavidhayaḥ. yadi guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2309: na tarhi karma vidhīyate. avihite ca karmaṇi tatra guṇavidhāna[86]{*1/644*}m anarthakam. neti brūmaḥ. prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome guṇavidhānam arthavad bhaviṣyati. yadi nāmadheyaṃ syād,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2312: na pravṛttau kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ syāt. guṇavidhau ca guṇasaṃyogād abhyadhikam arthaṃ vidadhata udbhidādayaḥ śabdā arthavanto bhaviṣyanti. tasmād guṇavidhaya ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2325: api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yad utpattāv apūrvam avidhāyakatvāt // MS_1,4.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2326_0: api veti pakṣo viparivartate. nāmadheyaṃ syād iti pratijānīmahe evam avihitam arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2326_1: vidhāsyati - jyotiṣṭomād yāgāntaram. śrutiś caivaṃ yāgam abhidhāsyati. itarathā śrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:2326_2: udbhidādīn vakṣyantī udbhidādimato lakṣayet. udbhidvatā yāgena kuryād iti. yāgena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2326_3: kuryād iti yajetety asyārthaḥ. karaṇaṃ hi yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2328_1: matvarthalakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt. śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir jyāyasī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2328_2: tasmāt karmanāmadheyam. nanu prasiddhaṃ dravyavacanatvam apahnūyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2329: aprasiddhaṃ karmavacanatvaṃ pratijñāyeta. ucyate - tṛtīyānirdeśāt karmavacanatā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2330: karaṇavācino hi prātipādikāt tṛtīyā bhavati, karaṇaṃ ca yāgaḥ. tena yāgavacanam imam anumāsyāmahe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2331: naitad yuktam. yadi tṛtīyānirdeśe saty udbhidādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yāge buddhir utpadyeta syād etad evam. na hi no buddhir utpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2332: tasmād ayuktam. tṛtīyāvacanam anyathā nopapadyata iti cet. kāmaṃ nopapādi{*1/645*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2334: tasmād guṇavidhayaḥ. lakṣaṇeti cet. varaṃ lakṣaṇā kalpitā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2336: haṭho 'prasiddhakalpaneti. api ca - yadi nāmadheyaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2338_0: na nāmadheyam. ubhayavidhāne vākyabheda iti. ucyate - na nāmadheyaṃ vidhāyiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2338_1: anuvādā hy udbhidādayaḥ. kutaḥ prāptir iti cet. tato 'bhidhīyate - ucchabdasāmarthyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2338_2: bhicchabdasāmarthyāc codbhicchabdaḥ kriyāvacanaḥ - udbhedanaṃ prakāśanaṃ paśūnām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2338_3: anena kriyata ity udbhid yāgaḥ. evam ābhimukhyena jayād abhijit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2339: viśvajayād viśvajit. evaṃ sarvatra. ataḥ karmanāmadheyam. yat tv apravṛttiviśeṣakaro 'narthaka iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2340: nāmadheyam api guṇaphalopabandhenārthavat. tasmāt karmanāmadheyāny evaṃjātīyakānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2351: ājyaśabdaḥ pṛṣṭhaśabdaś ca guṇavidhaya uta karmanāmadheyānīti saṃśayaḥ. prasiddheḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2352: arthavattvāt pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvāc ca guṇavidhayaḥ. na caite karmāṇi prasiddhāḥ. na cāmī yaugikāḥ. jātiśabdā hy ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2353: citreti ca guṇaśabdaḥ. citrayā yajeti ca yāgānuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2354: vijñātatvān na yāgavidhiḥ. guṇe phalakalpanāyāṃ yajater na vivakṣā. tathājyāni bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2355: pṛṣṭhāni bhavantīti ca. guṇavidhikalpanāyām api na lakṣaṇā. tasmād guṇavidhaya ity evaṃ prāptam. [88]{*1/652*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2356: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yasmin guṇavidhir nāmadheyam iti saṃdigdhe guṇo 'para upadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2358: karmanāmadheyam ity arthaḥ. guṇavidhau hi sati vākyaṃ bhidyeta. puṃpaśau{*1/653*} prāpte strīpaśuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2360: citro guṇa iti na śakyam ekena vākyena vidhātum. citro guṇo vidhīyamānaḥ striyāṃ vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2362: so 'pi nāgnīṣomīye. tathā pañcadaśāny ājyāni bhavantīty ājyeṣu pañcadaśatā. na cāvihitāni stotreṣv ājyāni bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2364_0: tac caitad ājyāni vidadhyād vihiteṣu ca pañcadaśatām. gamyate ca pañcadaśatāyā ājyānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2364_1: ca saṃbandhaḥ. stotrasaṃbandhaś cājyānām avijñātaḥ pañcadaśatāsaṃbandhaś ca. dvāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:2364_2: etāv arthāv ekavākyasyāśakyau vidhātum. atha nu{*1 /654*} karmanāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2365: naiṣa virodho bhavati. kevalaṃ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhas tadānīṃ vidhīyate. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2366: ājyāni stotrāṇīty anena śabdena lakṣaṇayaiva guṇo vidhīyeta. ataḥ karmaṇāṃ nāmadheyāni vākyāntarair ājyaiḥ stuvate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2367: pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate ityevamādibhir vihitānām. yat tv aprasiddhaṃ karmaṇāṃ nāmadheyam iti{*1/655*}. avayavaprasiddhyā{*1/656*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2368_0: ājigamanād ājyāni. katham ājigamanam iti. arthavādavacanāt. yad ājimīyus tad ājyānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2368_1: ājyatvam iti. sparśavacanāt pṛṣṭhāni. pavamānārthamantrakatvād bahiḥsaṃbandhāc ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:2368_2: bahiṣpavamānam. dadhi madhu payo ghṛtaṃ dhānās taṇḍulā udakam iti{*1 /657*} nānāvidhadravyatvāc{*1 /658*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2368_3: citrā. tasmād evaṃjātīyakāni karmanāmadheyānīti. atha kasmān na pañcadaśasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:2368_4: ājyāni stotrakarmasu vidhīyante. viśiṣṭānāṃ vācakasya śabdasyābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2371: tad eteṣu stotreṣu vidhāsyati. naitat padadvayam api vidhāyakam. ekam atra vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2372: ekam uddeśakam. ubhayasmin vidhāyake paraspareṇa saṃbandho na syāt. avidhāyake stotrasaṃbandho na vidhīyate. na cātraikaṃ padaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ praty uddeśakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2373: stotraṃ prati vidhāyakaṃ bhavitum arhati. vacanavyaktibhedād ato 'yam asamādhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2379: *{1/651: E2,4 (richtig): saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhānīti, E5,6: saptadaśa pṛṣṭhāni}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2385: *{1/657: E2,4,5,6 (besser): udakaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatyam iti, diese Lesart hat E1 auch als Fn}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2391: āghāram āghārayatīti{*1/661*} ca samāmananti. tatra saṃśayaḥ -kim agnihotraśabda ādhāraśabdaś ca guṇavidhī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2392: uta karmanāmadheya iti. guṇavidhī iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2393: gamyate hi agnaye hotram asminn iti. tathā kṣaraṇasamarthaṃ dravyaṃ ghṛtādi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2394: āghāram āghārayatīti. prasiddhir evam anugrahīṣyate. guṇavidhiś ca darvihome,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2395_0: āghāraś copāṃśuyāje. tatraitayor arthavattā pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvaṃ ca. na ca guṇavidhipakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:2395_1: lakṣaṇā bhavati yathodbhidā yajeta iti. agnihotre samāsenāvagataṃ guṇavidhānam. āghāre
GSP28msbh1-7u:2395_2: 'pi āghāraṃ nirvartayatīti śrutyaiva guṇo vidhīyate. tasmād guṇavidhīty evaṃ prāpte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2396: brūmah - tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram. yau guṇāv etābhyāṃ vidhīyeta ity āśaṅkyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2397_0: tāv anyata evāvagatau. yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhotīti{*1 /662*} devatāvidhānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2397_1: caturgṛhītaṃ vā etad abhūt tasyādhāram ādhāryā ity{*1 /663*} ādhāre ca dravyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2397_2: aviditavedanaṃ ca vidhir ity ucyate. viditaṃ cātrānyato guṇavidhānam. tasmān na guṇavidhī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2397_3: karmanāmadheye tu saṃbhavataḥ. yasminn agnaye hotraṃ [90]{*1 /664*} homo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2398_0: tad agnihotram. dīrghadhārā kṣaraṇakriyā prasiddha evāghāraḥ. tasmāt karmanāmadheye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2398_1: prasiddhyādayaś coktottarāḥ. prajāpatinivṛttyartham agnividhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cen.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2398_2: naitad evam. agniṃ hy eṣa vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2399: na parjāpatiṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ. pratiṣidhyamānasya ca prajāpater vidhānam anarthakaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2400_0: prajāpatir devateti gamyate. gamyamānaṃ ca na śakyaṃ mithyeti kalpayitum. ato 'yam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2400_1: asamādhiḥ. ucyate - āghāram āghārayatīti dravyaparā codanā. yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti{*1 /665*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2401_0: dravyaṃ hy anayā kriyayā kṣāryate. kṣāritaṃ ca yāgaṃ sādhayati. tat kasya pradhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2401_1: karmaṇo nāmadheyam iti. ucyate - etad evāghāraṇaṃ pradhānakarma. nanv asya dravyadevataṇ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2401_2: nāsti. astīti brūmaḥ. tasyāghāram āghāryety ājyaṃ dravyam;
GSP28msbh1-7u:2402: māntravarṇikī devatā - indra ūrdhvoddhara ity āghāram āghārayatīti{*1/666*} mantro hy abhidadhat karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2403: tatsādhanaṃ vā karmaṇi samavaiti. eṣa ca mantra indram abhidhātuṃ śaknoti. sa yadīndras tatsādhanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2404: evam anena mantreṇāghāraḥ śakyate kartum. tasmād indro devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2419: athaiṣa gavābhicaran yajeteti{*1/669*} samāmnāyante. tatra guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ. prasiddhyādibhiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2420: udbhidādīnām iva. te tūdbhidādayaḥ kriyānimittāḥ śaknuvanti yāgaṃ vaditum. ime punar jātinimittā na śaknuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2421: [91]{*1/670*} tena guṇavidhaya ity evaṃ prāptam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tadvyapadeśaṃ ca. tena śyenādīnā prasiddhena yasya vyapadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2422: tac ca karmanāmadheyam. śrutir hi nāmadheyatve,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2424: ime na yāgam abhivadantīti. sādṛśyavyapadeśād abhivadiṣyanti. evaṃ hi vyapadeśo bhavati - yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2426: yam abhicaranti śyeneneti{*1/671*}. nipatyādatta ity anena sādṛśyena śyenaśabdo yāge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2427: yathā siṃho devadatta iti. tasmāt karmanāmadheyam. saṃdaṃśe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2428: saṃdaṃśena yathā durādānam ādatta iti. gavi yathā gāvo gopāyantīti. tasmāt saṃdaṃśaśabdo 'pi karmanāmadheyaṃ gośabdo 'pi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2436: nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syād vidhānam iti cet // MS_1,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2437: vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti{*1/672*} śrūyate. tatra kiṃ guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2438: karmanāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ. evaṃ cet saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2440: śrūyate hi guṇaḥ. so 'vagamyamāno na śakyo nāstīti vaditum. tasmād guṇavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2446: tulye hīme kriye syātām. yā ca vājypeyakriyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2448: ubhayatra dārśapaurṇamāsiko vidhyantaḥ syāt. tathā ca dīkṣāṇām upasadāṃ ca darśanaṃ nāvakalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2450: saptadaśopasatko vājapeya iti. atha vā tulyatvāt kriyayor neti. yadi na guṇavidhiḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2698_6: lakṣaṇārthaṃ ghṛtavacanam. yathā sṛṣṭiṣv asṛṣṭiṣu ca sṛṣṭiśabdaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2734: bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hy artho vidhīyate // MS_2,1.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2738: sandigdhānām arthānāṃ vākyaśeṣād arthādhyavasānam uktam. tan na prasmartavyam. anantaraṃ pradhānāpradhānāni{*2/1*} parīkṣiṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2741: eṣa eva cādhyāyasaṃbandhaḥ. tad iha ṣaḍvidhaḥ karmabhedo vakṣyate - śabdāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2746: nāmadheyam iti vakṣyamānam anusaṃkīrtyate. pradarśitam ucyamānaṃ sukhaṃ grāhayiṣyata iti śrotuś ca buddhiḥ samādhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2747: tad etan nānākarmalakṣaṇam ity adhyāyam ācakṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2750: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cintyate - prathame 'dhyāya idam uktam - codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti {*2/3*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2753: tatra kiṃ padena padena dharma ucyate{*2/4*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2754: uta sarvair eka eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2758: evam alpīyasy adṛṣṭānumānaprasaṇgakalpanā bhaviṣyati. tasmād ekam apūrvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2759: yadaikam, tadā sandehaḥ - kim, bhāvaśabdebhyaḥ, uta dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2762: yajati dadāti juhotītyevamādayaḥ. nanu yāgadānahomaśabdā ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2763: na bhāvaśabdāḥ. naitad evam. yāgādiśabdāś caite bhāvaśabdāś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2767: dravyaguṇaśabdebhyo dravyaguṇapratyayo na bhāvanāyāḥ. atas te na bhāvaśabdā iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? aviśeṣeṇeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2768: tata ucyate - bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāḥ, tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta, yajetetyevamādibhyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2769: bhāvārthatvād eva. ya āhuḥ - kim api bhāvayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2770: te svargakāmapadasaṃbandhāt svargaṃ bhāvayed iti brūyuḥ. tasmāt tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2771: phalasya kriyā karaṇaṃ niṣpattir iti. te ca yāgadānahomasaṃbaddhāḥ svargasyotpattiṃ vadanti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2772: eṣa hy artho vidhīyate, yathā - yāgādinā svargakāmaḥ kena bhāvayet svargam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2773: yāgādineti. yasya ca śabdasyārthena phalaṃ sādhyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2782_0: yajeta kiṃ kena katham iti. svargakāma ity anena prayojanena nirākāṅkṣāḥ. naivaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2782_1: dravyaguṇaśabdāḥ. tasmād bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā apūrvaṃ codayantīti. atha kasmād ubhayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2782_2: [110]{*2 /6*} sūtritam{*2 /7*} - bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā iti. ucyate - bhavanti kecit
GSP28msbh1-7u:2783: yathā śyenaikatrikādayaḥ{*2/8*}. kecid bhāvārthā na karmaśabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2784: yathā bhavanaṃ bhāvo bhūtir iti. kiṃ punar ihodāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2786: citrayā yajeta paśukāma iti{*2/10*}. kiṃ śyenenābhicarann uta yajetābhicarann iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2788: uta paśukāmo yajeteti sthite etasminn adhikaraṇe guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2789: nāmadheyam iti vicāro bhaviṣyati. tathā darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2795: vivibhaktikatvāt. tasmān na dravyaguṇaśabdā apūrvasya vidhāyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2804: *{2/8: Jhā, Ü, Bd.1, S.170 konj. śyenacitrādayaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2810: abhāvaśabdatvān na dravyaguṇaśabdā apūrvasya vidhāyakā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2812: svargakāmo darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity etayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ yajeteti vakṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2814: tathā citrayā paśukāma iti. tasmād ete 'pi sākāṅkṣatvād bhāvavacanāḥ. sarveṣu bhāvavacaneṣu nāsti vinigamanāyāṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2818: yeṣām utpattau sve prayoge rūpopalabdhis tāni nāmāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2819: tasmāt tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā bhūtatvāt sve prayoge // MS_2,1.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2820: yeṣāṃ śabdānām uccāraṇotpattau sve 'rthe prayujyamānānāṃ rūpa[111]{*2/11*}m upalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2825: īdṛśo dravyaguṇaśabdānām arthaḥ. te dravyaguṇaśabdā iti vaktavye tāni nāmānīti sūtritam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2826: ato nāmānīti eṣāṃ paryāyaśabdaḥ. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2827: yata eṣāṃ vibhaktayo nāmikya ucyante. katamāstāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2829: śuklaḥ śuklau śuklā ityevamādayaḥ. tasmāt samyak sūtritam. yata eṣāṃ na kṣaṇiko 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2830: tataḥ tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā pradhānākāṅkṣā na vidyata - iti naiṣām utpattiḥ kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2831: bhūtatvāt sve prayoge svaprayogakāle vidyamānatvād ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2836: yeṣāṃ tūtpattāv arthe sve prayogo na vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2837: tāny ākhyātāni. tasmāt tebhyaḥ pratīyetāśritatvāt prayogasya // MS_2,1.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2838: yeṣāṃ tu śabdānām uccāraṇotpattau sve 'rthe prayogo na vidyate. prayogakāle yeṣām artho nopalabhyata ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2839: tany ākhyātānīti bhāvaśabdān paryāyaśabdenopadiśati. kathaṃ paryāyaśabdatā bhāvaśabdānām. yata eṣāṃ vibhaktaya ākhyātikya ity ucyante. katamāstāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2840: pacati pacataḥ pacantītyevamādyaḥ. tasmāt tebhyo 'pūrvaṃ pratīyeta. bhavyārthās te bhūtārthaiḥ samuccaritāḥ. bhūtasya bhavyārthatāyāṃ dṛṣṭārthatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2842: sā ca bhūtena kriyata iti dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ. bhavyasya punar bhūtārthatāyāṃ na kiñcid dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2843: kalpyate cādṛṣṭam. tasmān na yāgo dravyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2844: kiṃ ca - āśritatvāt prayogasyaiteṣāṃ prayogaḥ puruṣeṇāśrito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2849: yāgo 'pi saṃbandho 'pi. svargakāmo dravyeṇeti dravye{*2/14*} pratīyate puruṣaś ca, na tu saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2851: arthinaś ca dravyasya ca saṃbandhaṃ yajeteti vakṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2852: dravyeṇa bhāvayed iti. ato dravyeṇārthasya bhāvanā gamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2855: yāgena bhāvayed iti tu śrutyā. yadā tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2857: na tadā dravyeṇa bhāvayed iti dravyasaṃbandhaḥ. na ca dravyasaṃbandhe vidhīyamāne yajetety anena saṃbandhaḥ. anūdyamāne tu saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2859: yaugapādyena vidhyanuvādau saṃbhavataḥ. tasmāc chrutivākyayor virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2861: tenārthinā na dravyasaṃbandhaḥ. tatra dravyam asati svargakāmasaṃbandhe svargārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīty anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2866: tadā{*2/15*} yāgavacanam eva bhavati. darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti lakṣaṇayā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2867: darśe ca pūrṇamāse ca yāgo vihita iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2868: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate, asti tad apūrvam iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2881: phalam asati nimitte na syāt. tasmād utpādayatīti. yadi punaḥ phalavacanasāmarthyāt tad eva na viniśyatīti kalpyate. naivaṃ śakyam. na hi karmaṇo 'nyad rūpam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2887: na tu{*2/18*} tad eva deśāntarād āgamanasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2888: na hy asaty āgamane kiṃcid viruddhaṃ dṛśyate. yatra samavetam āsīt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2890: tasya vināśāt tad api vinaṣṭam ity avagamyate. āśrayo 'py avinaṣṭa iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2891_0: bhasmopalambhanāt. saty api basmany astīti cet. na vidyamānopalambhane 'py adarśanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2891_1: phalakriyā liṅgam iti cet. evaṃ saty adarśane samādhir vaktavyaḥ. saukṣmādīnām anyatamad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2892: kalpitam evaṃ sati kiṃcid bhavatīti. tatrāpūrvaṃ vā kalpyeta tad veti. aviśeṣakalpanāyām asti hetuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2893: na viśiṣṭakalpanāyām. anāśritaṃ karma bhaviṣyatīti cet. tad api tādṛśam eva. svabhāvāntarakalpanena deśāntaraṃ na prāpayiṣyatīti. tādṛśam eva. tasmād bhaṅgī yajiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2898: yathā tarhi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2899: dravyaṃ guṇaṃ vā pratinidhāya prayogo 'nuṣṭhātavya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2915: vilāpayatītyevamādayaś ca. teṣu sandehaḥ - kiṃ sarve pradhānakarmaṇo vidhāyakāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2916: uta kecit saṃskārakarmaṇa iti. bhāvārthatvāviśeṣāt sarve pradhānakarmaṇo vācakā iti prāptam. tato brūmaḥ - tāni dvaidhaṃ bhavitum arhantīti dviprakārāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2918: kānicit saṃskārakarmaṇaḥ. evam api sarvāṇy arthavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2919: arthavattve sati sarvebhyaḥ na śakyam apūrvaṃ kalpayitum. ato na sarvāṇi pradhānakarmaṇo vācakāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2923: yair dravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate, tāni pradhānabhūtāni, dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2927: kuto neti. tad ucyate - yair bhāvakarmabhir na dravyaṃ saṃskartum iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2937: yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇas tatra pratīyeta, tasya dravyapradhānatvāt // MS_2,1.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2938: yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate, guṇas tatra pratīyeta karma. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2939: tasya dravyapradhānatvāt. pratyakṣaṃ yajetetyevamādibhir dravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2941: dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt. pinaṣṭi - ityevamādibhir dravyaṃ saṃskriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2942: tasmāt tāni guṇakarmavacanāni. eṣa eva vinigamanāyāṃ hetuḥ. prayojanaṃ tu pūrvasmin pakṣe praiyaṅgave 'pi carau vrīhaya utpādyā avadhātārthatvena. siddhānte notpādyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2946: dharmamātre tu karma syād anirvṛtteḥ prayājavat // MS_2,1.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2953: uta guṇakarmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. tata{*2/26*} ucyate - karmamātram evaṃjātīyakam aparyāptaṃ yat prayojanasya dṛṣṭasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2958: dravyaṃ tv evaṃjātīyakam abhinirvartayad{*2/27*} guṇabhūtam. tasya guṇabhūtatvād idaṃ pradhānabhūtam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2966: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. itarair guṇakarmabhiḥ sadharmaḥ syād evaṃjātīyakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2969: tulyā hi dvitīyā śrutir eṣāṃ dravyeṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2972_0: puroṅāśaṃ paryagni karotīti. kiṃ guṇakarmaṇi dravye dvitīyā dṛṣṭeti yato dvitīyādarśanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2972_1: ihāpi sāmānyato dṛṣṭena guṇakarmatā. neti brūmaḥ - dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ kartur īpsitatame smaryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2976: karma guṇabhūtam. yady api pratyakṣādibhir guṇabhāvo na gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2984: iti cet paśyasi - dvitīyādarśanāt pradhānabhūtam atra dravyam iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2992: na, tadarthatvāl lokavat tasya ca śeṣabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2994: evaṃ hy abhiyuktā upadiśanti - karmaṇi dvitīyā{*2/31*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2996: na ca loke guṇabhūte kvacid dvitīyāṃ paśyāmaḥ. yad api ca taṇḍulān odanaṃ paceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2997: odanārthaṃ taṇḍulān saṃskurv itīpsitā eva taṇḍulāḥ. balvajān śikhaṇḍakān kurv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2998: balvjā eva tenā-kāreṇa saṃbaddhā īpsitā iti tatrābhiprāyaḥ. laukikaś ca prayogaḥ śabdārthaparicchede hetur na vaidikaḥ. yat tu laukike{*2/33*} juhotīti prayoge dvitīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2999: śakyate tatra vaktum īpsitatama eva sa prayoga iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3001: taṇḍulān adya homena saṃbandhayeti loke bhavati hi bahuprakārā vivakṣā. anyāyaś cānekārthatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3002: tena pradhānabhāvena siddhā satī dvitīyā guṇabhāvena kalpyeta. vede tu kathaṃ dvitīyānirdiṣṭe guṇabhāva iti. dvitīyānirdeśāt pradhānyam evāvagacchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3003: evam avagate pradhānye balīyasā hetunā nāsti prādhānyam ity avagamyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3004: na homasya kecit prakāreṇa saktvarthatāvakalpyate kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3006: na saktūnām anyat prayojanaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate{*2/35*} vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3007: yadi vā homas tadartho homo 'pi niṣprayojanaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3012: prayogavacanena hi sa ākāṅkṣyate. nanu saktūnām api prakaraṇapāṭhāt prayojanavattvaṃ bhaviṣyati. ko vā brūte - neti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3015: nānyena prakāreṇa. nanu te 'pi prayogavacanenākāṅkṣyante. tad ucyate - na dravyaṃ tenākāṅkṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3018_0: na dravyam. nanu home kṛte saktubhyo 'dṛṣṭaṃ niṣpatsyate. nāsty atra pramāṇam. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:3018_1: dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ pramāṇam. na hi dvitīyā vibhaktir homasya saktvarthatāṃ jñāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3018_2: na saktavaḥ prayojanavanta iti bhaved dhomaḥ saktvarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3020: bhavanti home kṛte saktavo homasaṃbaddhāḥ. na homasya saktvarthatā niṣprayojaneṣu saktuṣu ghaṭate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3021: saktv-arthatāvacanaṃ tu na puruṣasyopakārakaṃ na kratoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3022: tadanarthakam eva syāt. yato na{*2/36*} tadvacanāc chakyam anyatarat{*2/37*} kalpayitum. sa eṣa dvitīyāntaḥ saktūnāṃ homasya ca saṃbandhaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3023: saṃbandhe ca sati dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandha iti bhūtatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3026: tena tadarthatvād dhomārthatvāt saktūnāṃ na pradhānyaṃ dvitīyāsaṃyoge 'pi. evam saty arthavad vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3027: na cārthavattve saty ānārthakyam ity ucyate. tasya ca puroḍāśāder yāgādiṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3029: tatra saṃskāro nānarthakaḥ. na sa dṛṣṭopakārāyeti cet. adṛṣṭārtho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3031: yathā grāmāntarād āgatānāṃ puruṣānāṃ paryagnikareṇādṛṣṭa upakāraḥ kriyata ity ucyate. loke ca nānupapattiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3035: nānāvṛkṣasruca utpādayitavyāḥ saṃmārgārthatvena yathā pūrvapakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3036_0: śamīmaya eva hi hiraṇmayo vā saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ. tathā yatra bāṇavantaḥ paridhayas tatrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3036_1: pālāśā utpādayitavyāḥ pūrvapakṣe. siddhānte bāṇavanta eva saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ. avabhṛthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:3037_0: siddhānte cāpaḥ saṃmārjanīyāḥ. tathā{*2 /40*} ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaretarasamayāḥ puroḍāśāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3037_1: savanīyā{*2 /41*} iti śrūyate. tatrāpi piṣṭamayaḥ puroḍāśa utpādayitavayaḥ paryagnikaraṇārthatvena pūrvapakṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3042: *{2/33: E1,6; E2,4: yā laukike, E5: yā tu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3052: stutaśastrayos tu saṃskāro yājyāvad devatābhidhānatvāt // MS_2,1.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3056: pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvate - iti guṇavacanaṃ stavanaṃ śaṃsanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3057: yathā - indrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam iti{*2/42*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3060: uta pradhānam iti. tatrocyate - stutaśastre saṃskārakarmaṇīti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3065: devatāprakāśanena ca pratyakṣa [119]{*2/43*} upakāro yāgasiddhiḥ. tasmāt saṃskārakarmaṇī yājyāvat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3067: puro 'nuvākyām anvāheti stutivacanaṃ devatāprakāśanenārthavat, tadvad etad apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3072: arthena tv apakṛṣyeta devatānām acodanārthasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3075: devatārthasya guṇabhūto mantra iti tatpradhānabhāve yatra pradhānaṃ tatra nīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3076_0: tatra kramasannidhī uparudhyeyātām. tasmād eṣa duṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ - iti paryudasitavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3076_1: katamaḥ punar asau mantraḥ. abhi tvā śūrety{*2 /45*} aindraḥ pragātho māhendrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3088: sa evendro mahattvena guṇena mahendra ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3094: yathā sā vā eṣā sarvadevatyā yad ajā vaśā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3095: vāyavyām ālabhetety{*2/47*} ajāvaśāśabdena codite karmaṇi chāgaśabdena nigamā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3096: tadvat saguṇe codite nirguṇenābhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati. tena na{*2/48*} bhaviṣyaty utkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3100: *{2/48: E2 om. tena, E4: te na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3105: [120]{*2/50*} na cāsya mahattvam apekṣamāṇasya taddhitasaṃyoga upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3106: taddhitasaṃyogāpekṣasya vā mahattvasaṃbandhāt samāsakalpanā. na ca taddhitārthe vṛttasya mahattvasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3107: na ca samāsārthe vṛttasya taddhitasaṃbandhaḥ. na cāsminn eva prayoge samāsārthe vṛttir iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3108: etasminn eva taddhitārthe. na cāyam indraśabdo 'vihitavat svārthaṃ taddhitārthena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3109: vihitavac ca parārthaṃ mahattvena saṃbaddham anūdyeta. vispaṣṭaś cāyam anyo 'rtho mahendro bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3111: anyaś cendro haviṣo devatā bhavatīti sakṛd uccāraṇe ca nobhayaṃ śakyeta. tasmān nendro devatā mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3114: na tv avayavasaṃbandhena. tasmād devatāntaram indrān mahendraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3116: ataḥ paryudastitavyaḥ eṣa pakṣaḥ. yad apy ucyate - indrasya vṛtravadhottarakālaṃ mahendratvaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3117: mahān vāyam abhūd yo vṛtram avadhīd iti{*2/51*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3128: bahu dugdhi mahendrāya devebhyo havir iti{*2/53*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3136: yadā vidhiśabdād avagatam etad bhavati - indro devateti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3138: mahattvaṃ nāmendrasya guṇo bhavatīti devatābhidhānam. kathaṃ tasyai devatāyai dīyata iti. [121]{*2/54*} guṇe 'pi hi vihite sati tasyā eva devatāyai dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3139: avihite 'pi. tasmād guṇavidhānam anarthakam. athocyate - yo 'smin grahe indraḥ sa mahān iti. naivaṃ grahasaṃbandhasyāprasiddhatvād viśeṣaṇaṃ nātra kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3140: guṇasaṃbandhasya cāprasiddhatvād guṇena viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptam. tasmād api devatāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3145: evaṃ sati yājyāpuronuvākyayor bhedena darśanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3146: endra{*2/55*} sānasiṃ rayim ity{*2/56*} aindrayājyāpuronuvākyād vayam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3147: mahān indro ya ojasā - iti{*2/57*} bhedena māhendraṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3148: tadekatve vikalpyeta. tatra, pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3155: yad uktam - ajāvaśāśabdena codite karmaṇi chāgaśabdena nigamā bhavantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3158: chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nubrūhīti{*2/58*} yaiva vaśā saiva chāgeti. tasmāt pragāthasyotkarṣaḥ saṃskārapakṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3192: sarvā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi sarvāṇi sāmāni vācastome,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3194: tathā yasyāśvine śasyamāne sūryo nodiyād api sarvā dāśatayīr anubrūyād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3195: tasmād asty arthavattotkṛṣṭānām. ataḥ saṃskārakarmaṇī stotraśastre iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3197: *{2/64: Mit E6; E2,4 om. aśvamedhe, E5 hat es geklammert}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3199: api vā śrutisaṃyogāt prakāraṇe stautiśaṃsatī kriyotpattiṃ vidadhyātām // MS_2,1.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3200: api vā pradhānakarmaṇī stotraśastre syātām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3208: tatra karaṇaṃ kavatyas{*2/66*} tṛtīyayāśroṣyam{*2/67*}, na saptamyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3211: niṣkevalyaṃ śaṃsatīti. ataḥ stutir abhinirvartayitavyā tena mantreṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3212: guṇavacanaḥ śabdaḥ stutinirvartanārtho 'dṛṣṭam{*2/68*} arthaṃ kariṣyati. tasmāt pradhānakarmaṇī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3215: yathendrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam iti{*2/70*}. tena devatāśabdaḥ stutisaṃbandhārtha ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3216: devatābhidhānārthe prātipadikārthatvāt prathamā syāt. atha yat prathamāntam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3218: yathā - indro yāto vasitasya{*2/71*} rājeti{*2/72*}. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3219: tad api vākyasaṃyogāt stutyartham eva. nanu vākyāl liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3221: yat stutivākyasya sākāṅkṣasya nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇasāmarthyam. tathāpy ubhayathā liṅge 'nugṛhyamāṇe kuto nirṇayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3222_0: vākyaśeṣād eva na devatābhidhānārtha iti. devatābhidhānārtha ity etasmin pakṣe stutyarthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3222_1: sākāṅkṣavacanam anarthakam eva syāt. tasmād adṛṣṭārthatvāt stutivacanasya pradhānakarmaṇī stotraśastre.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3223: api ca - stautiśaṃsatīti sākṣād guṇavacanau lakṣaṇayābhidhānārthau syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3238: itarathā hi dvādaśatvaṃ na syāt. stotrāṇāṃ śastrāṇāṃ ca ekam eva śaṃsanaṃ stavanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3245: tan na vidhātavyam eva yadi saṃskārakarma{*2/74*}. tasmād api pradhānakarmaṇī iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3255: tatas tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ. yadi vāpūrvavacane tato 'nyat stotram anyac chastram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3256: itarathā yad eva stotraṃ tad eva śastraṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3267: indravanto manemahi bhakṣīmahi{*2/78*} prajām iṣaṃ sā me saty āśīryajñasya bhūyād iti{*2/79*} stotraphalam anūdyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3268: na devatāyāḥ. tasmāt pradhānakarmaṇī stotraśastre. anyatra sūtrabaddhaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3269: daśame 'dhyāye{*2/80*} grahāṇāṃ devatānyatve stutaśastrayoḥ pradhānakarmatvād adhikāraḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3272: *{2/78: E1,6; E2: vanāmaha dhukṣīmahi, E4,5: vanāmahe dhukṣīmahi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3279: taskaro nāsām ā mitro{*2/81*} vyathir ā dadharṣati. devāṃś ca yābhiryajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3280: dadāti ca jyog ittābhiḥ sa ca te gopatiḥ saheti{*2/82*}. yajate dadātīty udāharaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3281: kiṃ yadvad brāhmaṇe bhāvaśabdo vidhāyakas tadvan mantre 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3282: uta mantre 'bhidhāyaka{*2/83*} iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3283: vidhau matre cāmnāyamānasya bhāvaśabdasya eka evārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3285: sa evāyam ekaḥ śabdo brāhmaṇagato vidhāsyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3286: mantragato na śaknoti vidhātum ity anupapannam, tasmād vidhāyakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3293: api vā prayogasāmarthyān mantro 'bhidhānavācī syāt // MS_2,1.31 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3301: goyāgasya tv anubandhyāyām. karmāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3302: asakṛd apy ucyamāne tatpratyayād eva. stutyarthakalpanāyām apy ānarthakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3303: parisamāptena sārthavādakena vākyena vihitatvād yāgasya. tasmān na mantragato bhāvaśabda evaṃjātīyako vidhāyaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3306: mantragato bhāvaśabdo vidhāyako neti parīkṣitam. ko 'yaṃ mantro nāmeti ucyate. ajñāte mantre tadgato bhāvaśabdaḥ kathaṃ vicārita iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3307: idam artho 'dhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam. kathaṃ lakṣaṇo mantra iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3312: mantrā vartanta iti. prāyikam idaṃ lakṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3313: anabhidhāyakā api kecin mantrā ity ucyanta{*2/85*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3315_0: na śakyaṃ pṛṣṭhākoṭeṇa{*2 /87*} tatra tatropadeṣṭum iti lakṣaṇam uktam - ṛṣayo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3315_1: padārthānāṃ nāntaṃ yānti [126]{*2 /88*} pṛthakkaśaḥ{*2 /89*}. lakṣaṇena tu siddhānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:3320: pralapitam akṣī te indrapiṅgale duler{*2/95*} iveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3329: tac caitad vṛttikāraṇenodāharaṇopadeśenākhyātam{*2/106*}. etad api prāyikam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3331: īḍyaś cāsi vandyaś ca vājin iti{*2/107*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3332: tvāmadhyāś ca tattvāyāmīti. āśīr brāhmaṇam api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3334: stutir api vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devateti{*2/108*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3335: pralāpo na caitad vidmo yadi brāhmaṇā vā smo 'brāhmaṇāḥ smo veti{*2/109*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3336: paridevanaṃ ye mām adhukṣanta te māṃ pratyamuñcanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3338: anveṣaṇam iha vā sa iha veti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3341: anuṣaṅgaḥ hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyaty atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasīti{*2/110*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3343: sāmarthyaṃ sruveṇāvadyati draveṣv iti. lakṣaṇakarmaṇi prayojanaṃ prasiddhatvān na vaktavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3344: laghīyasī pratipattir lakṣaṇena. ākṣepeṣv apavādeṣu prāptyāṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi. prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yaś ca kṛtvā pravartate. ākṣepeṣu pūrvādhikaraṇasya prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3347: kṛtvācintāyāṃ pūrvādhikaraṇasya prayojanam. asti vede mantraśabdo yasyāyam arthaḥ parīkṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3348: ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yam ṛṣayas trayīvidā viduḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3385: tatra mantralakṣaṇa ukte pariśeṣasiddhatvād brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam avacanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3388: tad brāhamaṇam iti pariśeṣasiddhaṃ brāhmaṇam. vṛttikāras tu śiṣyahitārthaṃ prapañcitavān itikaraṇabahulam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3391: hetuḥ sūrpeṇa{*2/114*} juhoti tena hy annaṃ kriyata iti{*2/115*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3405: ulmukhair ha sma pūrve samājagmur iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3407_0: yāvato 'śvān pratigṛhnīyād iti. hetur nirvacanaṃ nindā praśaṃsā saṃśayo vidhiḥ. parakriyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3407_1: purākalpo vyavadhāraṇakalpanā. upamānaṃ daśaite tu vidhayo brāhmaṇasya tu. etad vai{*2 /123*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3407_2: sarvavedeṣu niyataṃ vidhilakṣaṇam. etad api prāyikam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3414: nirvacanaṃ tasmād āpo nu sthanā{*2/131*} - iti{*2/132*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3417: saṃśayaḥ - adhaḥ khidāsīd{*2/135*} upari khidāsīd{*2/136*} iti{*2/137*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3420: purākalpaḥ - yajñena yajñam ayajanta devā iti{*2/142*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3454: anāmnāteṣv amantratvam āmnāteṣu hi vibhāgaḥ // MS_2,1.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3456: mantrā uta neti. abhidhāyakatvān mantrā iti prāpte brūmaḥ - anāmnāteṣu mantratvaṃ na syād abhidhāyakeṣv api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3463: mantre duṣṭe yat prāyaścittam amantreṣu tan na.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3467: ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yam ṛṣayas trayīvidā{*2/144*} viduḥ ṛco{*2/145*} yajūṃṣi sāmānīti{*2/146*}. kathaṃlakṣaṇikā ṛcaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3469: yatra pādakṛtā vyavasthā sa mantra ṛg nāmā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3474: ṛco vartanta iti. yady arthavaśenety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3478: kiṃ tarhy anuvāda eṣa pradarśanārthaḥ. avaśyaṃ caitad evaṃ vijñeyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3479: vṛttādinirvṛttyarthe sati vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmād yatra pādakṛtā vyavasthā, sā ṛg iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3492: pragīte hi mantravākye sāmaśabdam abhiyuktā upadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3496: abhiyuktopadeśaś ca naḥ pramāṇam. yathā - amlaṃ{*2/150*} dadhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3497: madhuro guḍa iti gītiviśiṣṭe tāvan mantre gītiśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3500: *{2/150: E2: pratyakṣā amlaṃ, E4: yakṣā amlaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3503: atha yajuṣaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti. yajuṣo lakṣaṇaṃ na vaktavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3505: yā na gītir na ca pādabaddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3507: atha nigado nāma kiṃ yajūṃṣy uta yajuṣo 'nya iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3509: nigado vā caturthaṃ syād dharmaviśeṣāt // MS_2,1.38 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3518: na ca tasyoccais tvaṃ dharmo dṛśyeta. dṛśyate tu. tasmāc caturthaṃ mantrajātaṃ nigado nāma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3530: tadrūpatvāt, tad evaiṣāṃ rūpam, yad yajuṣāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhaḥ, ṛksāmalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatā ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3533: vacanāt pratyāyanasāmarthyāt, asti hi puruṣāntarapratyāyanasāmarthyaṃ keṣāṃcid yajuṣām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3536: asti ca taiḥ puruṣāntaraiḥ pratyāyitaiḥ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3537: nopaṃśūccāryamāṇāḥ puruṣāntaraṃ pratyāyayeyuḥ. tasmād dharmaviśeṣo 'rthavān. yāni ca yajaṃṣy{*2/152*} uccair uccāryante te nigadāḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3540: yathā prakarṣeṇa raktaṃ nitarāṃ raktam ity ucyate. gadatir gadanārthaḥ pāṭhavacanaḥ. eṣa eva hi prakarṣo yad uccais tvāvacchinnatvaṃ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3541: nanu vācaniko guṇo yajuṣām upāṃśutvam. neti brūmaḥ - guṇo nāma sa bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3543: na ca parasaṃbodhanārthānāṃ yajuṣām upāṃśutvaṃ sāhāyye vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3545: tena puruṣāntarasaṃbodhanārtham uccais tvaṃ guṇaḥ. itarārthaṃ tu vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3557: itaḥ parivrājakā iti. evam uccaistvena guṇena tāny eva yajūṃṣi vyapadiśyante, nigadā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3560: yadi ya uccair gadyate sa nigadaḥ, ṛg api nigadaḥ prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3564: ayājyā vai nigadā ṛcaiva yajantīti pṛthaktvanimittā hi vyapadeśā bhavanti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3566: prāptir ucyatām iti. apādabaddhe gadatir vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3571: arthaikatvād ekaṃ vākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ ced vibhāge syāt // MS_2,1.46 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3572: atha praśliṣṭapaṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣu katham avagamyeta iyad ekaṃ yajur iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3573: yāvatā padasamūhenejyate, tāvān padasamūhaḥ ekaṃ yajuḥ. kiyatā cejyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3575: tāvad vaktavyatvād vākyam ity ucyate. tenābhidhīyate - [132]{*2/156*} arthaikatvād ekaṃ vākyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3576: etasmāc cet kāraṇād ekavākyatā bhavati. tasmād ekārthaḥ padasamūho vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3577: yadi ca vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ padaṃ bhavati. kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3578: devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti{*2/157*}. nanu padaṃ padam atraikārtham. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3579: na tu tadvibhāge sākāṅkṣaṃ. na tarhy arthaikatvam upapadyate. bahutvāt padārthānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3580: padasamudāyasya ca pṛthagartho nāstīty uktam. bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā vākyārtha iti yady ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3582: bahupade bhedānāṃ saṃsargāṇāṃ ca bahutvāt. ekaprayojanatvād upapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3585: tat vākyam. nanv atra devasya tvā savituḥ prasave nirvapāmīty ekaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3587: evaṃ bahūni vākyāni. yadi nirvapāmīty anuṣaṅgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3591: tadā pratipradhānaṃ bhidyeta. na ca nirvāpo devasya tvetyevamādīnām arthenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3592: sādhanaprādhānye hy adṛṣṭārthatā vacasya syāt. nirvāpe punaḥ pradhāne dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ nirvāpaprakāśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3593: tat sarvair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭam ucyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ. yathā ca padaṃ padena viśeṣyate tathoktaṃ tadbhūtānām iti{*2/158*}. tasmād ekaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3595: arthaikatvād iti ca vibhāge sākāṅkṣatvād{*2/159*} iti ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3600: aryamā vāṃ vibhajatv ity ekārthāḥ sarve vibhāgam abhidadhati. nanu bhagaviśiṣṭād vibhāgād aryam aviśiṣṭo 'nyo vibhāgaḥ. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3605_0: vibhāge tu na sākāṅkṣam. tasmād bhinnam idaṃ vākyaṃ vibhāge vikalpyate. tathā syonaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3605_1: te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā susevaṃ{*2 /161*} kalyayāmi{*2 /162*}. tasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:3605_2: sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medhaḥ sumanasyamāna iti{*2 /163*} vibhāge sākāṅkṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3607: sadanakaraṇaṃ puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca. tasmād bhinne vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3626: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām iti{*2/166*}. atra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3627: kim evamādiṣu bhinnaṃ vākyam utaikam iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3629: īṣe tvety evam ukte na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3633: evam alyīyasy adṛṣṭānumānakalpanā bhaviṣyati. tasmād ekaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3634: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sameṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3637: ūrje tvety anenāparaḥ. nanu idānīm evoktaṃ nātra dṛṣṭo 'rtha iti. yady api pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena nopalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3640: ūrje tvety anumārṣṭīti{*2/167*}. tathā - āyuryajñena kalpatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3641: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity āyuḥkḷpter anyā prāṇakḷptiḥ. nanu sāmānyamātram idaṃ tan na viśeṣaṇabhedād bhedam arhatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3642: yathā - agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti [134]{*2/168*} nirvāpa ekas tasya viśeṣāḥ savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ puṣṇo{*2/169*} hastābhyām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3643: na teṣāṃ bhedān nirvāpasya bheda iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3645: nāsāv āyurādibhir viśeṣair bhinno bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate - iha kḷptīr vācayatīti bahvaḥ{*2/170*} kḷptayaḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3647: tatraikām āyuḥkḷptim āyuḥyajñena kalpatām ity eṣa mantraḥ śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3648: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity ayam api prāṇakḷptim aparām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3650: tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam. tasmād anekārthatvāt tatrāpi vākyabheda iti. nanu sāmānyavacanād ekatvaṃ yathā vibhāge. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3651: vibhāge dṛṣṭārthaṃ sāmānyam iha na. api ca kḷptīr vācayatīti vihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3652: āyuḥyajñena kalpatām iti cāyuḥkḷptyabhidhānam abhinivartyate pratyakṣam. prāṇo yajñena kalpatām iti ca prāṇakḷpteḥ. tasmād vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3663: ugraṃ vaco apāvadhīt tveṣaṃ vaco apāvadhīt svāhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3665: yā te agne harāśayety{*2/171*} atra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3667: āhosvil laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3668: yā te agne rajāśayety etasya tanūr-varṣiṣṭheti na vākyaśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3669: na hy ayam asmāt paraḥ prayujyate. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāptiḥ syāt tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3670: yathaiva hy ayaṃ yā te agne 'yāśayety etasyānantaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3672: yā te agne harāśayety etayor api. harāśayety etasya vyavahita iti cet. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3674: avyavahito rajāśayeti samudāyaḥ [135]{*2/172*} samudāyena ca vākyaśeṣasya saṃbandhābhāvāt samudāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3675: samudāyisaṃbandhe ca na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. tasmāt sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3676: api ca sākāṅkṣasya sannidhau paras tātpurastād vā paripūrṇasamarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo vākyaśeṣo bhavati. kiyāṃs tu kālaḥ sannidhir iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3677: ucyate - yāvati śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum. kaś cāsau?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3679: tāvati hi śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3680: saṃbandhipadavyavāye hi saṃbandhād eva pūrvasaṃskāro nāpaiti. yatrāpy apareṇa sākāṅkṣena vyavāyas tatrāpy asti saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3681: dvayor api hi kāryaṃ vaktavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3685: tasmād yathaivāyam ekasya sannidhāv evam aparasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3687: dvayor apy ākāṅkṣator{*2/173*} etāvac ca vākyaśeṣasaṃbandhe kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3689: avyavadhāne vicchede 'pi bhavati saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād anuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3694: devasya tvā{*2/174*} savitā punātv achidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhir iti{*2/175*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3695: atra hi punātv antāni paripūrṇāni na kiṃcid ākāṅkṣanti. nanv achidreṇety etad ākāṅkṣiṣyati{*2/176*}. satyam ākāṅkṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3700: ekena ca saṃbaddho nānarthako bhavati. tasmān netarāv ākāṅkṣatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3701: itarāv api paripūrṇatvān na tam ākāṅkṣataḥ. nanv etasya vākyaśeṣasyaikam apy ākāṅkṣato na gamyate viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3703: kena vā neti. tenānavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarvaiḥ saha saṃbhantsyate. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3705: yenāsya pratyakṣam ānantaryam upalabhāmahe tena saha saṃbhantsyata iti gamyate viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3706: tasmāt tenānantareṇa saha saṃbha[136]{*2/178*}ntsyata iti nāsti sarvatrānuṣaṅga iti. āha - naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3709: ekaś cāsau punātuśabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3712: tatra tenaikavākyatvād achidreṇety ayam api prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3713: tathā ca sati citpatis tvetyevamādayo vinā punātuśabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3717: tena punātuśabdena sānuṣaṅgeṇa niyogataḥ sarve nirākāṅkṣīkartavyāḥ. tasmāt sarveṣu tulyaprayogā iti vākyaparisamāptir anuṣajyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3731: saṃ yajñapatir āśiṣā{*2/181*} iti. vāryur{*2/182*} vātena gacchatām ity eṣa saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīti bahuvacanāntana vyavahitatvāt saṃyajñapatir āśiṣety atra nānuṣajyata{*2/183*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3732: ekena sākāṅkṣeṇa vyaveto{*2/184*} gacchatām iti śeṣaḥ,
