GSP28msbh1-7u:3733: tato bahuvacanāntena saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīty etena saṃbandham anupetya vyavetatvāt pareṇa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3736: gamyamāne viśeṣe na tatra bhāvo vākyaśeṣasyopapadyate. tasmād bahuvacanāntasya parasya ca tadvyapetasya laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3743: *{2/183: E2: nānuṣañjate, E4: nānuṣajjate, E5: nānuṣajyate, E6: nānuṣajjyate}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3748: asti jyotiṣṭomas tatra śrūyate - somena yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3750: hiraṇyamātreyāya dadātīti{*2/186*}; yajati - dadāti - juhotayas te kiṃ saṃhatya kāryaṃ kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3756: ekaikasmin hi śakyate śikyam avalambayitum. ato yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3758: juhotavyaḥ saṃhatya sādhayeyur viyutya veti jāyate saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3759: kiṃ tāvat prāptam, saṃhatyeti. kutaḥ? adṛṣṭārthānām upakārakalpanālpīyasī nyāyyeti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3760: adṛṣṭo yo 'śruto vārthaḥ, sa nāstīty avagamyate/
GSP28msbh1-7u:3761: tasminn asati dṛṣṭaś cet śruto vā na virudhyate//
GSP28msbh1-7u:3762: virudhyamāne kalpyaḥ syāj jāyate tena so 'rthavān/
GSP28msbh1-7u:3763: viśeṣaś cen na gamyeta, tato naiko 'pi kalpyate//
GSP28msbh1-7u:3765: bahubhya ekam apūrvam iti. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3767: avayavānāṃ samudāyaṃ praty arthavattvād ekam apūrvaṃ samudāyāt kalpitaṃ bhaviṣyati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3769: avayavaśabdair eva samudāyasyoktatvāt. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ. atha vā yajetety etasya pūrvo bhāgo [138]{*2/187*} yajaty arthaṃ bravīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3770: uttaras tam eva{*2/188*} bhāvayed ity anuvadati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3771: evaṃ juhotīti pūrvo bhāgo juhoty artham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3772: uttaras tam evānuvadati. tenaikasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ trayo yajaty ādaya upāyā vidhīyante śrutyā. tasmād etair yāgadānahomair viśiṣṭāpūrvasya bhāvanā pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3773: ata ucyate - saṃhatyaikam apūrvaṃ sādhayantīti. yad vā yajatiśabdena vihitaṃ dānaṃ dānahomaśabdenānūdyate guṇasambandhārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3775: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - pratiśabdam apūrvabheda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3779: śabdāntaratvāt. prayogavākyaśeṣabhāvena hi samudāyasya sattāsambandho gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3781: yajeta - iti sannihitayor api vākyena dānahomayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3783: na dānahomayoḥ. śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmān na samudāyaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3785: śabdāntaraṃ ca yajater dadātiḥ. tatra yady api paro bhāgo bhāvanāvacanaḥ sarveṣu samānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3787: anyaś ca tena samudāyaḥ śabdāntaram anyasmāt samudāyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3789: dadyād iti dānena sādhayed iti kevalam eva dānaṃ karaṇaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3790: na yāgahomau sahāyāv apekṣate. tathā juhotīti homasādhanāṃ bhāvanām āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3792: dānena kevalena sidhyatīti juhotīty api homena kevalena sidhyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3793: na tu dānena kevalena sidhyatīti vijñānam nivartate. dadāti tarhi svena kārakagrāmeṇa kṛtānubandho na yāgaṃ homaṃ vānubandham apekṣate. tasmād bhinnāni vākyani,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3794: pratiśabdam apūrvabhedaḥ [139]{*2/189*} iti. na ca dānasya yajati juhotir vānuvādo yāgahomayor avivakṣāprasaṅgāt. na ca dānam itarayor anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3796: itarayoś ca tyāgārthatvāt. prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe samudāyād apūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3797: siddhānte tu yāgasya phalavattvād itarayor guṇabhāvaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3804: ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_2,2.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3806: tanūnapātaṃ yajatītyevamādiḥ{*2/190*} pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabdaḥ kim ekam apūrvaṃ codayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3807: kiṃ pratyabhyāsam apūrvabheda iti. śabdāntare karmabheda uktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3808: iha sa eva śabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccāryate. tasmād ekam evātrāpūrvam. nanv apūrvāntaram avidadhad anarthako bhavati. satyam evāprayojano bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3811: śatatame 'pi{*2/192*} tad eva gamyate. tasmāt pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabda ekam apūrvaṃ codayati. na cābhyāso 'narthako bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3814: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3815_0: karmabhedaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ. tāvaty eva vidhīyamāne 'sati kasmiṃścid viśeṣe punaḥśrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:3815_1: anarthakā bhavet. nanūktaṃ na śaknoty arthāntaraṃ vidhātum iti. ucyate - samidho
GSP28msbh1-7u:3816: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti yāgaḥ prāpta eva. tatra devatā na śakyā vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3820: sa eṣa devatāyāgasaṃbandho [140]{*2/193*} vidhīyamāno 'kriyamāṇe yāge na śakyaḥ kartum ity anarthakaḥ syāt. kriyamāṇe tu śakyate. tasmād abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3825: ato na vikalpaḥ. prayojanaṃ{*2/195*} pūrvapakṣe sakṛt prayoga iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3836: evaṃ hi samāmananti - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati{*2/196*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:3837: tāv abrūtām agnīṣomāv ājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu{*2/197*} paurṇamāsyāṃ yajann iti;
GSP28msbh1-7u:3838: tābhyām etam agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālaṃ paurṇamāse prāyacchat{*2/198*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:3839: aindraṃ dadhyamāvāsyāyām aindraṃ payo 'māvās-yāyām iti{*2/199*}. tathāghāram āghārayati{*2/200*}; ājyabhāgau yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3842: samiṣṭayajur juhoti{*2/201*}. tathā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3843: ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata iti{*2/202*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - sarvāṇy etāni samapradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3847: ya evaṃ vidvān ity evaṃ saṃyuktau prakṛtānāṃ karmaṇām anuvaditārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3848: atha vā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3849: ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata ity apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3850: tatretare guṇavidhaya iti. kiṃ{*2/203*} prāptam - śabdāntara-tvād abhyāsāc ca samapradhānānīti prāpte brūmaḥ{*2/204*} - prakaraṇaṃ tu paurṇamāsyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3853: ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīsaṃjñakaṃ yāgaṃ yajata iti na sarve yāgā [141]{*2/205*} ucyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3857: te na{*2/206*} kiṃcit pratipadyemahi. ato brūmaḥ - yady apūrvasya vidhātārāv anarthakāv iti. atha nu prakṛtānām anuvaditārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3858: tataḥ sannihitāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktā yāgā iti gamyate rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3859: tatrārthavattā vacanasya. kathaṃ punar ekavacanānto bahūnāṃ vācako bhaviṣyatīti yady ucyate. samudāyaśabdatayāvakalpiṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3861: teṣāṃ ca pracayaśiṣṭaḥ samudāyo 'py asti tadapekṣo 'yam arūpaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3863: bhavati hi bahūnām ekavacanāntaḥ śabdaḥ samudāyāpekṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3864: yathā - yūthaṃ vanaṃ kulaṃ pariṣad iti. yadāgneyādīnāṃ samudāyavacanāvetau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3865: tadā darśapaurṇamāsaśabdenaita evābhidhīyante. tata eṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3869: *{2/197: E1,6; E2,5: nāv upāṃśu; E4: nāv uvāṃśu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3880: viśeṣadarśanāc ca sarveṣāṃ{*2/207*} sameṣu hy apravṛttiḥ syāt // MS_2,2.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3882: na vikṛtau prayājā dṛṣṭantām dṛśyante tu - prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*2/208*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3883: asatyāgneyaguṇatve prayājasya tannopapadyate{*2/209*}. ato na sarvāṇi samapradhānāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3893: tathā na lakṣaṇaśabdo [142]{*2/210*} bhaviṣyati. nanu rūpaṃ nāsti. vākyāntareṇa rūpam avagamiṣyāmaḥ. paurṇamāsyām āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavatīti yad etat paurṇamāsīnām karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3896: puroṅāśo dravyam iti. ata āgneyādibhir guṇo vidhīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3900: codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapac chāstrāc codite hi tadarthatvāt tasya tasyopadiśyeta // MS_2,2.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3903: ekenaiva vākyenātrāneko guṇo vidhātum iṣyate bhavatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3905: śabdāntareṇa codite karmaṇy aneko guṇaḥ parasparasaṃbandhe cāsati śakyate vidhātum. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3906: yadi tāvat paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālo bhavatīti saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3907: na tadāyam artho 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sat tayābhisaṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3910: tadānīm āgneya ity ayam asyāntikād apy upanipatito bhavati saṃbandhābhāvān nānena saṃbandham arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3911_0: aṣṭākapāla āgneyo bhavatīti. athāgneyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhavatīti vivakṣyate. tadāgneyapuroṅāśayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:3911_1: asaṃbandha eva syāt. atha paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālasyāgneyatā vidhīyate. vaktavyam{*2 /211*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3912: kena tasyām aṣṭākapālo vihita iti. atha tasyām āgneyasyāṣṭākapālatā. tathāpy eṣa doṣaḥ{*2/212*}. atha paurṇamāsīty ubhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3913: paraspareṇa dravyadevatayor asaṃbandha eva{*2/213*} syāt. atha dravyadevate paraspareṇa viśiṣṭe satyau paurṇamāsyā saṃbadhyeyātām ity ucyate. āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo yaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3915_0: tasyāprasiddhatvād etad apy ayuktam. atha kenacid agnaye saṅkalpitaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3915_1: vidhīyate. tathāpi devatāyā avidhānād rūpābhāva eva. athāgnir devatā bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3915_2: kaścid brūyāt. sa [143]{*2 /214*} vaktavyaḥ - mithaś cānarthasaṃbandha iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3916: na hy āgneyaśabdo 'nuvādo vidhiś ca bhavatīti. kalpayiṣyāmo devatām iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3917: asati vidhāne devatāyā abhāvāt. saṃbandhiśabdo 'yaṃ devateti sa evāgnir aṣṭākapālasya devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3921_0: na dravyaṃ devatā vā. na ca yāgasya yāgāntaraṃ rūpaṃ bhavati. ato rūpāvacanāt paurṇamāsyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3921_1: āvāsyāsaṃyuktau nāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau. yat tūktam - paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau
GSP28msbh1-7u:3921_2: lakṣaṇayā prakṛtān yāgānanuvadituṃ śaknuto nāñjasyeneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3928: avaṭasamīpe tiṣṭhatīti bhavati saṃvyavahāraḥ. lakṣaṇāpi hi laukikyeveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3936: ugrāṇi ha vaitāni havīṃṣy amāvāsyāyāṃ saṃbhriyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3937: āgneyaṃ prathamam aindra uttara iti sam-uccayaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3938: āgneyādīnāṃ guṇatve vikalpaḥ syāt. tatrāgneyaṃ prathamam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3939: aindra uttare dva iti vyavadeśo nāvakalpeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3943: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyate - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante, trayodaśāmāvāsyāyām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3949: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyate yad anvañcau puroḍāśāv upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti{*2/216*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3952: agnīṣomāv upāṃśu yaṣṭavyāv ajāmitvāya iti. tatra sandehaḥ - upāṃśuyājamantarā yajatīti kiṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakānāṃ prakṛtānāṃ yāgānāṃ samud-āyasya vācakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3953: atha vāpūrvasya yāgasyeti. tata ucyate - paurṇamāsīvad upāṃśuyājo bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ - nāmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3957_0: prakṛtāś copāṃśuguṇakā yāgā vidyante. tasmāt samudāyaśabda iti. nanūpāṃśuguṇakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3957_1: yāgāntaram upāṃśutvena rūpeṇa rūpavad vidhīyate. na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabda upāṃśuviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3959: cajoḥ ku ghiṇṇyator{*2/217*} iti{*2/218*} kutvena bhavitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3960: avyutpannaḥ punar upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ. tasmān na rūpavad yāgāntaram. athāpi nāmasaṃyuktaṃ yajatisāmānyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3961: tathāpy anupadiṣṭadevatādravyarūpaṃ na yāgāntaraṃ pratipadyemahi. nanv evaṃ sati prakṛtānām apy avācakaḥ prāpnoti. mā bhūd upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3963: tathā saty upāṃśuyājaśabde 'py anuvādatvād anāñjasye 'pi na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3972: karmāntarasya vācakaḥ syāt, upāṃśuyājaṃ yajatīti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3973: prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvāt, na cet prakṛtā vidyanta{*2/220*}, kasya samudāyaṃ vakṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3974: nanv idānīm evoktaṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyanta iti. na vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3976: te vidhayo viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayaḥ. arthavādā hi te. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3978: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti etad etasmin vākye vidhī-yate. yadīme 'pi vidhīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3979: bhidyeta{*2/221*} tarhi vākyam. api ca - yāgasya viṣṇvādināṃ ca saṃbandho 'tra gamyate vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3980: na ca yāgasya vidhānam. nanu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3981: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīty atrāpy antarālasaṃbandho 'vagamyate. vāḍham{*2/222*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3982: sa tu vidhīyata upāṃśutvādisaṃbandhaḥ. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyaṃ nānekaṃ vidhātum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3983: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyata ity evam upakramam etad vākyam ajāmitvāyety evam antam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3984: tasya madhye samāmnātaṃ viṣṇvādivākyaṃ tena saṃbandhya-mānaṃ na vākyāntaraṃ bhavitum arhati. tasmād viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayo na vidhayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3985: kiṃ tarhy arthavādāḥ. kaḥ punar arthavādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3988: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti vihitam. kathaṃ tena bhiṣajiṣyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3990: yathā viṣṇur yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatir agnīṣomau ceti{*2/223*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3993: na tv antarālasaṃbandhasyānyat prayojanam asty ato vidhānāt. kathaṃ viṣṇvādayo yaṣṭavyā ity etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3994: yaṣṭavyān ayaṣṭavyān vā viṣṇvādīn upāṃśuyājābhiṣṭavāya saṅkīrtayatīti gamyate. [146]{*2/224*} tatra kecit tāvad āhuḥ - prāptā eveti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3995: śākhāntare vidhānād iti. yady apy aprāptiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3996: tathāpy upāṃśutvasāmānyāt prajāpatir devatā viṣṇuś cety anuvādāv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3999_0: tad upāṃśv eva kriyata ityevamādisaṅkīrtanān mantrasamāmnānāc ca viṣṇum aprāptam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3999_1: api prāptam iva vadet. agniṣomayos tu vidhāyakam udāhriyate - etāv abrūyātām{*2 /225*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3999_2: agnīṣomāv vājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti, tasmād yāgāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4013: upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti. tasmān na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4019: agryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaved ayam agrya iti matiḥ. tasmān na samudāyaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4029: payasā juhotītyevamādi. tatra sandehaḥ - kim ūrdhvam [147]{*2/228*} āghārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4030: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir āghārā homāś ca vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4033: utaitāv evāpūrvayor āghārahomayor vidhātārāv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4037: etayoḥ pūrvebhyo homāghārebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam asti. yataḥ karmāntaram adhyavaseyam. ataḥ prakṛtatvāt{*2/229*} prakṛtānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4052: havanaṃ homaḥ. yady āghāraṇasāmānyaṃ homasāmānyaṃ ca vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4057: sa viśeṣo gamyata ity apūrvāvāghārahomavidhī nāvakalpyete. api ca kathaṃ kriyā sādhanaśabdenocyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4067: prakṛtam api dravyadevatam āghāre vidyate. yena rūpavān syāt. tasmād etāv api samudāyaśabdāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4072: codanā vā śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāt, tatsannidher guṇārthena punaḥ-śrutiḥ // MS_2,2.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4073: na caitad asti, samudāyaśabdāv iti, karmāntaracodane syātām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4078: tena karmāntare vidhīyeta ity avagacchāmaḥ. āghārāgnihotraśabdau ca havanāghāraṇasāmānyavācinau prajñātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4079: ato nāvijñātārthau. tena rūpavantau santau vidhīyete.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4082: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir vihitatvād anuvādāv iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4083: na hy ete homāghārau vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti. ūrdhvam āghārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4084: dadhnā juhotīti ca naitad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4089: dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād arāptatvān nānuvādau. nanu saṃbandhe vihita arthād dhomāghārau bhaviṣyataḥ. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4090: asmin hi sati vidhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nārthād āpadyete homāghārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4094_0: na dadhyūrdhvatādisaṃbandhaḥ. satyaṃ na śrūyate. tasmin nidher guṇārthena vyāpāraśravaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4094_1: avakalpiṣyate. nanu padārthāntaragataṃ vyāpāraṃ śrutir na śaknoti vaditum. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4097: sa eva{*2/232*} viśiṣṭaḥ pratyeṣyata iti bhaved etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4099: na tv eṣa{*2/233*} guṇagato vyāpāraḥ pratīyeta. tatra kiṃ bhaviṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4100: avyāpriyamāṇe 'pi guṇe śabdārthāvakḷpto bhaviṣyati. guṇavacanasannidhir idānīṃ kim arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4101: anarthakas tu. kathaṃ punar anarthako [149]{*2/234*} nāma vedo{*2/235*} bhavitum arhati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4103: asati tv arthe kim anyad ucyeta. evaṃ tarhi vākyād bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4104: śrutyarthe sati na vākyārtho 'vakalpyate. satyam evam etat. avivakṣite tv avakalpiṣyate. katham avivakṣā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4106_0: svapadārthasya ca śabdāntareṇa vihitatvāt. tasmāt siddham - guṇārthena dadhnā juhotītyevamādīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4106_1: punaḥśrutiḥ{*2 /236*}. juhoter uccāraṇaṃ cānuvādo guṇasaṃbandhārthaḥ. yadi juhotīty anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4108: dadhiśabdeneti mā vocata. nanv idānīm eva vākyād guṇavyāpāro{*2/237*} gamyata ity uktam. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4110: pramāṇam asya nāvagamyeta. asati pramāṇe vyāmohaḥ syāt. evaṃ tarhi vidhāyakau juhotyāghārayatiśabdau. kasya tarhy anuvādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4112: yadi vidhāyakau, pūrvam eva vihite svārthe, kim arthaṃ punar uccāryete?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4113: vākyārtho yas taṃ vidhātum ity adoṣaḥ. tasmāt karmāntaracodane. yad uktam - nāsty āghāre prakṛtaṃ dravyadevatam iti. kim evaṃ sati dravyadevatena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4114: yadā prasiddhārthābhidhānān nirjñātam evāsya rūpam. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4115: caturgṛhītaṃ vaitad abhūt tasyāghāram āghāryety ājyamasya dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4117: indra ūrdhvo 'dhvaro divi spṛśatu mahato yajño yajñapata indravān svāhetyāghāram āghārayatīti{*2/238*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4118: evam asāv indravān yady asyendro devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4134: prakaraṇe hy anarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena // MS_2,2.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4135: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*2/240*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4139: atha vakṣasa iti{*2/241*}. tathā{*2/242*} somena yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4144: kim avadyati gṛhṇāti{*2/244*} - coditānāṃ karmaṇām evālabhatiyajatī samudāyasyānuvaditarau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4148: ye ime ālabhatiyajatibhyāṃ karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām iti cintyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4149: pūrvam eva ta avadyatigṛhṇātibhyām avagamite. na cāvagamito 'rtho vidhīyate. hṛdayādīṃs tu paśuśabdenānuvadati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4150: somaśabdena ca rasam. tasmāt somena yajetety anuvādo yajatiḥ yajeta svargakāma iti{*2/245*} phalasambandhārthaḥ. paśum ālabheteti cālabhatir agnīṣomasaṃbandhārthaḥ. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4151: daśaitān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇātīti samuccayo dṛśyate. tathāśvino daśamo gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4152: tṛtīyo hūyata iti ca kramaḥ. yadi cāpūrvau yāgau vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4156: pālāśe badhnāti rohitake badhnātīti. tatra kramasamuccayadarśane nopapadyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4158: yajatau samyag etad avakḷptaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4159: [151]{*2/246*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhānacodane paśusomayoḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4160: soma-śabdaḥ kṣīriṇyāṃ latāyāṃ prasiddho na rase,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4161: ākṛtivacano hi somaśabdo na vyaktivacanaḥ. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4162: śṛṅgiṇi pucchavati lomaśe catuṣpadi dravyaviśeṣe paśuśabdam ākṛtivacanam upacaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4164: evam ākṛtikadravyāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyante. yeṣām imau samudāyasyānuvaditārau bhaveyātām. nanu paśu-vikāro hṛdayādiḥ paśuśabdenāgnīṣomasaṃbandhārtham anūdyate. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4166: nāyaṃ prakṛto hṛdayādiḥ paśur iti. tatra yadi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4167: laukikasya paśor grahaṇaṃ tato mukhyaḥ paśuśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4170: somaśabdo 'pi vikārasaṃbandhenānuvādaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrve karmaṇī vidhīyeyātāṃ nānuvādau. athaindravāyavādiṣu prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu latā vidhīyeteti. ucyate - na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4172: śrutyā hi rasa aindravāyavaḥ. tasmād dravyasaṃyogavacanaḥ prakṛteṣu yāgeṣv api satsu vidhātum anuvadituṃ vā na śaknuvann anarthakaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrvakarmaṇī vidhīyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4180: *{2/245: E1,6; E2,4,5: svargakāmo vasante vasanta iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4185: prakṛteṣu satsv api nānuvādāv ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4187: prakṛtā eva yāgā na santīty ucyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4193: aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītīndravāyubhyāṃ saṃkalpayatīty etāvad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4194: tatra yāgam antareṇa saṃkalpayatīty etan na yujyata iti yāgaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4198: prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvān na samudāyaśabdo yajatiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4204: tadbhedāt karmaṇo 'bhyāso dravyapṛthaktvād anarthakaṃ hi syād bhedo dravyaguṇībhāvāt // MS_2,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4205: paśau vṛttā kathā daśame punar udbhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4206: soma idānīṃ vartate. kathaṃ kramasamuccayāv iti. indravāyvādyā devatā naivaṃ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4211: kevalayā hi devatayā tadā yāgo nirvartyata iti vihitam abhaviṣyat. atha punar imāḥ adṛṣṭārthaṃ gṛhṇāti saṃskāraṃ prati devatā vidhīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4213: tena gṛhṇātau tatkṛtād adṛṣṭād adṛṣṭāntaram utpādayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4215_0: tasmāt samuccayaḥ. grahaṇaṃ tu{*2 /249*} niyataparimāṇeṣūrdhvapātreṣu prādeśamātreṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:4215_1: niyataparimāṇeṣūdakakalaśeṣu saṃskṛtasya daśamuṣṭiparimitasya kṛtsnasya somasya nāvakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4216: tathāpi nityavihitānāṃ devatānāṃ vikalpapakṣe tāvat prayogavacano mā bādhīty ava[153]{*2/250*}yavagrahaṇam eva nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4218_0: tad eva mitrāvarūṇābhyām iti nāvakalpeta. tasmāt kalpanabhedāt pṛthagavasthitaḥ somo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4218_1: nānādevatatvād eva naikyena śakyaḥ kartum. na cāsati devatāyāge devatābhyaḥ śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:4218_2: saṃkalpayitum. tasmād avaśyaṃ yathāsaṃkalpitā devatā yaṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4219: tāsu cejyamānāsu jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti śruto yāgo nirvṛtta eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4221: kṛtsnena ca daśamuṣṭinā somena yāgaḥ śrutaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4222: so 'saty abhyāse nāvakalpata ity arthāt sa guṇo bhaviṣyatīty abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4223: na hy anabhyastaḥ sarvābhir devatābhiḥ sarveṇa ca{*2/251*} somena saṃpanno bhaviṣyati. tasmiṃś cābhyasyamāne kramasamuccayau yuktāv eva bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4230: saṃskāras tu na bhidyeta, parārthatvād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_2,2.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4231: yad apy ucyate - yathā khādire badhnāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4235: tatra saṃskāram abhinirvartayituṃ khādirādayaḥ śrūyante. yadi cendravāyvādyā api grahadevatā yāgam abhinirvartayituṃ śrūyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4237: na tv etā yāge śrutāḥ. tasmāt samuccīyeran.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4246: evam eva hi prajāpatiḥ samṛddhyai{*2/253*}. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ saptadaśaitāni karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4247: atha saptadaśapaśuguṇakam ekaṃ karmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4249: prajāpataye saptadaśa paśavaḥ saṅkalpyante. kim ekaṃ yāgam abhinivartayitum uta bahūn iti saṃśaye ekam iti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4252: tatraikasminn eva parikḷpte saptadaśānām eva paśūnāṃ parikalpanam upapannaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4253: kena ca dvitīyādīn yāgān avakalpayema. evaṃ saty{*2/254*} alpīyasy adṛṣṭānumānaprasaṅgakalpanā bhavati. tasmād eko yāgaḥ saptadaśabhiḥ paśubhir nirvartyate{*2/255*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4254: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṅkhyayā karmabhedo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4256: tac ca paśūnāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bahuṣu yāgeṣv avakalpate, naikasmin. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4257: ekādaśabhir avadānair asau yāgo nivartayitavya ity evaṃ codakaḥ pratidiśati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4259: tatra dvitīyāder ālambho nāvadānasaṃpādanāya bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4261: tathāsaty{*2/256*} atadarthatvān na te prājāpatyā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4262: tatra prājāpatyān iti śravaṇam uparudhyeta{*2/257*}. tenaikasmin paśau pṛthaktve niveśinī saptadaśasaṅkhyā nāvakalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4264: tena saptadaśabhyo yāgebhyaḥ saptadaśa paśūn upādadīraṃs tatra saṅkhyāsāmaṃ jasyaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4266: nanv ekasminn api yāge saptadaśabhir avadānagaṇair yakṣyate vacanāt. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4270: sā hy avadānaprakṛtidravyaṃ viśiṣantī prakṛtau pradhānasyopakṛtavatīti [155]{*2/258*} vikṛtāv apy avadānaprakṛtidravyaṃ viśiṣantī pradhānasyopakariṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4273: tasmād ekasmai avadānagaṇāyaikaḥ paśur ālabdhavyaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4275: evam evāvakalpiṣyate. yadi śṛṅgābhiprāyā varṇābhiprāyā rūpābhiprāyā vābhiviṣyan saptadaśapaśavaḥ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo rohita ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4279: te hi śyāmās tūparā ekarūpāḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4281: naikasmin. tasmāt saptadaśa yāgā iti. prayojanam ekasminn aṣṭe duṣṭe kṛtsnaḥ paśugaṇa āvarteta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4283: pūrvapakṣe 'dṛṣṭārtham. siddhānta eka eva paśur āvartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4284: na hi karmabhede paśuḥ paśvantaram ākāṅkṣatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4295: athaiṣa jyotir athaiṣa viśvajyotir athaiṣa sarvajyotir iti. atra{*2/259*} saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4296: kim ebhir nāmadheyaiḥ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ saṅkīrtya tatra sahasradakṣiṇādiguṇo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4297: atha vā vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣāṇi karmāntarāṇy upadiśyanta iti. kiṃ prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4298: prakaraṇānugrahāt prakṛtasya guṇavidhānam iti. nanu vākyasāmarthyāj jyotirādīnām ete guṇā vidhāyiṣyante. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4301: viśvajyotir iti trivṛdādīny asya jyotīṃṣi vākyaśeṣasaṅkīrtitāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4303: tenāsau viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiś ca jyotiṣṭoma iti evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4304: [156]{*2/260*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṃjñā hi tisro bhedikāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4307: tāsām{*2/261*} imāḥ punaḥ śrutayaḥ. tasmād athaiṣa jyotir ity apūrvasya karmaṇo vidhāyakaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4308: anuvāde hi saty apravṛttiviśeṣakaram anarthakaṃ syāt. prakṛtasya ca guṇavidhāne vikalpo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4312: na cāvayavena samānena samudāyāntaraṃ tadartham eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4314_0: tatra na śālāśabdasāmānyān mālāśabdādayo 'pi gṛhavacanā bhavanti. yat tu jyotiṣṭomasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4314_1: jyotir iti pratīkam upādīyata iti. prakaraṇasāmarthyād dhi tatra jyotiṣṭomaśabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4317: vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇād balīyaḥ. atha punar ayaṃ dyotanārthatvād vā jyotiṣṭomatvād vā karmāntare vatsyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4318: yac{*2/262*} ca trivṛdādīni jyotīṃṣi teṣāṃ sākalyavacano viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotir iti cet. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4320: evaṃ bruvan prasiddhaṃ bādheta. yat tu vākyaśeṣāj jyotiḥśabdas trivṛdādivacana iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4321: tasminn eva vākye sa tatra prayukta iti gamyate pramāṇāntareṇa na śabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4324: yathā siṃho devadatta iti siṃhaśabdo devadattavacanaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4326: tatra tu tatpramāṇāntaraṃ nāsti. tasmān na viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotir iti{*2/263*} ca jyotiṣṭomasya vaditārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4331: *{2/259: E1,5,6; E2,4: sarvajyotir etena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeteti śrūyate. atra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4341: tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevy āmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam iti{*2/266*}. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4346: vājenān nenāmikṣayā vājino viśve-devās tān anūdya vājinaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4348: āmikṣā vājinaṃ ca. tasminn eva ca karmaṇi vājinaguṇavidhiḥ. yathā agnihotraṃ juhotīty ukte dadhnā juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4350: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇaś cāprakṛtena devatābhidhānena saṃbandhyamānaḥ karmāntaraṃ vidadhyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4352: ubhe apy apūrvayor yāgayor vidhātṛṇī. kathaṃ punar apūrvadevatābhidhānam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4354: viśveṣāṃ devānām anuvādo vājinam{*2/269*} iti. tad ucyate - iha viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ devatātvaṃ kvacic chrutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4360: vākyena dravyaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ. ekatrobhayam api vākyena. tad iha devatātvaṃ prati śrutivākyayor virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4361: virodhe ca śrutir balīyasīty āmikṣāvākye devatātvaṃ viśveṣāṃ devānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4364: aprakṛtena devatāpadenāsya saṃbandha iti. tasmāt karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4366: yathāgnihotraṃ juhotīty ukte dadhnā juhotītyevamādayo guṇavidhaya iti. tatrocyate - [158]{*2/270*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4374: aguṇe tu karmaśabde guṇas tatra pratīyeta // MS_2,2.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4377: prakṛtena tv asti yāgena. tasmād anupavarṇanam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4380: vikalpaparijihīrṣayāvakalpyante. tad eva tu karma juhotītiśabdād avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4384: phalaśrutes tu karma syāt, phalasya karmayogitvāt // MS_2,2.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4388: uta dadhyāder guṇāt phalam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4390: phalaśruteḥ, phalam iha śrūyate, tac ca karmaṇo nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4396: na home. atha kṛṣau dṛṣṭam anyatrāpi bhavati. dravyād api prasajyate. atha kṛṣisadṛśād bhavatīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4399: asadṛśaṃ hi tad iti. homo 'py asadṛśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4402_0: pāṭanātmakatvāc ca kṛṣeḥ. atha kiṃcit sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate. dravyasyāpi sad anityam ityevamādi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4402_1: kiṃcit sādṛśyam asti. atha dravyād anyat sadṛśataram astīti kṛtvā na dravyaṃ sadṛśam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4402_2: ity ucyate. homād apy anyat kṛṣeḥ sadṛśataram asti dṛṣṭārtham iti kṛtvā homo 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:4404: tad anyasmin sadṛśamātre 'dṛṣṭam api bhavitum arhatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4405: yad dhi yasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ siddhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4406: tac cet sādhye 'pi kāraṇabhūtam ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4409: na tat sadṛśam api sādhakam. tasmāt sadṛśam api sādhakam asādhakaṃ veti parīkṣitavyam iti. atha yat karma tat phalavad dṛṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4411_0: tenāpi phalavatā bhavitavyam iti. uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇāṃ tatsaṃyogānāṃ ca dravyāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4411_1: phalaṃ dṛṣṭam iti dravyam api phalavat syāt. api ca kṛṣer nādṛṣṭam iti tatsādṛśyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:4413: nendriyam. tasmān naivaṃjātīyakeṣv etad bhavati dṛṣṭād adṛṣṭasiddhir iti. kathaṃ tarhi homān nyāyyaṃ phalam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4417: homāc ca phalam iti śrutyā śabdena gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4419: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmāt homāt phalam iti nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4423: sādhayituṃ homaṃ ca. [160]{*2/273*} nanu kambalanirṇejanavad etad bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4425: kambalaśuddhiṃ pādayoś ca nirmalatām. na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4427: kiṃ tarhi phale guṇabhūtaṃ dadhi home cety ekaṃ vākyaṃ vaditum asamartham iti. yadi phalaṃ dadhnā kuryād iti brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4429: atha dadhnā homaṃ sādhayed iti brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4430: na phalam iti. ubhayavacane bhidyeta vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4431: abhinnaṃ cedam upalabhyate. tasmān na guṇāt phalam ity agnihotrahomād dadhihomaḥ karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4437: atulyatvāt tu vākyayor guṇe tasya pratīyeta // MS_2,2.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4438: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate, na karmāntaram, kiṃ tu guṇāt phalam iti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4440: agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity atra karmasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalaṃ svargakāmo homena kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4441: dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyād iti guṇasamabhivyāhṛtam. na hy atra homa indriyāya kartavya iti pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4446: sa dadhnā homaṃ kuryād iti. katamo 'tra śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnasya vakteti. juhuyād iti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4447: nanu śrutyā homasaṃbaddham eṣa puruṣaprayatnaṃ vadati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4450: vākyaṃ śrutim apabādhitum arhati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4452: vākyaṃ hi tathā bhidyeteti. atrocyate - ye bhavadīyaṃ pakṣam āśrayeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4454: asmadīye tu punaḥ pakṣe juhuyād iti dhātvarthaḥ kevalo 'pabādhito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4455: yuṣmadīye tu kṛtsna eva dadhneti śabdaḥ. taṃ cāpramādyantaḥ samāmanantīti gamyate. na caitat pramattagītam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4457: tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikam iti. tasmān na karmasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4460: juhuyād iti dadhnendriyakāmayoḥ saṃbandhavi-dhānārthaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati. nanūcyamāne 'pi na kevalaḥ karoty artho 'vagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4467: indriyakāmasya homasaṃbaddhaṃ prayatnaṃ dadhisaṃbaddhaṃ kuryād iti. nanv evaṃ sati sa eva doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4468: homasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalam iti. ucyate - juhuyād iti śabdasyaitatsāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4470: na tv atra homaḥ sādhanatvena vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4471: sādhyatvena viśiṣṭas tu prayatno vākyena dadhyāśrito 'vagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4472: ata eva ca vṛttikāreṇoktam - homam āśrito guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4473: yathā rājapuruṣo rājānam āśrito rājakarma karotīti. tasmād dadhnaḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4475: sa dadhnā kuryād indriyam iti. katham iti. anayāgnihotretikartavyatayeti. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4478: codanāliṅgasya ca juhoty arthasya darśanāt. yasmād eva cāyaṃ juhoty 'rtho 'nuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4482: tasmād dadhnaḥ phalam iti. atha vā dadhiśabdasya vivakṣitārthatvād dadhihomasaṃbandho 'yaṃ vākyena vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4483: tena dadhno homena saṃbadhyamānāt phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4491: trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv ekaviṃśam agniṣṭomasāmakṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4492: etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeteti. atrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4493: kiṃ tasyaivāgniṣṭuto 'gniṣṭomasya guṇād vāravantīyāt paśavaḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4495: atha kim etena yajeteti karmāntaram iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4496: na karmāntaraṃ guṇāt phalam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4503: etasyaiveti vispaṣṭam akarmāntaravacanam. tasmād guṇāt phalam ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4504: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sameṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu bhinnavākyeṣu karmayuktaṃ phalaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4509: tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ vidhīyeteti vākyam bhidyeta. athocyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4510: asya pūrvā revatīr upādāya tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ kṛtvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4511: etena yajetety anuvadatīti. tathāgniṣṭomasāmeti nāvakalpyeta. athāgniṣṭomasāmakārye bhavatīty ucyate. etasyaivety etad avivakṣitaṃ syāt. ubhayasmin vivakṣyamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4513: atha karmāntare katham avākyabhedaḥ. revatīṣu ṛkṣu vāravantīyaṃ sāma kṛtvā paśukāmo yajetety apūrvo yāgaḥ sarvair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4515: vibhāge ca sākāṅkṣatvam ity ekavākyatvam upapadyate. nanv arthabhedo yāgaś caivaṃ hy apūrvaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4516: revatīṣu vāravantīyam apūrvam iti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4520: śakyate ca tan nirvartayitum. ucyate - revatīnāṃ vāravantī yasya ca saṃbandho na vihitaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4521: tatra ca revatīṣv anyāny api sāmāni bhaveyuḥ. vāravantīyaṃ cānyāsv api ṛkṣu. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4524: dvāv apy etāv arthau kṛtvety eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4526: yathā śoṇamānaya - iti raktaguṇasaṃbaddho 'śvaḥ śabdenaivānayato{*2/278*} vidhīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4543: tasmād bahuṣu vidhīyamāneṣu naikārthyam. atrocyate - artha iti prayojanam abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4550: revatīṣv iti naitat kevalaṃ revatīnāṃ vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4551: revatīṣu vāravantīyam iti. atrāpi padadvaye vāravantīyaśabdo dvitīyāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4554: kṛtvety api karotir na saṃbandhamātre paryavasitaḥ paraprayojanasaṃbandham āha. evaṃ viśiṣṭas tu yajatir na parārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4556: tasmād ekavākyatvam. guṇe punaḥ phale prakalpyamāna agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ kārye vāravantīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4559: revatyādisarvaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭo yāga etasyāgniṣṭuto vidhīyeta. tathāpi paśukāmasaṃbandhād bhidyeta vākyam. athaivam ucyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4560: revatīṣu kṛtena vārayantīyena paśukāmo yajeteti. naivaṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4561: ṛgantarapragāṇād viśeṣahānād vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. nanv idānīm evoktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4562: śakyate hi revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ kartum iti. sati vacane śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4563: asati vacane na vāravantīyagrahaṇena gṛhyante. vacanaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4565: tato yajeteti yajatir anuvādaḥ. yadi vacanaṃ revatīṣu vāravantīyasaṃbandhasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4567: nāgniṣṭuto guṇavidhiḥ. nanu tato yajeteti yāgānuvādād yāgenāsyāṅgaprayojanasaṃbandho bhaviṣyati. naivaṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4575: tatra yāgapaśukāmayoḥ saṃbandhasya vidhātrīṃ yajater uparitanīṃ vibhaktim upalabhāmahe liṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4576: na tu revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhasya [165]{*2/281*} vidhāyakaṃ sākṣāt kiṃcid upalabhyate. tasmāt sarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4578: atha punar viśiṣṭe yāge vidhīyamāne, tad revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ katham agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4580: kim iva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4581: nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. atha yad uktam etasyaiveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4582: anantarāpekṣaṃ vacanam iti tatrāpy avirodhād etaddharmakasyeti lakṣaṇāśabdo bhaviṣyati. tasmān na guṇāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4584: siddhaṃ sameṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu karmayuktaṃ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4594: sa saubhareṇa stuvīta sarve vai kāmāḥ saubhara iti{*2/282*} samāmnāya tataḥ samāmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4600: hīṣ ity etad aparaṃ vṛṣṭer nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4603: tadā hīṣ iti saubharasya nidhanaṃ kartavyam iti (evaṃ ūrgityannādyakāmasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4604: ū - iti svargakāmasya ca tulyo vicāraḥ.)
GSP28msbh1-7u:4616: saubhare nidhane 'paraḥ kāmo vidhīyata iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4620: tad vṛṣṭikāmasya hīṣaś ca saṃbandhe kartavye vaktavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4622: tatra hi sāṅgaṃ saubharaṃ kuryād iti prayogavacanasāmarthyād eva siddham. tasmāt kuryād iti puruṣaprayatnavacanād avagacchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4623: yatarasmin pakṣe puruṣaprayatnavacanam arthavat tataro 'yaṃ pakṣa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4625: nidhanād aparaṃ phalam iti. tasmāt saubhara ekaḥ kāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4626: bhedena nidhanād api dvitīyaḥ kāma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4631: itarasmin pakṣe punar vṛṣṭikāmaśabdena puruṣavacanena satā saubharaṃ lakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4632: tathā lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ syāt. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4633: na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt paśyāmo nidhane dvitīyaḥ kāma iti. evaṃ ca phalabhūyastvaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4641: sarvasyoktakāmatvāt{*2/286*} tasmin kāmaśrutiḥ syāt, nidhanārthā punaḥśrutiḥ // MS_2,2.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4642: vāsabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4646: vṛṣṭikāmāya hīṣ iti kuryād iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4649: nidhanaṃ [167]{*2/287*} kuryād iti saṃbandho na kṛtaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4650: tatra hīṣ iti nidhanam iti nāvakalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4656: atha hīṣo nidhanasaṃbandhe katham avākyabheda iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4660: tatra hīṣ iti kuryād ity eṣa evārtho vidhīyate. tasmād avākyabheda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4661: ato nidhanavyavastheti gamyate. evam eva ūrg iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4663_0: sarvasya saubharasya ūrgvṛṣṭisvargakāmatvāc chakyate kāmavacanaiḥ saubharaṃ lakṣayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4663_1: kim arthaṃ lakṣyata iti. nidhanārthā punaḥśrutir (nidhanavyavasthāṃ kariṣyatīty arthaḥ){*2 /290*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4669: *{2/289: In E1 geklammert; E6 ohne Klammern; E2,4: nidhanaprāptir; E5: niyataprāptiḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4673: guṇas tu kratusaṃyogāt karmāntaraṃ prayojayet saṃyogasyāśeṣabhūtvāt // MS_2,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4681: āgrayaṇāgrān iti. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ grahāgratāviśeṣo jyotiṣṭomasya vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4682: uta karmāntarasya rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ceti. yadi rathantarasāmagrahaṇena bṛhatsāmagrahaṇena ca jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4688: jyotiṣṭomasya. iti prāpte ucyate - guṇas tu kratusaṃyogād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4693: karmāntarasyeti. nanu jyotiṣṭomakrator evaiṣa evaṃjātīyako vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4694: rathantarasāmā bṛhatsāmeti. neti brūmaḥ - yadi na kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4696: kṛtsnakratusaṃyogas tu eṣaḥ. kathaṃ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4697: kathaṃ vā na kṛtsnakratusaṃyoga iti. yadi rathantarasattā vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4702: tato jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhiḥ. atha rathantarasāmasattā bṛhatsāmasattā vā na [169]{*2/293*} nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4704: ayam arthaḥ, yadi rathantarasāma asya viśeṣaṇaṃ krator iti. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4711: bṛhad eva vā nānyad iti. jyotiṣṭomasya ca bahūni sāmāni gāyatrādīni. tasmān na jyotiṣṭomasya vācakāv etau śabdāv iti. tena yady api prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhir iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4712: tathāpi tad bādhitvā vākyena rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ca bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4714: evam anyo 'pi na rathantarasāmā kaścid asti. ucyate - karmāntaraṃ rathantarasāmakaṃ kalpayiṣyaty etad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4715: yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti. nanu nāsty atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ. ucyate - asti ya eṣaḥ syād iti. āha - naiṣa vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4717: na vidhānārtheneti. atra brūmaḥ - yad etat sayadikaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4726: rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmno vā bhāvo nimittatvena śrūyamāṇo 'py arthavān bhavati. tasmād avivakṣito yadisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4727: tasmiṃś cāvivakṣite padadvayam idaṃ rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti śaknoti rathantarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ vidhātum, yadīty anarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4728: atha vā yadi rocetety adhyāhāraḥ. atha vā yathaitad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4731: tatra dadhyupasiñced [170]{*2/294*} iti. evaṃjātīyakena vākyena śālibhojanaṃ vihitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4734: aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti. kathaṃ punaḥ śālibhojanaṃ tena vākyena vihitaṃ bhavatīti. ucyate - vyatyāsena saṃbandhaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4736: nanu na khalv icchateḥ parāṃ liṅvibhaktim upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4737: siñcater hi tāṃ parāṃ samāmnantīti. siñcateḥ khalu sā parā samuccarantī kamer arthaṃ gamayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4739: evam ihāpi yady aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti grahītum icched ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4740: tato rathanatarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryād iti. nanv evaṃ saty icchāmātraṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4741: na grahāgratviśeṣavidhānam. ucyate - yathāsmin laukike vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4743: śāliṃ bhuñjīteti dadhyupasecanasaṃkīrtanād dadhyupasiktaṃ śāliṃ bhuñjīteti tenaikavākyatvād gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4744: evam atrāpi grahāgratāviśeṣasaṅkīrtanāt tenaikavākyatvād grahāgratāviśiṣṭo rathantarasāmā gamyate. atha vātra hetuhetumator liṅ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4745: rathantarasāmā soma aindravāyavāgrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ hetuḥ kartavya iti. tasmāt kṛtsnakratusaṃyogād guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ prayojayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4747: api ca pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam, pareṇa naimittikena. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4748: sati hi nimitte naimittikaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4750: yac ca bhaviṣyat tan na sat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4752: tat kathaṃ pūrvakālasya grahāgratāviśeṣasya nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. api ca niḥsandigdhaṃ jagatsāmā karmāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4753: tatsāmānyād itarad api karmāntaram iti gamyate. tasmān na jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4761: ekasya tu liṅgabhedāt prayojanārtham ucyetaikatvaṃ guṇavākyatvāt // MS_2,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4762: tuśabdāt pakṣo 'nyathā bhavati, naitad asti, yad uktam, kratvantaram iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4764_0: prakaraṇasāmarthyāt. nanv etad uktam - vākyasāmarthyāt kratvantarasya rathantarasāmno
GSP28msbh1-7u:4764_1: bṛhatsāmnaś ceti. parihṛtam etaj jyotiṣṭoma eva rathantarasāmā bṛhatsāmā ceti. punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:4765: viśeṣaṇaṃ rathantareṇa bṛhatā vā na prakalpata iti. tad ucyate - prakalpate viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4768: yatra rathantaraṃ nāsti. bhavati ca sa prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4770: tad etat rathantaraṃ sattayaivāsādhāraṇatvād viśeṣakam. tasmāj jyotiṣṭoma eva rathanatarasāmā bṛhatsāmā ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4771: atha yad uktam - pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4773: niyogato bhavati hi bhaviṣyad api nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4777: tad yathāvacanaṃ bhavitum arhati. syād iti ceyaṃ liṅ triṣv api kāleṣu bhavati. tasmād bhaviṣyad api nimittam. yat tu jagatsāmeti karmāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4788: rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti. taṃ prakṛtyāmananty aveṣṭiṃ nāmeṣṭim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4789: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇetyevamādi. tāṃ prakṛtya vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4790: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutim āhutiṃ hutvābhighārayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4792: yadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevam iti. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4794: uta brāhmaṇādīnām ayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā bhavet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4795: kathaṃ vā yāgavidhānam iti. yadi rājaśabdo brāhmaṇādiṣv api kenacit prakāreṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4805: tataś coddharaṇe rājyaśabdam āryāvartanivāsinaḥ prayuñjante. rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti cābhiyuktā upadiśanti. tena manyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4807: yathā ya udameghaṃ nāma kaṃcit puruṣaṃ nāvediṣuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4808: tasya tu putram audameghir ity evaṃ viduḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4811: udameghaputrasyaivaṃ samabhivyāhāro bhavatīti. evaṃ rājyayogād rājaśabda iti vijñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4812: nanu janapadapuraparirakṣaṇavṛttim anupajīvaty api kṣatriye rājaśabdam āndhrāḥ prayuñjante prayoktāraḥ. na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4815: tadyogād api [173]{*2/297*} rājaśabdo bhavatīty etad upapādayāmaḥ. prayuñjate ca tad yukte rājaśabdam akṣatriye 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4818: na brāhmaṇasya vaiśyasya ca karmāntaraṃ vidhāyiṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4819: atha vāsārvalaukikasya prayogasya sārvalaukikena prayogeṇa virudhyamānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4821: sārvabhaumaṃ prayogam. api cāvipragītā laukikā arthā vipragītebhyaḥ pratyayitatarā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4822: tathāryāvartanivāsināṃ śabdārthopāyeṣv abhiyuktānām abhivyāharatāṃ karmāṇi cānutiṣṭhatām antyajanapadavāsibhyo mlecchebhyaḥ samīcīnatara ācāro bhavati. tasmād yaugiko rājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4825: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - aveṣṭau tu khalu kratupradhānaṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4830: rājā rājasūyena yajeteti. nanūktam - yaugiko rājaśabda iti. etad apy ayuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4832: prakaraṇāc ca na karmāntaravidhānaṃ nyāyyam ity uktam. atrocyate - nobhayābhidhānam avakalpate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4835: tenāryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogo na virotsyate. atha yadi rājyaśabdaḥ paripālane nityasaṃbaddho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4836: tatas tasya karteti rājaśabdaḥ kṣatriyajātau tannimitto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4837: tatrāndhrāṇāṃ prayogo na virotysyate. tasmān na prayogadarśanād ubhāv api rājarājyaśabdau jātiparipālanābhyāṃ nityasaṃbaddhāv ity abhyupagantavyam. ko nu khalu nirṇayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4838: rājajātīyasya karma [174]{*2/298*} ity ataḥ paripālanaṃ rājyaśabdenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4839: evaṃ hi smaranto 'bhiyuktāḥ tasya karmeti ṣyañpratyayaṃ vidadhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4840: na tu tasya karteti pratyayalopaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4841: prātipadikapratyāpattiṃ vā samāmananti. tasmād rājñaḥ karma rājyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4844: taṃ tu loko rājaśabdenābhivadati. ucyate - yogāl lokaḥ prayuṅkte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4846: sa tu paripālane rājyaśabdo rājayogād ity asmābhir uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4849: tadayogād{*2/299*} api brāhmaṇavaiśyayo rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate. na tv evaṃ smaranti, rājyayogād rājeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4850: yat tūktam - anumānād rājyasya kartā yaḥ sa rājā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4851: yathā audamegheḥ pitodamegha iti. ucyate - anumānāt prayogo balavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4853: kṣatriye tu pratyakṣaṃ prayuñjānān upalabhāmahe. tathā yogam apy anumimīmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4854: rājyasya kartā rājeti. rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti tu smaranti. anumimānāś ca smṛtiṃ anumimate sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4856: tena tatra smṛtir balīyasīti. āha - yo yo rājyaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4858: na yad rājñaḥ karma tad rājyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4861: na tu rājayogo rājyaśabdapravṛttāv iti. na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4862: prayogād vayaṃ rājayogaṃ rājyaśabdapravṛttau nimittam avagacchāma iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4863: smaraṇāt, prayogāc ca smṛtir balīyasī, prayogād dhi smṛtir anumīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4865: janapadaparipālanam akurvaty api rājety āndhrā vadantīty uktam. nanu rājayogād rājyam ity etad api vyabhicarati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4866: na hi rājñaḥ syanditaṃ{*2/301*} nimiṣitaṃ ca sarvaṃ rājyam ity ucyate. yadi vayaṃ prayogān nimittabhāvaṃ brūyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4867: tata evam upālabhyemahi. smṛtyā tu vayaṃ nimittabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4868: tena yad yad rājajātīyasya karma jātyā viśeṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4869: tad rājyam ity abhyupagacchāmaḥ. yat tūktam - āndhrā api rājyayogād rājānam abhyupa-gacchantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4871: prayogo durbalaḥ smṛter iti. yad uktam - āryāvartanivāsinaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4872: pramāṇam itarebhya ācārebhya iti. tulyaḥ śabdaprayoga ācāreṣv ity uktam. tasmāj jātinimitto rājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4886: śaradi vaiśya iti{*2/303*}. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇaṃ nimittārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4888: uta brāhmaṇādīnām ādhānaṃ vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4889: kathaṃ cādhānavidhānam iti. yadi brāhmaṇo vasanta iti padadvayaṃ parasparaṃ saṃbaddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4890: tato nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam. atha brāhmaṇa ādadhīteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4896: tac cāviditaṃ vedyata iti. nanu brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādadhati nāpy asti samuccāraṇam. vāḍham{*2/305*} asti samuccāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4897: na tv amīṣām ādhānasaṃbandho na viditaḥ. kena prāpto vidita iti. kāmaśrutibhiḥ. kāḥ kāmaśrutayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4899: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajetetyevamādayaḥ. kathamābhiḥ śrutibhir ādhānaṃ prāptam iti. ucyate - sāmarthyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4907: tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatītyevamādi{*2/306*}. tena sāmarthyād etad uktaṃ bhavati - āhavanīyādi kartavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4908: tac cādhānena vinā na sidhyatīty ādhānam api kartavyam ity avagamyate. tat kena kartavyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4909: yasya kāmaśrutayaḥ. tāś cāviṣeśeṇa brāhmaṇādīnām. tasmād amīṣām ādhānasaṃbandho vidita iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4910: ubhābhyāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4911: tadānīm eko 'rtho vidhīyate. ato nimittārthāḥ śrutaya ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4912: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādhāne sarvaśeṣatvāt{*2/307*} prāpakāṇyādhānasyaitāni śravaṇāni. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4913: sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣabhūtam ādhānam iti na śrutiliṅgādīnām anyatamenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4919: nādhānm iti. nanv agnīnām abhyupāya ādhānam iti. ucyate - naiteṣām arjane ādhānam evaiko 'bhyupāyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4920: kiṃ tarhi yathānyeṣāṃ dravyāṇām utpādane [177]{*2/308*} krayaṇādayaś cābhyupāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4921: evam agnīnām apīti na niyogataḥ utpādanam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4924: tataraḥ pakṣa utpattiṃ prayojayiṣyati brāhmaṇādīnām ādhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4928_0: na kṛtrimeṇa yācitena vā karmāṇy agnihotrādīny anuṣṭhātavyānīti gamyate. tenākṛtrima
GSP28msbh1-7u:4928_1: eva kevalo 'gnis teṣāṃ sādhaka iti niścīyate. kathaṃ cātmārthatādhānasya gamyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:4928_2: iti. kartrabhiprāye hi kriyāphala ādadhītety etad ātmanepadaṃ saṃbhavati. asatyasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:4929: api ca satīṣv etāsv ādhānaśrutiṣu na kāmaśrutayaḥ śaknuvanty aparām ādhānaśrutiṃ kalpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4931: asatīṣv etāsv ādhānaśrutim aparigṛhṇantaḥ{*2/309*} kāmaśrutayo 'śakyān agnihotrādīn vadantīti parigṛhṇīyur ādhānaśrutim. satīṣv etāsu yeṣām ādhānam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4935: ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4936: tayā prāptasya nimittārthāni brāhmaṇādīnāṃ śravaṇāni bhaviṣyanti. ucyate - saṃbhāravidhānārthā punaḥśrutir eṣā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4944: ucyate - vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhītety asyāṃ śrutau satyāṃ punaḥśrutiḥ kevalasyādhānasyāvidhāyikā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4946: tad ekasminn arthe vidhīyamāne nānekārthaṃ bhavati. nanv ādhānasyaitad vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4952: iyaṃ praśastam ādhānam ity āha. tataḥ praśastatām ādhānasyānumanyāmahe. evaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4953: vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhītety eṣā vidhāyikā śrutir iti brūmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4955: śakyate hy anyena vihitam anyena praśastam iti vaditum. yadi tv etad vidhāyakam ity ucyate{*2/312*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4960: tatrāpūrvajñāpanavacanaḥ śabdaḥ uparudhyeta. na tu liṅgā vihite praśaṃsāvacanam uparudhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4961: vihite 'pi hi vākyāntareṇa praśaṃsāvacanam avakalpate. api ca yal liṅgā vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4966: brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīteti. ucyate - svapadārtham atra śrutir vidadhāty ādhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4968: ya evaṃ sapatnaṃ{*2/313*} bhrātṛvyam avarti sahata iti. nanv anekaguṇavidhānaṃ tvayā vākyenādhyavasitaṃ bhavati. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4969: aguṇavidhipare hi vākye bhavaty anekaguṇavidhānam ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4970: tadguṇās tu vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti{*2/314*}. tasmād brāhmaṇādisaṃyuktā vidhāyikā śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4971: iyam api kevalasyādhānasya punaḥśrutiḥ saṃbhāravidhānam upakramitum iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4975: dvābhyāṃ tu viśeṣaṇābhyāṃ viśiṣṭam ekam ādhānaṃ vidhāyiṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4976: [179]{*2/316*} tena na bhaviṣyati vākyabhedaḥ. tasmād brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādhānasya prāpakāṇi śravaṇānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4998: saṃkramayajñena yajetānnādyakāma iti{*2/318*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor eva guṇāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5003: yady api prakaraṇād yajatiśabdāc ca sa eva pūrvaprakṛto yāga iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5004: tathāpi nāsāv evaṃsaṃjñaka iti yāgāntaraṃ vidheyaṃ gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5016: tato yāgaguṇasaṃbandho gamyata iti tad anuṣṭhānaṃ vidhīyetety ananubadhyamāne{*2/319*} yāgamātraṃ gamyata iti tad anuṣṭhānaṃ vihitaṃ gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5024: prajākāmasya yāga upayo vidhīyate. vidhīyate cet, karmāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5039: dve hi paurṇamāsyau yajeta dve amāvasye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5040: atra hi eva khalu sā saṃpad bhavatīti. yadi dākṣāyaṇayajño darśapūrṇamāsāv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5047: yadi dākṣāyaṇaśabdo na kenacid api prakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsavacanaḥ śakyate kalpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5048: tata ucyeta karmāntaram iti. śaknoti tv āvṛttiguṇasaṃbandhād viditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5051: teṣām ayanaṃ dākṣāyaṇam. kaḥ punar dakṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5054: evaṃ sarvatra. śakyate ced darśapūrṇamāsayor guṇasaṃbandho vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5055: kim iti sa eva yāgaḥ pratīyamāno 'nya ity ucyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5065: yāni [181]{*2/323*} anyāni muktasaṃśayāni guṇe phalasya vidhāyakāni vākyāni guṇasya phalavacanāni paryavasitāni (yathā dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt, ityevamādīni)
GSP28msbh1-7u:5068: atrāpi hi guṇāt phalam ucyate. kathaṃ naitad evaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5071: āvṛttiyajña iti yajñāvṛtti-saṃbandho 'nuṣṭhātavyo nirdiśyate, na yajñaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5072: tasmāt prakṛtayor darśapūrṇamāsayor guṇāt phalam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5073: na yāgāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti. evaṃ sākaṃprasthāpye{*2/326*} saṃkramayajñe ca draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5086: caturo muṣṭīn nirvapatīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5087: kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsike{*2/329*} ālambhe ālambho guṇavidhir darśapūrṇamāsike{*2/330*} ca nirvāpe nirvāpo guṇavidhir uta na prakṛtim apekṣate itaraś cetavaraś ceti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5088: yadā na prakṛtim apekṣate, tadāpi kiṃ yāvad ukte, uta yajimaty ete karmaṇīti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5092: nātra karmaṇo vidhāyakaḥ [182]{*2/331*} śabdo 'sti. nanv ālabheta nirvaped iti ca. naitau vidhātārāv aviditasyārthasya vaktā vidhāyako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5095: nirvāpaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād anuvaditārau. kim artham anuvadataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5097: nirvāpe ca carum. tasmān nālambhāntaraṃ nirvāpāntaraṃ ca. prakṛtayor eva guṇavidhīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5105: yāvad uktaṃ vā, karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt // MS_2,3.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5108: kiṃ tarhy ālambhāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti nirvāpāntaraṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5110: tato na prākṛtau tau vihitau. yadi na vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5113: tataḥ tau lakṣayitvā śveto vidhātavyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5115: tau ca bhūtikāmasya brahmavarcasakāmasya ceti dvāv apy athā vidheyau syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5116: tatra vākyam bhidyeta. atha vā yo 'sau vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5117: sa lakṣayitavyopayukta iti vidhāyakābhāvād eko 'py artho na śakyate vidhātum. atha sa eva lakṣayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5118: tenaiva ca vidhāyiṣyate guṇa iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5121: ya ālambhaḥ sa etadguṇaḥ kartavya iti. tathāpi na prākṛto lakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5124: sa hi kartavyo nirjñāto na laukikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5125: ato na prākṛtānuvādo ghaṭa iti yāvad uktam ālambhamātraṃ nirvāpamātraṃ{*2/332*} cāpūrvaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5135: yajatis tu dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād eteṣāṃ karmasaṃbandhāt // MS_2,3.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5136: yad uktam, na prākṛtayor guṇavidhīti, etad gṛhṇīmaḥ. yat tūktam, ālambhamātraṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5137: nirvāpamātram iti, etad apajānīmahe, yajimatī ete karmaṇīti. kutah? dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5139: {*2/335*}, dravyadevatāsaṃyogo 'tra vidhīyate, bhūtikāmasya brahmavarcaskāmasya ca. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5145: iha hi śvetaṃ vāyavyam ālabhetety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5148: paṭaṃ dīrghaṃ vayeti paṭasya dīrghatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5150: evam ihāpi sauryavāyavyaśabdaprayogād dravyadevatābhisaṃbandho vidheya iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5153: taṃ cālabhetety arthadvayavidhānād bhidyetaiva vākyam. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5156: taṃ cālabhetety arthaviśiṣṭam. śrutyaiva hi puruṣaprayatno viśiṣṭo gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5157: vākyena ca dravyadevatāśraya iti nātra dvābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5158: yathā raktam aśvaṃ yojayeti yadā guṇavidhiparaṃ bhavati vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5161: tatra guṇavidhipare 'pi vākye paryavasita eva guṇadvayavidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5164: evam ihāpīti. saṃbandhaś ca bahubhiḥ padair viśiṣṭa eka evocyata ity ekārthatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5165: vibhajya[184]{*2/337*}mānāni cātra padāni sākāṅkṣāṇīty upapannam ekavākyatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5168: ity eṣa saṃbandho 'vakalpate. tasmād yajimatī ete karmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5175: liṅgaṃ khalv apy etam arthaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5179: yadi yajimatī ete karmaṇī. atha prakṛtau guṇavidhānaṃ yāvad uktaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5189: aveṣṭau yajñasaṃyogāt kratupradhānam ucyata iti{*2/340*}. nāpi ca sādhyaṃ pratijñātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5191: ayaneṣu codanāntaram iti{*2/341*}{*2/342*}. kevalaṃ viśaye saṃśaye prāyadarśanaṃ hetur iti nirdiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5192: kasyāyaṃ hetur iti na vijānīmaḥ. prakṛtaṃ yajimad etat karmeti{*2/343*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5193: tad api na saṃbandhyamānam iva paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5194: tad etad agamakaṃ{*2/344*} sūtram eva tāvad anarthakam. atha kātra pratijñā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5195: kaś ca sandeha iti vaktavyam. vṛttikāravacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5196: pratijñāṃ saṃśayaṃ cāvagacchāmaḥ. atra bhagavān ācārya idam udāhṛtya vatsam ālabheta vatsanikāntā hi paśava iti{*2/345*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5201: [185]{*2/346*} saṃśayaś ca. tatra ca pūrvapakṣaṃ pratijānīte sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5202: yajimad abhidhāna iti. idaṃ tu pratyudāharaṇasūtraṃ pūrvasyādhikaraṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5204: tathāpi puruṣāṇām uccāvacabuddhiviśeṣān ālocya bhavati mandānāṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭenāpy āśaṅkā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5207: mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikenāpi daṣṭo mriyeta na jātucit kadāpi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5208: tatra cikitsā nādareṇa kartavyā bhavet. atastāṃ nivartayituṃ pūrvapakṣam upanyasyati sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5209: ālabhatir asmābhiḥ prāṇisaṃyukto yajimad abhidhāno dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5211: tenāyam api yajimadvacana eveti bhavati kasyacid āśaṅkā. atha vā yajimadabhidhāno dṛṣṭa ālabhatiḥ prāṇisaṃyuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5213: tathā ca phalam na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5214: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asmin saṃśaye ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5217: tatraitad api śrūyate. prāyād api cārthaniścayo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5219: agryaprāye likhito 'grya iti gamyate. nanu liṅgaṃ prāyadarśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5220: katham anena siddhir iti. ucyate - yathā prāyadarśanena sidhyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5221: tathā varṇayitavyam. kathaṃ ca prāyadarśanaṃ hetuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5222: nyāyataḥ prāptau satyām. kaḥ punar nyāyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5224: vatsa ālabhyamāno gāṃ prastāvayiṣyatīti. tasmād evaṃ nyāyaprāpte prāyadarśanaṃ dyotakaṃ bhavati. tasmād ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5243: tatraivaṃjātīyakaṃ vacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmād apy ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāra iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5249: saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena tadarthaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt // MS_2,3.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5253: yad enaṃ carum upadadhātīti samāmananti. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5254: kiṃ carur yāgārtho yāgaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭa upadhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5256: caror hi prasiddhaṃ kāryaṃ yāgo nopadhānam. ucyate - yady api yāgārthatā caroḥ prasiddhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5257: tathāpi devatāvacanasaṃbandhābhāvād yajatiśabdāsaṃbandhāc ca na yāgārthateti gamyate. tad ucyate - tasyaiva vākyaśeṣe śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5258: bṛhaspater vā etad annaṃ yan nīvārā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5259: tena devatāvacanena sannihitenaikavākyatā bhaviṣyatīti bṛhaspatidevatāka upadhātavya iti. tasmād yāgārthaś carur ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5260: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena kāryaśabdenopadadhātīti tad arthaḥ eva syād upadhānārthaḥ. upadadhātinā cāsya pratyakṣam ekavākyatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5262: carum upadadhātīti hi pratyakṣaṃ vākyam. bārhaspatyam upadadhātīty ānumānikam. tasmāt kṛtsnaś carur upadhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5264: tad anyatra śrutam anyatra kṛtaṃ bhavet. yat tu bārhaspatyā nīvārā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5265: arthavādaḥ sa iti. yat tūktam - prasiddhā caror yāgārthateti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5266: prasiddhir vākyena bādhyate. tasmād upadhānārtha iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5273: yat paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatam utsṛjantīti. tatra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5275: uta tasmād yāgāntaram iti. yadi paryagnikṛtam utsṛjantīti padadvayaṃ paraspareṇa saṃbaddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5277: atha pātnīvataśabda utsṛjatinā saṃbadhyeta, tato yāgāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5281_0: ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kathaṃ pātnīvataśabdenānūdyeta. api ca tvāṣṭrasyotsarge vidhīyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:5281_1: paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvakalpeta. ato brūmaḥ - paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5283: pūrvasyaivotsṛjatiśabdenāvacchedo vidhīyate. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati. yajimattā tāvat kalpayitavyā na bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5284: utsṛjatiśabdaś ca śrutyotsargaṃ vidadhad vākyena na bādhito bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5285: karmāntarapakṣe vākyena pātnīvatatāyāṃ vidhīyamānāyām arthāt prāpta utsargo dhātunānūdyeta. api ca paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā pūrvasya viditaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5286: sā vidhātum na śakyate. tasmāt pūrvasya karmaṇo 'vacchedaḥ. yat tūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5287: tvāṣṭrasyotsargo vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvan nāvakalpeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5291: ata eva tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvata ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kevalena pātnīvataśabdena lakṣaṇayānūdyeteti na doṣaḥ. tasmād avaccheda iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5299: eṣa vai haviṣā havir yajate yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5300: tathā parā vaitasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'ṃśuṃ gṛhṇātīti{*2/354*}. tatra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5307: na grahaḥ kaścid yo 'bhyasyeta. tasmād yāgāntaram. nanu dravyadevataṃ na śrūyate. mā bhūd dravyadevatam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5308: sākṣād eva yajatiśabdo vidyate. tasmāt karmāntaram adābhyasaṃjñakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5309: aṃśusaṃjñakaṃ ca yāgaṃ karotīty evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5310: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - adravyadevatāke kevale nāmadheye śrūyamāṇe brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5312: etat tāvad grahasya nāmadheyaṃ na yāgasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5314: vyavahitatvād yāgasya. aṃśur iti ca muktasaṃśayam eva grahanāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5317: dravyadevataṃ śrūyate. yato gṛhṇātir yajimadvacano bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5323: aṃśvadābhyaśabdābhyām apy aparau grahābhyāsau vidhīyeta iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5329: agnis tu liṅgadarśanāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta // MS_2,3.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5331: ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5337: kim ayam agniśabdo yāgavacano jyotiṣṭomādibhyaḥ karmāntaraṃ cinuta ity ākhyātena vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5343: agneḥ stotram agneḥ śastram iti tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5345: yasya stotraṃ śastram upasadaś ca tasyāgniśabdo vācaka iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5347: tasmāt yāgavacana iti. nanu liṅgam asādhakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5348: prāptir ucyatām iti. atrocyate - athāto 'gnim agniṣṭomenaivānuyajatīti yāgam abhinivartayatīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5349: tam agnim iti viśinaṣṭi. tasmād agnisaṃjñaka iti gamyate. anuśabdo 'py upasargo yajater viśeṣaka evam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5350: yady agnir yāgaḥ. tasmāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5354: dravyaṃ vā syāc codanāyās tadarthatvāt // MS_2,3.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5357: atra hy eṣa prasiddhaḥ. cinuta ity eṣā hi codanā cayanārthā na yajaty arthaṃ śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5358: cayanenainaṃ saṃskurute citau sthāpayatīti. anuśabdaś ca paścād artho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5359: cayane nirvṛtte paścād agniṣṭomena yāgena yajatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5364: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni // MS_2,3.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5376: māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajata ityevamādi. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5377: kiṃ niyate 'gnihotre niyatayoś ca darśapūrṇamāsayor māso vidhīyate kālaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5378: atha kiṃ niyatāgnihotrān niyatābhyāṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ karmāntaravidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5381: kālavidhisarūpa eṣa śabdo māsam iti. kathaṃ kālavidhisarūpatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5383: māsam ity aviditam. evaṃ cāgnihotraśabdo darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaś ca nārthāntaravṛttau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5384: tasmāt kālavidhiḥ. nanu kuṇḍapāyinām ayanaprakaraṇaṃ bādhyetaivam. kāmaṃ bādhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5386: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇāntare śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyaṃ yasya prakaraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5387: tasya vācakaṃ bhavitum arhati. nanu pratyakṣo 'gnihotrasya darśapūrṇa[191]{*2/358*}māsayoś ca guṇavidhiḥ. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5391: upasado 'gnihotrasya darśapūrṇamāsayoś ca santi. tasmād aśakyas tatra māsavidhiḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5392: upasado 'pi vidhīyanta iti. tathā guṇavidhānārtho 'smin vākye 'nekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asmin pakṣe punar atantram agnihotraśabdo na karma viśekṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5393: tena vākyabhedo na bhaviṣyati. tasmāt karmāntaram iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5398: anārabhya kiṃcic chrūyata āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped rukkāmaḥ{*2/359*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:5400: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāma iti{*2/361*}. atra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5405: viditā āgneyādayaḥ pratyabhijñāyante, tasmāt teṣām anuvādaḥ phalasaṃbandhārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5406: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - phalaṃ ca bhedakam akarmasannidhau śrūyamāṇam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5407: anuvāde sati na śakyeta phalaṃ vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5410: avidhīyamāno hy upāyo ruco bhavatīti gamyate. api ca rukkāme 'tra vidhīyamāne kāmasya [192]{*2/362*} anityatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5411: āgneyādīnāṃ nityatvāt saṃbandho nāvakalpeta. evaṃ sarvatra. tasmāt karmāntarāṇi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5418: sannidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥśrutiḥ // MS_2,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5422: etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayeteti. tatra sandehaḥ - kiṃ karmāntaram aveṣṭer utāveṣṭir eveti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5425: uktena nyāyena. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sannidhau phalārthena punaḥśrutir aveṣṭer eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5428: etayety eṣa śabdo na śaknoty aveṣṭyā vibhaktaṃ yāgam anyaṃ vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5429: sannihitasya pratinirdeśaka eṣa śabdaḥ. tasmād aveṣṭir evānnādyakāmasya vidhīyata iti. kiṃ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5430: yady aveṣṭiḥ, āgneyādīni havīṃṣi. atha karmāntaram, anyahaviṣko yāga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5433: darśapūrṇamāsayor āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyābhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti vidhāya punar ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5434: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavatīti. tatra sandehaḥ - kim amāvāsyāyāṃ dvir āgneyena yaṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5437: ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syād iti{*2/363*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5443: avibhāgāt tu karmaṇā{*2/365*} dvir ukter na vidhīyate // MS_2,3.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5444: naitad asti, punar abhyasitavya āgneya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5446: abhyāsasya vācakaḥ śabdo 'stīti. nanv āgneyaḥ punaruccaritaḥ paraṃ karma vidhāsyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5447: śabdaḥ punaruccarito{*2/366*} na punar arthaḥ kartavya iti śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5450: nānyaḥ. nanu vihitam eva punar viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhad anarthako bhavati. bhavatu kāmam anarthakatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5453: na tv arthāntaravacanatā. tasmān na dvir abhyasyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5459: atha vā, nānarthikā punaḥśrutiḥ, arthavādārthā bhaviṣyatīty ucyate. kim arthavādena prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5460: yadā pūrvenaiva vākyena sārthavādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5466: śrutaś cāśrutaś{*2/370*} ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5467: yathā śrutā cāśrutā{*2/371*} ca devatā aṅgabhāvaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5468: evam etad iti. tad ucyate - anyārthā vā punaḥśrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5472: na kevalenāgninā sa sādhur bhavatītīndrasahito 'gniḥ samīcīnataraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5480: *{2/371: E1,6; E2,4: stutā vāstutā vā, E5: stutā cāstutā ca}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5485: yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām yajeteti. atra sandeheḥ - kiṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāso yāvajjīvikatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5486: uta kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyate yāvajjīvikateti. kathaṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5487: kathaṃ vā kartṛdharmo niyama iti. yadi juhotir anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5490: tataḥ kartṛdharmo niyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5497: tasmād abhyāsaḥ. evaṃ kṛtvā satrasaṃstavo yukto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5498: jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5502: atra brūmaḥ - yāvajjīviko 'bhyāso na syāt, kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5503: śrutisaṃyogāt. evaṃ śrutiparicchinno 'rtho bhaviṣyati, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5508: paurṇamāsyam āvāsyāparisamāptau ca darśapūrṇamāsau. yady ucyeta - jīvanakālasyaikadeśe 'pi kṛtaṃ tena kālena kṛtaṃ bhavatīti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5509: [195]{*2/373*} arthaprāptaṃ hi tan na vidhātavyaṃ śabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5516: śrutiś ca prakaraṇād balīyasī. yadīyaṃ vacanavyaktir asya vākyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5517: yāvajjīvam ity anuvādo juhoti yajatīti ca vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5518: ity evaṃ yajatijuhotiśabdau svārthāv eva bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5520: nābhyāsalakṣaṇo bhaviṣyatīti jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5529: liṅgadarśanāc ca, karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta, tatrānarthakam anyat syāt // MS_2,4.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5530: liṅgaṃ ca bhavaty api ha vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayeteti. kathaṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5531: karmadharme hi prakrāntaṃ satraṃ yāvajjīvanakālena parisamāpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5532: na tatra kālātipātaḥ syāt. tatra cānarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścittādi vidhīyamānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5534: vyapavargaṃ ca darśayati, kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt // MS_2,4.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5536: darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti. yadi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somasya kālo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5537: vyaktaṃ na yāvajjīvanakālena tau parisamāpyete. atha jīvanaṃ nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5539: darśapūrṇamāsau parisamāpya somaṃ karmāntaraṃ kuryād iti. [196]{*2/374*} api cāhitāgnir vā eṣa yo 'gnihotraṃ juhoti na darśapūrṇamāsau yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5540: yā āhutibhājo devatās tā anudhyāyinīḥ karotīty anudhyāyinīvacanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5542: tasmin adīyamāne 'nudhyāyinīvacanaṃ bhavati. yas tv aniyata āhutibhāgas tam{*2/375*} anudhyāyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5546: karmadharme ca kāmyam agnihotraṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsau ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5548: jarāmaryaṃ vaitat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5549: jarayā ha vaitābhyāṃ nirmucyate mṛtyunā ceti jarāmaraṇanirmocanāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ ca niyamapakṣa upapadyate. kāmyapakṣe hy aprayogād api mucyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5557: kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata iti. yadi pūrvasya homasya guṇavidhir bhavet sa ekaikaḥ pūrvo 'gnihotrahomo 'nityaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5560: jarāmaryaṃ vaitat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5561: jarayā vaitābhyāṃ nirmucyate mṛtyunā ceti. kathaṃ virudhyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5562: jarāmaraṇanirmocanādhāraṇavacanaṃ niyamapakṣa upapadyate, kāmyapakṣe 'prayogād api mucyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5565: itaś ca paśyāmo na pūrvābhyāso guṇaś codyata iti. kutah?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5568: darśapūrṇamāsavikārāḥ sauryādayo 'pi yāvajjīvam abhyasitavyā bhaveyuḥ. so 'nārabhyārthaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt. ato 'pi paśyāmo niyama iti satrasaṃstavaś ca santatabhāvam upapatsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5573: kartus tu dharmaniyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt // MS_2,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5576: jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate. tatra prayoge parisamāptaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5578: tasmāt kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyata iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5582: kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ paippalādakam ityevamādīni. tatra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5583: kim ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ yat karmāgnihotrādi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5584: tac chākhāntare punaḥ śrūyamāṇam bhidyeta tasmāt, uta na bhidyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5589: evaṃ nāmabhedād bhedaḥ. nanu granthanāmaitat. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5591: karmabhir apy evamādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktitvaṃ ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5598: kārīrīvākyāny adhīyānās taittirīyā bhūmau bhojanam ācaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5602: aśvamedham adhīyānāḥ kecid aśvasya ghāsam āharanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5607: sa evaikaḥ kathaṃ nākāṅkṣeta kathaṃ vānyad ākāṅkṣitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5608: ato gamyata anyad iti. punaruktiprasaṅgāc ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5610: ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ vihitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntare vacanaṃ punaruktam anarthakaṃ syāt. na tu bhedapakṣa eṣa doṣo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5612_0: nindāvacanāc ca prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayā{*2 /379*} juhvati ye 'gnihotraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5612_1: divākīrtyam ādivā kīrtayantaḥ sūryo jyotir na tadā jyotir eṣām iti kecic chākhino
GSP28msbh1-7u:5614: yathātithaye pradrutāyānnam āhareyus tādṛk tad yady udite juhvatīti{*2/380*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5617: tasmād api bheda iti. aśakteś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5618: na śaknuyuḥ khalv api sarvaśākhāpratyayam upasaṃhartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5629: anyatra na. bhede tu yuktam, tasmād bheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5633: na ca karmaikatva ubhayathā vṛddhiḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5636: itarad apy udite, tasmād api bhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5639: yadi purā didīkṣāṇāḥ syuḥ yadi vaiṣāṃ gṛhapatir gṛhapater vānusatriṇa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5640: ta enam eva [199]{*2/382*} bṛhatsāmānaṃ kratum upeyur upetaṃ hy eṣāṃ rathantaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5641: atha yady adidīkṣāṇā itīṣṭavatām aniṣṭapūrvāṇāṃ ca dvādaśāhe darśanam upapadyate yadi karmabhedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5646: ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta gartapatyam eva taj jāyeta pravām īyata iti{*2/384*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5651: yat pakṣasamitāṃ pinuyāt kanīyāṃsaṃ yajñakratum upeyāt kanīyasīṃ prajñāṃ kanīyasaḥ paśūn kanīyo 'nnādyaṃ pāpīyān syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5652: atha yadi vedisaṃmityā minotīti{*2/385*} pakṣasamāne pratiṣiddhe vedisaṃmānasya darśanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5654: pākṣikasya vedisaṃmānasya darśanam ekakarmatve nopapadyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5658: tatra ca no pakṣasaṃmānaṃ no vedisaṃmānaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5664: pareṣāṃ tisraḥ saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyanta ity ekakarmatve virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5669: ye puroḍāśinas te upaviśanti ye sānnāyinas te vatsān vārayanti. sānnāyina iṣṭaprathamayajñāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5684: nānākarmatve tv anyo bṛhatsāmānyo rathantarasāmeti yuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5691: *{2/381: E1,6; E2,4,5: na hi tad eva tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5706: tad eva prayojanam uddiśya tad eva vidhīyamānaṃ pratyabhijānīmaḥ. rūpam apy asya tad eva dravyadevatam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5709: tena tad eva karma sarvaśākhādiṣv iti pratyayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5713: parihṛtaṃ tad granthanām ata iti. atha yad uktam - karmaṇo 'pi nāmasāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanād iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5715: na karmasaṃyogād granthaḥ kāṭhakaḥ. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5716: yat karma kāṭhakādisaṃyuktam, tat kāṭhakādiśabdenocyate. kim ato 'pi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5717: yad granthasaṃyogāt kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ karmocyate. ekatve 'pi kāṭhakagranthasaṃyogāt kāṭhakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5725: śabdaikyāt tarhi karmaikyaṃ bhavet. tatra kāṭhakaśabdābhidhānād aikyaṃ bhaved agnihotrasya darśapūrṇamāsayor jyotiṣṭomasya ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5727: na caitad evam. tasmād apy abhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5744: atha yo dharmaviśeṣa uktaḥ, vidyāgrahaṇārthaḥ saḥ, na karmaṇa upakārakaḥ. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5745: śrutyādīnām abhāvāt, vidyāsaṃyogāc ca na karmaprayukta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5748: atha yad uktam - yathāmāvāsyāyām{*2/391*} āgneyasya punaruktadoṣān madhyamaḥ pakṣo nirastaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5749: evam ayam api tasmād eva doṣāt karmaikatvapakṣo nirasitavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5759: sa evāyam arthaḥ punaḥ śrāvito 'gnihotrādir bahukṛtvo bahubhis tu puruṣaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5760: na caiko 'rtho bahubhir ucyamānaḥ punarukto bhavati. yadi bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5761: ekasminn eva vede bahubhir ucyamāne bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5767: *{2/394: Dieses Sūtra wurde von Śabara nicht kommentiert,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5768: es findet sich jedoch bei Kumārila. In E2,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5770: 5 ist es aufgenommen worden. Dies bedingt eine von E1,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5777: evam ihāpi vṛkṣasthānīyasya vedasya śākhāḥ. kiṃ śākhāsārūpyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5779: na caikaikasyāṃ kṛtsnaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ sannihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5782: ity arthāsannidheḥ śākhāśabdopapattiḥ. tasmād apy ekaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5787: tat kāṭhakam evaikaṃ puruṣaṃ prati vidhīyate. taittirīyasyāpi tadvihitam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5794: tasmāt sarvaśākhyābhir ekaṃ samāptaṃ karmocyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5800: atrāsmākam agniḥ parisamāpyata ity utprekṣitāro bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5805: kathaṃ te brūyur eṣv asmākaṃ na parisamāpyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5810: na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ prayujyate. kiṃ tarhi ninditād itarat praśaṃsitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5811: tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedho gamyate. kiṃ tarhi ninditāditarat praśaṃsitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5812: tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedho gamyate. kiṃ tv itarasya vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5813: tatraikasminn agnihotre dvau kālau vihitau vikalpyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5815: tathāsamarthānām ekasminn api vede vihitaṃ kṛtsnam{*2/396*} aṅgajātam upasaṃhartum aśaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5816: samarthānāṃ tu sarvaśākhābhyo 'py āgamitam adhikaṃ vidhim upasaṃhartum śaktir astīti tenaikakarmatve 'pi na viruddham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5817: tathaikasminn api karmaṇi kiṃcid vastu samāptam iti kṛtvā samāptiśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5825: yad uktam - uditahomasyāpi prāyaścittāntā{*2/397*} nāvṛddhatā{*2/398*} gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5831: *{2/397: E2: prāyaścinnānād; E4: prāyaścitāmnānād; E5: prāyaścittāmnānād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5838: udite hoṣyāmīti prakānte 'nyathā kriyamāṇe bhavati doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5839: tatra prāyaścittasya viṣayo bhaviṣyatīti karmaikatve 'pi na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5849: liṅgam aviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśeṣatvān na hi tatra karmacodanā tasmād dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ syāt // MS_2,4.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5850: yad uktam - yadi purā didīksāṇā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5851: dvādaśāha iṣṭaprathamayajñānām aniṣṭaprathamayajñānāṃ ca darśanaṃ karmabheda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5855: na hi sāmavede jyotiṣṭomasya vidhānam. kim ato 'pi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5857: tena karmabhede 'pi sarvajyotiṣṭomānām eṣa dharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ nāma. ato nānākarmapakṣe 'py avaśyaṃ dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ kalpanīyas tasmād adoṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5862: dravye cācoditatvād vidhīnām avyavasthā syān nirdeśād vyavatiṣṭheta tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt // MS_2,4.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5863: dravye cāgnāv acoditatvād ekādaśinyāḥ saṃmānaparimāṇaṃ parti naiṣā vyavasthā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5868: yadi pakṣasaṃmitā syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5871: ekasmin yūpa ekādaśa paśavo niyoktavā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5872: vācastomādiṣu tu yūpaikādaśinyām asya nityānuvādatvād rathākṣamātrāṇy eva yūpāntarālāni bhaviṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5873: nityānuvādatvāc cāsaty api pakṣasaṃmāne vedisaṃmāne vaikādaśinīvidhānārthaṃ vacanam upapadyata eveti na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5878: atirātre gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinam iti vihitaḥ ṣoḍaśī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5882: tasmād adoṣaḥ. kathaṃ punar ayaṃ dvayos tisṝṇāṃ vātirekaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5886: tena sā ṣaṣṭiḥ. pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5888: pūrvayā ca navasaṃkhyayā caturaśītiḥ. saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni catvāri,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5890: pañcasaptadaśakāni tānīti pañcāśītiḥ. pūrvayā caturśītyā sahaikonasaptatiśatam. ekaviṃśaṃ yajñāyajñiyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5891: tayaikaviṃśatyā saha tasya navatiśataṃ stotriyā{*2/405*} iti brāhmaṇavādaḥ. agniṣṭomamātram abhipretyocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5892: sā virāṭ saṃpūrṇā virāḍ iti daśakākhyāḥ{*2/406*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5895: tayaikaviṃśatyā saha caturaśītiḥ. pañcadaśakā rātriparyāyās trayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5897: tad aśītiśataṃ saṃpūrṇā virāṭ. trivṛd rathantaraṃ pañcasāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5902: tadaikaviṃśatyā vinā dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5910: yad uktam - puroḍāśināṃ sānnāyināṃ ca sārasvate darśanaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5913: tena yadā sānnāyinaḥ puroḍāśina{*2/407*} iti kalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5918: atham yad uktam - upahavye bṛhadrathantaravidhānaṃ prakṛtiprāptam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5919: ekakarmatve pratiprasavatayāpy asaṃbhavād vidhīyamānam anarthakaṃ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5926: yadā rathantarasāmā, tadāśvaḥ śveto dakṣiṇā, yadā bṛhatsāmā tadā rukmalalāṭa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5930: katham ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ samāmnāyate 'nyasyāṃ guṇo vidhīyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5931: yathā maitrāyaṇīyānāṃ samidādayaḥ prayājā na samāmnāyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5933: ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānīya hotavyā iti{*2/409*}. tathā yeṣāṃ śākhināṃ kuṭarur asīty{*2/410*} aśmādānamantro nāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5936: kuṭarur asīti veti. tasmād ekaṃ karmeti pratīmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5941: api vā kramasaṃyogād vidhipṛthaktvam ekasyāṃ vyavatiṣṭheta // MS_2,4.31 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5946: virodhinā{*2/411*} tv asaṃyogād aikakarmye tatsaṃyogād vidhīnāṃ sarvakarmapratyayaḥ syāt // MS_2,4.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5947: ucyate - naiṣa śākhāntaravihitānām aikakarmye sati virodhinā{*2/412*} saṃyogaḥ. na hi kramo vākyena virudhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5950: vākyena ca śākhāntarīyāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ. tasmāt sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ sarvabrāhmaṇapratyayaṃ caikaṃ karma codyata iti siddhaṃ bhavati.

GSP28msbh1-7u:5965: nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam, anantaraṃ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vartayiṣyāmaḥ. kaḥ śeṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5975: yena ca hetunā śeṣa ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5976: tad ubhayam ākhyāyate. yaḥ parasyopakāre vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5977: sa śeṣa ity ucyate. tad yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5979: te vaktāro bhavanti śeṣabhūtā vayam iheti. nanu yo 'pi pradhānabhūtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5981: yathopādhyāyaḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ vidyāvinayādhāne vartate. satyaṃ vartate. yas tv atyantaṃ parārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5982: taṃ vayaṃ śeṣa iti brūmaḥ. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5983: garbhadāsaḥ karmārtha eva svāmino 'naḍvāṃś ca krīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5984: vakṣyatīty eva. nanu garbhadāsasyāpi savāmī saṃvidadhāno guṇabhāvamāyāt. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5987: anaḍuho vā. yas tv atyantaṃ parārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5990: yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇas tatra pratīyeta{*3/3*} iti{*3/4*}. tatrāpūrvārthatā vyāvartitā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5991: dṛṣṭaprayojanānāmākhyātānām. iha tu sarveṣām eva śeṣāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5998: vādarir{*3/6*} ācāryo 'tra dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva śeṣaśabda iti mane{*3/7*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6002: tasyā nirvṛttir dravyādṛte na bhavatīti tannirvṛttaye dravyam eṣitavyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt kriyārthaṃ dravyam. guṇaḥ śaknoti viśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ coditaṃ lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6004: viśiṣṭasya kriyāsādhanatvāt. tasmāt so 'pi dravyadvāreṇa kriyāyā upakarotīti{*3/9*} kriyārtha eva. saṃskāro nāma sa bhavati,
