GSP28msbh1-7u:6005: yasmin jāte padārtho bhavati yogyaḥ kasyacid arthasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6006: tenāpi kriyāyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ prayojanam iti so 'pi parārthaḥ. tasmād dravyaguṇasaṃskārāḥ parārthatvāc cheṣabhūtāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6007: na tu yāgaphalapuruṣāḥ. yāgas tāvat kartavyaḥ puruṣasya. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6008: tasmin nirvartite kiṃcid aparam asti kartavyam. sa hi puruṣārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6010: tat tadarthaṃ tasya śeṣabhūtam. sa tu na kiṃcid abhinirvartayituṃ kriyate. phalam api na tena kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6011_0: tasmiṃs tu kṛte svayam eva tad bhavati. tasmin kṛte phalam asya bhavatīty etāvad
GSP28msbh1-7u:6011_1: gamyate. nāsti śabdo yāgena kriyate [210]{*3 /10*} phalam iti. tasmād yāgo na śeṣabhūtaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6011_2: kasyacid arthasya. phalam api na puruṣaṃ pratyupadiśyate. yaḥ svargaṃ kāmayate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6012: sa yāgaṃ kuryād ity etāvac chabdenodiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6013_0: nātmanaḥ parasya veti. svargaṃ pratīcchāmātreṇa svargakāma iti bhavati. tasmāt puruṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6013_1: prati guṇabhāvena na śrūyate svargaḥ. tasmāt so 'pi na śeṣabhūtaḥ. na cet phalayāgau
GSP28msbh1-7u:6014: kasya puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūto bhavati. pratyakṣaś cāsya dravyatvāt karma prati guṇabhāvaḥ. tasmād dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva śeṣabhāvaṃ vādarir{*3/11*} mena iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6025: jaiminis tu khalv ācāryaḥ karmāṇy api śeṣabhūtāni manyate sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6026: na vādarir{*3/12*} ivāvadhāraṇām anumene. sa hi dadarśa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6028_0: phalakāmasya tu tatsādhanopāyatveneti. evaṃ śruto 'rthaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati. arthavāṃś
GSP28msbh1-7u:6028_1: copadeśaḥ. enam evārthaṃ ṣaṣṭhe 'dhyāye sūtrair eva sādhayiṣyati. iha tu tatsiddhenaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6028_2: phalārthatvena śeṣabhāvaṃ yāgasyāpādayati sma. tasmād anavadhāraṇā dravyaguṇasaṃkārāḥ śeṣabhūtāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6034: phalam api puruṣaṃ pratyupadiśyate. yaḥ svargo me bhaved ity evaṃ kāmayate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6037: kartrabhiprāya etad bhavati. kriyāphalam anubhavet kathaṃ puruṣa iti yāgaḥ prayujyate. tasmāt phalaṃ puruṣārthaṃ yāgāc chrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6044: puruṣo 'py audumbarīsaṃmānādiṣu guṇabhūtaḥ śrūyate. tasmād anavadhāraṇaiṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6046: athedānīm atra bhagavān vṛttikāraḥ pariniścikāya - dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva niyato yajiṃ prati śeṣabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6047: āpekṣika itareṣām. yāgasya dravyaṃ prati pradhānabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6059: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti. tatra śrūyante dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6066: gavāṃ prastāvanam{*3/16*} ityevamādayo 'pi sāntāyyasya{*3/17*}. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sarve,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6075: vākyenaiṣāṃ vrīhyādisaṃyogaḥ. ato 'sti saṃśayaḥ. [212]{*3/19*} kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6078: te tatra kartavyāḥ. prathanādaya ājyasāntāyyayor{*3/20*} anupakārakā iti na tatra karaṇīyāḥ. evam utpavanādaya auṣadhasānnāyyayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6079: śākhāharaṇādaya ājyauṣadhayoḥ. nanu śrūyante sarve sarvatra. etad eva na jānīmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6086: *{3/17: E2: sāṃnāyyasya, E4: sānāyyasya, E6: sānnāyyasya}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6092: vihitas tu sarvadharmaḥ syāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca // MS_3,1.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6094: sa yatra prayojanaṃ tatraiva kriyeta. śabdena tu sarve 'mī padārthā vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6098: yatra yatra vihitāḥ, te cāmī sarvatra vihitāḥ gamyante. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6099: saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca. sarveṣāṃ tāvad ājyauṣadhasānnāyyānām apūrveṇa sādhyasādhanasaṃyogo 'viśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6100: yatra kriyamāṇā apūrvasya kṛtā bhavatīti vijñāyate. tathā prakaraṇam aviśiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6101: yasmin vihitāḥ sarveṣāṃ vihitā bhavantīti gamyate. ataḥ sarve sarvatra kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6103: vidhānasāmarthyāt sarvatropakārakā iti gamyate. sa cāyam adṛṣṭa upakāro bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6109: na te tatra kriyām arhantīty uktam eva. nanu vidhānasāmarthyāt sarve sarvatropkariṣyanti. neti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6114: phalaṃ tu saha ceṣṭayā śabdārtho 'bhāvād viprayoge syāt // MS_3,1.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6116: yena sarve sarvatropakurvanti. na ca pratyakṣādibhir upakāram avagacchāmaḥ. arthāpattir api niyogatas tatraiva bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6118: nānyathā. yadi ca prathanādīnām ājyasānnāyyayor anupakurvatām api tatprakaraṇe samāmnāyo 'nupapanno bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6120: te tv avaśyaṃ samāmnānīyā auṣadhārtham. phalaṃ hi saha ceṣṭayāvahananādikayāvagamyate tuṣavimocanādi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6123: sati cāsminn arthavān prakaraṇe samāmnāyaḥ. arthavati ca tasmin nādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇam astīty ato na śakyaṃ kalpayitum. yadi ca tatra taṇḍulādiniṣpādanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nābhaviṣyat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6124_0: tato viprayoge taṇḍulādīnām abhāvād upakārasya śabdārthamātraṃ dṛṣṭopakārānapekṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6124_1: kartavyam ity ājyasānnāyyayor api kriyamāṇānām adṛṣṭam abhaviṣyat. tasmān na prathanādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6124_2: sarvatra. evam utpavanādayaḥ śākhāharaṇādayaś ca. tasmān na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6133: dravyaṃ cotpattisaṃyogāt tadartham{*3/23*} eva codyeta // MS_3,1.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6135_0: tatra samāmananti - sphyaś ca kapālāni ca [214]{*3 /24*} agnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6135_1: ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyā colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣṭac copalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti{*3 /25*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6135_2: tatra saṃdihyate - kiṃ yo ya iha śakyata ebhiḥ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6143: yajñāyudhānīti ca yajñasaṃyogo 'viśiṣṭaḥ. tasmāt sarve sarvatrety evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6144: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - dravyaṃ cotpattisaṃyogāt tadartham eva codyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6145: yo yena padārthena sahotpattivākyena saṃyuktaḥ sa padārthaḥ tenaiva kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6147: tad uddhaṇanaṃ na sphyād anyena kartavyam. yadā caivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6151: tena tena vacanena prāptasya. yathā - kapāleṣu śrapayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6157: dṛṣad upalābhyāṃ pinaṣṭīti. prakaraṇāt sarvāṇi sarvatra prāpnuyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6159: yajñāyudhaśabdo 'pi sāmānyena prayojanaṃ vidadhat tad vādhyetaiva{*3/29*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6161: pratyakṣaṃ tu viśeṣavacanena viśeṣavidhānam. tasmād yad yenotpattyā saṃyuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6174: arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6175: jyotiṣṭome krayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā{*3/31*} somaṃ krīṇātīti{*3/32*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aruṇimā kṛtsnaprakaraṇe niviśete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6176_0: uta kraya evaikahāyanyām iti. kathaṃ punaḥ aruṇayā krīṇātīty evaṃ vispaṣṭe krayasaṃbandhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:6176_1: gamyamāne saṃśaya iti. ucyate - iha hi guṇam aruṇimānam amūrtaṃ santaṃ kriyāyāḥ karaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6177: yat karaṇābhidhāyinyā tṛtīyāvibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati - aruṇayeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6178: na cāmūrto 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6179_0: ato 'saṃ-bandhaṃ krīṇātināruṇaguṇasyāvagacchāmaḥ. na cāśaṅkanīyam arthaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6179_1: śabdo 'bhidhāsyatīty evaṃ prakalpanā kadācid upapadyetāpi. kenacit prakāreṇa saṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:6182: ekavākyatayā kraya evāruṇimānaṃ niveśayiṣyāmaḥ. atha tv apramādyadbhir anviṣyamāṇo na kathaṃcana saṃbandha upapatsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6183: tato vākyabhedam abhyupagamya prakaraṇadharmam enam adhyavasāsyāmaḥ{*3/33*}. tasmād avaśyaṃ vicāraṇīyam etad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6187: prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca. nanu prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyo bhavatīty ekavākyatvād aruṇimā krayeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. naitad evam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6188: na hi vacanaśatenāpy anāra[213]{*3/34*}bhyo 'rthaḥ śakyo vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6189: yo hi brūyāt - udakena dagdhavyam agninā kledayitavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6191: na cāmūrto 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanam upapadyate. tasmād aruṇayā krīṇātīti saṃbandhābhāvād ekavākyatā na bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6192: nanu naivāyaṃ guṇavacanaḥ, kiṃ tarhi dravyavacanaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6193: strīliṅgasaṃbandhāt. dravyaviśeṣā hy ete strī pumān napuṃsakam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6198: tad eva hi dravyam aruṇimnā parichidyamānam aruṇaśabdābhidhānīyatāṃ{*3/36*} labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6202: avyabhicāri ca kāraṇaṃ kāraṇavatām iṣṭam. ato 'sya guṇaḥ svārtha iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6204: strīpratyayadarśanāt tu nūnam aruṇāprātipadikaṃ dravyavacanam ity anumānam. pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6208: evam aruṇeti. guṇavacanaś cet krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate. tasmād vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā prakaraṇe sarvasminn eva saṃniveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6211: na bhaviṣyati vākyabheda iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6213: na dravyaguṇau. kevalaṃ ca dravyam ekahāyanīśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6214: na guṇasahitam iti tayoḥ saṃbandhasya vācikāṃ ṣaṣṭhīm antareṇa kathaṃ saṃbandho gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6217: yathā nīlam utpalam iti. tad anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6219: kalpanīyaṃ tv ekavibhaktisaṃyogād ekahāyanīśabdasaṃnidhānāc ca tad ekavākyatām abhyupagamyaikahāyanīśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6220: na ca liṅgād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmād asad etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6221: tatrocyate - yadā kevalaguṇavacanatāyāṃ śabdaḥ pravartamāno nānyena saṃbandhaṃ labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6222: tadānupadeśakatvād ānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd iti dravyaparatām āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6223: tasyām avasthāyām ekavibhaktiyuktenaikahāyanīśabdena saṃnihitenaikavākyatām āpadyamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6225: nīlam utpalam ity upapadyate. sa cāyam aruṇāśabdas tasyām avasthāyāṃ vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6226: na hy asya svārtham abhidadhata ito vicchinnasya prakaraṇe 'py arthavattā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6228: nāmūrto{*3/43*} 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavatīti. na ca kriyāsādhanair dravyaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6229: na hi kevalaguṇavacanaḥ śaknoti dravyam abhidhātum iti sa eva hetuḥ prakaraṇasaṃbandhābhāve 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6232: tac cobhayam apy anupapannam. ato 'narthakatvaparijihīrṣayā saṃnihitenaikahāyanīśabdenāruṇāśabdaḥ saṃbadhyate. nāsti vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6233: naitad evam, na hy ayam aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6236: kārakāṇāṃ hi kriyayā saṃbandho na dravyeṇeti. sa eṣa śrutisāmarthyāt kriyāviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6237: ekavākyatvād{*3/44*} ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇam. śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6239: nanu ca guṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhābhāvād avivakṣitā kāraka[218]{*3/45*}śaktir{*3/46*} ity ekahāyanīsaṃbandho 'yam adhyavasitaḥ. evam api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6240: yadi kārakābhidhānam avivakṣitam iti guṇaśabdenaitena dravyam abhidhātum iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6241: tadā prātipadikārthasyāvyatireka iti prathamā vibhaktiḥ prāpnoti. na hi tṛtīyāntas tam abhisaṃbandhaṃ śaknoti vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6242: na cānyathānupapattir ity anyo 'syānupapadyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyate kalpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6243: yathāgnau tiṣṭhati māṇavaka ity ukte jvalane 'nupapadyamāno nāśve gavi vā kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6244_0: agnisamīpavacana evādhyavasīyate. tadvad ihāpy aprathamāntaḥ śabdo na kathaṃcid apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:6244_1: avyatirikte prātipadikārthe bhavitum arhatīti. tasmāt kāmam anarthako 'vagamyatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6247: vyaktam aruṇaguṇaviśiṣṭam etena kārakam abhidhīyate. kadācit tu kiṃcid vidhitsitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6251_0: kadācit tu nirjñāte puruṣe daṇḍaguṇavidhānārtham uccāryate - daṇḍī praiṣānanvāheti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6251_1: tathā{*3 /47*} lohiteṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. evam ihāpi yady anupasarjanabhūto{*3 /48*} 'ruṇo guṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6252: pradhānabhūtaṃ kārakam. tathāpy anūdite kārake 'ruṇaguṇavidhānārthaṃ vacanaṃ yujyate. tasmād ekahāyanīsaṃbandha upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6254: atra hy ekahāyanīkrīṇātyor anavabuddhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ bodhayitum ayam ekahāyanīśabda uccaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6256: tad etad abhihitam api punaḥ punaḥ paryanuyujjyate. [219]{*3/49*} kathaṃ punar ekahāyanīśabdasya krīṇātinā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6257: aruṇaguṇena ca samāne samabhivyāhāre krīṇātinā saṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6259: bhavati hi kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā vibhaktir ekahāyanīśabdam anuniviṣṭā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6260: na tu guṇasaṃbandhasya vācikā. kā punaḥ kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6261: kā vā guṇasaṃbandhasyeti. kārakalakṣaṇā kriyāsaṃbandhe vivakṣite bhavati dvitīyādiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6263: saṃbandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī. na cātra ṣaṣṭīṃ paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6264: paśyāmas tu khalu tṛtīyām. ataḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandham abhyupagacchāma ekahāyanīśabdasya, nāruṇāśabdeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6269: utpalaśabdasaṃnidhāne tadapekṣī nīlaśabdas tenaikavākyatām abhyupagacchan nājahat svārthavṛttir upalaviśeṣābhidhānapara uccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandham abhyupaiti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6270: nanv ihāpi vākyalakṣaṇas tadvad evāruṇimnā samaṃ saṃbandha ekahāyanyā yujyate. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6276: yo hy anyena saha saṃbandhum uccāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6277: na tatsamīpagato 'py anyas tena saha saṃbanddhum arhati. yathā bhāryā rājñaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6278: puruṣo{*3/50*} devadattasyeti bhāryāviśeṣaṇārtham uccāryamāṇo rājaśabdo na puruṣeṇa saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6279: tadvad iha krayāviśeṣaṇārtham uccāryamāṇa ekahāyanīśabdo nāruṇāśabdena saṃbandham arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6282: sarvatra tu bodhite padārthe vākyārtha upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6288: tad etad uktam - tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāyo 'rthasya tannimittatvād iti{*3/52*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6292: kevalasvārthavṛtti padam anupadeśakam iti padāntareṇa saṃnihitenaikavākyatvam abhyupaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6293: nānyatheti. tad iha yady apy ekahāyanīśabdaḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandhyamānaḥ kṛtārtho na padāntareṇa saṃbandham ākāṅkṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6294: aruṇāśabdas tu padāntareṇa saṃbandham alabhamāno 'narthaka ity ekahāyanīśabdenaikavākyatām abhyupaiti. nanūktam - kriyāsaṃbandhārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6297: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārtham api śaknoti kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6299: tābhyaś ca pānīyaṃ pīyata upaspṛśyate ca. evam ihāpi krayasaṃbandhārtham ekahāyanīśabda uccāryamāṇo 'ruṇāśabdena saha saṃbhantyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6300: na kiṃcid duṣyati. tasmān na vākyabheda iti. naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6301: yady apy ayam aruṇāśabdo 'narthako mā bhūd ity ekahāyanyā saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6302: tathāpi sarvasmin prakaraṇe niveṣṭum arhati. na cainaṃ somaṃ krīṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. na hy ayaṃ viśeṣaṇatvenocāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6304: nanv apūrvo 'pi vidhīyamāna ekahāyanīśabdavad itareṇa saṃbhantsyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6308: tena buddhau saṃnihitena śakyate sākāṅkṣaḥ śabdaḥ saṃbandhayitum iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6312: tatra vākyena śrutiḥ pīḍitā syāt. na cāyam [221]{*3/54*} asaṃbadhyamānaḥ krīṇātinānarthako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6314: nanv etad uktam - prakaraṇe 'py asya saṃbandho 'nupapanna iti. nānupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6318: anyā guṇena saṃbadhyamānasya. ajñātavaj jñāpyate vidhīyamāno 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6320: na ca sakṛd uccāryamāṇo jñātavad ajñātavac ca bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6322: aruṇāśabdena saṃbadhyamānaś ca jñatavat. vākyabhede punar na doṣo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6323: prakaraṇe tu vākyāntaraiḥ kriyādravyāntarāṇī ca prāptāni. tair idaṃ vākyāntaravihitaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6325: anyasmin vākye 'nūdyata ity upa-pannaṃ bhavati. tasmāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/57*} sarvasmin prakaraṇe dravyeṣu niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6326: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6328: tatra dravyaguṇāv ekasmin padārthe niyamyeyātām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6330: ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ dravyaguṇayoḥ śrūyate krayasaṃbandhaḥ. katham etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6334: tayor evaṃ nairutsukyāt. yady ekakāryatā kim iti vikalpo na bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6335: naitad{*3/58*} evam. ekārthās tu vikalperann iti vikalpadharmāṇau prāpnuta ity ayukto 'yaṃ paryanuyogaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6340: krayeṇāruṇim āsaṃbandha{*3/60*} ity eṣa naḥ pakṣaḥ. na ca vikalpo nānākāryatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6341: nanv idānīm evoktam - ekaṃ kāryam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6344: amūrta-tvād guṇo na kriyayā saṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6345: idānīṃ viparītam abhidhīyate - ubhāv api dravyaguṇāv ekārthau krayam abhinirvartayata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6350: sākṣād dhi dravyaṃ kriyāṃ pratyupakaroti. guṇas tu viśiṣṭānāṃ sādhanam. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6353: guṇasya kriyām abhinirvartayata etad eva sāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6354: yat sādhanaṃ viśiṣyāt. ākāṅkṣati ca kriyā sādhanaviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6355: cihnabhūto hi guṇaḥ sādhanaṃ lakṣayati. asati cihne na lakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6356: katamat sādhanaṃ kriyāyā iti. tataḥ kriyā nādhyavasyema kartum iti bhavati kriyāsādhanaṃ gunaḥ. na caiva sati vikalpo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6359: tāny adhāryamāṇāni na śaknuvanti kriyām abhinirvartayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6361: tāny asamāhitāni na śaknuvanti svaṃ svam artham abhinirvartayitum. yasmiṃs tu sādhanopakāre kārye tasminn evopakāre 'nyat sādhanaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6366: evaṃ tarhi tad evedaṃ saṃjātaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6369: tatra sa eva doṣo vākyabhedaḥ prasajjyeteti. na brūmaḥ - aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīśabdena saṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6370: kiṃ tarhi krīṇātinaiva saṃbadhyate. evaṃ hi śrūyate 'ruṇaguṇena krayam abhinirvartayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6372: tathā yatitavya bhavati. na cāviśiṃṣan sādhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6373: guṇaḥ kriyā[223]{*3/62*}m abhinivartayatīty arthāt sādhanaviśeṣaṇatāṃ pratipadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6374: yathā sthālyāṃ paced iti kriyāsādhanatvena nirdiṣṭe 'rthāt saṃbhavane dhāraṇe ca syālīṃ{*3/63*} vyāpārayati tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān nāsti vākyabhedaprasaṅga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6375: nanv evam api vākyaṃ bhidyeta. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6377: yathā devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrā bhojyantām iti pratyekaṃ bhujiḥ samāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6378: yathā ca yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pived iti. evam ihāpy aruṇayā krīṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6381: na sarvasmin prakaraṇa iti. satyam eṣa doṣo na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6382: kiṃ tv anaruṇayāpy ekahāyanyā krayaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6384: tatra yad uktaṃ dravyaguṇayor niyama iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6385: sā pratijñā hīyate. na tarhi brūmaḥ - vākyabheda iti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6390: asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ - samudāye vākyaparisamāptir iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6392: tathā abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣāyantīti. tasmād ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ krayo vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6393: kathaṃ punas tasmiṃś cetariṃś ca dṛṣṭānte saty ekāntenāvadhāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6394: samudāya eva vākyaparisamāptir na pratyavayavam iti. atra brūmaḥ - iha dravyāruṇimānāv ubhāv api kriyāsaṃbaddhāv upalabhyete paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6396: tatra yadi dravyaparam aruṇim aparaṃ ca bhavati vacanam idam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6397: tataḥ pratyavayavam asaṃśayaṃ krayasaṃbandhaḥ. atha krayavidhitsayābhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6399: evam aruṇim aviśiṣṭa iti niyamata ubhayasaṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ. na cātra dravyāruṇimānāv īpsitau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6404: sa ca nānyataraviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyata iti samudāye vākyaparisamāptir iha niścīyate. yadā caivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6407: na cāruṇād anyaḥ sādhanasya viśeṣako guṇa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6409: atra vadāmaḥ - yadi krayasya sādhane guṇo 'bhisaṃbandhum upaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6410: tadā vākye bhinne 'pi krayasādhanatvād aruṇimāsmin dravye na nivekṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6411: kim artham ekavākyatā prayatnena sādhyata iti. tad etad abhidhīyate - bhinne hi vākya ekāhāyanīsādhanakaḥ krayo 'vabuddho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6413: na tasminn evaikahāyanīsādhane kraye 'ruṇimā vihito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6415_0: tatrārthāt prāptam anyad api sādhanaṃ bhavati. tad api viśiṃṣan aruṇo guṇas tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:6415_1: saṃbadhyeta. ekavākyatve tu tat parihṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sādhv abhidhīyate - arthaikatve
GSP28msbh1-7u:6453: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - ya evaṃ vidvān somena yajata iti{*3/65*}. [225]{*3/66*} tatra śrūyate - daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃārṣṭīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6455: tathā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - puroḍāśaṃ paryagnikarotīti{*3/67*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ekasya grahasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6458: uta sarveṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ sarveṣām agnīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ puroḍāśānām iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6459: eko grahaḥ, eko 'gniḥ, ekaḥ puroḍāśa iha grahītavyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6463: śabdalakṣaṇe ca hi karmaṇi yac chabda āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6465: yathā paśum ālabheta ity ukta eka eva paśuḥ pumāṃś cālabhyate. evam atrāpy eko grahaḥ saṃmārjanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6473: sarveṣāṃ vā lakṣaṇatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi lakṣaṇam // MS_3,1.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6474: naitad asti - yad uktaṃ grahādiṣv{*3/68*} ekatvayukteṣv amī padārthāḥ kartavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6483: sāmānyāvagamād viśeṣān avagamāc ca sarvapratyayaḥ. tathāgnipuroḍāśānām api. nanv ekavacanaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6485: ekatvaṃ hi śrūyamāṇaṃ grahādiṣv ekatvaṃ brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6487: ekatvasyāsau vācako na dvitīyādeḥ [226]{*3/69*} pratiṣedhakaḥ. tenāpratiṣiddhe dvitīyādau sāmānyavacanena prāptaṃ saṃmārjanādi kim iti na kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6489: ekavacanam iha śrūyamāṇaṃ prāpta evaikasmin dravye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6502: ādatta iti liṅgenaivādāne prāptatvān mantrasya parisaṃkhyā yuktā. iha punar yad ekavacanaṃ dravye śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6503: tac chrūyamāṇam apy avidhīyamānatvena na nivartakaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6504: yathā kaścid odanaṃ nirdiśya brūyāt - ya enaṃ bhakṣayet kaścic chvā mārjāro vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6509_0: tataḥ kāko 'py āgacchan nivāryate. śrūyamāṇe 'pi śuni mārjāre vā śvamārjārasaṃbandhasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6510: na cātra dravyaikatvasaṃbandhavidhāyakaḥ kaścic chabdo 'sti. nanu saṃmārṣṭīti. na hy etad dravyaikatvasaṃbandhasya vidhāyakam. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6513: itarathā vākyena parapadārtho vidhīyate. śrutyasaṃbhave ca vākyaṃ kramate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6515: ekatvaṃ na dvitīyādīn pratiṣeddhum arhati. evaṃ sati na dvitīyādau saṃmārgādi kriyamāṇam [227]{*3/72*} acoditaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6517: yathaiva hi tad ekasya śrutam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6520: na tad ekatvaṃ dravyasya saṃmārgādau viṣaye niyamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6527: lakṣaṇatvena coc-cārayitum. prasiddhasaṃbandho hi śaknoti lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6528: na cāvihita evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdāvagamyaḥ prasiddhasaṃbandho bhavati. vidhīyate ca saṃmārgādiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6531: na dravya ekatvaṃ niyamyata iti śakyam āśrayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6532: athaikatvaṃ saṃmārga ucyate. tatrāpi dvayī gatiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6535_0: tac cobhayam apy anupapannam. na tāvad ekatvasya saṃmārgaḥ śākyate kartum. na ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:6535_1: dravye kriyamāṇa ekatvasyopakaroti kenacit prakaraṇam. na caikatvasyopakṛtena kiṃcit prayojanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6536: na hi tad guṇabhūtaṃ śrutam. athaikatvaṃ saṃmārgaṃ prati guṇabhūtam iti. tad api na. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6538: na hi tat saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayati. yady apy anyad amūrtaṃ kriyāṃ niṣpādayati sādhanaṃ viśiṃṣat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6544: tad upakāriṇa{*3/73*} upakarotīti saṃmārgasyopakārakam ekatvaṃ bhavet. na tv etad evam. tasmād ekatvasaṃmārgayor asaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6545: nanu pradhānabhutam api grahādi saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayaty eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6546: atas tatsādhanaṃ tac ca viśiṃṣat tad upakariṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6547: yathā ijyārthe dadhani payasi ca praṇītā dharmāḥ pāka upakurvanti. paridhānārthe ca [228]{*3/74*} paridau yūpadharmā bandhane. tasmād ayam asamādhir iti. atrocyate - na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6548: atadarthe sādhake na śaknuvanty upakartum iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6554: na tu tadvidhīyate vijñānāya. kim arthaṃ tarhy uccāryate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6556: tad etad grahādi lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgādi vidhīyate. tad yady ekatvasaṃbandho 'paro grahadravye{*3/75*} saṃmārgādau vā padārthe{*3/76*} vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6557: dvayoḥ saṃbandhayor vidhānād bhidyeta vākyam. athocyeta - grahādi lakṣayitvā tasyaikatvasaṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6559: tathā ca saṃmārgādīnām adhyayanaṃ pramāda ity abhyupagataṃ syāt. na caitad evam. tasmād ubhābhyām ekavacanasyāsaṃbandha iti. evam etad ekatvaṃ grahasya na kiṃcid upakāraṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6561: evam eva sadanūdyate. tasmān naitat kiṃcid api kartuṃ vivakṣyata iti sarveṣāṃ grahādīnāṃ saṃmārgādi kartavyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6563: yady avivakṣitam ekatvam, kathaṃ trahy ekavacanam uccāryate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6564: nanu bahuṣu vivakṣiteṣu bahuvacanena bhavitavyam. ucyate - na vayam etad vicārayāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6570: tac ca sarveṣv iti sthāpitam. api ca na vibhakter vacanam evaikaṃ prayojanam. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6572: avivakṣita ekatve kārakasaṃbandhārtham asyoccāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmān nānarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6573_0: api ca grahaḥ prātipadikārtha ekatvaṃ vibhaktyarthaḥ. kim ato [229]{*3 /78*} yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:6573_1: evam. etad ato bhavati - prātipadikārthagataṃ hi vibhaktiḥ svam arthaṃ śrutyaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6574: saṃmārgeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. tena hi saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6576: anyena saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyenācchidyānyena saṃbandham arhati. asaṃbadhyamānas tv ekatvena saṃmārgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6580: grahādimātrasya ca vidhīyata iti kim iti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca na kriyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6594: codite tu parārthatvād yathāśruti patīyeta // MS_3,1.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6595: atha yad uktam - yathā paśum ālabhetety eka eva paśuḥ puṃpaśuś cālabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6597: asty atra vaiparītyam iha grahārthaḥ saṃmārgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6598: tatra punar yāgārthaḥ paśuḥ. kim evaṃ sati bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6601: aparicchinnena na śakyo yāgaḥ kartum iti. na tu graheṇa kenacid viśiṣṭena saṃmārgaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6603: paśoś caitad ekatvaṃ yāgaṃ pratyupadiśyate. nanūktam - prātipadikārthagataṃ svam arthaṃ vibhaktiḥ śrutyaivābhivadatīti{*3/80*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6605: tatra vākyāc chrutir balīyasīty uktam. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6607: avivakṣyamāṇe ca vākyāvagataḥ san aparyudasitavyo{*3/81*} bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6609: grahaikatvaṃ na saṃmārgasyopakarotīti na grahaṃ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. tasmād avivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6614: *{3/81: E2,4: san na paryudasitavyo, E6: sann aparyudasitavyo}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6617: saṃskārād vā guṇānām avyavasthā syāt // MS_3,1.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6619: tatra śrūyate - daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti. tatraiṣo 'rtho 'dhigataḥ - sarve grahāḥ saṃmārjitavyā iti. idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ camasāpi saṃmārṣṭavyā uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6621: camasādy api sarvaṃ saṃmārjyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6628: te camasānāṃ nirvartakā bhaviṣyanti. ucyate - pradarśanārthaṃ grahagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6632: tat sarvaṃ saṃmārjitavyam. yathā bhojanakālo vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6636: sthālagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇārtham iti gamyate. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6639: ukto 'nukto vā sa sa{*3/84*} saṃmṛjyetaiva. iha tu vede śabdalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6641: tatra kim arthaṃ śrutau saṃbhavantyāṃ grahaśabdo lakṣaṇayā kalpyate. ucyate - saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmārge puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātum eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti śravaṇenaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6643: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmāl lakṣaṇayā grahaśabdo varṇyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6647: yo yaḥ saṃmārjanasaṃskārārhaḥ sa sa saṃmārjitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6648: neti{*3/85*} graheṣv eva vyavatiṣṭhetaivaṃjātīyako guṇa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6656: vyavasthā vārthasya śrutisaṃyogāt, tasya śabdapramāṇatvāt // MS_3,1.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6657: vyavatiṣṭheta vā graheṣv eva saṃmārgaḥ, na camaseṣv api prasajyeteti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6660: utsṛjyamāne śrutir eva bādhyate graham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6662: na caitan nyāyyam. tasmād grahaśabdena grahaṃ lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgasaṃbandho vidhīyate. na cāvidadhat saṃmārgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6664: ato vidadhāty evaiṣa śabdaḥ saṃmārgam. na ca śrutir bādhiṣyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6665: saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmṛjigataṃ puruṣaprayatnaṃ śrutyā śaknoti vidhātum. na{*3/87*} tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6667: pareṇa vā saṃbadhyamāna iti. tena na grahasaṃbandhe 'pi śrutir bādhitā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6668: ato graheṣv eva saṃmārgo vyavasthātum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6669: nanv apūrvasaṃyogāviśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca camaseṣv api prasajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6670: na graheṣv evāsya vidhānam ity uktam. atrocyate - prakaraṇavadbhir ekavākyatāṃ kṛtvā śaknoti tatra vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6675: na śaknoti vidhātum. tasmād vaiṣamyam asya{*3/89*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6676: grahaikatvavidhānena{*3/90*}. yad uktam - yathā sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām iti lakṣaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6690: vājapeye śrūyate - saptadaśāratnir vājapeyasya yūpo bhavatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saptadaśāratnitā vājapeyasyordhvapātre niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6691: uta paśor yūpe niviśata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6697: tac ca khādiratvād ūrdhvatvāc ca yūpasadṛśam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6698: tatra niveśe sati vājapeyaśabda āñjasyena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6699: itarathā vājapeyāṅgapaśuyāge{*3/93*} lakṣaṇayā vājapeyaśabdo vṛtta iti gamyate. nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayordhvapātre. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6700: sarvathā vayaṃ lakṣaṇāśabdān na mucyāmahe. matpakṣe tu vājapeyaprakaraṇam anugṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6706: tasya tu paśuṃ bandhuṃ yūpena kāryam. sākṣād vājapeyayūpasya yadi saptadaśāratnitā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6708: tad anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti yo 'sya paśuyāge yūpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6709: tatra niveśam arhati. ūrdhvapātre ca yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayā syāt. nanv itarasminn api pakṣe vājapeyaśabdo lakṣaṇayeti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6714: bhavati sa tasya saṃbaddho mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena. na caikāntaritam iti kṛtvāsaṃbaddho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6717: atha ca devadattena mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena saṃbaddhaḥ. tasmād eṣa eva [233]{*3/94*} pakṣa āśrayaṇīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6718: na hy etasmin pakṣe kaścid api lakṣaṇaśabdo bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6723: kartṛguṇe tu karmāsamavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6724_0: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayājavākye śrūyate - abhikrāmaṃ juhoty abhijityeti{*3 /95*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6724_1: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim abhikramaṇaṃ prayājeṣv eva niviśata uta kṛtsne prakaraṇa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6727: na tat karma havanaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6728: tasmān na tenaikavākyatāṃ yāti. ataḥ sarvasmin prakaraṇe niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6730: nanv anenaiva hetunānyasminn api na nivekṣyate. ucyate - anyatra puruṣaiḥ saṃbhantsyate. nanu prayājeṣv api puruṣaiḥ saṃbadhyeta. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6731: juhḥtīti havana eṣa śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6732: na puruṣābhikramaṇāsaṃbandham. nanv anyatrāpi puruṣābhikramaṇasaṃbandhasyāvidhānam. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6733: anyatra prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgabhāve nirjñāte prayogavacano 'sya kartavyatāṃ vakṣyati. tasmāt sarvasmin prakaraṇe 'bhikramaṇasya niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6738: sākāṅkṣaṃ tv ekavākyaṃ syād asamāptaṃ hi pūrveṇa // MS_3,1.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6739: naitad asti - yad uktam abhikramaṇaṃ prakaraṇe niviśata iti. prayā[234]{*3/97*}jeṣv eva bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6741: yataḥ sākāṅkṣam etat pūrveṇa padenāsamāptaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6743: prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ balavad iti prayājeṣv evābhikramaṇaṃ niviśate. nanv abhikramaṇam amūrtatvād dhomanirvṛttāv asamartham ity uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6750: samāsīded anvābhikramaṇena. tasmād abhikramaṇam upakaroti homasyety avagamyate. ataḥ prayājeṣv eva niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6754: saṃdigdhe tu vyavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6760: ekādaśe ca yajñopavītam āmnātam - upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kuruta iti{*3/98*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sāmidhenīr evānubruvāṇa upavyayeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6761: uta prakaraṇe sarvān eva padārthān anutiṣṭhatā upavyātavyam iti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6762: upavītaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇe samāmnātam, atha nivṛtte vā tāsāṃ prakaraṇa iti na jñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6764: paraprakaraṇe sāmidhenyaḥ śrūyante. satyaṃ paraprakaraṇe śrūyante. tathāpi tāsām avāntaraprakaraṇam aparam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6767: yena tatsaṃnidhāv abhidhīyamānaṃ tasyeti jñāyate. kathaṃ punar nivṛttaṃ tāsāṃ prakaraṇam ity āśaṅkyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6768: [235]{*3/99*} nivitpadāni tāsāṃ prakaraṇaṃ vyavadadhatīti. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6773: tenānivṛttaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇam iti bhavati matiḥ. ataḥ paraprakaraṇe nividaḥ samupanipatitā na vyavadadhati. yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6774: dvādaśopasattāhīnadharmo jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa iti. tena bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6776: sāmidhenīprakaraṇam anivṛttam, tatropavītaṃ samāmnātam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6779: kartuś ca vāsovinyāsamātraṃ guṇo bhavaty upavītaṃ nāma. kiṃ kurvatā tat kartavyam iti bhavati tatra padārthākāṅkṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6780: tatra buddhau saṃnihitenāviprakṛṣṭena sāmidhenīvākyenaikavākyatāṃ upagamya sāmidhenīṣūpavītaṃ upavyayata ity eṣa śabdo vidadhātīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6783: sa nirṇayaḥ. asmin saṃdehe vākyabheda iti nirṇaya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6787: nividāṃ vidhāyakena sāmidhenībhir asaṃbaddhena granthena vyavadhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6788: yasya ca paryavasite 'pi vacane tatsaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6790: āgacchati hi tatsaṃbaddhābhidhāne hṛdayam. yatra tu paryavasite vacane tadasaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6791: na tatra buddhau pūrvaḥ padārthaḥ saṃnidhīyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6792: buddhāv asaṃnihitenaikavākyatā bhavati. dvābhyāṃ hi buddhābhyāṃ{*3/100*} padārthābhyāṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃjanyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6795: katham ubhābhyāṃ padārthābhyāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ buddhim utpādayeyur iti. [236]{*3/101*} anantarāv abuddhena saha vākyārthaḥ śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6796: asaṃbaddhapadoccāraṇe ca nānantarāv abuddho bhavati. tasmād vyavahitena saha naikavākyatā bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6798: vākyārthaṃ saṃjanayet. avaidikaḥ sa puruṣabuddhir pūrvako vākyārtho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6801: anyasmāc ca nāmapadaṃ yo vākyārthaḥ saṃjanyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6804_0: vākyārthaṃ saṃjanayet. tasmān nāsaṃbaddhārthavyavadhānaikavākyatā bhavatīti niścīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6804_1: tasmān na sāmidhenībhir ekavākyatopavītasyeti. nanu sāmidhenīkalpānām anantarabuddhānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6805: tena sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbhantsyata iti. neti brūmaḥ - ativṛttam eva hi sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nivitpadair vyavadhānāt. vākyena hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:6809: punaḥ kalpavacanena sāmidhenyaḥ prakṛtā bhavanti. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6810: tatra tāsāṃ vacanaṃ kartavyā iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6813: na prakaraṇena. tatrāprakṛtāsu samidhenīṣu yasyaikavākyatā guṇasya sāmidhenībhir nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6814: na tasya tābhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ. tasmāt{*3/102*} prakaraṇe{*3/103*} yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad yajñopavītineti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6823: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād asaṃbandhaḥ samatvāt syāt // MS_3,1.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6824: agnyādheye vāraṇavaikaṅkatapātrāṇy ahomārthāni homārthāni [237]{*3/104*} ca śrūyante - tasmād vāraṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6826: vaikaṅkato yajñāvacaraḥ syāj juhuyād eteneti. na ca vāraṇavaikaṅkatānāṃ pātrāṇām agnyādheyena saṃbandhaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6829: vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā bhavanti. tatraiṣa saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pavam āneṣṭiṣu niviśante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6830: uta darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu sarvayāgeṣv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6832: uktam etat pradhāne 'saṃbhavan padārthas tadguṇe kalpyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6833: agnyādheyaprakaraṇe ca samāmnānāt pavamānahaviṣāṃ tadguṇatā. tasmāt pavamānahaviḥṣv ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6835: pavamānahaviṣām agnyādheyasya ca na paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. yathādhānam agner guṇaḥ saṃskārārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6836: evaṃ pavamānahavīṃṣy apy agner eva guṇabhūtāni. kas tatra paraspareṇa saṃbandha iti. yad uktam - ādhānasya prakaraṇe samāmnāyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6838: tathāpi prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyenāgner bhavanti. kim iha vākyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6839: yad āhavanīye juhoti{*3/105*} tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6840: nanv āhavanīyo 'tra yāgasyādhikaraṇatvena guṇabhūtaḥ śrūyate. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6843: prayojanavattvād āhavanīyasya niṣprayojanatvāt pavamānahaviṣām. katham eṣāṃ niṣprayojanatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6844: phalāśravaṇāt. kalpyaṃ phalam iti cet. satyaṃ kalpyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6849: tasya cāhavanīyenāparo 'dṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāra iti. tasmād agnyarthatā pavamānahaviṣām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6850: naiṣām ādhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nādhāne śrūyamāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6851: pavamānahaviṣāṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ tarhi sarvayāgeṣu darśapūrṇamāsaprabhṛtiṣv ādhānasya pradhānabhūteṣu niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6859: vṛdhanvaty amāv asyāyām iti{*3/107*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim anuvākyādvitvasya pradhāne niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6863: amāv asyāsamabhivyāhārāc ca. pradhānaṃ paurṇamāsī cāmāv asyā ca nājyabhāgau. tasmāt sākṣād vākyāt pradhānasyeti prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6864: tatra brūmaḥ - mithaḥ saha dvābhyām anuvākyābhyāṃ na pradhānasya kāryam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6866: tatra tayor vārtraghnatā vṛdhanvattā ca vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6868: tatra dvitvaṃ vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ ca vidadhad vākyaṃ bhidyeta. ājyabhāgayos tu dve prāpte āgneyī saumī ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6869: tatra vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ kevalāṃ śakṣyati vidhātum. nanu pradhānagāmitve 'pi dvayoḥ pradhānayor dve anuvākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6870: āgneyasyāgnīṣomīyasya ceti. ucyate - ekā [239]{*3/108*} vārtraghny āgneyī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6874: sā vidhīyamānā saṃbadhyeta na saumī. amāv asyāyāṃ tāvan nāsty eva{*3/109*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6875: paurṇamāsyām apy agnīṣomīya eva kriyamāṇe kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6876: tatrāpy ekadevatyā na śaknuyād devatādvitve kāryaṃ kartum. athobha agnīṣomīye prāpte iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6877: ekasya yāgasya dvābhyām anuvākyābhyāṃ prayojanam. upādeyatvena hy anuvākyā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6879: tena tatrāpi na dve. tasmād ājyabhāgayor niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6890: ulaparājiṃ stṛṇātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś cāvedanārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6893: uta prakaraṇe sarvapadārthān kartum iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6898: tena keṣāṃ keṣāṃ padārthānām ime{*3/110*} saṃskārāv ity ākāṅkṣāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6899: satyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryeṇa nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇam. tasmād ānantaryād āvedanārtho vāgyamo muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6901: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvaiḥ prakaraṇādhītaiḥ saṃbandha iti. [240]{*3/111*} kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6904: dīkṣitam āvedayitum ity asminn artha āvedayatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6905: na ca staritum ity asminn arthe stṛṇātīti. staraṇam api vidhīyate 'vanejanaṃ ca. muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś ca vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6909: padārthākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyām ānantaryam ekavākyatve kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6916: svena svena padasamūhena paripūrṇam ekaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6918: tathā sarvāṇi yāny udāhṛtāni. tasmād vispaṣṭam arthadvayam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6920: tena vākyabhedaḥ. ataḥ saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/112*} kṛtsne parkaraṇe niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6924: śeṣas tu guṇasaṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyeta mithas teṣām asaṃbandhāt // MS_3,1.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6925: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate - āgneyaṃ caturdhā karotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim āgneye 'gnīṣomīye aindrāgne{*3/113*} ca sarvatra caturdhākaraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6937: evam ihāpi. yady āgneyāgnīṣomasya ca puroḍāśasya mithaḥ saṃbandho na bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6941: yathāgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajya prāśitram avadyatīti sarvebhyaḥ prāśitrāv adānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6947: vyavasthā vārthasaṃyogāl liṅgasyārthena saṃbandhāl lakṣaṇārthā guṇaśrutiḥ // MS_3,1.27 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6961: sāpekṣaṃ cāsamartham. tasmān na taddhitāntena nirapekṣāgnidaivatyena{*3/117*} dvidevatyasyābhidhānam{*3/118*}. ato yatra nirapekṣo 'gnir devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6963: devatāliṅgasya hi sāmartyena saṃyogo bhavati taddhitārthasya, nāsati sāmarthye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6967: yuktaṃ prāśitrāv adānena tatraiva{*3/121*} saṃbandhaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6969: āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajyeti. ekaṃ hy etad vākyaṃ prāśitram avadyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6973: anyasmād vety aniyamaḥ. yadi tu tatra kevalāgnidaivatyo{*3/122*} nābhaviṣyat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6981: nātra kiṃcid apekṣyate. sa ca tāvāṃs tatra saṃbandho 'stīti ḍitthasya māteti yuktaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6990: *{3/121: E2: adāne. na tatraivaṃ, E4: adāne. tatraivaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6997: arthabhidhānasāmarthyān mantreṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ syāt tasmād utpattisaṃbandho 'rthena nityasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6998: iha mantrā udāharaṇam - bahirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādayaḥ. kiṃ mukhya evābhidheye mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6999: uta gauṇe 'pīti. kaḥ punar mukhyaḥ ko vā gauṇa iti. ucyate - yaḥ śabdād evāvagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7001: mukham iva bhavatīti mukhya ity ucyate. yas tu khalu pratītād arthāt kenacit saṃbandhena gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7002: sa paścād bhāvāj jaghanam iva bhavatīti jaghanyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7006: yathaiva hy agnir jvalatīty ukte jvalane saṃpratyayaḥ{*3/127*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7007: evam evāgnir māṇavaka iti śabda evoccārite māṇavake saṃpratyayaḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7008: yasmin nirupapadāc chabdāt saṃpratyayaḥ sa mukhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7009: yasmin sopapadāt sa gauṇa iti. naitad yuktam. yasya hi śabdasya rūpaṃ kasyacid arthasya nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7011: nirupapadasyāpi. na ca śakyaṃ nimitte sati naimittikena na bhavitum. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7013: idaṃ na śakyate vaditum - upapadād ṛte na so 'rtho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7014: upapade tu saṃjāte so 'rthaḥ saṃjaniṣyata iti. na cāsau samudāyārthaḥ śakyate vijñātum. anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hi vibhāgo 'vagamyate. atha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7016: na hy ananvitaḥ padārtho bhavati [244]{*3/128*} vākyārthaḥ. tad evaṃ dṛśyatām - agniśabda evāyaṃ jvalanavacanaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7017: agniśabda eva māṇavakasyābhidhāteti. tasmān na gauṇo mukhya iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7019: yo manāg iva sa gauṇa iti. idam api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7021: na ca prajñāne kaścid viśeṣo 'sti. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7023: alpaśaḥ prayujyamāno gauṇa iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7024: alpaśo 'pi prayujyamāno nāsati sāmarthye pratyāyayet. ataḥ so 'pi śabdāt pratīyata iti mukhya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7025: atrocyate - asty atra viśeṣaḥ, māṇavako nāgniśabdāt pratīyate. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7026: uktam - anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. kathaṃ na viparyayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7027: ucyate - anādṛtyaiva māṇavakapratyayaṃ jvalanam agniśabdāt pratiyanto dṛśyante. na tv anādṛtya jvalanam{*3/129*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7030_0: tatra tatrāgniśabdo niyata iti. ata eva vigatasādṛśyād ayaṃ tu dṛśyate. ato 'gnisādṛśyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7030_1: asya pravṛttau nimittaṃ na ca jvalane 'pratīte tatsādrṛśyaṃ pratīyate. tasmāj jvalanasyāgniśabdo nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7031: na māṇavakasya. tasmāj jvalane mukhyo na māṇavake. evam eva tṛṇapratyayasya barhiḥśabdo nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7032: na tṛṇasadṛśapratyayasya. tad evaṃ dvaite sati mukhyaparatā śabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7033: uta gauṇaparatāpīti yukto vicāraḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7035: ubhayasya śakyatvād ubhayam api barhiḥśabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7038: tṛṇasadṛśaṃ tṛṇapratyayena. yac ca nāma darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sādhanabhūtena barhiḥśabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7041: [245]{*3/130*} api caivam āśrīyamāṇe pūṣādyanumantraṇādīni darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ notkṛṣyante{*3/131*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7043: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - mukhya eva viniyoktavyo mantro na gauṇa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7045: prakaraṇe hi samāmnānāt pradhānenaikavākyatām upaiti. tatraitad āpatati yac chaknuyād anena mantreṇa sādhayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7046: tathā sādhayed iti. sa cāsāv arthābhidhānasaṃyogāc chaknoty upakartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7049: nanu mukhyapratyayāc chakyate gauṇaḥ pratyāyayitum. satyam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7050: mukhyapratyāyanenaivāsya prayojanavattā nirvṛtteti na gauṇaṃ prati viniyoge kiṃcit pramāṇam asti. mukhye viniyogena tv ānarthakyaṃ parihriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7051: parihṛta ānarthakye na gauṇābhidhānam āpatati. na hy anabhidhāya mukhyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7052: gauṇam abhivadati śabdaḥ. ataḥ pramāṇābhāvān na gauṇe viniyujyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7053: api ca gauṇasya pratyāyane sāmarthyād bahavo 'bhyupāyāḥ prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7054: sāmarthyaṃ ca śabdaikadeśa ity uktam - arthād vā kalpanaikadeśātvād iti{*3/132*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7055: tatra mantre niyogato gauṇaṃ prati viniyujyamāna upāyāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7056_0: vinā pramāṇena bādhyeta. mantrāmnānaṃ pramāṇam iti cet. na tasyopāyāntaranivṛttau
GSP28msbh1-7u:7056_1: sāmarthyam asti. nanu mukhye 'pi viniyujyamānsyaiṣa eva doṣaḥ. nety ucyate - yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7057: naiva pradhānasyopakuryāt tatra cāsyotpattir anarthikaiva syāt. tasmād asti gauṇe mukhye ca viśeṣaḥ. api ca yo gauṇe mantraṃ viniyuṅkte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7058: sa vaktavyaḥ - kim arthaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyāyayasi [246]{*3/133*} iti. sa ced brūyāt - nānyathā gauṇapratyayo 'stīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7059: pratibrūyād enam - anye 'pi gauṇapratyayasyābhyupāyāḥ santīti. atha sa evam abhiyuktaḥ pratibrūyāt -mukhyapratyayo 'pi pākṣiko 'bhyupāya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7060: brūyād enam - na tarhi niyogato gauṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7063: mukhya eva viniyoga iti. arthena ca pratītena prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7066: na sa eva mantra ādartavyaḥ. athāpi mantreṇa pratyāyakena prayojanaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7067: tathāpi mukhyapratyāyanenaiva nirvṛttaṃ prayojanam iti natarāṃ gauṇe viniyujyeta. tasmān mukhyagauṇayor mukhye kāryasaṃpratyaya iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7078: atha yad uktam - pūṣādyanumantraṇādīnām utkarṣo na bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7081: so 'sati saṃskārye 'narthaka iti yatrārthavāṃs tatra nāyayiṣyate. na ca kaścid doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7083: vacanāt tv ayathārtham aindrī syāt // MS_3,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7084: agnau śrūyate - niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnām ity aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti{*3/134*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim indrasyopasthānaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7085: uta gārhapatyasyeti. kutaḥ punar gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata ity evaṃ vispaṣṭe vacane saṃśaya iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7086: [247]{*3/135*} yad dhi{*3/136*} vākyenopasthānaṃ{*3/137*} tat stutivacanena saṃskaraṇaṃ na samīpasthānamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7088: aindreṇa mantreṇāgner abhidhānaṃ śakyate kartum. ato gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti na gārhapatyārtham upasthānam etad iti jāyeta śaṅkā - gārhapatya upasthānārtho bhaved iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7090: tṛtīyāntaḥ saptamyanto vā. tasmād vicāraḥ - katham upapannaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7093_0: aśakyatvāc ca gārhaptyopasthānasya. kathaṃ dvitīyā vibhaktir iti cet. avivaksitepsitārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7093_1: vā saṃbandhamātrapradhānā. yad vopasthānaviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhād gārhapatyaśabdaḥ. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7093_2: gārhapatyaviśiṣṭam upasthānam indrārthaṃ kartavyam iti. gārhapatyaś ca deśena viśiṃṣyān
GSP28msbh1-7u:7094: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vacanāt tv ayathārtham aindrī syāt. naitad astīndrārtham upasthānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7108: guṇād vāpy abhidhānaṃ syāt saṃbandhasyāśāstrahetutvāt // MS_3,2.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7109: atrāha nanv etad uktam - naindreṇa mantreṇa gārhapatyopasthānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7110: vacanād bhaviṣyati. āha - na vacanaśatenāpi śakyam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7114_0: na hi śāstrahetukaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bhavati. nityau 'sau lokato 'vagamyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:7114_1: ity uktam - autpa[248]{*3 /139*}ttikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandha iti{*3 /140*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7114_2: nanu śabdalakṣaṇo 'pi bhavati śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kṛtrimaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7115: yathā devadatto yajñadatta iti. bhavati kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7117: na tv etad vākyaṃ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7119: kathaṃ tarhi siddhasaṃbandhenendraśabdena gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti. na ca śakyate paraśabdena paro vaditum. kim atra vacanaṃ kariṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7120: atrocyate - guṇād vāpy abhidhānaṃ syāt saṃbandhasyāśāstrahetutvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7121: yady api nedaṃ vākyaṃ śabdārthasaṃbandhasya vidhāne hetubhūtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7122: tathāpy anenendraśabdena śakyaṃ kartum - gārhapatyābhidhānam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7126: agnir māṇavaka iti. evam ihāpy anindre gārhapatya indraśabdo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7129: evaṃ gārhapatye 'pīti. athavā indrater aiśvaryakarmaṇa indro bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7130: bhavati ca gārhapatyasyāpi svasmin kārya īśvaratvam. tasmād indraśabdena yaḥ pratyāyate 'rthaḥ sa pratītaḥ sādṛśyād gārhapatyaṃ pratyāyayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7140: tatredaṃ samāmnāyate - haviṣkṛd ehi [249]{*3/142*} iti trir avaghnann āhvayatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣa mantro 'vahantiṃ pratyupadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7141: uta hantir asya kālaṃ lakṣayatīti. kathaṃ hantiṃ pratyupadiśyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7143: yady evaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta - haviṣkṛd ehīty avaghnann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7146: tato 'sya kālaṃ lakṣyatīti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7149: evam eṣa mantro hantiṃ pratyupadiśyate. evaṃ śrutir anugṛhītā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7152: na hanter mantrasya. evaṃ ca satyāhvayatīty ayam anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7154: yo hy ehīti brūte sa āhvayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7155: tatra kenacid guṇena mantro hantiṃ pratyāyayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7161: naitad asti - hantiṃ pratyupadiśyata iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7164: yady asminn eva vākye mantro vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7165: anekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmān naivam abhisaṃbandha evam avaghnann iti. kathaṃ tarhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7166: avaghnann āhvayatīti. nanv asminn api pakṣe mantro vidhīyate kālaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7167: tatra sa eva doṣo bhavet. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7169: tatrāyam eva saṃbandho 'nūdyate. kevalā tu trir āvṛttir vidhīyate. yat tu kālalakṣaṇārthaḥ śabda iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7170: laukikī hi lakṣaṇā. mantro 'pi ca rūpād evāhvāne prāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7172: coditaś ca vākyāntareṇāvaghātaḥ śaknoti kālaṃ lakṣayitum. tasmād āhvāne viniyoktavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7178: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*3/144*}. atha kasmān na guṇād avahantiṃ brūte?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7179: haviṣkaroti hy avahantiḥ, tasmād dhaviṣkṛt. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7180_0: rūpād evāvahantau mantre prāpte kevalaṃ trir āvṛttim eva vakṣyati na bhaviṣyati vākyabheda
GSP28msbh1-7u:7180_1: iti. atrocyate - guṇābhāvād gauṇam abhidhānam avahantau na saṃbhavatīti. na hy asāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:7181: tatrādṛṣṭārtham āhvānaṃ syāt. yajamānasya patnyāṃ haviṣkṛti dṛṣṭārtham āhvānam. tasmān na hantimantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7183: *{3/144: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in E1 geklammert}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7186: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati - vāg vai haviṣkṛd vācam evaitad āhvayatīti{*3/145*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7191: avahantis tu na strī na pumān na napuṃsakam iti. nanv avahanter api strīliṅgaḥ śabdo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7192: kriyeti. atra brūmaḥ - na niyogato 'vahanteḥ strīliṅgaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7197: avahanteḥ pararūpeṇa śabdena. tasmāt patnyāṃ haviṣkṛti liṅgam anurūpataraṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7202_0: avahantimantre saty asmin mantre vidhyantarakopaḥ syāt. apahataṃ rakṣa ity avahanty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7202_1: apahatā yātudhānā ity avahantīti. tatra pakṣe 'bhāvān nityavac chrūtir upadhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7202_2: tasmād avaghnann [251]{*3 /146*} iti kālalakṣaṇārtha iti. mantro 'py ahvānārtha iti{*3 /147*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7209: agnīd agnīn vihara iti. tathā - vrataṃ kṛṇuteti vācaṃ visṛjatīti{*3/148*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim utthānaṃ vāgvisarjanaṃ ca prati mantrayor upadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7210: uta kālārthaḥ saṃyoga iti. atra pūrvādhikaraṇyāyo 'tidiśyate. yas tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7211: sa iha pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yas tatra siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7212: sa iha siddhāṇtaḥ. agnīd agnīn ity evam uttiṣṭhann anvāheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7213: vrataṃ kṛṇutety evaṃ vācaṃ visṛjatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. lakṣaṇābhāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7214: uttiṣṭhann anvāheti siddhānte saṃbandhaḥ. vrataṃ kṛṇutety ucyamāne vācaṃ visṛjatīti. vākyena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7219_0: vahniś ca vihriyata iti. vrataṃ kṛṇuteti ca vāgabhidhānam. tathāpy adṛṣṭārthaṃ vacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7219_1: bhavatīti na mantrayor utthānavisarjanārthatā kalpyeta. kalpyamānāyāṃ ca mantrāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7219_2: vihitaṃ bādhyeta - yāḥ paśūnām ṛṣabho vāca iti. api cotthānavāgvisargau prati mantrau
GSP28msbh1-7u:7220: preṣaṇe tu dṛṣṭhārthau. tal{*3/149*} lakṣaṇaivātra nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7228: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti{*3/151*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sūktavākaḥ prastaraprakaraṇaṃ pratyupadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7229: uteyaṃ kālalakṣaṇeti. tad ucyate - kālalakṣaṇeti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7236: upadeśo vā yājyāśabdo hi nākasmāt // MS_3,2.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7237: upadeśo vā prastaraprakaraṇaṃ prati mantrasya syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7241: sūktavākena lakṣaṇena prastaraṃ prahared iti. evaṃ ca kṛtvā yājyā śabda upapanno bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7246: yad uktam - devatāsaṃkīrtane sūktavākaḥ samarthaḥ, na prastaraprakaraṇa iti. ucyate - na{*3/152*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7250: evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ. agnir idaṃ havir ajuṣatāvīvṛdhata ity{*3/154*} evaṃ devatām anukramya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7252: idam idam āśāsta iti ca yad anena haviṣāśāste tad asya syād [253]{*3/156*} iti{*3/157*} prastaraṃ havir nirdiśati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7254: tena praharatir yajatiḥ. evaṃ sūktavākena prastaraḥ prahartuṃ śakyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7256: agnyādidevatākaś ca. tasmāt sūktavākasya haratisaṃyogo 'pi devatārthatā ghaṭata eva. yady agnir idaṃ havir ajuṣatāvī vṛdhata ityevamādy eva śrūyeta. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7258: tato 'gnyādaya eveṣṭā nāntaritā ity eva paryavasitaṃ vākyaṃ bhavet. yatas tu khalv āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāna ityevamādīny aparāṇi śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7261: aparaṃ tu yajamāna āśāste. tad anena prastareṇa prāpnuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7262: nanu satsv apy eteṣu devatāsaṃkīrtana eva paryavasyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7264: tata eva yajamāna āyur ādīny apy āśāsānaḥ prāpnuyād iti. ucyate - ubhayathā saṃbandhe sati praharaṇe viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7267: athavāgnir idaṃ havir ajuṣateti prastara eva havir nidiśyate. evam idam iti saṃnihitavacanam upapannaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7276: pratipattir iti cet, sviṣṭakṛdvad ubhayasaṃskāraḥ syāt // MS_3,2.14 //{*3/158*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7277: atha srugdhāraṇe viniyuktasya prastarasya prakaraṇaṃ pratiprattir ity ucyate. tatra prativacanam -sviṣṭakṛdvad etat syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7284: yāgaś ca nirvartyata iti na doṣaḥ. pratipādyamāno 'pi hi tyajyate. pratyakṣataḥ pratipādyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7285: vacanād ijyāṃ sādhayatīty evaṃ gamyate. tasmāt sūktavākaḥ praharatimantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7289: dadurch weicht nun auch ihre Zählung ab: pratipattir iti cet // MS_3,2.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7290: atha srugdhāraṇe viniyuktasya prastarasya prakaraṇaṃ pratiprattir ity ucyate. sviṣṭakṛdvad ubhayasaṃskāraḥ syāt // MS_3,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7295: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7297: uta yathāsāmarthyaṃ niṣkṛṣya yathāyathaṃ prayoga iti. tad ucyate - ubhayatra sarvavacanam iti. kutah?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7298: kṛtsno hi mantraḥ sūktavāka ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7301: tatra sūktavākena na prahṛtaṃ bhavet. tasmād ubhayatra kṛtsnaḥ sūktavāko vaditavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7310: na paurṇamāsyāṃ. śeṣabhūtam arthaṃ saṃskurvanto mantrā upakurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7312: te tatra prayoktavyā iti na kṛtsnaḥ paurṇamāsyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7316: atha yad uktam - vacanam idaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7317: sūktavākena praharati [255]{*3/161*} iti. tatra padenāpy ūnena na sūktavākena prahṛtaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7329: na hi sāpekṣāṇām itikartavyatayā saṃbandhaḥ. na hītikartavyataitad viśiṣṭā śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7336: kasya neti na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. sādhanatvena ca sarveṣāṃ nirdeśād itikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānāc ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7340: na sahāyam apekṣamāṇasya. tasmād ekaikaṃ prati kṛtsnaḥ sūktavāka upadiśyate. sa vibhāge 'pi pradhānānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7341: kṛtsna eva prayoktavya iti yāni yatrānarthakāni padāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7342: tāny api tatra prayoktavyāny adṛṣṭāya bhaviṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7345: guṇena vā kenacid abhidhānaṃ tāsāṃ devatānāṃ nirvartayiṣyantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7347: naitad evam. uktam - mukhyam eva kāryaṃ mantrāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7350: na gauṇam abhidhānam iti. kas tarhi kṛtsnasaṃyogasya samādhir ucyata iti. eṣa samādhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7356: tathā parastāt. yathā - agnir idaṃ havir ajuṣatāvī vṛdhata mahojyāyokṛtāgnīṣomāvidaṃ havir ajuṣetām avī vṛdhetām ityevamādīni{*3/166*}. teṣāṃ purastāt tantram - yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7359: asyāmṛdhed iti. tāny etāni sarvāṇi sūktavacanena sūktavākaśabdaṃ labhyante. na ca teṣāṃ samudāyaḥ kiṃcid arthaṃ vadati. tasmān na samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7362_0: sūktavāko vartata ity ekavacanaṃ bhavati. sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti tu yena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7362_1: kenacit sūktavākena prahriyamāṇe yathāśrutaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7366: tac ca nyāyyam eva. tasmāt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca vibhajya sūktavākaḥ prayoktavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7368: *{3/162: E2: saṃnidhānāvacanāc ca, asya, E4: saṃnidhānād avacanāc ca, asya}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7375: iha kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍam udāharaṇam - indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ{*3/167*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7378: ślathad vṛtram{*3/170*} ityevamādyā ṛcaḥ. aparā api kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ - aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7382: agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet sapatnam abhidroṣyann ityevamādyāḥ. tad etā yājyānuvākyāḥ prati saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7384: utaitasyām evaindrāgnyām iṣṭau kāmyāyām iti. evaṃ vaiśvānarīyayor yājyānuvākyayoḥ, evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7386: yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnaṃ vaiśvāvarīyam agnīṣomīyaṃ jātavedasaṃ ca sarvatraitā yājyānuvākyā bhaveyuḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7387: liṅgāt. nanu kramasamākhyāne viśeṣake bhaviṣyataḥ. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7388: tathāpi kramaṃ samākhyāṃ ca śaknoti liṅgaṃ bādhitum iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgakramasamākhyānāt tāsv eva kāmyāsv etā yājyānuvākyā iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7389: ya eva hi liṅgakrama eṣāṃ karmaṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7391: tena tāsām eva tāḥ śeṣabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7392: nanu liṅgaṃ balavattaram ity uktam. satyam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7394: na hy etāḥ samākhyānād ṛta eṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7396: samākhyām antareṇāsām ṛtāṃ yājyānuvākyātvam eva na vijñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7399: sā kāmyānām eva yājyānuvākyātvam ācaṣṭe na sarveṣām. yadi samākhyā nādriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7402: tadā kāmyānām eva. evaṃ hi tat samākhyāyate - kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7403: atha kim artham ubhayam upadiśyate - liṅgakramād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7404: samākhyānād iti ca. asti tatra pāthikṛtīyaṃ vrātapatīyaṃ ca karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7406: yājyānuvākyākāryam api. yadi liṅgakramād ity etāvad evocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7407: sāmidhenīkārye 'pi liṅgena [258]{*3/172*} tāsāṃ viniyogaḥ syāt. atha kim arthaṃ liṅgakramau vyapadiśyete?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7409: sāmidhenīṣu viniyogo na syāt. atha punaḥ samākhyānāl liṅgakramāc ca nirvṛtte yājyānuvākyākārye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7412: manor ṛcas tāḥ sāmidhenīṣu dhāyyā ity ucyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7413: tathā - pṛthuyājās tam saṃbādha iti dve dhāyye kalpyete. tasmād ubhayaṃ vyapadeṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7422: adhikāre ca mantravidhir atadākhyeṣu śiṣṭatvāt // MS_3,2.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7425: vaiṣṇavyā havir dhānam{*3/175*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prakṛtābhir evaṃliṅgavatībhir upasthātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7427: kiṃ tāvat prāptam. prakaraṇe ca mantro liṅgena vidhīyamāno dāśatayībhya evāgamayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7428: āgneyītyevamādibhir hi śakyā dāśatayo 'bhivaditum. yaś cāyaṃ prakṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7430: nehāpy upadeśam arhati. upadiṣṭopadeśo hi na nyāyya evaṃjātīyakasya. kathaṃ jātīyakasya?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7431: yaḥ kasmiṃścid viśeṣeṇopadiṣṭaḥ, nāsau sāmānyena liṅgenānyātropadeśam arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7433: tataḥ sa viśiṣṭo lakṣyeta [259]{*3/176*} yenānenaivaṃliṅgenaitat karotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7434: tato nopadiṣṭo bhavati. athopadiśyate - evaṃliṅgena karotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7436: tenopadiṣṭasyaivaṃjātīyakasyaivaṃjātīyakaḥ punar upadeśo na nyāyyaḥ. tasmād dāśatayā liṅgavanto mantrā grahītavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7437: nanu prakaraṇasāmarthyataḥ prakṛtā grahītuṃ nyāyyāḥ. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7441: na vayaṃ prakaraṇam anujighṛkṣantaḥ prakṛtaṃ liṅgavantam upādadānā liṅgam upabādhemahi{*3/177*}. yadi tu prakṛtaṃ viliṅgam upadademahi{*3/178*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7442: tato bādhemahi liṅgam. ubhayaṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ ca. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7446: sa pratyayo liṅgajanito yan mithyeti kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7447: tat prakaraṇānurodhāt. sa cet prakaraṇam anurudhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7453: sā ca prakṛte mantra upādīyamāne niravaśeṣā upāttā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7454: dāśatayāṃ punar mantravyaktāv upādīyamānāyāṃ prakaraṇād yā mantravyaktiḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7461: anyat sāmānyam. tasmāt prakṛto liṅgavān upādeya iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7462: satyam evam etat prakṛta upādīyamāne prakaraṇaṃ na bādhitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7464: liṅgajanitas tu pratyayaḥ kaścin mithyeti kalpito bhavati. nanu vyaktir apadārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7466: ucyate - etad eva na [260]{*3/180*} vijānīmo liṅgavattātrāṅgaṃ na veti. kiṃ tu tad dhitarnirdeśo 'yam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7471: yayāsādhanaṃ{*3/181*} lakṣayitavyam. na ca gamyate viśeṣaḥ - ayam asau mantro nāyam asāv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7472: anavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarve talliṅgā grahītavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7474: sa prakaraṇānurodhena bādhyetety anyāyyam. evaṃ sati na dāśataya evopādātavyā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7475: prakṛtam apy upādadīran. nanv etad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7476: kāryāntare prakṛtasyopadeśo nāsāv arthāntara upadekṣyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7478: sa cānyaś ca sāmānyena liṅgena. naivaṃ sati kiṃcid duṣyati. nanv etad duṣyati - nobhayam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7480: kiṃ tv ananugrāhyam eva prakaraṇaṃ liṅgapratyayaviruddhatvāt. api ca na liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahītavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7482: yad avagamyate - etat phalavad iti. tatra pravartate. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7484: na liṅgam anugṛhītaṃ kvacid ity aparasmiṃs tatparicchinne na pravṛttir bhavitum arhati. tasmād dāśatayo grahītavyā iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7498: prakaraṇopapattibhyām, prakṛto hy asau, prakṛtapratyayaś ca nyāyyaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7499: na jyotiṣṭomaṃ prati mantrasya vyāpāravidhānam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7502: anapekṣya ca prakaraṇaṃ dāśataye vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. upasthānaṃ ca kuryāt. tac caivaṃ liṅgeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7508: anarthakaś copadeśaḥ syād asaṃbandhāt phalavatā, na hy upasthānaṃ phalavat // MS_3,2.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7509: nanu ca prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasyopakārakaṃ syāt. yady upasthānajyotiṣṭmasaṃbandho vivakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7511: prakaraṇāt tenaikavākyatām iyāt. yadā tu khalūpasthānasya mantrasaṃbandho vivakṣyate sarvopasthāneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7513: prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā. na prakaraṇaṃ viśeṣakaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7514: ubhayasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaḥ. asmatpakṣe na punar ayaṃ doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7517: anyat sarvam anūdyata iti na doṣo bhavati. athavā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7520: anena mantreṇāgnīdhram{*3/185*} upatiṣṭhata iti samāsīdatīty arthaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtā mantrā evaṃjātīyakā upādātavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7526: yad apy uktam upadiṣṭā hi te prakṛtāḥ kāryantara iti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7527: uktottaram etat. api ca na kenacin nopadiṣṭāḥ{*3/186*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7529: tena na prakṛte kaścid viṣeśaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtasyaiva grahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7532: *{3/186: E2: api ca kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ, E4: api ca na kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7536_0: bhakṣamantraḥ śrūyate - bhakṣe hi mā viśa dīrghāyutvāya śaṃtanutvāya rāyaspoṣāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7536_1: varcase suprajāstvāya. ehi vaso purovaso priyo me hṛdo 'sy aśvinos tvā bāhubhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7536_2: sadhyāsam. nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā deva soma sucakṣā avakhyeṣam. hinva me gātrā harivo gaṇān me mā vitītṛṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7537: śivo me saptarṣīn upatiṣṭhasva mā me 'vāṅ nābhimatigāḥ mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānaṃ vāg juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7538_0: vasumad gaṇasya rudramad gaṇasyādityavad gaṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7538_1: mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya tṛtīyasavanasya gāyatracchandasas triṣṭupchandaso jagacchandaso
GSP28msbh1-7u:7538_3: bhakṣayāmītyevamādiḥ{*3 /189*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsna eṣo 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7541: liṅgasamākhyānābhyāṃ bhakṣārthatānuvākasya, sarvo 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7542: bhakṣayāmīty eṣa śabdo vyaktaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7544: nānyat kiṃcit. anyāni cāsya padāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇavacanāny eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7547: nanu ehi vaso ityevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antaṃ grahaṇārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7549_0: vibhinnaṃ bhakṣaṇavākyāt. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādy avakhyeṣam ity evam antam avekṣaṇavacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7549_1: hinva me gātrā hariva ityevamādi ca [263]{*3 /190*} mā me vāṅ nābhimatigā ity evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7549_2: antaṃ samyag jaraṇārtham. tad bahutvād arthānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7550: bahūni vākyāni. katham etac chakyaṃ vadituṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7551: ucyate - sarvāṇy etāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇānīty uktam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7552: evam api bhidyeta vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāṃ yugapad vacanāsaṃbhavāt. ucyate - na viśeṣaṇāni vivakṣiṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7553: viśeṣaṇair grahaṇāvekṣaṇādibhir viśiṣṭa eko 'rtho vivakṣyate. naivaṃ samyag bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7556: lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7559: atrocyate - yady apy amī grahaṇādayo bahavo 'rthā gamyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7561: bhakṣaṇam evaikaṃ pratyāyayitavyam. tad dhi śrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7565: tāvad ekaṃ vākyam. tasmād viśiṣṭabhakṣaṇārtham etad ekaṃ vākyam iti bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyam. samākhyānaṃ ca bhavati - bhakṣānuvāka iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7567: nanu ca samākhyā laukikaḥ śabdaḥ kathaṃ vaidikam aṅgaṃ niyaṃsyatīti. yady api laukikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7568: tathāpy anādiḥ tasyānuvākena saṃbandhaḥ. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7572: yathā pācako lāvaka iti samabhivyāhārāt saṃbandham anumāsyāmahe. āha nānumānagamya evaṃjātīyakeṣv aṅgabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7575: na ca samākhyā vidhātrī. atrocyate - samākhyā saṃbandhinau buddhau saṃnidhim upaneṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7576: prayogavacano vidhāsyatīti. tasmāt kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7585: naitad evaṃ kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti. rūpād grahaṇavākyaṃ grahaṇe viniyujyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7586: ehītyevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antam. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādi cāvakhyeṣam ity evam antaṃ darśane. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7591: na kiṃcid asti prayojanam ity uktam. atrocyate - naivaitāni viśeṣaṇāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7592: pṛthag evaitāni grahaṇādīni svaiḥ svair vākyair ucyanta iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7597: tāny avaśyaṃ prakāśayitavyāni. tāni prakāśayiṣyanty etāni vākyāni. rūpaṃ caiṣāṃ tatprakāśanasāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7598: ato nānārthatvān naikaṃ vākyam ucyate. nanu bhakṣaṇavākyaśeṣī bhavitum apy eṣāṃ rūpam iti. ucyate - bāḍham asti rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7599: na tu tadviśeṣaṇāny etāni kalpyante. kasya hetor adṛṣṭārthāni tathā bhavanti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7600: uktair anuktair vā viśeṣaṇais tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7602: tathā dṛṣṭārthāni bhaviṣyanti. tasmād rūpopadeśābhyām apakrṣo bhavet keṣāṃcid atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7604: guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syāt tayor ekārthasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7605_0: bhakṣānuvāke śrūyate - mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānāṃ vāgju[265]{*3 /192*}ṣāṇā somasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7605_1: tṛpyatu. vasu-mad guṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandaso 'gnihuta{*3 /193*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7605_2: indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti{*3 /194*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7605_3: kiṃ mandrādiḥ tṛpyatv ity evam anta eko mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7607: uta mandrādir bhakṣayāmy anta eka eva mantra iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7611: tato 'rthabhedād vākyabhedaḥ. tad uktam - tasya rūpopadeśābhyām apakarṣo 'rthasya coditatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7612: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7613: tṛptir bhakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇatvenābhidhīyata iti{*3/195*}. bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7617_0: tatra dvayoḥ kriyayor asti saṃbandho bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti. iha punar bhakṣayāmi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7617_1: tṛpyatv iti nāsti kaścit saṃbandhaḥ. ucyate - na hy ayaṃ vidhau tṛpyatv iti vijñāyate. kva tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7618: prārthanāyāṃ vā prāptakāle vā. yadi bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīty evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate. yadi vā bhakṣayāṃi vācas tarptuṃ prāptaḥ kāla iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7619_0: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvād ekārthatāyām ekavākyatve mantraikyam upapadyate. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7619_1: nirākāṅkṣa ete vākye bhaṅktvā rūpaṃ sākāṅkṣe kriyete. atrocyate -yady apy ete vākye
GSP28msbh1-7u:7620: tathāpi bhakṣaṇasya prakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ na tarpaṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7621: iti kṛtvaikārthyam eva bhavet. kim aṅga punar guṇabhāve gamyamāna evātra. tasmād guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7631: eṣa eva mantra udāharaṇam - iha ca pradānāny aindrāṇy anaindrāṇi ca vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7632: teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇāny api santi. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aindreṣv anaindreṣu ca mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7634: anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7637: teṣv indrapītasyeti mantro 'nindrapītaṃ na śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7639: asati vacane 'nyārthānabhidhānāt. tasmād amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam evaṃjātīyakeṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7641: yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati // MS_3,2.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7643: dhruvacamasā hi prakṛtibhūtāḥ. ke punar dhruvacamasāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7649: anuṣṭupchandasa iti ṣoḍaśiny atirātre bhakṣamantraṃ namatīti. kim atra darśanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7651: nanu vacanam etat syāt. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7652: naitan namatīti śrūyate. kathaṃ tarhi evaṃ namatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7656: ato 'naindreṣv api codakaprāpto mantra ūhitavyo bhavati. ucyate - vikārā eta iti liṅgam apadiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7657: nyāyo 'bhidhīyatām iti. ucyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7658: tenaindreṣu somo 'naindreṣu soma eva nāstīti sarve somadharmā aindreṣv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7659: adharmakā itare sākāṅkṣāḥ. kathaṃ punar jñāyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ceti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7661: indrāya tvā vasumata ityevamādir mantra aindraṃ somaṃ vadituṃ śaknoti nānyam. tasmād aindraḥ somaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7664: ato dharmān grahīṣyantīti nyāyaḥ. tasmād yathādevatam ūhitavyo mantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7665: evaṃ sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam, tata evaṃ sati cintāntaraṃ vartiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7670: santi punarabhyunnītāḥ somāḥ śukrāmanthipracāra eva savanamukhīyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7671: teṣāṃ hotur vaṣatkāre 'nuvaṣatkāre ca caturbhir madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasair hutvā hotrakāṇāṃ camasaiḥ sakṛt sakṛd vaṣaṭkāra eva hutvā punaḥ saśeṣeṣv eva pātreṣu somo 'bhyunnītaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7674: hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛd dhutvā śukrasyābhyunnīyopāvartadhvam iti. tatra hotrakā nānādevatā yajanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7680: maruto yasya hi kṣaya iti{*3/201*}. neṣṭā tvaṣṭāraṃ patnīś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7682: āgnīdhro 'gnim ukṣānnāya vaśānnāyeti{*3/203*}. tatra taiś camasaiḥ pūrvasmin vaṣaṭkāra indra iṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7684: śeṣas tatrendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ ca. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prasthitadevatāyāś cendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ copalakṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7691: tac cheṣas tatpīta ity uktam. ihāpi tadvad eva vaditavyam. tasmāc camase camase dvayor upalakṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7704: tad yathācāryaśeṣaṃ devadatto bhuñjāno yadi śeṣaṃ pūrṇakāya prayacchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7707: nācāryaśeṣam. tasmān na prasthitadevatā indra upalakṣayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7712: tasyāpi hy asau śeṣaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate. nanv apanīta iti. ucyate - nāsāv apanīyate. sakṛd dhutāṃś camasānabhidroṇakalaśād gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713_0: saśeṣaś camaso lakṣaṇam anyasyonnīyamānasya. tataś{*3 /206*} camasastho hotum unnetavyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713_1: preṣito vā. yat tu yakṣyamāṇā devatāḥ praty āśrā[269]{*3 /207*}vita iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713_2: āśrāvyate tatra devatābhyo na tv idaṃ vā tad veti. tena{*3 /208*} yad dhotuṃ gṛhītaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713_3: tad āśrāvitam iti gamyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7718: lakṣyate{*3/209*} ca. ataḥ sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam iti. kṛtvācintaiṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7733: tataḥ pātnīvato gṛhyate. atha hute pātnīvate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7734: tac cheṣe bhakṣyamāṇe bhavati saṃdehaḥ - kim indravāyvādaya upalakṣayitavyā na veti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7735: upalakṣayitavyāḥ. teṣām api hy asau śeṣo yathā prasthitadevatāyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7740: tatra hi pātralakṣaṇatvena saṃkīrtyate na somo grāhyatvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7743: yakṣyamāṇadevatāṃ prati. nanu sthālyām āgrayaṇo nāgrayaṇaś{*3/210*} ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7746: yas tu saṃpātānn āsau pātnīvata iti. ucyate - āgrayaṇo 'pādānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7750: [270]{*3/212*} nanv anāgrayaṇād apy apetaḥ. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7752_0: tenāsau pūrvadevatābhiḥ pīta iti na śakyate vaktum. yo hīndrārthasya somasyāvayavaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7752_1: śeṣaḥ sa indrapīta iti prakṛtāv ucyate. ihāpi tadvad eva pūrvadevatārthasyāvayavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7754_0: na hi hutasyāvayavo dṛśyate. nanu prakṛtāv api hutasyāvayavo na dṛśyate. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7754_1: hutāhutasya samudāyasya tatrāvayava upalakṣyate taddevatasya. nanv ihāpi samudāya evāsīt taddevatyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7759: āha pūrvadevatāpītasyāsāv avayava āsīt tena bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati. ucyate - prakṛtau na bhūtapūrvagatyābhidhānaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7760: ihāpi tadvad eva na kartavyam iti. api cendradevatyas tatrendrapīta ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7762: asya punaḥ pūrvadevatāsaṃbandho 'pagataḥ. tasmān nātra pūrvadevatopalakṣaṇīyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7771: agnā i patnīvan sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ pibeti{*3/213*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ tvaṣṭopalakṣayitavyo na veti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7774: pānaṃ śrūyate - sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā [271]{*3/214*} somaṃ pibeti. tenāyam agnaye patnīvate saha tvaṣṭrā dīyata iti gamyate. yasmai ca yena saha dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7777: yathā devadattāya yajñadattena saha śataṃ dīyatām ity ukte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7778: tatrobhābhyām api dīyate. tasmāt tvāṣṭro 'py asau soma iti tvaṣṭopalakṣayitavyaḥ. asāv apīndra iva{*3/215*} pibatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7789: śabdaś cāgneḥ patnīvataḥ pānam āha tvaṣṭuḥ sahabhāvamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7790: na hy ananuṣṭhīyamāne sahabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti tvaṣṭari pānam anumīyate. nanu tvaṣṭre pānaṃ coditam. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7792: na codanayā. codanā hi pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7793: loke tu kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā coditam acoditam apy anuṣṭhīyata{*3/216*} eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7798: *{3/216: E2,4, E1 (v.l.): coditam acoditam apy anuṣṭhīyata}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7801_0: tasminn eva pātnīvate mantraḥ - aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7801_1: hy aśvāḥ. patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasveti{*3 /217*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7801_2: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ trayastriṃśato [272]{*3 /218*} devānām upalakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7804: dīyate hi somas trayastriṃśate devebhyaḥ. evaṃ hy agnim agnīd adhīcchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7806_0: trayastriṃśatā devaiḥ saha samānaṃ ratham adhiṣṭhāya nānārathair vā vibhavanti hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7806_1: te 'śvāḥ. tad idam anuṣvadham āvaha trayastriṃśataṃ patnīvato devān āgamaya tarpaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7806_2: ceti. atra hy agnim agnīd adhīcchati trayastriṃśato devānāṃ tṛptaya iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7808: tat paraḥ somaḥ. tasmād ucyate - trayastriṃśad devā upalakṣayitavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7809: nanu codanāyāṃ patnīvān kevalo 'gnir devatātvena śrūyate. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7811: na tu devatāntaraṃ niṣidhyate. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7812: etad ato bhavati, māntravarṇikās trayastriṃśad devā aviruddhāś codanāyāṃ pratīyanta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7813: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na trayastriṃśad devā upalakṣayitavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7814: nātra mantre 'gnir āhvātā pariveṣṭā vā tarpayitā vādhyeṣyate. nātra trayastriṃśad deveṣv iṣṭeṣu prayojanaṃ nirvartyate. kas tarhi yaṣṭavyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7816: sa hi codyate - pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti. nanu māntravarṇikānāṃ trayastriṃśato devānām atra saṃkīrtanam. ucyate - parārthatvena tāḥ saṃkīrtyante. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7819: na ca parakīyasya dānam avakalpate. tasmāt tvam amūbhyas trayastriṃśad devatābhyo dehīty asamañjasaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7820: agnaye tv anena dānam uktaṃ bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7821: īśāno hi vilaṃbhayati dravyam, tad iha vilaṃbhanaṃ saṃkīrtayan tvam asya īśāna iti pratyāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7823: na vilaṃbhayeti. ucyate - na hi mādyanti devatāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7827: pramāṇād dhi sā bhavati. nanu tyāge 'pi lakṣyamāṇe 'gniḥ kartādhīṣyate. tad ucyate - agner apy adhyeṣaṇādṛṣṭāyaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7828: tasmād agner aiśvaryakaraṇam etad vākyaṃ lakṣayatīti nyāyyam. api ca pātnīvate somaś codyate - pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7830: māntravarṇikaṃ ca pratiṣedhati codaneti. ucyate - tad api māntravarṇikaṃ nāstīty uktam. api ca sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhatīti gamyate. na hi sāpekṣaḥ patnīvac chabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7832: tasmāt kevalaḥ patnīvān devateti. etac codanāvaśena mantro varṇanīyaḥ. tasmād yathaivāsmābhir varṇito mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7834: patnīvāṃś cāgnir agne patnīvann iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnir upalakṣayitavyo na trayastriṃśad devatā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7842: somasyāgne vīhīty anuvaṣaṭkarotīti{*3/220*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim anuvaṣaṭkāradevatopalakṣayitavyā na veti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7844: na tatra pārārthyaṃ kiṃcit pūrvad upalakṣyate. tasmād upalakṣayitevyati. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - anuvaṣaṭkāradevatā nopalakṣayitavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7848: evam evānuvaṣaṭkāradevatāpi. na hi sā prakṛtāv upalakṣitā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7857: yad uktam ūhena mantravad bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7859: ucyate - samānavidhānatvāt, nāsty atra prakṛtivikṛtibhāvaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7863_0: tṛtīyasavanatvāj jagatīcchandasa iti prāpte 'nuṣṭupchandasa iti ṣoḍaśini bhakṣamantraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7863_1: namatīti{*3 /223*} samānavidhāne 'py avakalpyate. yat tūktam{*3 /224*} - aindraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7864: naita aindrā anaindrāś ca bhinnā yāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7867: sarva ete yāgadharmāḥ. tena kṛtsnā yāgasya codyante somadharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7871: itarāsāṃ devatānāṃ dhyānādineti. tasmād anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7880: evaṃ sthite cintyate - asti tatraindrāgnaḥ somaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7881: aindrāgnaṃ gṛhṇātīti{*3/226*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ mantravad bhakṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7885: śakyate hi sa indrapīta iti vyapadeṣṭum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7888: tasyendrāgnibhyāṃ pibadbhyāṃ pītam avayavāntaram indreṇa. tasmān mantravad bhakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7896: tena pīta iti lakṣaṇāśabdo 'yam. indram uddiśya yaḥ saṃkalpito indro yasya devateti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7900: āha - nanu tenaivādhikaraṇenaitad gatam{*3/229*}. kim arthaṃ punaś cintyata iti. ucyate - yat tatra vicāritaṃ siddham eva tat. kathaṃ punar vicāryate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7901: naiva sākāṅkṣasya devatāsaṃbandha iti. naiveha devatāsaṃbandha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7914: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ekacchandasi some mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7915: uta nānācchandasyapīti{*3/231*}. ucyate - chandaś ca devatāvat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7917: evam anekacchandaske some na syān mantra iti. atrāpi hi gāyatracchandasa iti saviśeṣaṇasya samāso nāvakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7926: tathābhūtasya{*3/232*} chando viśeṣaṇam. tasmād anekacchandaske some mantraḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7930: sarveṣāṃ vaikamantryam aitiśāyanasya bhaktipānatvāt savanādhikāro hi // MS_3,2.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7931: yad uktam - anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7934: yathāsamāmnātaś ca mantraḥ syāt. nendrapīta iti soma ucyate. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7936: prātaḥsavanaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt. nanu some 'pi ṣaṣṭhī. satyam asti ṣaṣṭhī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7937: na tu tena sāmānādhikaraṇyam. nāsāv indreṇa somaḥ pītaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7940: sa gata eva. na cātītaḥ samudāyo vyapadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7941: [277]{*3/233*} pratyakṣavacano hy ayaṃ śabdaḥ. savane tu na doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7943_0: yatrendreṇa pītam. tasmād anaindro 'pītasavane 'ntarbhavatīti śakyate mantreṇa vaditum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7943_1: śakyate cet samānavidhāne katham iva mantro na bhaviṣyati. bhaktyā hy apītaḥ pīta
GSP28msbh1-7u:7943_2: ity ucyate. evam eva aitiśāyana ācāryo manyate sma. asmākam apy etad eva matam. ācāryagrahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7951: upāṃśu yajuṣā iti{*3/234*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ṛgādijātim adhikṛtyaite śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7952: uta vedam adhikṛtyeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7955: eṣāṃ śabdānāṃ śravaṇād eva jātiṃ pratipadyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7957: vedānām adhikārakaḥ śabdo nāstīti. api ca - ṛgvedavyatikrāntānām ṛcāṃ yajurveda uccaiḥ prayogo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7958: itarathā tasyā eva ṛca ubhau dharmau vaikalpikau syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7959: tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt. prakaraṇaṃ caivam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7960: itarathā vedasaṃyoge sarvasminn api kratāv upāṃśutvaṃ syāt. tasmāj jātādhikārā ete śabdā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7967: vedaprāye vākye vedopakrame nigamyamānā ime śabdāḥ śrūyante - prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7969: tasmāt tapas te pānāt trayo devā asṛjyanta - agnir vāyur ādityaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7970: te tapo 'tapyanta tebhyas te pānebhyas trayo vedā asṛjyanta. agner ṛgvedo vāyor yajurveda ādityāt sāmaveda ity evam upakramya nigamana idaṃ śrūyate - uccair ṛcā kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7972: [279]{*3/235*} upāṃśu yajuṣeti. etasmāt kāraṇād ebhiḥ prakṛtair upāṃśvādi kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7973: na jātyā ṛgādibhir ity ucyate. kuta etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7977: ṛgādibhir api vedavacanair evopasaṃhāreṇa bhavitavyam. itarathā vākyam eva nāvakalpeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7985: yathā ṛgādayaḥ śabdāḥ śaknuvanti vedam abhivaditum iti,
