GSP28msbh1-7u:7986: ṛgbhiḥ prātardivi deva īyate. yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye ahnaḥ. sāmavedenāstamaye mahīyate. vedair aśūnyais tribhir eti sūrya iti{*3/236*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:7990: vedair aśūnyas tribhir eti sūrya ity ṛkśabdaṃ vedavacanaṃ darśayati. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ. vedādhikārā ete śabdā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7994: dharmopadeśāc ca na hi dravyeṇa saṃbandhaḥ // MS_3,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7997: sa vedādhikārapakṣe yujyate. jātādhikāre tv ṛca uccais tvena sāmna uccais tvaṃ siddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8004: sa evaṃ prakhyāyate{*3/237*}. trayīti caiṣa śabdā ṛksāmayajuḥṣu prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8013: atha yad uktam - ṛgvedam atikrāntānām ṛcāṃ yajurvede 'py uccais tvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8014: tatra matpakṣe yathāśrutaḥ prayogo bhaviṣyatīti yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8021: sarvasminn ṛgveda uccais tvaṃ sarvasmiṃś ca yajurveda upāṃśutvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8022: tatra yady ṛgvedavyatikrāntāyā ṛco yajurveda upāṃśutvaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8023: naitad dūṣyati. vedadharmaḥ san{*3/240*} ṛgdharma iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8029: yad uktam - prakaraṇam evam anugṛhītaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8030: vedasaṃyogād vākyena prakaraṇe bādhyamāne na doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8034: ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti{*3/241*}. tad yājurvaidikam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8035: tatra sāmagānam āmananti - ya evaṃ vidvān vāravantīyaṃ gāyati{*3/242*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8037: ya evaṃ vidvān vāmadevyaṃ gāyati{*3/243*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ādhāne sāmagānam uccaiḥ, utopāṃśv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8039: sāmavedenaitat kriyate yad vāravantīyādibhiḥ, tasmād uccair etāni sāmāni geyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8040: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇānurodhena vā mukhyaṃ vyatikramet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8045: guṇasyānuṣṭhānena mukhyaḥ saguṇaḥ kathaṃ syād iti guṇe pravartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8047: guṇapravṛttau phalam eva nāvāptaṃ bhavati. atha pradhānaṃ saguṇaṃ kariṣyāmīti guṇe pravartamāno guṇasya guṇaṃ vinipātayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8048: nāsya svārtho hīyate. nāsau guṇaṃ saguṇaṃ kartuṃ pravartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8053: sa gaṇadharmam uccais tvaṃ sāmavaidikaṃ{*3/246*} bādhate. tasmād upāṃśu sāmāni geyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8063: yajurvede jyotiṣṭomaṃ samāmananti - jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8064: tathā sāmavede 'py asyaivam eva samāmnānam. sakṛc ca kṛtāyāṃ buddhau dvitīyaṃ guṇārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ yājurvaidikam{*3/247*} āmnānaṃ kriyārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8065: sāmavaidikaṃ{*3/248*} guṇārtham uta viparītam iti. yatarac cāmnānaṃ kriyārthaṃ taddharmā bhaviṣyanti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8066: sāmavedikaṃ{*3/249*} kriyārthaṃ yājurvedikaṃ{*3/250*} vety aniścayo viśeṣān avagamād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8067: [282]{*3/251*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - bhūyastvena guṇānāṃ paricchidyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8069: tatra kriyārthā{*3/252*} codaneti gamyate. yatra hi kartavyatayā codanā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8072: tatretikartavyatāvacanaṃ nyāyyam. ye ca bhūyāṃso guṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8075: yathā bahuṣu rājapratimeṣūpaviṣṭeṣu yasya śvetaṃ chatraṃ bālavyajanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8077: anākhyāto 'pi rājaliṅgena. evaṃ kartavyatāliṅgena guṇānāṃ bhūyastvena jyotiṣṭomasya yājurvaidikasya{*3/254*} codanānumīyate. tasmāj jyotiṣṭomasyopāṃśuprayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8079: yat tena codyate. acoditaṃ na śakyate kartum iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8091: uktāni viniyogakāraṇāni śrutir liṅgaṃ vākyam iti. śrutir aindryā gārhapatyam iti{*3/255*} dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8093: vākyam aruṇayā krīṇātīti{*3/257*}. atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8094: nety ucyate. kim aparaṃ kāraṇam iti praśnenaivopakramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8101: yad asaṃyuktaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8103: itikartavyatārthitvāt. yad itikartavyatākāṅkṣiṇaḥ saṃnidhau pūraṇasamartham upanipatati yad vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8104: tat{*3/258*} tena prakṛtena sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. [283]{*3/259*} tasmāt prakṛte viniyujyate. kim ihodāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8105: kiṃ ca prayojanam iti. darśapūrṇamāsau prakṛtya śrūyate - samidho yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8122: atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇāni. nety ucyate. kiṃ ca?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8124: kramavatām ānupūrveṇopadiśyamānānāṃ{*3/262*} yasya paryāye yaṃ dharmam āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8127: tasmāt tato viniyoga iti. kim ihodāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8129: ānupūrvyavatāṃ yāgānām anumantraṇeṣv āmnāteṣūpāṃśuyājasya krame dabdhir nāmāsīti{*3/263*} samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8130: tasyākāṅkṣām utpādya tenaikavākyatāṃ yāt vā tatraiva viniyogam arhatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8134: aparam indrāgnī navatiṃ puraḥ [284]{*3/267*} ślathad vṛtram iti{*3/268*}. tatra liṅgād viniyoge siddhe viśeṣaviniyogo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8148: atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇānīti. nety ucyate. kiṃ ca?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8149: samākhyā caivaṃ syāt. kathaṃ viniyogakāraṇam iti. samākhyā sati saṃbandhe bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8151: tatra pācakaśabdam upalabhya pacatināsya saṃbandha iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8152: evaṃ vede 'pīti. akṛtakārthasaṃbandhaṃ{*3/269*} samācakṣāṇaṃ śabdam upalabhya bhavati saṃbandhe tasmin saṃpratyayaḥ. kim ihodāharaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ca?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8153: ādhvaryavam iti samākhyātāni karmāṇy adhvaryuṇā kartavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8154: hautram iti ca hotrā. etad udāharaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8160: śrutiliṅgaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8161: teṣāṃ samavāye kiṃ balīya iti cintyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8162: ekārthavṛttitvād vāco yugapad asaṃbandhād dvayor dvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇā. tatra śrutiliṅgayoḥ kiṃ śrutibalīyasy āhosvil liṅgam iti. kiṃ punar atrodāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8164: atra cintyate - kim indrasya gārhapatyasya vopasthānaṃ kartavyam ity aniyamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8165: uta gārhapatyasyaiveti. yadi tulyabale ete kāraṇe tato vikalpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8172: kadā ca na starīrasi nendrasaścasi dāśuṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8173: itīndraśabdasya viśiṣṭadevatābhidhānasāmarthyam. atha kiṃ vākyaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8174: saṃhatya artham abhidadhati padāni vākyam. yady evam idam api vākyam - aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8175: idam api - kadā cana starīr asīti{*3/271*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8176: ubhayatrāpi saṃhatyārtham abhidadhati padāni. tena vākyasya vākyasya caiṣā saṃpradhāraṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8181: tad abhidhīyate - yat tāvac chabdasyārtham abhidhātuṃ sāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8185_0: śravaṇaṃ śrutiḥ. ekārtham anekaṃ padaṃ vākyam ity uktam eva. tad etat sarveṣv eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8185_1: vākyeṣu samavetaṃ viviktaṃ ca dṛśyate. iha tāvat kadā cana starīr asīty{*3 /272*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8186: naitat kasyacic chabdasya śravaṇād evāvagamyate. nāpi śabdāntarasya samīpa uccāritasya sāmarthyam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8187: yenaitad avagamyate. etasyāṃ khalv ṛcīndraśabdo vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8189: tayā cāvagamitayā prayojanam astīti. tenendropasthāna indraśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8191: na tv [286]{*3/273*} evam asyām ṛci kasyacic chabdasya sāmarthyād gārhapatyasyopasthānaṃ bhavati. śravaṇād eva tu gārhapatyaśabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8192: vayam agniṃ pratīmo na liṅgāt. yadi tu liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8195: evaṃ tarhi liṅgavākye virudhyamāna iha saṃpradhārye na śrutiliṅge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8197: yadi liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ. atha tu vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8198: gārhapatya upastheyaḥ. vākyaṃ hy etad aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8199: yady apy etad vākyaṃ śrutir apy atrāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8204: aindryopatiṣṭhata ity etad gārhapatyaśabdena sahaikavākyatām upaityaiva{*3/274*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8206: tato liṅgena virudhyate. yas tu gārhapatyaśravaṇād evārthaḥ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8207: sa liṅge balīyasi parityakto bhavati. nāsāv upasthānena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8208: tadā hīndraṃ gārhapatyaśabdo 'bhivaded agnisamīpaṃ vā. atha nu śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8209: tato liṅgenāvagatam indropasthānaṃ bādhyeta. tasmāc chrutiliṅgayor evaiṣa virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8210: na liṅgavākyayor iti. athavā nātraikavākyatvād indraprādhānyaṃ gārhapatyaprādhānyaṃ vopasthānasya. kutas tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8219: liṅgam api{*3/275*}. na hi vijñānasya vijñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣa upalabhyate rūpaṃ prati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8221: asya dṛḍhasyeveti. nanu liṅgasya bhaṅgurasyeva rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8225_0: tasya ca śruteś ca naiva saṃpradhāraṇāsti. yatas tu khalu liṅgān nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8225_1: sa śrutyā vikalpitum arhati. nanu naiva kadācil liṅgān nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayo 'sti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8226: evaṃ hi sati naiva liṅgaṃ nāma kiṃcit pramāṇam abhaviṣyat. kāmaṃ mā bhūt pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8227: bhavati tu saṃśayo liṅgaparijñāteṣv artheṣu. yadi vā vispaṣṭam evāprāmāṇyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8228: samartham etad imam artham abhinirvartayitum iti liṅgād etāvad avagamyate. na ca yad yasya nirvartanāyālam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8229: tad asaty eva vacane tan nirvartayitum arhati. tasmān na liṅgaṃ viniyojakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8230: atrābhidhīyate - prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāne yam artham āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8231: sa tasya sādhanabhūta ity eva gamyate. kathaṃ khalūpakariṣyatīti saṃdihyamāne bhavati sāmarthyāt pariniścayaḥ. yatrāyaṃ samarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8233: tasmād bhavati liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. na ca liṅgaprāmāṇye vinigamanāyāṃ hetur asti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8234: kadā cana starīr asīti{*3/277*} liṅgād indra upasthātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8235: śruter gārhapatya iti. avirodhāt khalv apīmam evārthaṃ pratipadyāmahe. balīyān api hetur virudhyamānm abalīyāṃsaṃ bādhitum arhati nāviruddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8237: yad indram upatiṣṭhetānena mantreṇa, gārhapatyam api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8238: nanv ayam eva virodhaḥ - sakṛd upasthānaṃ coditam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8239_0: asakṛd abhinirvartyata iti. upastheyabhedāt pratipradhānam āvartante guṇā iti nyāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8239_1: evaiṣa na virodhaḥ. ayaṃ tarhi virodhaḥ - gārhapatya upasthīyamāne 'gnivacana indraśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8239_2: guṇaṃ kriyāyogaṃ vāpekṣamāṇo bhavitum arhati. indre tūpasthātavye nirapekṣa indra[288]{*3 /278*}vacana eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8240: gauṇamukhyayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyaya iti. neti brūmaḥ - virodhe mukhyena gauṇo bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8242: yugapad abhhidhāne hi virudhyeyātām. iha cānyasmin prayoge 'gnivacano 'nyasminn indravacanaḥ. atas tulyabale ete kāraṇe iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8243: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasī. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8246: śrutyārthaḥ. gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8248: kadā cana starīr asīty{*3/279*} anena mantreṇendra upasthātavya iti na śrūyate. saty apīndrābhidhānasāmarthye vacanābhāvād anupasthānīya indra ity eva gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8249: nanv idam uktam - prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgam ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8251_0: uktam evaitat - dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syād iti. yad etat prakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8251_1: liṅgaṃ cobhayam apy etad śabdam. na cātikrāntapratyakṣaviṣaya evaṃlakṣaṇake 'rthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8251_2: śabdam antareṇa paricchedo 'vakalpate. ato manyāmahe - viprakṛṣṭaṃ śrutyarthāl liṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8251_3: iti. yady evaṃ śrutir yatra virodhinī na vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8252_0: tatrāpi na liṅgād arthaparicchedaḥ. tatraitad eva nāsti liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. kuta
GSP28msbh1-7u:8252_1: evaitena śrutir virotsyata iti. tatra śrutiliṅgayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8253_0: atrocyate - itikartavyathārthinaḥ prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāv upanipatito mantra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8253_1: āmnānasāmarthyād itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vākyaśeṣatām abhyupetyaitena mantreṇa yajeteti. kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8255: na cāntareṇendrābhidhānam ayaṃ mantra upakartuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8257: anenendro 'bhidhātavya iti. ataḥ śrutimūla evāyam arthaḥ. yadi śrutimūlaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8258: na śrutyantareṇa bādhituṃ śakyaḥ. tad etal liṅgaṃ yadi vā naiva pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8259: yadi vā śrutyā vikalpitum arhatīti. nāpy apramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8262: tasmān nāpramāṇam. yatas tu khalv ānumānikīm ekavākyatāṃ liṅgasāmarthyaṃ cāpekṣya śrauto 'yam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8269: anena mantreṇa gārhapatya upastheya iti. tatra vijñātam etad evam ayam upakaroti mantra ity etasmiṃś ca nirjñāte kṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor naitad evaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8270: indropasthānaṃ śabdenābhihitam iti. tasmād arthaviprakarṣāc chrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8272: anyāyyaś ca vikalpaḥ. tatra hy abhāvaḥ pakṣe nityavac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8273: aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti śrūyamāne yad abhāvaḥ pakṣe parikalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8275: śrutaṃ ca hīyate. yāvāṃś ca śrutasyārthasyotsarge doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8277: ubhayatra hi prasiddhir bādhyate. tasmād anyāyyatvād vikalpasya śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasīty avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8278: atha yad uktam - sati virodhe nyāyyo bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8281: yad akṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor indropasthānavācinī śrutir bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8283: na ca vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ yugapat kṛtasāmarthyābhyām [290]{*3/281*} akṛtasāmarthyābhyāṃ ca śakyaṃ bhavitum. tasmād virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8286_0: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suṣevaṃ{*3 /282*} kalpayāmi. tasmin sīdāmṛte
GSP28msbh1-7u:8286_1: pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamāna iti{*3 /283*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsno
GSP28msbh1-7u:8288: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ puroḍāśāsādana iti. yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8291: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatām upaiti - yat kalpayāmi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8295: sadanakaraṇam abhivaditum alam iti. tasmin sīdety ayam api puroḍāśaṃ sādayitum iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8299: yathā liṅgaṃ prati śruter balīyastvam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8300: na tathā vākyaṃ prati liṅgasyocyate. athavā vākyam eva liṅgād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8302: na ca balīyaḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyate bādhitum. tenāsya bhaṅguratām adhyavasyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8305: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgavākyayor liṅgaṃ balīya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8307: prakaraṇavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnānād darśapūrṇamāsāṅgam ayaṃ mantra ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8308: tasmin sīdeti puroḍāśāsādanābhidhānasāmarthyāt sādane viniyujyamāne kṛtasāmarthyaṃ mantrāmnānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8309_0: nāsti pramāṇaṃ yenopastaraṇe 'pi viniyujyeta. tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomīty{*3 /286*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8309_2: sāmarthyād evopastaraṇe viniyogāt kṛtaprayojane na puroḍāśāsādane viniyogam arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8310_0: na hy asmin viniyuj-yamānasya kiṃcid api prayojanam asti. evam upastaraṇe tasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:8310_1: sīdety asya nāsti sāmarthyam. pūroḍāśāsādane 'pi syonaṃ ta ity{*3 /288*} asya. pūrveṇaikavākyatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:8313: yat syonaṃ ta ity{*3/289*} asya pratyakṣaṃ sadanakarmaṇo 'bhidhānasāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8314: tan mukhyam. tasmin sīdety asya punaḥ pūrveṇa sahaikavākyatām upagatasya bhavati jaghanyam. tad atra pūrvasya mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyād upastaraṇe viniyoga ukto bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8316_0: uttarasya tūpajanite 'bhidhānasāmarthye tataḥ śrutyartha iti liṅgāntarito viprakṛṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8316_1: bhavati. evam uttarasya sādane saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ pūrvasya ca liṅgāntaritaḥ. tasmād arthaviprakṛṣṭāl
GSP28msbh1-7u:8317: tataḥ syonam ity{*3/290*} eṣa śabdo yady apy uttareṇākāṅkśita iti sādane 'pi prayogam arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8318: tathāpi bhitvā vākyam upastaraṇa eva viniyoktavyaḥ. tasmin sīdety eṣa ca sādane.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8319: nanu syonaṃ ta ity{*3/291*} asya śabdasya yathaivopastaraṇābhidhānasāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8321: sāmarthyaṃ ca liṅgam ity ucyate. tasmād bhidyamāne vākye liṅgam eva bādhitaṃ bhavatīti. satyam evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8323: liṅgam api khalv etad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ viprakṛṣṭārtham eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8325: tasmād abhidhānasāmarthyam. tataḥ śrutyartha iti viprakṛṣṭārthatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8326: viprakṛṣṭārthatā ca bādhane hetubhūtā. tasmān na [292]{*3/292*} uttaraṇaikavākyatāṃ yāsyatīti. evaṃ tasmin sīdety uttaraṃ na pūrveṇāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8327: api cottareṇaikavākyatām upagatasya na kiṃcid api dṛṣṭam asti kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8329: śrutatvād upastaraṇasya sādanasya ca. evam uttarasya sādanapratyāyanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8330: na tu pūrveṇaikavākyatāyām. na caitau pūrvottarābhyām ekavākyatām antareṇa pṛthag yathāyathaṃ kārye na kurutaḥ. tasmāt pūrvaḥ pūrvatra viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8332: atha yad uktam - śrutyāpi tad bādhitam iti vākyenāpi tad bādhitavyam iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8333: na hi bādhitasyānyenāpi bādhanam eva nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8338: atha vākyaprakaraṇayor virodhe katham iti. kiṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8339: kartavyasyetikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vacanaṃ prakaraṇam. prārambho hi sa tasyā vacanakriyāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8340: na eṣa vidhyādir vidhyantāpekṣaḥ. vākyaṃ tūktam eva. tayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8341: sūktavākanigadaḥ. tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatā amāvāsyādevatāś cāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8342: tāḥ paraspareṇaikavākyatāṃ nābhyupayanti. tatra liṅgasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīprayogād indrāgniśabda utkraṣṭavyo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayoktavyaḥ. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8345: sa kiṃ yāvat kṛtvaḥ sūktavāke samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8346: tāvat kṛtva ubhayoḥ paurṇamāsyam āvāsyayoḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8350: vākyaṃ balavattaram iti. evaṃ sarveṣu saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8356: tasmāt tulyabala iti. athavā vākyaṃ durbalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8358: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8360: vākya ekaikaṃ padaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8364: itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya samīpa upanipatitaṃ pūrṇam iti tasya prakṛtasya sākāṅkṣatvam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8365: naikavākyabhūtam ity anumīyate. ekavākyatayā cābhidhānasāmarthyam avakalpyābhihito 'yam evaṃ bhavatīti parikalpanā. eṣo 'trārthaviprakarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8367: prakaraṇasya viprakṛṣṭā. tasmāt sūktavākena prastaraṃ{*3/296*} praharatīti paurṇamāsīdevatāvācinām amāv āsyā devatāvācināṃ ca niṣkṛṣya prayoge tac cheṣāṇām api niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8368: tena yady api prakaraṇasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīdevatāpadaśeṣāṇām amāv āsyā devatāvācibhiḥ sahaikavākyatānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8369: pratyakṣā tv amāv āsyā devatāpadaiḥ saha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8370: na ca pratyakṣavirodhe 'numānaṃ saṃbhavati. arthavati ca prakaraṇe saṃjāte na nirākāṅkṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā śakyopapādayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8371: atha yad uktam - liṅgenāpi hi tad bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8374: tad bhaṅguram anyatrāpīty avagantavyam. atha bhaṅguram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8375: pramāṇam eva nābhaviṣyat. kiṃcit tu prati kasyacit prabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8376: vākyasya prakaraṇaṃ prati bādhakaśaktir na tu liṅgaṃ prati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8377: liṅgaṃ prati viprakṛṣṭārtham etat prakaraṇaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8379: [294]{*3/297*} atha prakaraṇasya kramasya ca virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8387: yenāvagacchāma idaṃ balīya iti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti. api ca prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8389: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇaṃ kramād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8394_0: anekasyāmnāyamānasya saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānamātraṃ hi kramaḥ. tatra saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānasāmarthyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:8394_1: kramavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnātasyānupalabhyamānam evākāṅkṣāvattvam astīty avagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8395: na ca prakaraṇavatā kramavatā ca yaugapadyenaikavākyatā saṃbhavaty āmnātasyeti virodhaḥ. tatra prakaraṇe pratyakṣaṃ sākāṅkṣatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8398: sāmarthyāc chrutyartha iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasya śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8399: viprakṛṣṭaḥ kramasya. tasmāt krama karaṇayoḥ prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8400: atha yad uktam - vākyenāpi hi tad bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8405_0: kiṃ balavattaram iti. pauroḍāśikam iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sāṃnāyyakrame śundhadhvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8405_1: daivyāya kramaṇa iti{*3 /299*} śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ. tatra saṃdihyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:8405_2: - kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvāt puroḍāśa[295]{*3 /300*}pātrāṇāṃ śundhane viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8406: uta kramasya balīyastvāt sāṃnāyyapātrāṇām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8408: aviśeṣāt, yadi vā samākhyaiva balīyasī, bādhito hi kramaḥ prakaraṇenāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8409: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kramo balīyān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8411: nirjñāte prakaraṇena kenāpi sahaikavākyatve yat saṃnidhāv āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8414: laukikaś ca śabdaḥ samākhyā. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8415: loka evaṃvidheṣv artheṣu pramāṇam. tasmāt kramo balīyān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8416: yady evaṃ bhavaty evaṃlakṣaṇakeṣu krameṇa viniyogaḥ, na tv arthāviprakarṣāt kramo balīyān. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8417: dvayor hi pramāṇayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8423: ity etad atra puruṣapramāṇakam. bhavati cāsminn arthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8426: vedaśabdaś cāyam iti. na hy ete 'nindriyaviṣayā arthā upapadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8428: ye tv anindriyaviṣayās teṣv abhiyuktā na pramāṇam. tasmāt samākhyā kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8429: kāraṇatve ca sati balīyastvaṃ parīkṣyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8430: ucyate 'rthaviprakarṣas tarhi vaktavyaḥ samākhyāyāḥ. ayam arthaviprakarṣaḥ. upadiśyate hi krame samāmnānāt sāṃnāyyasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8432: śabdam uccāryamāṇam upalabhyārthāpattyā nūnam astīti kalpyate. tasmāt pūrvavedārthaviprakarṣāt krameṇa samākhyā bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8433: atha yat tatra tatrocyate - idam anena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8435: tat kiṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ prāptam utāprāptam [296]{*3/302*} iti. kiṃ cātaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8438: prāptaṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ pūrvavijñānam iti brūmaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8439: sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāt. atha kathaṃ nivartate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8440: mithyājñānam{*3/303*} iti pratyayāntaraṃ bhavati. kiṃ tu{*3/304*} khalv amithyājñānasya svarūpam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8442: na tan mithyā. tad eteṣāṃ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat paraṃ paraṃ prati balīyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8443: naitasyotpannasya vimṛṣyamāṇasya bādhakaṃ vijñānāntaram asti. tasmāt teṣāṃ samavāye virodhe{*3/305*} paradaurbalyam arthavipralkarṣād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8450: *{3/275: E1 gibt śrutir api, liṅgam api in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8468: *{3/293: E2: maho jyāyate 'krātām, E4: maho jyāyo 'krātām, E6: mahojyāyo 'krātām}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8478: *{3/303: E2,4: naiva hi tannivartate. kathaṃ tarhi? mithyājñānam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8483: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/306*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dvādaśopasattā jyotiṣṭoma utāhīna iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8486: evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati. nanu vākyena bādhyate. na bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8489: dakṣiṇayā kratukaraṇair vā phalena vā na hīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8496: asaṃyogāt tu mukhyasya tasmād apakṛṣyeta{*3/308*} // MS_3,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8499: ahīnenaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣatvāt. nanu jyotiṣṭoma eva gauṇo 'hīnaḥ. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8500: na hi mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇagrahaṇam arhati. nanu nañsamāso bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8502: madhyodāttas tv ayam{*3/309*}. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvāhīnasya dharmaḥ. api ca vyapadeśo bhavati - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti. yady anyaḥ sāhno 'nyaś cāhīnaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8510_0: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī{*3 /311*} iti{*3 /312*} dvayor yajamānayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8510_1: pratipadaṃ kuryāt{*3 /313*}. ete 'sṛgram indava iti{*3 /314*} bahubhyo yajamānebhya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8510_2: iti{*3 /315*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - jyotiṣṭoma eva niviśete pratipādāu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8511: uta dviyajñaṃ kiṃcit kulāyādiṃ bahuyajñaṃ ca dvirātrādim utkraṣṭavya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8513: na hi [298]{*3/317*} jyotiṣṭomasya dvau yajamānau śrūyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8528: iti cet paśyasi - partipadāv utkraṣṭavya iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8529: prakaraṇaṃ hi bādhyeta. bādhyatām asaṃyogād dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānair jyotiṣṭomasyeti cet. asaty api vacane 'rthād dvau yajamānau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8533: tathā yaṣṭavyam iti bādhitvāpi kāṃcit prāptiṃ yajamānaḥ sahāyam upādāsyate. evaṃ prakaraṇe pratipadau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8537: prakṛtir hi jyotiṣṭomaḥ, pratyakṣās tatra dharmā āmnātāḥ, na kutaścic codakena prāpyante. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8539: pratyakṣaśrutā na śakyā bādhitum. vikṛtau tu codakaprāptāḥ santa ānumānikā bādhyerann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8540: vivakṣitaṃ hi jyotiṣṭome kartur ekatvaṃ pratyakṣaśrutaṃ na sāmarthyena bādhyate. yatrāpi hy avaśyakartavyatā śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8541: tatrāpy eka eva yajamānaḥ śrūyate - vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeteti. tasmāj jyotiṣṭomād utkraṣṭavya ete pratipādāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8542: atha kasmāt patnyabhiprāyam etan na bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8545: dvayor bahuṣu vā patnīṣv ete 'sṛgram indava iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8546: yathā kṣaume vasānāv agnimādadhīyātām iti kṣaumavasānaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8547: evam ihāpi pratipad vidhānaparam. ucyate - asaṃbhavāt tatra mukhyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8549: iha tu dviyajñe bahuyajñe ca saṃbhavati na lakṣaṇāśabdo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8550: bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti. yad apy etad dvivacanaṃ dvayor yajamānayor iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8553: pumān striyety asāv api lakṣaṇāśabda eva. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8554: upāsmai gāyatā nara iti pratipador niravakāśatvam eva syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavye ete pratipadāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8559: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim etad vidhānaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8561: kathaṃ ca paśāv iti. yadi jāghanyāṃ patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante tata utkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8562: atha patnīsaṃyājeṣu jāghanī vidhīyate tato darśapūrṇamāsayor eva. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8565: śabdāt patnīsaṃyājānāṃ vidhānam, vākyena jāghanyāḥ, śabdaś ca balavān, na vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8566: nanu patnīsaṃyājā vihitā eva. satyaṃ vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8568: sā tatsaṃbaddhā kartavyety ucyate. evaṃ sati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ patnīsaṃyājā vināpi jāghanyā na viguṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8569: jāghanī tu tatra pratipādyate. tasmād yatra jāghanī prayojanavatī tatra tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8571: na darśapūrṇa[300]{*3/320*}māsayoḥ. ekadeśaś ca jāghanī pratipādyamānā na paśuṃ prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8577: jāghanī vā patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena vidhīyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8579: aprāptā jāghanī patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena. tatra svaśabdena patnīsaṃyājā vihitā jāghanīsaṃbandhas teṣām avihitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8582: saṃbandho nāntarīyakaḥ. yad vā saṃbandhasya vidhānaṃ nāntarīyakau saṃbandhinau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8588: patnīsaṃbandhān na sarvo yāgaḥ, kaścid eva tu lakṣyate yasya patnyaḥ sādhanatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8589: atha kasmān na jāghanīṃ lakṣayitvā patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8591: jāghanyāṃ tu lakṣyamāṇāyāṃ yāge sapatnīke vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asti tv atra vihitaḥ sapatnīko yāgo ya patnībhir lakṣyate. tasmād yāgaṃ lakṣayitvā jāghanī vidhīyate. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8593: tad iha yāgavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīty uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8594: vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. tasmāj jāghanīvidhānam. evaṃ ced darśapūrṇamāsayor vinā jāghanyā viguṇaḥ patnīsaṃyājayāgaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8598: atha yad uktam - ekadeśo jāghanī na paśuṃ prayokṣyate, tasmād utkarṣa iti. tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8604_0: na prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayor jāghanī śāstrenocyate. evaṃ paśor niṣpannayā jāghanyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8604_1: patnīsaṃyājā yaṣṭavyā iti. aviśiṣṭā jāghanī vidhīyate. sā saṃbhavati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ krītyāpy ānīyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8607: saṃtardanaṃ prakṛtau krayaṇavad anarthalopāt syāt // MS_3,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8608: jyotiṣṭome 'bhiṣavaṇaphalake{*3/322*} prakṛtya śrūyate - dīrghasome saṃtṛdyād dhṛtyā iti{*3/323*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8609: āhosvid dīrghakāleṣu someṣv iti. ucyate - naital luptārthaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8610: tasmān notkṛṣyeteti. āha nanv asaṃtardanam api śrūyate - asaṃtṛṇe{*3/324*} bhavata iti{*3/325*}. ucyate - krayaṇavad vikalpiṣyate{*3/326*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8611: yathā hiraṇyena krīṇāti gavā krīṇātītyevamādīnāṃ vikalpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8612: evam atrāpi vikalpo bhaviṣyati - saṃtardanam asaṃtardanaṃ vā bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8616: *{3/324: E2: asaṃtṛṇye, E4: asaṃtṛṣṇe; E6: asantṛṇṇe}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8623: dīrghasome [302]{*3/327*} saṃtṛdyād iti. jyotiṣṭomam apekṣya satrāṇi kālato dīrghāṇi bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8628: notkṛṣyeta vā saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭomāt. evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8633: na caitad asti - jyotiṣṭome saṃniveśa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8640: dīrghakāle some punaḥ punar grāvabhir abhihanyamāne somābhiṣavaṇaphalakayor dāraṇaśaṅkāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8646: atha kim arthaṃ saṃsthāsu na niveśaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8648: dīrghasomaśabdaś ca. dīrghakālo hy agniṣṭomam apekṣyokthyādiṣu saṃsthāsu soma iti. ucyate - na saṃsthāsu dīrghakālatve 'pi some 'rthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8649: tāvān eva hi tatra somo daśa muṣṭīr mimīta iti vacanāt. tatra dhāraṇe na viśeṣaḥ kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8660: pradānāni hi vivardhante. tāny avivṛddhe pradeye na śakyāni vivardhayitum. pūrṇe grahe grahaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8661: tena na śakyāni nyūnāni pātrāṇi grahītum. tasmād dāraṇāśaṅkāyāṃ dhāraṇam āśaṃsitavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8665: iti cet paśyasi - saṃsthāsv apy arthavādo 'vakalpate pradeyavivṛddhyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8671: ukthyādiṣv api daśamuṣṭir eva somo grahītavyaḥ. nanv arthāt pradeyaṃ vivartsyatīti. daśamuṣṭiḥ sa kathaṃ śakyeta vivardhayitum?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8672: triparveti ca parvasaṃkhyāniyamān na śakyo bahuparvā grahītum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8673: tasmād dhāraṇāviśeṣād arthavādānupapattiḥ saṃsthāsu syāt, tasmād utkarṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8678: prakaraṇānugrahāt. arthāc ca pradeyavivṛddhyā dāraṇaśaṅkāyām arthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8680: viprakṛṣṭaparvā somo grahīṣyate. api ca tṛtīye savana 'śur eko 'bhiṣūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8681: tasya pramāṇaṃ ca nāmnātam. tam anekaparvāṇaṃ sthūlaparvāṇaṃ ca grahīṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8689: jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya samāmnāyate - na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyād dvitīye tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭome sarveṣv eva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8690: uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8693: prathamaśabdena yajño 'bhidhīyate jyotiṣṭomaḥ. tasya hi prathamasaṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8694: evaṃ samāmnāyate - eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*3/330*} yaj jyotiṣṭomo ya etenānṣṭvāthānyena yajeteti. yajñānāṃ prathama iti kṛtvā prathamaśabdena jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8696: yadi krator eṣa vādaḥ. tasmāt saṃkhyāyuktaḥ pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomasya pravargyaṃ pratiṣedhed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8700: naimittikaṃ vā kartṛsaṃyogāl liṅgasya tannimittatvā // MS_3,3.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8701: na caitad asti - yajñasyaiṣa vāda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8705: kartṛsaṃyogāt. pūrvasya dvitīyādīn apekṣya prathamaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8709: śrutiś ca balīyasī na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt prathame prayoge na pravarjitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8710: atha yad uktam - jyotiṣṭomena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tad vacana iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8711: laksaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti tat parihṛtam. yat tu prathamayajña iti yajñaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8717: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetācodanāt prakṛtau // MS_3,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8718: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi sa iti{*3/333*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8721: prakaraṇāt. nanu prakṛtau pūṣaṇaṃ na kasyacid dhaviṣo devatāṃ samāmanantīti. ucyate - prākṛtīṃ kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8722: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yatra pauṣṇaṃ havir asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8725: tasmād utkraṣṭavyaṃ peṣaṇam iti. yad uktam - kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8727: yady anyatrāpi mukhyaḥ pūṣā na syāt. nanv anyatra kriyamāṇe prakaraṇam uparudhyeta. uparudhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8728: vākyaṃ hy asyoparodhakam. athavā naivātra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8729: evam eva prāptam ucyate - pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau na prakṛtāv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8730: nāsti puṣṇaḥ{*3/334*} prakṛtau [306]{*3/335*} codaneti. kim arthaṃ prāptam ucyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8738: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ vikṛtāv ity uktam. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ carau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8741: uta carāv eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8742: tat sarvatra syāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8743: aviśeṣāt, na kaścid viśeṣa ādhhīyate, tasmāt sarvatreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8745: carau vā, arthoktaṃ puroḍāśe 'rthavipratiṣedhāt paśau na syāt // MS_3,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8746: carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ viniyujyeta. puroḍāśe tāvat peṣaṇam arthād eva prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8748: tad arthaṃ tāvan na vacanam. paśau ca na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8749: hṛdayādiṣu piṣyamāṇeṣu teṣām ākāravināśaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8751: tathānyad apy avadānaṃ na yathāśrutād avadāsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8752: nanu śakyate piṣṭebhyo 'pi hṛdayādibhyo 'vadātum. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8755: uktam etad ākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti{*3/337*}. yady api punas tadākṛtikaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8757: tasmāc carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8763: iti cet paśyati bhavān - arthavipratiṣedhān na paśvartham [307]{*3/338*} iti. nanu carāv apy arthavipratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8765: piṣyamāṇo hi piṣṭakaṃ yavāgūrvā syāt khalir vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8770: atrocyate - satyaṃ viśadasiddha odane caruśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8772: na tv asya viśadasiddhir nimittam. yadi viśadasiddhir nimittaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8773: na piṣṭasiddhe prayujyeta. tatrāpi hi prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8777: tad etad ucyate - na paktināmatvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8781: carur iti. anavasrāvitāntaruṣmapākenābhinirvartyasya bhavati caruśabdo vācakaḥ. tena piṣṭa odane viśadaudane ca prayoktāro bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8787: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau bhavati carāv evety uktam. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kim ekadevatye pauṣṇa etad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8789: rājasūya uttare trisaṃyukte saumāpauṣṇe ekādaśakapāle aindrāpauṣṇaś caruḥ śyāvo dakṣiṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8802: apiṣṭa itarasya syāt. tatra viṣamaḥ pāko bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8803: pākanimittaś ca caruśabdaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta. athāvirodhaṃ manyamānā aparasyāpi bhāgaṃ piṃṣyuḥ. bhāgasaṃmohaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8804: anyasya bhāgo 'nyasymā avadīyeta. tathāyathāśrutaṃ kriyeta, tasmād apy ekadevatye peṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8806: api vā sadvitīye syād devatānimittatvāt // MS_3,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8807: devatānimittam etat peṣaṇaṃ śrūyate - pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8808: sa ca dvidevatye 'pi bhāge piṣyamāṇe prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8810: tatra hi tad dhito nirapekṣasya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8813: na sadvitīyasya. iha tu prapiṣṭaśabdasya bhāgaśabdena sahānyapadārtho bahuvrīhiḥ samāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8815: na tv atra dvidevatye kaścid evaṃjātīyako doṣaḥ. tasmād ekadevatye dvidevatye 'pi vā carāv asya bhāgaḥ peṣṭavya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8818: liṅgam apy evaṃ bhavati - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hīti{*3/340*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8819_0: devatānimittaṃ peṣaṇam iti stutir darśayati. tathā saumāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapen nemapiṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8819_1: paśukāma iti{*3 /341*} nemapiṣṭatāṃ darśayati. tathārdhaṃ piṣṭam ardham apiṣṭaṃ bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:8826: vacanāt sarvapeṣaṇaṃ taṃ prati śāstravattvād arthābhāvād dvicarāv{*3/343*} apeṣaṇaṃ bhavati // MS_3,3.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8828: nemapiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kasmād etan na vacanam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8830: yadi vacanam etad bhavet saumāpauṣṇamātram anūdya sarvatra peṣaṇaṃ vidadhyāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8831: tatra somāpauṣṇasya{*3/344*} carusaṃbandhe nemapiṣṭasaṃbandhe cobhayasmin vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. tasmād yo yaḥ saumāpauṣṇas tatra tatra nemapiṣṭatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8832: taṃ prati saumāpauṣṇamātraṃ prati{*3/345*} śāstravattvam ardhapeṣaṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8833: puroḍāśe 'rthāt sarvapeṣaṇe prāpte 'rthābhāvāc ca paśau carau vāpeṣaṇe prāpte vacanam idaṃ bhavet. tatra caruśabdo na vivakṣitasvārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8836: tasmād bhavaty eva liṅgam. nanv aṅganāśabhayāt paśor apeṣaṇam. neti brūmaḥ - ardhapeṣaṇe nāṅganāśo 'piṣṭād avadāsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8841: *{3/345: E1 gibt saumāpauṣṇamātraṃ prati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8843: ekasmin vārthadharmatvād aindrāgnavad ubhayor na syād acoditatvāt // MS_3,3.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8844: ekadevatye vā pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati, naindrāpauṣṇe. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8845: naiṣa devatādharmo vidhīyate, pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ piṣṭa upayoktavya iti. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8848: na devatādharma iti. ucyate - na hi tasyā bhāgo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8850: tat tasyā bhāgo bhavati. ucyate - etad dhi devatām uddiśya tyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8851: na ca tyāgamātreṇa devatāsvatvaṃ bhavati. parigrahaṇena hi svasvāmisaṃbandha āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8852: na ca parigṛhītaṃ devatayeti kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. yaś{*3/346*} ca yaṃ bhajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8857: tathāpi na devatāyā dharmaḥ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8858: niṣprayojano hi tathā syād ayāgadharmatvāt. kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇāntare samāmnāto yāgadharmo bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8859: vākyasaṃyogāt. nanu ca devatayaiṣa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate na yāgeneti. ucyate - bhāgābhāvād anarthakatvāc ca na devatāsaṃyoga ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8861: tathā vaktavyam. tad ucyate - ayam atra pūṣṇo bhāgo yaḥ pūṣaṇam uddiśya tyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8864: na sa caruḥ pūṣṇaḥ svatvena saṃbadhyate. tasmād aindrāpauṣṇe na kaścid asti pūṣṇaś caruṇā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8865: kevale tu pūṣaṇi devatābhūte tasmai saṃkalpito bhāgo bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8866: yam uddiśya saṃkalpo bhavati sa tasya bhāga iti prasiddhir eṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8867: tena yady api pūṣā svenoccāraṇenendrāpūṣṇor upakārakam uccāraṇaṃ kurvann upakārako bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8868: tathāpi na tasya dvidevatyo bhāga ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8869: asaṃkalpanāt. kevale pūṣaṇi devatāyāṃ caroḥ peṣaṇaṃ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8876: yad uktam - adantako hīti{*3/348*} devatādharmaṃ darśayatīti. arthavāda eṣa itarasminn api pakṣa upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8881: athāparaṃ yat kāraṇam uktam - nemapiṣṭam iti{*3/349*} dvidevatye peṣaṇaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8882_0: ardhapiṣṭaṃ{*3 /350*} bhavaty ardham apiṣṭaṃ dvidevatyatvāyeti [311]{*3 /351*} devatādharmaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8882_1: darśayatīti. atrocyate - evaṃ sati vacanam idam aprāpte bhavatīti. nanv anekārthavidhidhānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8882_2: ekaṃ vākyaṃ prāpnoti. ucyate - sati pakṣāntare 'nekārthavidhiḥ pakṣāntarāśrayaṇena
GSP28msbh1-7u:8882_4: vākyam abhyupagantavyaṃ bhavati. tasmān na dvidevatye peṣaṇam iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8890: nivītam iti manuṣyadharmaḥ śabdasya tatpradhānatvāt // MS_3,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8891_0: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām upavītaṃ devānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:8891_1: upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kuruta iti{*3 /353*}. nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām ity atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8891_2: saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ vidhir utārthavāda iti. yadā vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8892: tadā kim ayaṃ puruṣadharma uta karmadharmaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8893: atha yat prakaraṇe manuṣyāṇām, tatra vidhiḥ, uta manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi niviśata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8896: yadi vidhir evam apūrvam arthaṃ vidadhad arthavān bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8897: itarathārthavādamātram anarthakam. vidhiś cet puruṣadharmo nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti puruṣapradhāno nirdeśaḥ. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8900: na cāvihitam aṅgaṃ bhavati. yadi manuṣyā api vidhīyeran vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmān nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām upakārakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8901: nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakam. prakaraṇād dhi vākyaṃ balavattaram. api ca guṇabhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu kārakasaṃbandhasya vivakṣitatvāt tṛtīyā bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8903: tatra guṇabhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ naiva kartavyaṃ syāt. manuṣyair eva tat kriyamāṇaṃ kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8911: apadeśa iti jñāyamānasya vacanam. sa eṣa na vidhiḥ. anuvāda eṣaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8914: nivītaṃ hi manuṣyāḥ prāyaśaḥ svārthaṃ kurvanti, tasmād anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8928: etad gṛhyate. yat tu manuṣyadharma iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8930: prakṛtyaiva{*3/357*} hi karmaprāyeṣu dharmeṣūcyamāneṣv etad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8937: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām ity asya vākyaśeṣaḥ samākhyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8945: ucyate - prakaraṇāt samākhyānāc ca karmadharmo vijñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8955: tatpradhāne vā tulyavat prasaṃkhyānād itarasya tadarthatvāt // MS_3,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8956: naitad asti - prakaraṇe niveśa iti, manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi nivītaṃ syād ātithye. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8960: tat prakṛtayor darśapūrṇamāsayor upavītaṃ vidadhāti. yat prācīnāvītaṃ piṭṝṇām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8961: tat pitṛpradhāne karmaṇi prācīnāvītaṃ vidadhāti. yad apy etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8963: tad apy ātithye nirapekṣaṃ vidadhāti. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8964: manuṣyapradhāne vidadhātīti. manuṣyāṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantena saṃbandhāt. manuṣyāṇām eva prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8965: na manuṣyapradhāne. ucyate - manuṣyāṇāṃ kalpyamāne phalaṃ kalpanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8968: phalaṃ caivaṃ na kalpanīyam. tad uktam - sameṣu vākyabhedaḥ syād iti{*3/361*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8970: punaḥ prakṛtābhyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ekavākyatāṃ yāsyati. na hi dvau saṃbandhāv ekasmin vākye vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8971: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. itarasya manuṣyagrahaṇasya nivītasaṃbandhārthatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8973: tad ekavākyatayā cārthavattve sati na prakṛtenaikavākyatāvakalpyate. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvātithye nivekṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8981: naitad asti - vidhiḥ sa ca manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇīti. manuṣyāṇām iti manuṣyasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8982: na manuṣyapradhānena karmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ. manuṣyaprādhānye ca sati phalaṃ kalpanīyam. ātithyakarmaṇā tv anirdiṣṭenāprakṛtenānumeyena saṃbadhyeta. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8983: prakaraṇād utkṛṣyeta saṃbhavaṃs tatra. kathaṃ saṃbhava iti cet. arthavāda eṣaḥ sa prakṛtaṃ stuvan prakaraṇe saṃbhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8984: vidhiḥ sann utkṛṣyeta. tasmān na vidhir manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8988: vidhinaikavākyatvāt - upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kurute ity eṣa vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8989: anenāsya sahaikavākyatā bhavati. yadītaro 'pi vidhiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8991: na hi vidheś ca{*3/364*} vidheś caikavākyatā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8993: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti prāptānuvādaḥ. prāptasya kim arthena punar vacanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8996: manuṣyāṇāṃ hi tat. tathā prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8997: na devakarmaṇi. upavītaṃ tu tatra yogyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9001_0: yādṛśo devadattasya tādṛśo brāhmaṇānām iti devadattaveśapraśaṃsārtham{*3 /366*} itaraveśasaṃkīrtanam{*3 /367*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9001_1: evam ihāpy upavyānastutyarthena nivītasaṃkīrtanam. nāsty atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9002: tasya kartavyatāvidhāyakam iti cet. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9004: parokṣaṃ hi tad ānarthakyaparijihīrṣayā kalpyeta. parihṛte tv ānarthakya iha punar na kiṃcit kalpanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9005: tasmād arthavādaḥ. evaṃ ca vākyenāviruddhaṃ prakaraṇam arthavad bhavati.

GSP28msbh1-7u:9021: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - prācīṃ devā abhajanta dakṣiṇāṃ pitaraḥ pratīcīṃ manuṣyā udīcīm asurā iti{*3/370*}. apareṣām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9022: udīcīṃ rudrā iti{*3/371*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ vidhir utārthavādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9023: [317]{*3/372*} vidhiḥ san kiṃ manuṣyadharmaḥ, uta karmadharmaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9024: atha vā prakaraṇe manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi niveśaḥ? kiṃ vātithya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9028: sa nivītavad vicāryaḥ. yo nivīte pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9033_0: sa siddhāntaḥ. arthavattvād vidhir manuṣyasaṃbandhān manuṣyadharma iti pūrvapakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9033_1: pratyaṅmukhā udaṅmukhā vā pṛṣṭhata ādityaṃ prāṃśu{*3 /373*} padārthān anutiṣṭhanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9033_2: manuṣyā ity anuvādaḥ. vidhir eva prakaraṇānugrahāc ca jyotiṣṭomadharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9034: vākyaprakaraṇānugrahāya jyotiṣṭome manuṣyapradhāne dakṣiṇāvyāpāre niveśa ity aparaḥ pakṣaḥ. bhinnatvād vākyānām ātithye niveśa ity aparaṃ matam. arthavādo 'yaṃ prakaraṇānugrahāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9035: prācīnavaṃśaṃ karotīty anena vidhinaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣasiddhatvād iti siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9038: *{3/371: E1 gibt apareṣām, udīcīṃ rudrā iti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9043: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - yat puruṣi ditaṃ tad devānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9047: tat pitṝṇām iti{*3/374*}. tathā - yo vidagdhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9051: sa sadevatyaḥ{*3/375*}. tasmād avidahatā śrapayitavyaṃ sadevatyāya iti{*3/376*}. jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yat pūrṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9053: adho devānām adhaḥ pitṝṇām iti{*3/377*}. tathā - ghṛtaṃ [318]{*3/378*} devānāṃ mastu pitṝṇāṃ niṣpakvaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti{*3/379*}. tatra manuṣyasaṃbaddheṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9054: raudre ca saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmā vidhayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9061: yo nivīte pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ sa eteṣāṃ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9063: yaḥ siddhāntaḥ sa eva siddhāntaḥ. arthavattvān manuṣyasaṃbandhāc ca vidhayo manuṣyadharmāś ceti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. upari mūle cāniyamāl lāghavam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9065: pūrṇe 'pi ślakṣṇatvāl lāghavam. evaṃ ghṛtaṃ{*3/381*} śirasi nihitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhakaram eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9066: arthaprāptatvād anuvāda ity uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ. vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9067: karmadharmaprāyāt samākhyānāc ca karmadharma iti pakṣaḥ. anvāhārye dakṣiṇāsu ceti vākyaprakaraṇānugrahāt pakṣaḥ. ātithya iti vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. arthavāda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9071: avidahatā śrapayitavyam{*3/383*} ity ebhiḥ sahaiṣām ekavākyabhāvaḥ. tasmād ete na vidhayo 'rthavādā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9084: akarma kratusaṃyuktaṃ saṃyogān nityānuvādaḥ syāt // MS_3,3.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9085_0: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - nānṛtaṃ vaded iti{*3 /384*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9085_1: pratiṣedho dārśapaurṇamāsikasya padārthasya [319]{*3 /385*} prakaraṇa eva niveśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9085_2: atha prāyeṇa prāptasya karmaṇaḥ puruṣaṃ prati pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣadharmo 'yam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9086: puruṣadharmaḥ syāt, puruṣasyāyam upadiśyate, na darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9088: vaded iti vadanam anutiṣṭhed iti śrutyā gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9090_0: karmasaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt. śrutiś ca prakaraṇād balīyasī. itarathā vadanaṃ bhavatīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:9090_1: etāvaty arthe vadanam anutiṣṭhed ity avivakṣitasvārthaḥ parārtho vidhyartho bhavet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9090_2: puruṣasyopadeśe punar vivakṣitasvārtha eva śabdaḥ. tasmāt puruṣasyopadeśaḥ. yasya copadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9091: tasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ. sa cāyam artha upanayanakāla eva puruṣasya pratiṣiddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9093: nanv eṣā śrutis tasyāḥ smṛter mūlam. naiṣā tasyā mūlaṃ bhavitum arhati. yadīyaṃ tanmūlikā bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9095: upanayanakāla eva cāsyopadeṣṭāro bhavanti. api ca puruṣadharma ity upadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9096: tasmān naiṣā smṛtir ataḥ śruter iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9102: vidhir vāyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor nānṛtaṃ vaded iti, nānuvādaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9104: padārthapratiṣedheneha saṃyogaḥ puruṣasya. katham anyac chrūyamāṇam anyasyānuvādo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9105: tasmād vidhiḥ pratiṣedhasyāyam. āha gṛhṇāma{*3/386*} etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9106: vidhir iti. puruṣadharma iti tu gṛhṇāmaḥ{*3/387*} puruṣaprayatnasya śrutatvāt. atra brūmaḥ - sarveṣv ākhyāteṣu kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ śrūyate na kārakaṃ kiṃcit. katham etad gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9108: nanu kartāram api pratiyanti. satyaṃ pratiyanti, na tu śabdāt. kutas tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9112: yaś cārthād gamyate. na sa śrautaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9113: yaś ca na śrauto na sa vākyād gamyate. katham asau prakaraṇaṃ bādhiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9114: āha - prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta ity ācāryopadeśāt kartā śabdārthaḥ karma cety avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9116: karmaṇi yag{*3/390*} iti pratyayārthaṃ kartāraṃ karma ca samāmananty ācāryāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9118: ucyate - nācāryavacanāt sūtrakāravacanād vā śabdārtho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9119: pratyayād asau gamyate. anuṣṭheyā ca kriyā pratītā satī kārakāṇi pratyāyayatīty avagatam etat. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9120: naiva kartā pratyayārthaḥ karma vety ācāryā āhuḥ. nanu kartari karmaṇi ca lakāraḥ śrūyate. nāsau kartari karmaṇi vā śrūyate kiṃ tv ekasmin,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9122_0: dvayor dvivacanaṃ bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti tatrāparaṃ vacanam. tatraivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9122_1: kriyate - ekasmin kartari dvayoḥ kartror bahuṣu kartṛṣv iti. evaṃ karmaṇy ekatvādisaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9122_2: tatra naivaṃ bhavati - kartari bhavaty ekasmiṃś ceti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9124_0: kartur ekatva ity arthaḥ. evaṃ dvitve bahutve karmaṇi ca. evaṃ varṇyamāne laukikanyāyānugataḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9124_1: sūtrārtho varṇito bhavati. sūtrākṣarāṇi ca nyāyānugatāni bhavanti. āgamo 'pi cāyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9127: nanv etad apy asti yadā karmādayo vibhaktyarthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9128: tadaikatvādayo viśeṣaṇatveneti. ucyate - arthaprāptā hi karmādayas te na bhavanti śabdasyābhidheyabhūtāḥ. na tv ekatvādayo 'rthāt prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9132: yathā hiraṇyamālina ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti hiraṇyamālitvaṃ viśeṣaṇa[321]{*3/391*}tvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9134: tasmāt kartur ekatvaṃ śabdārtho na kartā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9137: kartur bahutvād bahuvacanam. tena nūnaṃ kartā śabdārtha iti gamyate. ucyate - naitad anumānāc chakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9138: kartānuṣṭheyakriyāvagamād evāvagamyata iti pratyakṣam. tat tāvat kenacin na bādhyate. ekavacananirdeśe kartrekatvaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9144: evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān na śrautaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9147: yat tu puruṣaprayatno 'narthako bhavati karmadharmapakṣe prayogavacanena kartavyatāvacanād iti. tad ucyate - aṅgaṃ sat prakaraṇena gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9150: asminn api pakṣe. ato manyāmahe - prākaraṇikasyāyaṃ niṣedha{*3/393*} iti. tasmād tad{*3/394*} aṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9151: yad anṛtaṃ tan na vācyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9155: vrīhim ayaṃ saṃkalpya na yavamayaḥ pradeyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9156: āha yadobhayor api pakṣayor nānṛtaṃ vaditavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9157: tadā ko vicāreṇārtha iti. ucyate - pūrvasmin pakṣe puruṣadharmaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:9175_1: 'psu dīkṣātapasī prāveśayaṃs tīrthe snāti tīrtham eva hi sajātānāṃ bhavatīti{*3 /398*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9176: tasmāj jañjabhyamāno 'nubrūyāt. mayi dakṣakratū iti. prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti{*3/399*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ dharmaḥ prakaraṇe niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9177: uta puruṣasyopadiśyata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9178: ahīnavat puruṣaḥ, tadarthatvāt. eṣa vidhiḥ prakaraṇād utkṛṣyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9180: nanu prakaraṇaṃ bādhyate. ucyate - bādhyatāṃ prakaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9185: vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād balīyaḥ. tasmād utkṛṣyeteti. phalam apy āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9187: sa ca saṃyogo bādhyate. tasmāt puruṣadharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9189: yathāhīnasaṃyogād{*3/400*} dvādaśopasattā prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. evaṃ jañjabhyamānasaṃyogān mayi dakṣakratū iti vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9196: prakaraṇaviśeṣād vā tad yuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat // MS_3,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9200: yathā yavādidravyaṃ prokṣaṇā[323]{*3/401*}dinā. nanu na śaknoti prakaraṇaṃ jañjabhyamānaśabdam ekadeśe 'vasthāpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9201_0: vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇād balavattaram iti. ucyate - na brūmo jañjabhyamānaśabdaḥ prakaraṇenāprākaraṇikāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9201_1: puruṣān nivartyata iti. kiṃ tu phalaṃ tatra kalpanīyam. nanu pratyakṣaṃ śrūyate phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9202: prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti. neti brūmaḥ - nātra vidhāyakaṃ śabdam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9205: vartamānāpadeśa eṣa na vidhāyakaḥ. stāvakas tu bhavati mantravacanasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9206: tasmād darśapūrṇamāsābhyām anyatraitan na phalavat. ataḥ puruṣasya darśapūrṇamāsau kurvataḥ saṃskārakarmeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9207: āha puruṣasaṃskārakarmeti gṛhyate, darśapūrṇamāsāv eva kurvata ity etan na. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9213: saṃskṛtena tu tena nāsti prayojanam. nanu prakaraṇe puruṣasaṃskāreṇāpi nāsti prayojanam. ucyate - saṃskṛtapuruṣo darśapūrṇamāsāv anuṣṭhāsyati. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9214: utkarṣe 'pi sati saṃskṛto 'nyad anuṣṭhāsyati. ucyate - nānyasya saṃskāro guṇo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9216: vākyena puruṣadharma ity avagamāt. ucyate - ānarthakyān na puruṣadharmo 'vagamyate. tasmād asya prakṛtābhyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ekavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9219: yat tu prakaraṇe niveśa etasmin{*3/402*} pakṣe brūyād - ity anuṣṭhānavacanam avivakṣitasvārtham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9231: tathedam apy utkraṣṭavyam iti. ucyate - tad dhi vākyenāhīnānāṃ vyapadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9232: phalavantaś cāhīnāḥ. na ca tatra jyotiṣṭome 'hīnaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9234: vyapadeśāc ca tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/405*}. tato yuktaṃ dvādaśopasattā yat prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. na tv iha puruṣasaṃbandho niṣprayojanatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9240: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - devā vai śaṃyuṃ bārhaspatyam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti prakṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9241: vacanam idaṃ bhavati - kiṃ me prajāyā iti te 'bruvan yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret taṃ śatena yātayād yo nihanat taṃ sahasreṇa yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9242: yo lohitaṃ karavat yāvataḥ praskandya pāṃsūn saṃgṛhaṇāt tāvataḥ saṃvatsarān pitṛlokaṃ na prajānīyād iti. tasmān na brāhmaṇāyāvaguren na hanyān na lohitaṃ kuryād iti{*3/406*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9245: prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor avagoraṇādipratiṣedhaḥ. na darśapūrṇamāsyor brāhmaṇasyāvagoritavyaṃ vadho vā kāryo lohitaṃ vā praskandanīyam. anya upāya āsthātavya ānataye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9246: te nānvāhāryeṇānamanti [325]{*3/407*} iti prakaraṇāt prāpnoti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śaṃyau ca prakaraṇād utkarṣaḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9249: na darśapūrṇamāsagatenaiva nāvagoraṇādi kartavyam iti. nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsadharmo 'yam. satyaṃ prakaraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9252: nanu jañjabhyamānasyeva prakaraṇe niveśo bhavet. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9254: iha kḷptam. asti hy atra vidhāyakavibhaktiḥ - śatena yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9263: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - malavad vāsasā na saṃvadet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9264: nāsyā annam adyād iti{*3/408*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ malavad vāsasā saha darśapūrṇamāsāṅgasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9265: uta puruṣasya sarvatra pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9267: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - malavad vāsasā saha saṃvāda utkṛṣyeta, prakaraṇāt. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9268_0: prāgaparodhāt. evaṃ śrūyate - yasya vratye 'hani patny anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9268_1: yajeteti{*3 /409*}. patnyā ca saha saṃvādo 'dhvaryor darśapūrṇamāsayor asti - patni
GSP28msbh1-7u:9270: sa cāprāpta [326]{*3/411*} eva prāgaparodhād apanīyatāṃ yāgam anutiṣṭhatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9272: yataḥ pratiṣedham arhet. tasmād utkṛṣyeta malavad vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9280: annapratiṣedhaś ca bhavati - nāsyā annam adyād abhyañjanaṃ vai striyā annam ity{*3/412*} upagamanapratiṣedha eṣa{*3/413*} vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9281: sa ca prakaraṇe na prasakta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9287: aprakaraṇe tu taddharmas tato viśeṣāt // MS_3,4.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9288_0: anārabhya śrūyate - tasmāt suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvarṇo 'sya bhrātṛvyo bhavatīti{*3 /414*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9288_1: suvāsasā bhavitavyaṃ rūpam eva bibhartīti. tatra kiṃ prakaraṇadharma uta puruṣadharma
GSP28msbh1-7u:9288_2: iti saṃśayaḥ. atrocyate - aprakaraṇe tu tad dharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9293: sarvaprakaraṇadharmaḥ syāt. aprakaraṇe samāmnānaṃ na kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ kuryāt. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9299: tuśabdaḥ pakṣavyāvṛttau. na puruṣadharmo bhavet, agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9303: bhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyam iti parikalpyeta. asati tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe vibhartir ayaṃ dhāraṇāvacanaḥ saṃskāravācī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9305: tasmāt karmaṇām agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ. evaṃ suvāsasā bhavitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9314: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi karmaṇāṃ sāṅgānām aṅgānām ardhvayuḥ kartā. tasmād api karmadharmā evaṃjātīyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9317: dravyaparaś cātra bhavati nirdeśaḥ - suvarṇaṃ bhāryam iti dvitīyārthasaṃyogāt. dravyasaṃskāraś ca karmaśeṣapakṣe prayojanavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9320: syād vāsya saṃyogavat phalena saṃbandhas tasmāt karmaitiśāyanaḥ // MS_3,4.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9321: syād vā phalenaivaṃjātīyakānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ puruṣadharma ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9322: suvarṇasya vāsaso vā dharmo bhavan niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. nanu saṃskṛtena suvarṇena vāsasā ca karma setsyati. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9323: suvarṇasyāṅgaṃ na karmaṇa upakuryāt. śrutyādīnām abhāvān na karmāṅgam. tasmāt durvarṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavatītyevamādinā evaṃjātīyakānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9325: ānarthakyaparihārāya phalacodanayā saṃbandha eṣi-tavyo bhavati. anyasmāc caiṣitavyād ekavākyagatasya vipariṇāmo{*3/418*} laghīyān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9329: saṃbandhasya ca tātparyādhyavasānam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ pradhānakarmopadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9330: yathā prajāpativratānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ. etāvatā hainasāviyukto bhavatīti. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9336: iha karmasaṃyuktā homā jayādaya udāharaṇam. yena karmaṇetsat{*3/420*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9339: abhyātānāñ juhotīti{*3/421*}. tatraite kiṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ kṛṣyādīnāṃ śeṣabhūtāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9340: uta vaidikānām agnihotrādinām iti. śeṣatvaṃ tu nirjñātakarmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9345: *{3/421: Vgl. Tait.S. 3.4.6.2; dazu auch Jha, Übs., Bd.1, S.516}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9348: na caitad asti - sarvakarmaṇāṃ karṣaṇādīnām apy aṅgabhūtā iti. homā ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9350: āhavanīyasaṃyogo bhavati homeṣu. yadāhavanīye juhoti tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*3/422*}. tena yasyāhavanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9351: tasyaite 'ṅgam. na [329]{*3/423*} ca kṛṣyādīny āhavanīye vartante. na caiṣāṃ gārhapatyo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9352: yataḥ praṇīta āhavanīyaḥ syāt. tasmān na karmaṇādīnāṃ jayādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9358: itaś ca paśyāmo vaidikānāṃ śeṣabhūtā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9360: ādhvaryavam iti hi samākhyāte vede jayādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ santo 'dhvaryuṇā kariṣyante. karṣaṇādiṣv adhvaryor abhāvād anadhvaryuṇāpi kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyāṃ bādheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9363: doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāc chāstrād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9364: asty aśvapratigraheṣṭiḥ - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9367: tāvato vāruṇāṃś catuṣkapālān nirvaped iti{*3/424*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ laukike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9368: atha vaidika iti. kaḥ punar laukiko 'śvapratigrahaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9369: ko vā vaidika iti. loke bhikṣamāṇo vābhikṣamāṇo vā yatrāśvaṃ labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9370: tatra laukikāśvapratigrahaḥ. vaidiko 'pi pauṇḍarīke 'śvasahasraṃ dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭome gauś cāśvaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9371: tatrocyate - vaidikatvasāmānyād vaidika iti prāpte. [330]{*3/425*} ucyate - doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāt. doṣo hi śrūyate - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9374: sa ca laukike 'śvapratigrahe śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ kṛto bhavatīty upapadyate. doṣasaṃyogāl laukika iti gamyate. āha na doṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ prāyaścittaviṣayaviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9375: kiṃ tu prāyaścitta-stutyarthena. ucyate - doṣanirdhātārthe saty evaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9378: loke varuṇagrahaṇasya vidyamānatvāt. vaidike tv aśvapratigrahe tan na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9379: śāstrād dhi vacanena{*3/426*} tasya kartavyatāvagamyate. yadi ca tataḥ pāpaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9382: nanu vaidike 'pi pratigrahe 'pratigrāhyāt pratigṛhṇataḥ pāpam asti. ucyate - bhaved evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9394: yad uktam - yaḥ śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakṛto loke 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt sa etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapet. sa hi varuṇagṛhīta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9396_0: yasyodaraṃ jalavṛddhyā śvayati. jalodaram ity eva loke tat prasiddham. na ca tasyāśvapratigraho
GSP28msbh1-7u:9396_1: laukiko nidānam iti prati[331]{*3 /427*}jñāyate. na cānena vidhīyate. tasmān nāśvapratigrahāj jalodaropapātaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9398: vṛṇīta ity eṣo 'bhiprāya iti. tadā prasiddhau tyaktāyāṃ kleśamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9401: rakṣaṇapoṣaṇavicikitsādinā kleśena naiṣa pakṣo vyavatiṣṭheta - laukike 'śvapratigraha iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9402: prasiddhiś ca bādhyeta. tasmād arthavāda eṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9404: tāvad etety upamānenaiṣā stutiḥ. yo 'sya pratigrahaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9410: tasmād yajñe pratīyeta. laukike hi phalaṃ kalpanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9412: tasyāṅgabhūtā bhaviṣyati. tatra prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatā saṃbandhād avakalpyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9413: parokṣāyāḥ phalavacanena sahaikavākyatāyā laghīyasīti yuktam iṣṭir vaidike dāna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9420: tāvato vāruṇāṃś catuṣkapālān nirvaped iti{*3/429*}. tatraitat samadhigatam - vaidike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭir iti. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ pratigrahakartrā kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9426: pratigrhakartus tām avagacchāmaḥ - yāvato 'śvān [332]{*3/430*} pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataś catuṣkapālān vāruṇān nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9433: naiṣā pratigrahakartuḥ, kiṃ tarhi hetukartuḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9435: pūrvapadānām uttaraiḥ padair yathārtham abhisaṃbandhaḥ. idaṃ śrūyate - prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anyad iti{*3/431*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9438: sa svāṃ devatām ārcchad iti. sa iti sāpekṣaṃ pūrvaprakṛtaṃ vākyaśeṣam apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9439: sa iti prajāpatiṃ pratinirdiśatīti tena sahaikyavākyatāṃ yāti. sāmānādhikaraṇyāc ca prajāpater eva pratinirdeśo 'vakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9441: vaiyadhikaraṇyāt. sa paryadīryata ity eṣo 'pi prajāpatim eva pratinirdiśati pūrvaprakṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9442: tena ca sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. sa evaitaṃ vāruṇaṃ catuṣkapālam apaśyad iti prajāpatir eveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9444: tato vai sa varuṇapāśād amucyata prajāpatiḥ. varuṇa etaṃ{*3/433*} gṛhṇātīti hetvapadeśo 'yam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9445: yasmād eva prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvaṃ dattvā paridīrṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9446: tasmād yo 'śvaṃ prati gṛhṇāti prayacchati{*3/434*} taṃ varuṇo gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9447: sa paridīryata iti. yatas tu vāruṇena pratimuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9448: tasmād anyenāpy aśvaṃ prayacchatā vāruṇo nirvaptavya ity aśvasya dātur vāruṇīṣṭiḥ praśasyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9449: kartavyānenākhyātena. tasmād aśvaṃ dattvā vāruṇīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9451: nanu yo 'svaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa nirvaped ity ucyate. evaṃ saty anyathopakrānte vākye 'nyathopasaṃhṛta upakramo 'py anarthakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9452: upasaṃhāro 'pi. tasmād upakrame vā śabdārtha upasaṃhāravaśena kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9453: upasaṃhāre vopakramavaśena. tatra [333]{*3/435*} prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9454: varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād ity upasaṃhārānurodhena kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9457: yo 'śvaṃ pratigrāhayatīti. tatra - mukhyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ codanāl lokavad iti{*3/436*} prathamam anugrahītavyaṃ virodhābhāvāt. paścāt tanaṃ tu virodhāl lakṣaṇayā kalpanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9459: prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād iti bahvasamañjasaṃ kalpayitavyam. pratigṛhṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9460: pratigrāhayatīty etam arthaṃ śaknoti yayā kayācic chaktyā vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9463: sa tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ karteti śakyate vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9464: yathā ṣaḍbhir halaiḥ karṣatīti saṃvidhānaṃ kurvan vilekhanam akurvann apy ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9465_0: tatsamartham ācaratīti. evam ihāpi sa pratigrahasamartham ācarati yo dadāti{*3 /438*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9465_1: tasmād dadat pratigṛhṇātīti śakyate vaditum. tasmād adhyavadhāryedam avakḷptam. dadat
GSP28msbh1-7u:9475: *{3/438: E1 gibt yo dadāti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9478: idaṃ samāmananti - somendraṃ caruṃ nirvapec chyāmākaṃ somavāmina iti{*3/439*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - laukikasya somapānasya vamane saumendraś{*3/440*} caruḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9481: ucyate - vaidikaṃ somapānaṃ jyotiṣṭome tadvikṛtiṣu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9482: laukikaṃ somapānaṃ yat saptarātreṣu [334]{*3/441*} daśarātreṣu dhātusāmyārtham{*3/442*} āsevyamāne some. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9490: indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ pibatīti{*3/443*} loke dhātusāmyārtham āsevite vamanena vinaṣte dhātusāmyavyāpadā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9492: śās-trād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt. tatra śeṣaḥ pātavya iti śabdāc codite nirvṛtte nāsti doṣaḥ. yady api vamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9494: kṛto vacanārtha iti na doṣaḥ syāt. tasmāl laukikasya somapānasya vyāpadi saumendraḥ{*3/444*} syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9500: *{3/443: E2: soma vamati, iti, E4: somaṃ vamity iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9503: doṣāt tu vaidike syād arthād dhi laukike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9504: vaidikasya pānasya vyāpadi bhavitum arhati, na laukikasya. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9506: doṣasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate - indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyata iti. laukike punar dhātusāmyādyarthaṃ kriyamāṇe na kiṃcid duṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9507: vamanāyaiva hi taṃ pibanti loke. athāpy ayam arthavādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9508: tathāpi phalakalpanāparīhārāya vaidika eveti kalpanā nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9515: na viśeṣaḥ [335]{*3/446*} kaścid āśrīyate 'sya vamane syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9527: yat tv atra saumendraṃ{*3/448*} karma. tad api tad artham eva. idaṃ hi somavāmina upakārāya śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9530: na hi tad ṛtvig arthaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9531: yatra somo vamyate. athocyate - somavāmino 'dhvaryor hotur vātmīyā ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9532: tadīyeṣv agniṣu nirvartayiṣyantīti. tathā sati yadi vā vyṛddhasomasya karmaṇo nāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9534: tatrātyantaguṇabhūtā adhvaryvādayaḥ svair ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayanto na phalaṃ prāpnuvanti. tad arthaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ na yajamānasyopakāre vartata iti na ṛtvijo vamane kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9541: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati, yajamānasya somavāmina iti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9542: somapīthena vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. yajamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9543: somasaṃskāre vinaṣṭe viguṇam asya karmeti vyṛdhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9544: na kathaṃcid ṛtvijo vyṛddhiḥ. ṛtvijo yasya somaṃ vamantīti vamanena saṃbandhaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9545: na yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. tasmād api paśyāmo yajamānasya vamane saumendram{*3/450*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9553: tatra sāmāmnāyate - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māv āsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*3/452*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsnaṃ haviḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9558: tadarthatvāt. puroḍāśa āgneyaḥ kartavya iti vacanam. tasmāt sarvaṃ pradātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9563: niṣkṛṣyāvadānaṃ niravadānam. tad dhi śrūyate - dvir haviṣo 'vadyatīti. aparam api vacanam - dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9570: na caitad asti - dvyavadānamātraṃ hotavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9575: kṛtsnaṃ ca hotavyam iti tad evaṃ nyāyyam, nānyathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9577: kṛtatvāt tu karmaṇaḥ sakṛtsyād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_3,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9578: ucyate - yadā dvir avakhaṇḍanaviṣiṣṭaṃ home śrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9579: tadā sakṛd [337]{*3/454*} avadānaṃ{*3/455*} yāvac chrutaṃ{*3/456*} tat sarvaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9580: tadā nāparaṃ dravyam astīti punar yāgo nāvartitavyaḥ. kathaṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9582: na dravyaṃ yāgena saṃbandhayitavyam iti. yadi hi yāgena haviḥ saṃbandhayitavyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9585: tatsaṃbandhārthaṃ punar yāga āvarteta. na tu yāgo dravyasaṃbandhārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9587: yāgaḥ kathaṃ nirvṛttim upeyād iti dravyam upādīyate. tena nirvṛtte yāge siddhe ca puruṣārthe{*3/457*} na niyogena guṇānurodhena pradhānāvṛttir yukteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9589: yenāvṛttir ta bhavet. yato yāgāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9590: bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. na ca yāgena dravyasyopakāro nirvartyate pratyakṣaḥ kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9591: tasmād dvyavadānaṃ hutvā śeṣayitavyam iti. yat tūktam - āgneyaṃ havir itivacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9594: iha tu pratyakṣo dvir avadāne. api cākṛtsnasaṃbandhe 'pi tad dhitasyopapattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9595: tato grahītavyam iti. sāmānyaṃ khalv āgneya iti dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti viśeṣaḥ. tasmāc cheṣayitavyaṃ kiṃcid iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9599: *{3/456: E1 gibt yāvac chrutaṃ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9603: śeṣād iḍām avadyati śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīty anuvādād asti śeṣa iti paśyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9608: aprayojakatvād ekasmāt kriyerañ cheṣasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_3,4.42 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9611: aiḍaprāśitrasauviṣṭakṛdādīni{*3/459*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ haviṣo haviṣaḥ kartavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9614: aprayojakāni śeṣakāryāṇi haviṣām. yadi śeṣakāryaiḥ prayuktāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9615: bhaveyuḥ sarvāṇi prayuktānīti sarvebhyaḥ kriyeran anyathārthāni tv etāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9616: nāvaśyaṃ śeṣakāryeṣu viniyoktavyāni. saṃnidhānāt tu yataḥ - kutaścid anuṣṭhātavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9622: sakṛc caivaṃjātīyakena śeṣakāryeṇa saṃskṛtaṃ pradhānam iti kṛtvā nāparasmād api kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9624: sarvebhyo vā kāraṇāviśeṣāt, saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt // MS_3,4.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9625: sarvebhyo vā havirbhyaḥ śeṣakāryāṇi kartavyāni. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9628: tat sarveṣām. sa hi śeṣaḥ pratipādayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9634: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyate - devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaha [339]{*3/460*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9635: so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai bhāgo me 'stv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9637: so 'bravīd uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti vīpsādarśanam. tasmāt sarvebhyaḥ śeṣakāryāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9643: kiṃ tadā yataḥ - kutaścid uta prathamād iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9645: na kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyata iti. tasmād aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9653: asati nimittavighāte naimittikaṃ kartavyam iti. tataḥ kṛteṣu dvitīyādīnāṃ nimittavidhāta ity akriyā. tasmān mukhyād eva kriyerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9659: idam agnīdha iti{*3/462*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayam [340]{*3/463*} ṛtvijāṃ vibhāgaḥ parikrayāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9663: na śrūyate - bhakṣitavyam iti. ya eva śrutasyotsarge doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9671: eṣā vai darśapūrṇamāsayor dakṣiṇeti dakṣiṇāsaṃstavāc ca parikrayārthaṃ manyāmahe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9674: bhakṣārtha eṣa vibhāgaḥ. kutaḥ? dānasyābhāvāt. katham abhāvaḥ? prabhavatā hi śakyaṃ dātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9677: devatāyā etad iti. na ca devatāyai saṃkalpitena śiṣṭāḥ sveneva vyavaharanti. tasmāc chiṣṭācāram anuvartamānenāśakyaṃ prabhavitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9682: tāvān aśrutaparikalpanāyām iti. ucyate - idaṃ brahmaṇa ityevamādibhir brahmādīnām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9684: tatra bhāgā brahmādīnām upakuryur brahmādayo vā bhāgānām. brahmādibhir bhāgānām upakurvadbhir na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9685_0: bāgais tu brahmādīnām upakārakaiḥ śakyate kenacit prakāreṇa dṛṣṭa upakāraḥ kartuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9685_1: bhakṣyamāṇaiḥ. tasmād bhakṣaṇāya vibhāga iti. kaḥ punar upakāra iti cet. tṛptānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9691: atha yad dakṣiṇāsaṃstava iti, vyādeśasāmānyāt tat, aparikrayārthe 'pi bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9700: tathānyāni prāśitrāvadānādīni śeṣakāryāṇi{*3/468*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ājyād upāṃśuyājadravyāt sviṣṭakṛd iḍam avadātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9704: sādhāraṇaprakaraṇasamāmnātāt sarveṣāṃ śeṣakāryāṇi. api ca sarvasaṃyogo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9705: tad yat{*3/469*} sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyatīti. tasmād ājyād api śeṣakāryāṇi kriyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9713: kāraṇaṃ śrūyate - devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9714: so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai bhāgo me 'stv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9716: so 'bravīd uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9717: tulyaṃ kāraṇam anyeṣām ājyasya cārthavāde saṃkīrtyate. tasmād apy ājyād avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9722: āditye carau prāyaṇīye śrūyate - agnaye sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatīti{*3/471*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9724: miśrasyānyena haviṣā samavadyatīti. yadi cājyād api sviṣṭakṛte 'vadīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9725: tataś codakena prāpaṇīya{*3/472*} ājyāvadāne kriyamāṇe [343]{*3/473*} samavadyatīty upapadyate. itarathā caror ekasmād avadyatīty abhaviṣyat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9731: ājye ca darśanāt sviṣṭakṛd arthavādasya // MS_3,5.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9732: dhrauve cājye sviṣṭakṛd arthavādo bhavati - avadāyāvadāya dhruvāṃ pratyabhidhārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9733: sviṣṭakṛte 'vadāya na dhruvāṃ pratyabhidhārayati. na hi tataḥ parāmāhutiṃ yakṣyan bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9734_0: pratyabhidhāraṇasyaitat prayojanaṃ darśayati - tataḥ patrāmāhutiṃ hoṣyatīti. sauviṣṭakṛte
GSP28msbh1-7u:9734_1: vṛtte{*3 /474*} tataḥ parāhutir nāstīti na pratyabhidhāryeta. sviṣṭakṛd arthe dhruvāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9738: aśeṣātvāt tu naivaṃ syāt sarvādānād aśeṣatā // MS_3,5.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9739: naivam, dhrauvājyāt sviṣṭakṛd iḍam avadātavyam iti. kasmāt? aśeṣatvāt. kuto nāsya śeṣaḥ? sarvādānāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9746: anyebhyaś ca prayojanebhyaḥ. yāvad ājyena yaṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9747: tat tad ājyaṃ prayojayati. yasya yasyājyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9749_0: tasmāt sādhāraṇaṃ dhrauvam ājyam. darśayati ca - sarvasmai vā etad yajñāya gṛhyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:9749_1: yad dhruvāyām ājyam iti{*3 /475*}. kim ato yady evam iti. yat sādhāraṇam upāṃśuyājāyāvattaṃ dhruvāyām ājyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9755: evaṃ pratipādayitavyam iti. yat tu prayojanavad upāttaṃ tan na pratipādayitavyam. tasmān na dhruvāyām upāṃśuyājasya{*3/477*} sauviṣṭakṛtaś ca{*3/478*} kaścic cheṣaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9756: yathā yatraikasyāmukhyāyāṃ bahūnām odanaḥ śṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9758: na tasya śiṣṭaṃ bhṛtyebhyaḥ pratipādanīyamukhāyām astīti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9759: prayojanavad dhi tat. evam upāṃśuyājājye 'pi draṣṭavyam{*3/479*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9760: āha - juhvāṃ tarhy ājyasya śeṣo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9762: yathā camaseṣu graheṣu ca somasya codanayeti. tatra pratyāha -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9770: avattatvāc ca juhvām, tasya ca homasaṃyogāt // MS_3,5.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9772: upāṃśuyājasya sādhāraṇatvād ity uktam. atha kasmān na juhvāṃ yac chiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9774: yathā homārthe camase śeṣa iti. ucyate - yaj juhvām avattam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9779: iti punar yad uktam, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9784: somasyāgner{*3/480*} vīhīty{*3/481*} anuvaṣaṭkarotīti{*3/482*} tatra codanā. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9798: atha yad uktam - tad yat{*3/486*} sarvebhyaḥ havirbhyaḥ samavadyatīti. ucyate - utpannaṃ śeṣam adhikṛtyaitad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9800: tasmād ya{*3/487*} iha śeṣās tebhyaḥ sarvebhya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9802: sarve brāhmaṇā bhuktavanta iti prakṛtāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabda evam atrāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9808: atha yad uktam - prāpaṇīye{*3/488*} kevale carau samavattaśabdo nāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9809: yadi na tatra codakenājyād api sviṣṭṛakṛd avadānam iti. ucyate - asaty apy ājyāc cheṣakārye samavattaśabdo jātiviśeṣāpekṣa upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9810: odanajātim ājyajātiṃ{*3/489*} cāpekṣya. anuvādo hi saḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9817: atha yad uktam - sviṣṭakṛd arthaṃ dhruvāyām abhidhāraṇaṃ darśayatīti. na tat sviṣṭakṛd artham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9818: śeṣābhāvād ity uktam. tasmād ayaṃ tasyārthaḥ. na hi tata āhutiṃ yakṣyan bhavatīti na rekṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9819: dhruvāto yady āhutir aparā hotavyā bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9820: na ca pratyabhidhāryeta. dhuvātaḥ kila{*3/490*} ricyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9829: sākaṃ prasthāyīye{*3/492*} sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ ca tadvat // MS_3,5.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9830: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - sākaṃ prasthāyīyena yajeteti{*3/493*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sviṣṭakṛd iḍam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9832: darśapūrṇamāsavikāro hi sākaṃ prasthāyīyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nāstīti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9834: evaṃ tatra śrūyate - ājyabhāgābhyāṃ pracaryāgneyena ca puroḍāśenāgnīdhre srucau pradāya saha kumbhībhir abhikrāmann āheti. tasmān na tataḥ śeṣakāryad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9843: tatra codakena sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ prāptam. athedānīṃ saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ nivartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9845: codakānugrahāya kartavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sautrāmaṇyāṃ ca graheṣu na{*3/495*} kartavyam iti caśabdenātidiśyate{*3/496*}. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9847: sarvādānād śeṣatā. tatrāpi hi grahair evaṃ hotuṃ pratiṣṭhante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9848: yat payograhāś ca suragrahāś ca gṛhyanta iti. grahasthaṃ khalv api tad dravyam abhigṛhītam abhyanukramam abhyāśrāvitaṃ devatāṃ prati. yathā - gṛhītān grahān ṛtvija ādadate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9852: homārtham [347]{*3/497*} aśeṣādānaṃ bhavati. homasaṃyogaś caiṣāṃ śruyate - uttare 'gnau payograhāj juhvati dakṣiṇe 'gnau suragrahāj juhvatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9864: pratiṣedho 'vakalpyate. vācanikatvāc ca sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9877: indrāya śāknarāyeti. tatra puroḍāśo bahūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ sādhāraṇaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pratikarma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9880: codanānugrahāt pratikarma, kartavyam, ekasminn api dravye bahutvāt karmaṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9884: avibhāgāc ca śeṣasya, sarvān praty aviśiṣṭatvāt // MS_3,5.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9886: avibhāgāc cheṣasya. na [348]{*3/500*} atra vibhāgaḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ puroḍāśasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9891: evam iḍāyām api. tasmāt sakṛd avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9895: aindravāyave tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,5.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9896: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. tatraindravāyave grahe saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sakṛd bhakṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9897: uta dvir iti. somasaṃskārārthatvāt sakṛd iti prāpte brūmaḥ - aindravāyave dvir bhakṣayitavyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9905: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti somān. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ{*3/501*} teṣāṃ śeṣo bhakṣayitavyaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10105: evaṃ hi śrūyate - vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa iti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10240: tatra ṛtuyāgeṣu śrūyate - yajamānasya yājyā so 'bhipreṣyati hotar etad yajeti svayaṃ yā niṣpadya yajatīti. yadā svayaṃ yajati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:10298: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - sa yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/546*} vaiṣyaṃ vā yājayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10300: nyagrodhastibhīr āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhany unmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchen na somam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ phalacamaso bhakṣavikāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10301: utejyāvikāra iti. kiṃ phalacamasaṃ bhakṣayed ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10311: *{3/547: E1 gibt kiṃ phalacamasaṃ bhakṣayed ity arthaḥ, uta phalacamasena yajeteti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10314: ijyāvikāro vā phalacamasaḥ phalacamasena yajetety arthaḥ{*3/548*}. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10318: phalacamasasyānyatrānupayogād anarthakam. atha bhakṣaṇaṃ pradhānam. tathā - na somam [363]{*3/549*} ity anuvādo nāvakalpate. yadi tv ijyāvikāro{*3/550*} bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10321: ijyāvikāro bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate - asti yajisaṃbandhaḥ. katham iti. yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/551*} vaiṣyaṃ vā yājayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10322: nyagrodhastibhīḥ saṃpiṣya tam asmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10323: yājayitum iti gamyate. bhakṣasaṃbandhe hi na pūrvam uttareṇa saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10324: yadi somaṃ bhakṣaṇena saṃskartum icchen nyagrodhastibhīḥ saṃskuryād iti. tasmān na bhakṣaṇasaṃbandhaḥ. yāgo hi prakṛto 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10327: nanu tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacched itivacanād bhakṣasādhanam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10330: bhakṣaśabdānantaryāt. ucyate - śrūyamāṇe saṃbandhe 'narthakam iti kṛtvā prakṛtasaṃabdha ity ucyate. kathaṃ tu bhakṣasaṃbandha iti. yad dhi{*3/552*} yāgadravyaṃ bhakṣayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10336: tasmād bhakṣavacanāt sutarāṃ tenejyata iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10338: tam asmai bhakṣaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10342: tato 'yaṃ bhakṣo bhavati. tasmāt tena yaṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10344: *{3/548: E1 gibt phalacamasena yajetety arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10352: athaitasya darbhataruṇakenopahatya juhotīti. ijyāvikāre sati darbhataruṇakeneti juhotau guṇavacanam avakalpate. tasmād apījyāvikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10360: athainaṃ camasam unnayantīti. ijyāvikāre saty unnayanadarśanaṃ yujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10364: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ - ijyāvikāra iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10369: ijyāvikāre sati somo na bhakṣyate. tasmāt paśyāmaḥ - ijyāvikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10373: tatra śrūyate - śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somān bhakṣayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10374: daśadaśaikaikacamasam anuprasarpantīti. atra rājanyacamase saṃdehaḥ - kim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10378: daśadaśaikaikaṃ camasam anuprasarpeyur ity anuprasarpatāṃ saṃkhyā vidhīyate. ekasyāṃ rājanyajātau daśasaṃkhyā vidhīyate. rājanyajātiḥ saiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10379: tena taṃ daśa rājanyā anuprasarpeyur evaṃ śataṃ brāhmaṇā rājanyāś ca. teṣu śataśabdo 'nuvādaḥ. anuvādasarūpaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10380: śataṃ bhakṣayantīti. tasmād rājanyā rājanyacamasam anuprasarpeyur iti. kecid āhuḥ - brāhmaṇarājanyānām ekasmiṃś camase bhakṣaṇaṃ [365]{*3/555*} virudhyata iti. na sa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10387: śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ bhakṣayantīti vidhiḥ śrutyā brāhmaṇagatām eva saṃkhyām āha. tasmāc chataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10388: teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇārtham anuprasarpatām ekaikasmiṃś camase daśadaśopadiśyante. tasmād brāhmaṇāśatasya daśa brāhmaṇā rājanyacamasam anuprasarpeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10394: anārabhya kiṃcid ucyate - yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavati sa chadasām eva rasenāvadyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10395: sarasā asyāhutayo bhavanti. yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīty{*3/557*}evamādi. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ khādiratā sruve,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10398: uta prakṛtau vikṛtau ceti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10400: aprakaraṇāt, na kasya-cid prakaraṇe śrūyante, tāni vākyena sarvatra bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10405: prakṛtau vā niviśerann anārabhyādhītāni pātrāṇi. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10406: adviruktatvāt, evam adviruktaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. dviruktāyāṃ ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10407: asaṃbhava iti brūmaḥ - yad dhi prakṛtau vikṛtau ca bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10408: asti tat prakṛtau. prakṛtau ced asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10410: tato nānārabhya vidhim ākāṅkṣati. tasmād anākāṅkṣitatvād anārabhyavidhir na tatra vidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10414_0: aprakaraṇāt prakṛtivikṛtyartham evety ucyate - yat tu coda[367]{*3 /558*}kena prāpnotīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:10414_1: anārabhyavidhinā prāpte na codakam ākāṅkṣati. tasmād anārabhyavidhivarjaṃ codakaḥ prāpayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10416: codakavākyenānumānikena vikṛtau. ānumānikāc ca pratyakṣaṃ balavat. tasmāt prakṛtivikṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10423: nirākāṅkṣe vaikṛte karmaṇi codako naiva prāpnoti. tatra prayājādīnāṃ darśanaṃ naivopapadyeta,
