GSP28msbh1-7u:10425: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*3/559*}. atha codako balīyān{*3/560*} tata etaddarśanam upapadyate. tasmāt prakṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10435: tan nopapadyate. na hy anārabhyavidhiś codanāṃ nirākāṅkṣīkaroti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10436: prāpte hi codake na sruve khādiratānārabhyavidhinā śakyā vidhātum. asati codake 'nārabhyavidhir api nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10440: yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatīti. na cātra sruvaḥ khādiratā cobhayaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10441: sruvasya sataḥ khādiratām eṣa śabda āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10442: sa ca codakena prāptaḥ. tasmād asti codakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10443: sa hy anārabhyavidhivākyasya pratyakṣatvāt taṃ varjayitvānyaṃ prāpayati. tasmāt prakṛtivikṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10446: *{3/561: E2: sarvārtham, E4: sarvārthe, E6: sarvārtha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10450: iti cet paśyasi - utpattir eṣāṃ prakṛtividhibhis tulyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10451_0: prakṛtāv aṅgāni saṃkṣepeṇa vistareṇa cocyante - pañca prayājān yacatīti saṃkṣepeṇa.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10451_1: samidho yajatīty{*3 /563*}evamādinā vistareṇa. ihāpi yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatītyevamādir vistāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10452: yasyaivaṃrūpāḥ sruva iti saṃkṣepaḥ. evaṃrūpaḥ prakṛtau vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10454: tasmāt prākṛta iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānam. tasmāt prakṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10459: naitad evam. na hy evaṃjātīyakaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ sādhakaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10461: na tu prakṛtāv etad bhavatīti pramāṇam asti. api ca vikṛtāv api saṃkṣepavistārābhyām{*3/564*} aṅgāni vidhīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10463: āmanam asyāmanasya devā iti{*3/566*} vistāraḥ{*3/567*}. ato vaikṛtair{*3/568*} apy anārabhyavidhayas tulyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10473: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na sarvārtho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ, prakṛtyarthaḥ sa iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10474: codanārthakārtsnyāt, kṛtsnaṃ codakaḥ prāpayati, nānārabhyavidhinā vaikṛtam apūvaṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10476: pātrāṇāṃ hi tad vākyena na yāgānām. yāgāś codanāliṅgasaṃyogāt prakṛtim apekṣante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10477: tayā sahaikavākyatāṃ yānti. prākṛtāś ca tāñ śaknavanti nirākāṅkṣīkartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10478: nānārabhya[369]{*3/569*}vidhayaḥ. tasmād avaśyaṃ codaka utpādayitavyaḥ. sa ced utpādyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10479: nārtho 'nārabhyavidhinā. na cāsau prakaraṇādīnām abhāvāt pravartamāno 'pi vaikṛtena yāgena saṃbadhyeta. tasmād vaikṛtena karmaṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10483: prākṛte vākyaśeṣe prāpte 'nārabhyavidhir na bhaviṣyati. tasmād anārabhyavidhiḥ prakṛtyartha iti{*3/572*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10490: prakaraṇaviśeṣāt tu vikṛtau virodhi syāt // MS_3,6.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10493: sāmidhenīnāṃ parimāṇam āmnātam - saptadaśa sāmidhenīr anubrūyād iti{*3/573*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim etat prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10495: pūrveṇa nyāyena prakṛtāv iti prāptam, prakṛtau ca pāñcadaśyam āmnātam, tena vikalpa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10496: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vikṛtāv evaṃjātīyako vidhiḥ syāt. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10497: prakṛteḥ pāñcadaśyena nirākāṅkṣatvāt. nanu vikalpo bhavaiṣyatīty uktam. prakaraṇaviśeṣāt pāñcadaśyena na vikalpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10498: viṣamaśāsanāt. vikṛtau tv ānumānikaṃ pāñcadaśyaṃ bādhitvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10499: anārabhyavidhivākyena pratyakṣeṇa sāptadaśyaṃ nivekṣyate. advi[370]{*3/574*}ruktaṃ caitat prayogavacanam upasaṃhariṣyati. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaṃ vikṛtyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10504: naimittakaṃ tu prakṛtau, tadvikāraḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt // MS_3,6.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10505: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10506: tathā - agnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate yūpaṃ prakṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10507: bailvo brahmavarcaskāmena kartavya iti{*3/575*}. evaṃjātīyakeṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prakṛtau niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10510: prakṛtīr anyena pātreṇa yūpena ca nirākāṅkṣāḥ. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakṛtau naimittikaṃ niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10517: tat parokṣaṃ lakṣaṇayā. yat tu viśeṣeṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10520: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣāt. tasmāt prakṛtāv eva syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10529: samāmnātam - brāhmaṇo vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti{*3/578*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim agnyādheyaṃ pavamāneṣṭyartham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10532: prakaraṇāt, tāsāṃ prakaraṇe śrūyate - atas tadartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10541: tatas tadartham agnyādheyam iṣṭīnām upakuryāt. niṣphalās tv iṣṭayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10542: tadartham agnyādheyam api niṣphalaṃ syāt. kathaṃ punar agnyarthatā pavamāneṣṭīnām?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10544: prayojanavattvāc cāgnīnām. bhāvayitavyā apīṣṭayo bhūtānām agnīnām arthena kriyeran. tasmād agnyādheyaṃ pavamāneṣṭyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10547: liṅgaṃ darśayati{*3/580*}, yathāgnyarthāḥ pavamāneṣṭaya iti. kiṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10548: jīryati vā eṣa āhitaḥ paśur yad agniḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10549: tad etāny evāgnyādheyasya havīṃṣi saṃvatsare nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10551: tenainaṃ{*3/581*} punar navaṃ karoti tan na sūkṣmam iti{*3/582*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10558: tad etad ādhānaṃ kiṃ prakṛtyartham, uta sarvakarmārtham iti saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10565: tadartham ādhānaṃ na prakṛtyartham. na prakṛtīḥ prakṛtya śrūyate. na [372]{*3/583*} ca śrutyādayo 'sya santi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10566: ye 'ṅgabhāvam upapādayanti. anyeṣv anārabhyavādeṣv anyato nirjñāte 'ṅgabhāve tato vicāraḥ - kiṃ prakṛter aṅgabhūtāni vikṛter iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10567: tasmāt teṣu yuktam. iha tv aṅgabhāve na kāraṇam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10570: sarvakarmārthā agnaya{*3/584*} iti sarvārtham ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10574: tadedaṃ kartavyam. tadā ca vasantaḥ. evaṃ yadā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10575: tadā kartavyam. tadā paurṇamāsy amāvāsyā vā. aprakṛtyarthaṃ tu na prakṛtiprayoge kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10576: tatra kālavacanaṃ yuktam. tasmān na prakṛtyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10581: tāsām agniḥ prakṛtitaḥ prayājavat syāt // MS_3,6.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10582: santi pavamāneṣṭavyaḥ - agnaye pavamānāyety{*3/585*}evamādyāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛte 'gnau pavamāneṣṭayaḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10584: tāsāṃ khalu pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛto 'gniḥ prakṛtitaḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10593: na veṣṭisaṃskāraḥ, agnīnāṃ pavamāneṣtiṣu syāt. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10595: tāḥ pavamāneṣṭayo 'gnisaṃskārārthā ity uktam. yac ca nāmāṅgabhūtaṃ tac codakena gṛhyate. agniprayuktaś ca pavamāneṣṭisaṃskāro na darśapūrṇamāsaprayuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10596: tena na codakenākṛṣyate. api ca pavamāneṣ-ṭaya iṣṭisaṃskāravarjitāṃ prakṛtim apekṣante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10603: paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/587*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:10604: tathā savanīyo 'nubandhyaś ca. santi ca paśudharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10606: yūpe niyojanaṃ saṃjñapanaṃ viśasanam ityevamādayaḥ. te kiṃ sarveṣām agnīṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10613: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - savanīyasyaite dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10615: yadi prakaraṇe viśeṣo na bhavet. bhavati tu prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10618: āgneyo hy agniṣṭomaḥ. aindrāgnaḥ paśur ukthya ālabhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10619: aindrāgnāni hy ukthyāni. aindro vṛṣṇiḥ ṣoḍaśiny ālabhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10620: aindro vai vṛṣṇir aindraḥ ṣoḍaśī. sārasvatī meṣy atirātra ālabhyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10621: vāg vai sarasvatī [374]{*3/590*} iti{*3/591*} prakṛtya paśudharmā āmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10622: tasmāt savanīyasya prakaraṇād bhavitum arhati // MS_3,6.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10633: kramāc cāgnīṣomīyasya. tasya hi krama aupavasathye 'hani samāmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10636: śvas tv ekeṣāṃ tatra prākśrutir guṇārthā // MS_3,6.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10637: ekeṣāṃ śākhināṃ śvaḥ savanīyānām āmnānam, tad apekṣyeyam eṣāṃ guṇārthā punaḥśrutiḥ. kaḥ punar guṇaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10638: yad arthaiṣā śrutiḥ. ucyate - paśūn saṃkīrtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10640: evam vaite{*3/593*} 'prajñāyamānā janam avadhunvata ity eṣām avijñāne doṣam abhidhāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10641: ebhiḥ kathaṃ savanāni paśumantītipraśnarūpakeṇa vapāpracāro guṇo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10647: kramād agnīṣomīyārthā eveti. kiṃ punas tac chva āmnānam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10648: āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ savanīyapaśum{*3/594*} upākarotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10660: prātaḥsavane vapāpracāre codite sati paśvālambho 'pi tatraiva prapnoti. tatra kālāniyame prāpte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10661: āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītveti kālamātraṃ vidhīyate. trivṛtā yūpaṃ [375]{*3/595*} parivīyopākarotīty{*3/596*} anuvādaḥ. itarathā hi{*3/597*} parivyāṇasya kālo vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10662: upākaraṇasya ca. tatrānekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmāt savanīyārthāḥ paśudharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10670: agnīṣomīyārthā evaite kramāt. āśvinakālaṃ hy āmnānaṃ vidhānārtham. guṇārtha etasmin vākyaṃ bhidyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10671: na vidhānārthe. na hi vapāpracāreṇotkṛṣṭasya kālavidhiḥ saṃbhavati. ekadeśo hi vapādravyaṃ tena saṃnipātino vapāsaṃskārāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10675_0: āha - arthena tarhy{*3 /598*} utkṛṣṭasya kālo vidhīyate. muṣṭinā pidhāya vapoddharaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:10675_1: āsīta ā vapāhomād iti śrūyate. pūrvedyur vapoddharaṇaṃ muṣṭinā pidhāya na śaknuyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10684: tṛṇamuṣṭinā parṇamuṣṭinā vā pidhāyiṣyate. nanv āsta ity upaveśane bhavati. nāvaśyam upaveśana eva{*3/600*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:10685: audāsīnye 'pi dṛśyate. tad yathā - gṛhyāṇi parigṛhyāste,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10687: vyāpāranivṛttau. ihāpi tṛṇamuṣṭinā parṇamuṣṭinā vā pidhāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10688: ā vapāhomād udāsiṣyate. tasmād āśvinakālam āmnānaṃ vidhānārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10697: sthānāt tu pūrvasya saṃskārasya tad arthatvāt // MS_3,6.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10698: nāsti savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇam ity evaṃ sati pūrveṇaiva hetunā sthānena pūrvasyāgnīṣomīyasya bhavitum arhati. saṃskāro 'yaṃ paśuyāgaprayuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10700: jyotiṣṭomaprayuktatve na viśeṣaḥ paśūnāṃ syāt. paśuyāgā api hi dharmān prayoktum apūrvatvāt samarthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10701: prakaraṇavantaś ca. tasmāt kramād agnīṣomīyadharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10704: itaś ca paśyāmo 'gnīṣomīyārtāḥ paśudharmā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10707_0: puroḍāśena mādhyaṃdine savana iti paśupuroḍāśaṃ darśayati. itarathā samānavidhāneṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:10707_1: sarveṣu paśuṣv agnīṣomayor devatayoḥ saṃskārārthaḥ san puroḍāśaḥ sāmarthyād agnīṣomīyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10716: arthavādaḥ sa ity uktam. tasmād devatāsaṃskārārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10719: na sādhāraṇye. tasmād agnīṣomīyārthāḥ paśudharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10722: *{3/602: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10726: dohayoḥ kālabhedād asaṃyuktaṃ śṛtaṃ syāt // MS_3,6.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10728: tathāsti prātardohaḥ. santi tu dohadharmāḥ śākhāharaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10733: dohayos tayor asaṃyuktaṃ dharmaiḥ śṛtaṃ bhavet. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10734: sāyaṃdohasya hi krama aupavasathye 'hani śākhāharaṇādīn samāmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10735: tasminn evāhani sāyaṃdohaḥ. tasmāt kramāt sāyaṃdohārthā dohadharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10742: na sāyaṃdohasya pūrvedyur āmnānam. kva tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10746: amāvāsyāyāṃ hy ubhayaṃ{*3/606*} sāṅgaṃ codyate. sa eṣa sāyaṃdoho 'rthāt pūrvedyur anuṣṭhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10748: yat pūrvedyur upakrāntam aparedyur abhinirvartate. tasmāt sāyaṃdohasya krama āmātā ity etad eva tāvan nāsti. ata ubhayārthā dohadharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10754: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - jyotiṣtomena svargakāmo yajeta [378]{*3/607*} iti{*3/608*}. tatraindravāyavādyā grahāḥ prātaḥsavane daśa āmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10755: tatra dharmā śrūyante - upopte 'nye grahāḥ sādyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10756: anupopte dhruvāḥ. daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ samārṣṭīti. santy apare mādhyaṃdine savane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10757: apare tṛtīyasavane grahāḥ. teṣu mādhyaṃdinīyeṣu tārtīyeṣu ca savaneṣu saṃdehaḥ{*3/609*} - kiṃ sarveṣu grahadharmāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10758: uta prātaḥsavane ye grahās teṣv iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10760: teṣāṃ hi krame{*3/610*} samāmnānāt{*3/611*} netareṣām. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - savanāntare prātaḥsavanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10761: mādhyaṃdine tṛtīyasavane ca grahāmnānaṃ tadvad eva bhavitum arhati. sarveṣāṃ hi tulyaṃ prakaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10763: vākyena grahamātrasya vidhīyante. kramāc ca vākyaprakaraṇe balīyasī. tasmāt sarvārthā grahadharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10772: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/612*}. tatra raśanā śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10775: prapiṣṭānāṃ{*3/613*} kartavyā ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ete dharmā agnīṣomīyaraśanāyāḥ savanīyaraśanāyāś ca sādhāraṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10778: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10781: evam āha - āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ paśum{*3/614*} upākarotīti [379]{*3/615*} savanīyaparivyāṇe raśanāṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10783: tata etad darśanam avakalpate. yady agnīṣomīyārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10784: tato 'prākṛtāt savanīyaparivyāṇān nivarteta. savanīye ca parivyāṇāntaraprākṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10786: sa vai āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvopaniṣkramya yūpaṃ parivyayatīti. tatra yadi na sādhāraṇī raśanā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10788: raśaṇāṃ tu darśayati. tasmāt sādhāraṇī raśanā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10789: tat sā-dhāraṇyāc ca taddharmā api sādhāraṇāḥ. tad etal liṅgād raśanāsādhāraṇyam. ko 'tra khalu nyāya iti. ucyate - prakaraṇād agnīṣomīyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10799: yathaupasadānuvākyākāṇḍe 'ṃśvadābhyau{*3/616*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasamāmnātā grahadharmāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10805: na sarveṣām. evam idam api dharmajātaṃ prakaraṇasthānām eva, na sarveṣām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10810: saṃyuktaṃ vā tadarthatvāc cheṣasya tannimittatvāt // MS_3,6.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10811: saṃyuktaṃ vā dharmaiḥ, evaṃjātīyakaṃ syāt, aprakaraṇastham api. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10812: yataḥ prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. nanv anyatra kriya[380]{*3/618*}māṇā jyotiṣṭomasya nopakuryuḥ. ucyate - upakariṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10815: tasya sarvasya bhavitum arhati. tasmād aṃśvadābhyayor api grahadharmāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10821: yad uktam - yathā maitrāvaruṇaṃ payasā śrīṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10824: prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vyavasthānam. iha tu viparītam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10826: viśiṣṭeṣu vākyam. iha tu sarveṣu graheṣu vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10827: viśiṣṭeṣu prakaraṇam. tasmād aprakaraṇasthasyāpi dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10834: akhaṇḍām akṛṣṇalām iṣṭakāṃ kuryād iti. tatha bhasmanā iṣṭakāḥ saṃyujyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aprakaraṇe samāmnātānām ime dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10839: ucyate - agnyaṅgam evaṃjātīyakaṃ tadvad eva syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10840: yadvad grahāḥ. prakaraṇād dhi vākyaṃ balavat. amūṣāṃ ceṣṭakānām agnyarthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10848: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - sa yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/623*} vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10850: nyagrodhastibhīr āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhany unmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchen na somam iti. jyotiṣṭome santi somadharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10851: mānam upāvaharaṇaṃ krayo 'bhiṣava ityevamādayaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ samānavidhānā ime dharmāḥ somasya phalacamasya ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10853: phalacamasasya tu tadvikāratvād iti. guṇakāmānāṃ pravṛttir vā prayojanam adhikaraṇacintāyāḥ{*3/624*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10856: ucyate - naimittikam evaṃjātīyakaṃ asamānavidhānaṃ{*3/625*} syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10857: atulyatvāt, atulyaḥ somena phalacamasaḥ, somo nityavad āmnātāḥ, phalacamaso naimittikaḥ. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10859: dharmā api nityavad āmnātāḥ na śakyā anityavat kartum. yadi sādhāraṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10860: tatrānārabhyo 'rtho vidhīyeta. api ca naimittikaḥ phalacamasaḥ sa somadharmān gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10861: tatra dharmāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ santo dviruktā ity ucyeran. tasmād asamānavidhānāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10864: *{3/624: E1 gibt guṇakāmānāṃ pravṛttir vā prayojanam adhikaraṇacintāyāḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10870: yathā vrīhiṣv apacaratsu nīvārāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ nīvārāḥ samānavidhānāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10876: vrīhīṇāṃ vihitāḥ, na nīvārāṇām. iyam atulyatā, vrīhīṇāṃ vihitāḥ, nīvārāṇām arthāpattyā bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10885: vrīhitvaṃ hi vrīhidharmāṇāṃ vrīhivyaktau nimittam. na ca vrīhitvasya sthāne nīvāratvaṃ bhavatīti śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10886: tasmān na prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. kathaṃ tarhi nīvāreṣu dharmā bhavantīti. ucyate -yā vrīhitvena paricchinnā vrīhivyaktayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10887: nīvāreṣu tāḥ santi. tāsām arthena te dharmāḥ kriyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10888: tāsāṃ ca vyaktīnām anyāsāṃ ca vrīhigatānāṃ tulya eṣa vidhiḥ. kā tulyatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10889: ubhaye 'pi vrīhitvalakṣitā iti. tasmāt samānavidhānā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10894: itaś ca na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10896: arthād dhi pratinidhiḥ kriyate. na cārthenaitad avagantuṃ śakyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10897: vrīhitvasya sthāne nīvāratvaṃ bhavatīti. tasmān na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛtivikārabhāvo bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10901: tatra kiṃ sāmānavidhyam uta na [383]{*3/628*} iti. yathā - yadi somaṃ na vindeta pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti{*3/629*}. asāmānavidhyam iti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10902: aśrutād dhy etad viparītam. evaṃ prāpta ucyate - niyamārthā guṇaśrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10904: some 'vidyamāne somasadṛśaṃ dravyaṃ prāptam. tatra susadṛśe dravye prāpta īṣatsadṛśaṃ niyamyate. anyasmin pratinidhātavye 'nyat pratinidhīyate śrutasya sthāne. na yāgadravyatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10914: atirātra iti. tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sarvasaṃsthaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā uktāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10919: yena jñāyetāgniṣṭomasaṃsthaṃ prakṛtyeti. tasmāt samānavidhānāḥ saṃsthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10924: tulya iva prakaraṇe vyapadeśo bhavati - yady agniṣṭomo juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10926: yady atirātra etad eva yajur japan havirdhānaṃ pratipadyeteti sarvāvasthasya viśeṣavacanād avagamyate. yadi api sāmānyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10927: tad api sarvāvasthasyaiveti. yadi hi na{*3/631*} samānaṃ vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10931: api ca śrūyate - āgneyam ajam agniṣṭoma ālabheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10933: aindraṃ vṛṣṇiṃ tṛtī-yaṃ ṣoḍaśinīti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca darśanaṃ sāmānavidhye ghaṭate. ukthye hi dve nimitte staḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10936_0: aindrāgnaś ceti tena dvitīyadarśanaṃ tatra yujyate. evaṃ ṣoḍaśiny atirātre ca. prakṛtivikārabhāve
GSP28msbh1-7u:10936_1: tu pratyakṣaśrutair aindrāgnādibhir atideśena prāpta āgneyo bādhyeta. tatra dvitīyādidarśanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10936_2: nopapadyeta. bhavati ca. tasmāt sarvāvasthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10938: *{3/631: E2 und 4 geben na in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10942: vikārās tu kāmasaṃyoge sa nityasya{*3/634*} samatvāt // MS_3,6.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10944: samānavidhānā iti. kiṃ tarhy ukthyādayaḥ saṃsthāvikārabhūtāḥ syuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10946: ukthyādīnāṃ kāmasaṃyogena śravaṇāt. paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10948: atirātreṇa prajākāmaṃ yājayed iti. kāmyo guṇaḥ śrūyamāṇo nityam arthaṃ vikṛtya niviśate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10953: tathā gṛhṇīyād ity arthaḥ. katham iti. tatrāvaśyam itikartavyatāpekṣitavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10958: sādhāraṇī veti. ucyate - yatra yatra guṇe kāmo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10959: tatra tatra kriyāyāṃ sādhyamānāyāṃ nānyathā. sā tatretikartavyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10961: sā sādhanasya vā sādhyasya veti saṃdihyamānā sādhyasya bhavitum arhati. nāsau sādhyasyābhavantī sādhanena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10963: anena sādhane{*3/637*} sādhakam upakuryād{*3/638*} iti. na cāsti sa prakāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10964: yenāsādhyamānāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tena sādhakaḥ kṛto bhavet. tasmāt sādhakasyāpītikartavyatāviśeṣam abhyupagacchatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10972: tadaiva dīkṣā. yadā tu jyotiṣṭome paśukāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10978: yadi sarvadā nokthyādīnām arthena. athokthyādīnām arthena na sarvadā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10979: ubhayaṃ viprati-ṣiddham. tasmān na sādhāraṇī. nityavad āmnānaṃ ca yady anityasya syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10981: tatra nityavad āmnānaṃ bādhyeta. tasmān nityasaṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10990: api vā dviruktatvāt prakṛter bhaviṣyantīti // MS_3,6.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10991: nanv agniṣṭomasaṃsthāpi kāmyā śrūyate. dve hi tatrāmnāte{*3/639*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:10994: tatra dvayor vākyayoḥ sāmarthyān nitya eva sakāmo bhaviṣyati. nityatāvidhāto [386]{*3/640*} nāstīty agniṣṭomasaṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā bhaviṣyantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11003: na darśanam. aindrāgna ukthye dvitīyo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11007: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāva iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11009: yady ukthyaḥ paridhimanakti na juhotīti homābhāvadarśanaṃ na syāt. prāpte nimitte vacanaprāmāṇyāt sāmānavidhye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11012: atha yad uktam - vyapadeśa iti. ekasyaivādhikṛtasya yathoktena nyāyenāyam anadhikṛtena guṇena vyapadeśaḥ. agniṣṭomagrahaṇaṃ cānuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11020: tathā vedir vedidharmāś ca. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ barhirādayo barhirādidharmāś ca pradhānasyotāṅgapradhānānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11021: prakaraṇaviśeṣād asaṃyuktaṃ pradhānasya, pradhānasya evaṃjātīyakā dharmāḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11032: sarveṣāṃ cāṅgapradhānānām ime dharmā upakurvanti. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11034: vedyāṃ havīṃṣy āsādayatīti havirmātraṃ vākyād gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11035: pradhānahavīṃṣi prakaraṇāt. vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11037: āha yadi prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhyate, loke 'pi barhiṣām ime dharmā uktā bhavanti. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11038: sarvatra dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ prāpnuvanti. ucyate - prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakā eveti gamyate. tasmāl laukikeṣu na kartavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11039: evaṃ ced aṅgāny api na darśapūrṇamāsaśabadakāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11040: tasmāt teṣv api na prāpnuvanti. ucyate - yady apy aṅgāni na darśapūrṇamāsa[388]{*3/642*}śabdakāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11042: eṣu kriyamāṇā dharmā darśapūrṇamāsayor upakariṣyanti. tasmād aṅgapradhāneṣu kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11049: tasya cāpi barhiṣāsti prayojanam. tad apy ārāc chiṣṭadharmavat syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11051: na tad vākyaṃ hi tadarthatvāt // MS_3,7.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11052: na tasya barhir etair dharmair dharmavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11053: vākyaṃ hy ekaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ saha dharmāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11061: evam āha - sa vai dhruvām evāgre 'bhidhārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11062: tato hi prathamāvājyabhāgau yakṣyan bhavatīty abhidhāraṇasyājyabhāgārthatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11065: jyotiṣṭome keśaśmaśruṇor vapanaṃ payovratāni tapaś cāmnātāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārthāny uta pradhānārthāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11068: [389]{*3/643*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - svāmiyuktam etat, tasmāt pradhānasya. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11072: puruṣaḥ pratigrahītā. nanv aparo 'py asti saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11074: puruṣo 'bhinirvartaka iti. phalena tu saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate. na hi yāgaṃ sa sādhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11075: yāgaḥ sattayā saṃbhantsyata iti. kim iti tarhi nirvartayataḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti. saṃskārāś ca saṃskurvantīty ucyante. yat tasya saṃskartavyasya prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11076: tatra sāmarthyaṃ janayantīti. phalaṃ ca grahītuṃ puruṣasya prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11077: na yāgam abhinirvartayitum. tasmād ye puruṣasaṃskārās te puruṣaṃ phalapratigrahaṇasamarthaṃ kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11080: kathaṃ tarhi yāgadharmās te bhavanti. ucyate - yāgasya svārthaṃ sādhayataḥ sāhāyye vartante. kaś ca tasya svārthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11081: yad asya kartā phalena saṃbadhyate. tasmāt svāmisaṃskārāḥ pradhānārthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11086: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - ṣaṭtriṃśatprakamā prācī caturviṃśatir agreṇa triṃśaj jaghaneneyati śakyāmaha iti{*3/644*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣā vedir aṅgapradhānārthā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11088: cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt pradhānārtheti. kā cikīrṣā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11090: tasyārthenaiṣā śrūyate - śakṣyāmahe 'syāṃ kartum iti pradhānaṃ ca tasya cikīrṣitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11093: kim arthaṃ kriyanta iti. ucyate - acikīrṣitāny apy aṅgāni kriyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11095: tathāpi tair acikīrṣitair anyāc cikīrṣyate. tasmāt tāni kriyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11102: *{3/646: E1 gibt sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11107: pañcahotrā amāv āsyām iti{*3/647*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārtham abhimarśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11108: uta pradhānārtham iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11111: paurṇamāsy amāvāsyeti ca. tasmāt pradhānasyābhimarśanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11116: tad yukte tu phalaśrutis tasmāt sarvacikīrṣā syāt // MS_3,7.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11117: sthitād uttaram{*3/649*}. yad uktam - pradhānaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ nāṅgāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11118: tasmāt pradhānasya vedir iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11121: tasmāt sāṅgaṃ cikīrṣitam. yady apy aṅgāni na cikī[391]{*3/650*}rṣitāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11122: tathāpi vedyāṃ kartavyāni. anyathā na sāṅgaṃ vedyāṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11124: *{3/649: E1 gibt sthitād uttaram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11131: guṇābhidhānāt, guṇo 'bhimarśanam ity abhidhānaṃ bhavati. katamat tadabhidhānam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11132: yat guṇo 'bhimarśanam iti brūte. paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām iti ca dvitīyāntaṃ paurṇamāsyartham abhimarśanaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11134: ato yatra yatra kriyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vopakaroti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11135: tatra tatra kartavyam. yad yat paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vābhisaṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11138: tatra tatra kriyamāṇaṃ tayor upakaroti. tasmāt pradhānahaviṣām aṅgahaviṣāṃ ca kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11141: jyotiṣṭome dīkṣāḥ śrūyate - tisro dīkṣā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11142: tathā dakṣiṇāḥ śrūyante - tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇā iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dīkṣādakṣiṇam aṅgapradhānārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11144: puruṣāṇām aṅgapradhānārthatvād dīkṣādakṣiṇasyāṅgapradhānārthateti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - dīkṣādakṣiṇaṃ pradhānasya. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11149: na hi vacanasya [392]{*3/651*} atibhāro nāma kvacit. tasmād dīkṣādakṣiṇaṃ vacanāt somasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11155: adhvaryo yat paśunāyākṣīratha kāsya dīkṣeti yat ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ juhoti sāsya dīkṣeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11156: asatyām api dīkṣāyāṃ vacanaṃ bhavati. tasmād aṅgānāṃ dīkṣādakṣiṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11159: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/652*}. tatra yūpaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - vajro vai yūpo yad antarvedi muniyāt tan nirdahet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11160: yad barhirvedy anavaruddhaḥ syād ardham antarvedi minoty ardhaṃ bahirvedy anavaruddho bhavati, na nirdahatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11161: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim antarvedīti yūpāṅgabhāvena vedir upadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11162: utārdham antarvedy ardhaṃ bahirvedīti deśalakṣaṇārtham ucyata iti. kathaṃ yūpāṅgabhāvena kathaṃ vā deśalakṣaṇeti. yadi yūpārdhasya vedyantarasya ca saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11164: tato yūpāṅgabhāvena. atha yasmin deśe mīyamānasyārdhaṃ vedyabhyantare 'rdhaṃ ca bahiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11171: tathā mīyamānasya [393]{*3/653*} ardhaṃ vedyabhyantare bhavati. evaṃ vediśrutir apy anugrahīṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11173: śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmād yūpāṅgabhāvena vedir nirdiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11179: deśāmātraṃ vā vediśabdena lakṣyate na vediyūpāṅgam{*3/654*}. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11181: ardham antarvedi minoty ardhaṃ bahirvedīty etenaikavākyatā yā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11185: tato na śāsitavyo bahirvedinirdeśo{*3/655*} bhavati. vedyāṃ yūpasyāṅgabhāvenopadiśyamānāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11186: ardhaṃ bahirvedīty etad uccāryamāṇaṃ na kasmiṃścid upakāre vartate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11187: atha bahirvedideśam api yūpāṅgabhāvenopadiśet. vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmād yūpāṅgabhāvena vedyā nirdeśe bahirvediśabdaḥ sarvathā na śāsitavyaḥ. yadi tu deśalakṣaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11188: tato viśiṣṭe deśe lakṣyamāṇe 'vaśyavaktavyo bahirvediśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11189: anucyamāne vedyabhyantare yasmin kasmiṃś ca pradeśe yūpa iti gamyate. atha punar bahirvediśabde śrūyamāṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11190: yatarasmin deśe mīyamānasyārdham antarvedy ardhaṃ bahirvedi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11191: sa deśo lakṣayitum iṣṭo bhavati. sa ca bahirvediśabdena vinā na śakyate lakṣayitum ity,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11197: svāmidhenīs tad anvāhur iti havirdhānayor vacanāt sāmidhenīnām // MS_3,7.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11198: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - uta yat sunvanti sāmidhenīs tad anvāhur [394]{*3/656*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11200: tat sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbandhayed ity arthaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sāmīdhenīnām aṅgabhāvena havirdhānaṃ codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11202: uta havirdhānenāmūṣām anūcyamānānāṃ deśo lakṣyata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11203: sāmidhenīnām aṅgatvena havirdhānaṃ codyate - yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11205: tena havirdhānasaṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyo 'nuvaktavyā iti vacanāt sāmidhenyaṅgabhāve sati havirdhānaśrutir anugrahīṣyate. itarathā deśaṃ lakṣayed iti. tasmāt sāmidhenyaṅgaṃ havirdhānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11209: deśamātraṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ hy arthakarma somasya // MS_3,7.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11212: pratyakṣaṃ hy arthakarma somasya tena kriyate. dakṣiṇe havirdhāne somam āsādayatīti{*3/657*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:11213_0: somāsādanārthaṃ tāvad etad upādeyam. sāmidhenyo 'py agnisamindhanārtham upādeyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11213_1: iha tv etāvac chrūyate - yasya havirdhānasya samīpe sunvanti tatsaṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11216: kiṃ havirdhānaṃ sāmidhenīnām iti. tad ucyate - sāmidhenyas tāvad dhavirdhānasya nopakurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11220: [395]{*3/660*} na cāvihitam aṅgaṃ bhavati. nāpy evaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11221: havirdhānamāsām anucyamānānām upādātavyaṃ saṃbandhayitum iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11225: yo viśeṣārtham anūdyeta. kena tarhi havirdhānasya saṃbandhaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11227: na tu sāmidhenīkarma pratyakṣaṃ havirdhānasya. bhavati tu deśasya sāmidhenīsaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11228: apareṇa vedim iti hotur deśo lakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11229: sa uttarasya dakṣiṇasya vā havirdhānasya samāsannaḥ. tatra yat{*3/663*} sunvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11230: tad anvāhur ity upapadyate vacanam. tasmād deśalakṣaṇārthaṃ havirdhānagrahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11233: tasya havirdhānasya sāmidhenīsaṃbandha iti. naivaṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11235: havirdhānasaṃbandho havirdhānaviśeṣasaṃbandhaś ca. tatra vākyaṃ bhidyate. tasmān naivam abhisaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11239: *{3/659: E2 und 4 geben sāmidhenyo 'gnisamindhanārtham upādeyā in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11246: samākhyānaṃ ca tadvad eva bhavati, yathāsmābhir nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ - somārthaṃ havirdhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11248: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāt tasmāt svayaṃ prayoge syāt // MS_3,7.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11249: iha karmāṇy udāharaṇam - agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11251: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim etāni karmāṇi svayam [396]{*3/664*} anuṣṭhātavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11254: uta śeṣam anya eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11256: yataḥ svayaṃ prayuñjānasya phalaṃ bhavati. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11259: svayaṃ prayuñjānasya phalaṃ bhavatīti. katamaḥ sa śabdaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11263: yāge kartā bhavan phalaṃ sādhayed iti. sāṅge ca kartā bhavan phalaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11268: utsarge tu pradhānatvāc cheṣakārī pradhānasya, tasmād anyaḥ svayaṃ vā syāt // MS_3,7.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11270: ya utsargaṃ karoti tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11272: tenānantāḥ sarvaṃ kurvanti. tasmād yaḥ parikrayaṃ karoti tena svayam eva sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmād utsargamātraṃ svayaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11275: anyo vā syāt parikrayāmnānād vipratiṣedhāt pratyagātmani // MS_3,7.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11277_0: parikrayasyāmnānatvāt. puruṣān atiprakāreṣu bahuṣu prāpteṣu parikrayo niyataḥ. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:11277_1: parikrayeṇānataiḥ sarve padārthāḥ kartavyā iti. vipratiṣeddhaś cātmani parikrayaḥ. yadi svayaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11280: adṛṣṭārtho vā pratijñāyeta. tasmād anyaiḥ parikrītaiḥ śeṣāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti. utsargaṃ tu svayaṃ kurvatā sarvaṃ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11286: tatra taiḥ parikrītaiḥ kartavyeṣv aniyamena kartṛparimāṇaṃ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11288: na kartṛparimāṇe viśeṣaḥ kaścid āmnāyate. arthena tatparimāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11294: api vā śrutibhedāt pratināmadheyaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,7.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11295: yāvanti kartṛnāmadheyāni karmāṇi śrūyante - tāvanto varītavyā bhidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11296: tāni ca{*3/667*} nāmadheyaśravaṇāni. tān puro 'dhvaryur vibhajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11299: unnetā camasān unnayatīti. tathā - prastotā prastauti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11308: tena te 'vaśyam etāni yathāśrutāni kartuṃ varītavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11309: etad vyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārtho na vidyate. yo 'pi vākyena nopadiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11310: sa samākhyayā gamyate. tasmād etāvato vṛṇīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11316: evaṃ cet pratijñāyate - etāvato vṛṇīteti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11318: sa sa tat tac chabdābhidheyo [398]{*3/669*} bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11319: eko 'pi bahūn padārthān kartuṃ bahubhir nāmadheyair ucyeta, tasmād aniyamaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11326: utpādyamāneṣu puruṣeṣu nāmadheyāni bhidyante - brāhmaṇaṃ{*3/670*} vṛṇīte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11329: adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta ityevamādi. tasmāt karmaṇi tair evaṃ nāmakaiḥ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11330: avaśyante varītavyāḥ. tasmād eṣāṃ varaṇe saṃkīrtanaṃ na vidhiḥ. prayojanasyābhāvan nānuvādaḥ. na vede tāvanto varītavyā iti brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11331: anarthakam eva syāt. śaknoti cedaṃ pratyāyayituṃ saṃkhyāviśeṣam. tasmād yaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣo eṣāṃ pratīyate tadartham etad vacanam. tasmāt ṣoḍaśa kartāro varītavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11332: somas{*3/671*} tāvat kartṛkaś ca syāt{*3/672*}. evaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11339: santi jyotiṣṭome camasādhvaryavaḥ - camasādhvaryūn vṛṇīteti. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣām anyatamāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11341: etāvatāṃ saṃkīrtanād eṣām evānyatamāḥ. iti{*3/673*} prāpte brūmaḥ - camasādhvaryavaś cāpare bhaveyus tebhyo 'nya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11343: taiḥ parigaṇitair eṣāṃ vyapadeśo bhavati - madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11345: nanu ya eva prakṛtās te camasādhvaryavo bhaveyuḥ. neti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11348: ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhe sati bhavati. ṛtvigbhis te vyapadiśyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11350: yajamānapuruṣebhyaś caite 'nya iti naḥ pratijñātam. na yajamānena camasādhvaryavaṃ{*3/675*} kartuṃ varītavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11351: ṛtvigbhis te varītavyā iti. api caiṣām utpattivākya eva bhedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11354: *{3/673: E2: saṃkīrtanād eṣām evam anyatamā iti, E4: saṃkīrtanādeśām evānyatamā iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11359: teṣv va saṃdehaḥ - kim aniyamaḥ, eko dvau bahavo vā, uta bahava eveti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11360: aniyama iti prāpta ucyate - bahava iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11361: utpattau bahuśruteḥ, camasādhvaryava ity eṣām utpattau bahuśrutir bhavati, tasmād bahava iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11365: te ca bahava ity uktam. kiyanto bahava iti saṃdehe trayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11366: bahuvacanasāmarthyād iti prāpte brūmaḥ - daśatvaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. te daśa bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11367: tathā hi liṅgaṃ jyotiṣṭomavikāre daśapeye śrūyate - daśa camasādhvaryavo daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasam anusarpantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11368: etasmāt kāraṇād daśapeyo bhavatīti bruvan daśa camasādhvaryūn darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11370: etaddarśanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmāt trīn atītyaiṣā saṃkhyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11371: yadi ca daśa na bhaveyur nopapadyetaitaddarśanam. tasmād [400]{*3/677*} bhavanti daśa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11372: daśa caiṣāṃ svāminaḥ. tasmāt prayojanabhāvād daśasaṃkhyopādīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11380: asti śamitā - śamitāram upanayīteti. sa kiṃ saṃkīrtitānām anyatamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11384: iti prāpte ucyate - śamitā ca śabdabhedāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11387: tasmād evaṃsaṃjñaka utpādayitavyaḥ. asya saṃkīrtanāt saṃkhyāv vṛddhir gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11388: tasmād anyaḥ śamitā syāt. api ca - klomā cordhaṃ{*3/678*} vaikartanaṃ ca śamituḥ tad brāhmaṇāya dadyād yadbrāhmaṇaḥ syād ity{*3/679*} abrāhmaṇāśaṅkā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11398: tatraikasya karmabhedād ity evam apy avakalpate. yat tūktam - abrāhmaṇāśaṅkā bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11400: yady abrāhmaṇo yajamānaḥ syād iti. nanu yady abrāhmaṇaḥ syād iti prakṛtaḥ śamitā saṃbadhyate. ucyate - śamayatīti śamitā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11401_0: yaugika eṣa śabdaḥ prakṛteṣv apy avakalpate. śāmitram apy ādhvaryave samāmnānād adhvaryuṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11401_1: kartavyam. [401] tasmāc chamanād adhvaryuḥ śamitā. evaṃ sati aprakṛto yajamānaḥ saṃbandhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11405: te śabdabhedāt saṃkhyāvivṛddhiṃ pratyāyayantīty adhvaryvādibhyo 'nya iti prāpte brūmaḥ - teṣām eva kecit syur iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11407: yaugikakatvāc ca śabdasya. liṅgam idaṃ bhavati - nādhvaryur upagāyed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11408: yady ebhyo 'nye bhaveyur nādhvaryuṃ pratiṣedhet. aprāptatvāt. yatas tu pratiṣedhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11413: asti somavikrayī, tatra saṃdehaḥ - sa kim adhvaryvādīnām anyatamaḥ, utaibhyo 'nya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11415: teṣām anyatama iti prāpte brūmaḥ - vikrayī tv anyaḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11418: jyotiṣṭomasya ca padārthān kartum adhvaryvādaya utpādyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11419: na tu vikrayo jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyate. tasmān nādhvaryvādīnām anyatama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11425: ya ete puruṣā jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyante, te kiṃ sarva eta ṛtvijaḥ, uta kecid eṣām iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11429: tasmāt sarva ṛtau yajanti. ye cartau yajanti ta ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11433: nanu parisaṃkhyā śrūyate - saumyasyādhvarasya yajñakratoḥ saptadaśa ṛtvija iti. ucyate - parisaṃkhyāyāṃ bahavo doṣāḥ santīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11446: nanu parisaṃkhyāyāṃ svārthahānaṃ parārthakalpanā prāptabādhaś ca. ucyate - svārthahānam adoṣaḥ prāptatvāt. parārthakalpanā ca pratyayāt. katham{*3/681*}?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11447: bahūnām ṛtviktve jñāte punaḥ saptadaśa ṛtvija ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11449: adhikaiś ca na prakāśyate. tatra vijñāyata etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11450: ṛtvikśabdasya puruṣaiḥ saṃbandhe punaḥ prakāśyamāne saptadaśabhyo 'bhyadhikā varjitā iti gamyate. tatra kiṃ saptadaśabhiḥ saṃbandho [403]{*3/682*} vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11452: saptadaśasaṃbandhasyāprayojakatvād adhikānāṃ varjanaṃ vivakṣitam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11453: āha - nanu pratiṣidhyamāneṣv apy adhikeṣu pratiṣedho na prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11454: na hi ta ṛtau na yajanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11455: na vartau yajanto na ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ. ucyate - satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11458: kiṃ tu pratiṣedhasāmarthyād dhy ṛtvikkārye na bhavanti. kiṃ punar ṛtvikkāryam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11459: ṛtvija upavasantīti{*3/684*}, ṛtvijo vṛṇīte, ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11461: kathaṃ tat keṣāṃcid ṛtvikśabdakānāṃ na syāt. ucyate - evaṃ tarhi dvividho 'yam ṛtvikśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11466: āha - nanv itaretarāśrayam evaṃ bhavati - ya ṛtvijas te varītavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11467: ye vriyante ta ṛtvija iti tad itaretarāśrayam. ucyate - na hy ṛtvijo vṛṇīta ity ayam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11468: ṛtvijaḥ santo varītavyā iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11471: adhvaryaṃ vṛṇīta ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ. dṛṣṭārthatā ca varaṇasya bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11472: katham ātmecchayādhvaryur bhavatīti cet kaścid brūyāt, bhavatīti brūyām. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11476: kartavyo bhavati. yathā - juhvā juhotīty avidyamānā juhūḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11477: evam etad api draṣṭavyam. tatrārthād aniyamenartvikśabdasaṃbandhe kartavye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11478: evaṃ varaṇaviśeṣeṇa kṛtavya iti niyamyate. tasmān netaretarāśrayam. tasmāt saptadaśaiva ṛtvijaḥ[404]{*3/685*} kartavyā iti parisaṃkhyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11488: evaṃ cen manyase - yathoktapakṣeṇaitad evam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11489: avayutyavādapakṣeṇa saptadaśa ṛtvija iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11494: yān adhikṛtyāvayutyavādo bhaviṣyati. yatra parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11498: iha parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate. tasmān nāvayutyavāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11501: saptadaśa ṛtvija iti samadhigatam. katame te saptadaśa itīdaṃ cintyate. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11502: ajñānam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - niyamas tu dakṣiṇābhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11504: dakṣiṇāsaṃbandhena niyamyeran. evaṃ hy āmnāyate - ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11505: evam abhidhāya dakṣiṇādānakramapare vākye brahmādayaḥ śrūyante - agnīdhe 'gre dadātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11507: tato 'muṣmai cāmuṣmai ceti{*3/686*} kecid eva viśiṣṭāḥ śrūyante - evaṃ ye śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11509: tato 'bhyadhikā nānye bhavitum arhanti. dakṣiṇābhir niyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11515: uktvā ca yajamānatvaṃ teṣāṃ dīkṣāvidhānāt // MS_3,7.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11516: ya ṛtvijas te yajamānā ity evam abhidhāya brahmādīnāṃ dīkṣākramapare ca vākye dīkṣāṃ darśayati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11519: tato hotāram. tatas taṃ pratiprasthātā dīkṣayitvārdhino dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11522: maitrāvaruṇaṃ hotuḥ. tatas taṃ neṣṭā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11525: acchāvākaṃ hotuḥ. tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā pādino dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11528: grāvastutaṃ hotuḥ. tatas tam anyo brāhmaṇo dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11529: brahmacārī vācāryapreṣita iti. dīkṣā ca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ. tasmād brahmādaya ṛtvijaḥ saptadaśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11535: te ca brahmādayaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣāṃ sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ, uta gṛhapatiḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11541: tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa ṛtvig iti. api ca - tasya camasam āmananti varaṇaṃ ca. ṛtvigvarītavyo na svāmī. tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa iti prāpte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11550: tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa iti. ucyate - brahmāṇam eva te samāmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11551: varaṇam api camasaś ca brahmaṇa eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11557: te svārthāḥ prayuktatvād agnayaś ca svakālatvāt // MS_3,7.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11558: svāmisaptadaśā jyotiṣṭomasyartvijaḥ samadhigatāḥ. atredānīm ayaṃ saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sarvaṃ puruṣakāryaṃ taiḥ kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11560: uta kācid vyavastheti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11567: svakālatvād agnayaś ca sarvārthā iti, samadhigatam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11572: tatsaṃyogāt karmaṇo vyavasthā syāt, saṃyogasyārthavattvāt // MS_3,7.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11577: evaṃ teṣāṃ puruṣasaṃyogo 'rthavān bhaviṣyati. ādhvaryavam adhvaryuṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11583: sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ samākhyātapuruṣaiḥ kartavyam iti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11584: tasyopadeśād viśeṣasamākhyānāc ca nirdeśaḥ. yathopadeśaḥ - tasmān maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cāheti{*3/691*}. samākhyā - potrīyā neṣṭrīyeti. eṣa samākhyāyāś cāpavāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11589_0: yatra hetuḥ prātaranuvākam anubruvata upaśṛṇuyād iti hotre{*3 /692*} prātaranuvāke
GSP28msbh1-7u:11589_1: samākhyayā prāptaṃ hotāraṃ darśayati. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati - udgītha udgātṝṇām
GSP28msbh1-7u:11590: samākhyākṛtaṃ bhedaṃ darśayati. tathedam api liṅgaṃ bhavati - yo vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ veda svavāneva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11591: etad vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ yad āśrāvayatīti{*3/696*} samākhyākṛtaṃ niyamaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11600_0: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3 /697*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11600_1: tatredaṃ samāmananti - tasmān maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cāheti. tatra saṃśayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11600_2: - kiṃ sarvānuvacaneṣu sarvapraiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11601: uta yatrānuvacane praiṣa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11603: aviśeṣāt. na hi kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyate - asminn anuvacane maitrāvaruṇo 'smin neti. tasmāt sarvānuvacaneṣu sarvapraiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11614: tatra sa bhavet. tathā hi samuccitayos taṃ samāmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11622: itaś ca paśyāmo na sarvānuvacaneṣu maitrāvaruṇa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11625: tadādhvayur gṛhṇīyād iti. tasmān na sarvānuvacaneṣu maitrāvaruṇa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11628: santi camasādhvaryavas teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ camasādhvaryavaś camasāñ juhuyur utādhvaryur iti. camasādhvaryava iti brūmaḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11629: camaseṣv ādhvaryavaṃ te kurvantīti camasādhvaryavaḥ, tasmāt te juhuyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11633: esa hi nyāyaḥ - yad ārdhvaryavapadārtham adhvaryuḥ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11635: tasmād adhvaryur juhuyāt. nanu camasādhvaryava iti viśeṣasamākhyānāc camasādhvaryavo hoṣyantīti. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11636: camaseṣv ete 'dhvaryuvad bhavantīti camasādhvaryavaḥ. yadi tair adhvaryur juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11637: tatas taiś camasādhvaryubhir api hotavyam. yadi camasādhvaryavo juhvati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11638: nādhvaryuḥ. tadā te na tadvat syuś camasādhvaryavaḥ. tasmān na juhuyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11644: anyo hutvā{*3/700*} camasādhvaryave prayacchatīti gamyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11646: bhakṣayitum iti gamyate. tasmād dhutasya camasādhvaryave pradānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11648: sa prayacchati. tasmād anyo juhotīti. api ca - yo vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ veda svavāneva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11649: srugvādhvaryoḥ svaṃ vāyavyam asya svaṃ camaso 'sya svam iti. na tāvad asya camasaḥ svam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11650: yajamānasya hi saḥ. camaso 'sya svam iti bruvan,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11664: vedopadeśāt pūrvavad vedānyatve yathopadeśaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,7.50 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11666: ādhvaryave vājapeyaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ śyena udgātṛbhir eva padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11673: ādhvaryavam iti samākhyānāt padārthān adhvaryuḥ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11676: tasya padārthās tenaiva kartavyāḥ. sāṅgaḥ sa tatropadiśyate. tasmāc chyena udgātṛbhir vājapeye cādhvaryubhiḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11679: *{3/702: E1 gibt samākhyānād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11682: tadgrahaṇād vā svadharmaḥ syād adhikārasāmarthyāt sahāṅgair avyaktaḥ śeṣe // MS_3,7.51 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11685: vā svadharmaḥ svair dharmaiś codakaprāptaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ{*3/705*} syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11687: tāni cāṅgāni jyotiṣṭome santy apekṣyante. tatra jyotiṣṭome nānarvijas tair asya sahaikavākyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11691: laukikī tu sā. tatrānumāya vaidikaṃ śabdaṃ tenaikavākyatā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11692: codake punar viprakṛṣṭādhītayā pratyakṣayetikartavyatayā sahaikavākyatā. tasmāc codako balavattaraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11693: yat tūktam - samākhyānād iti. tatrocyate - avyaktaḥ śeṣe samākhyāto bhaviṣyati. yaḥ padārtho na codakena prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11694: tatra samākhyayā niyamo bhaviṣyati. yathā śyene kaṇṭakair vitudantīty udgātāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:11699: *{3/705: E1 gibt codakaprāptaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ in Klammer,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11709: darśapūrṇamāsayor anvāhāryam{*3/709*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim adhvaryuṇā parikretavyā ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11711: samākhyānād adhvaryuṇeti prāpte brūmaḥ - svāmikarma parikrayaḥ. svayaṃ karotīti gamyate. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11715: tena svayaṃ kartavyam. sa yadi parikrīṇīte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11716: tataḥ svayaṃ sarvaṃ karotīti gamyate. atha na parikrīṇīte na sarvaṃ kuryāt. tasmāt svāmī parikrīṇīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11723: nety ucyate - vacanād itareṣāṃ syāt. yatra vacanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11724: tatra vacanaprāmāṇyād bhavati parikrayaḥ. ya etām iṣṭakām upadadhyāt sa trīn varān dadyād iti{*3/711*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11730: saṃskārās tu puruṣasāmarthye yathāvedaṃ karmavad vyavatiṣṭheran // MS_3,8.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11734: snātīti{*3/713*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim evaṃjātīyakā adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11737: saṃskārā yathāvedaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran samākhyānāt puruṣeṇa karmavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11738: yathā - anye padārthā yasmin veda āmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11747: tasmāt puruṣasya karmakaraṇasāmarthyam upajanayanti. na ca kaścid yena karmakaraṇena sāmarthyam upajanyate{*3/714*} tad arthaṃ puruṣān krīṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11752: yathā - pradhānakarmaṇi puruṣārthāni yajamānasya bhavanti, evam etad apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11754: *{3/714: E1 gibt yena karmakaraṇena sāmarthyam upajanyate in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11758: śareṣīkayānaktīti ca. anyo yajamānasyāñjanam abhyañjanaṃ karotīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11767: tatra samākhyayā niyamaḥ. kalpyo hi saṃbandho vapanādibhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11770: kḷpta ārād upakārakaiḥ. na ca kḷpta upapadyamāne kalpyaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum. tasmān na puruṣaprādhānye samākhyā niyāmikā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11775: codanety apūrvaṃ brūmaḥ - apūrvaṃ prati saṃskārā vidhīyante. te hy asaṃbhavād dravyeṣu kalpyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11782: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*3/716*}. atha kasmān na samānavidhānā bhavanti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11783: aviśeṣavidhānād dhi puruṣamātrasya prāpnuvanti. tad ucyate - naitat samānaṃ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ vidhānam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11784: atulyatvāt, atulyā eta etadvidhānaṃ prati. kātulyatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11785: yat, yajamānasya vihitā nartvijām. kathaṃ yajamānasya vihitā ity agamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11787: nanv aviśeṣād ṛtvijām api vihitāḥ. prayojanābhāvād avihitā iti paśyāmaḥ. kathaṃ prayojanābhāvaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11788: ṛtvigbhiḥ kriyamāṇā na yajamānena kṛtā na kāritāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11789: atadarthatvāt parikrayasya. svayaṃkṛtāś ca nārthina upakurvanti. tasmād apryojanāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11791: etad atulyatvam. tasmān na samānavidhānā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11794: *{3/716: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11799: try ahaṃ nāśnātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijaṃ tapaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11801: samākhyānād ārtvijaṃ tapa iti prāptam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yājamānaṃ tapa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11803: phalasiddhyarthaṃ tapaḥ. tapaḥsiddhasya yāgaphalaṃ siddhyati. katham etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11806: adharmo yāgaphalasya pratibandhako bhavati. aśreyaskaro hi saḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11807: tasmin sati na śreyo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11809: phalabhogena ca virudhyete dharmādharmau. tasmād duḥkhaphalabhogāya dharmaḥ{*3/718*} śrūyate. yat tena duḥkham utpādyaitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11810: idaṃ tad iti. evaṃ dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11812: tena phalopabhogena kṣīṇo 'dharme 'pratibaddho yāgaḥ phalaṃ dāsyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11813: phalasiddhiś ca yajamānasya kartavyā nartvijām. tasmād yājamānaṃ tapa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11818: etam evārthaṃ vākyaśeṣo 'pi dyotayati - yadā vai puruṣe na kiṃcin āntarbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11821: tadā medhārha iti. medhaś ca yajñaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11823: tyāgaṃ kartum arhas tapasā kriyata iti vākyaśeṣo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11824: tyāgī ca yajamānaḥ. tasmād yājamānaṃ tapa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11839: guṇatvāc ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt // MS_3,8.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11840: atha yad uktam - samākhyānād artvijaṃ tapa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11844_0: evaṃ vā śyene śrūyate - lohitoṣṇīṣā lohitavasanā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. tathā vājapeye
GSP28msbh1-7u:11844_1: śrūyate - hiraṇyamālina ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ śyena udgātṛbhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:11846: utobhayam api sarvartvijām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11847: samākhyānāt śyena udgātṛbhir vājapeye 'dhvaryubhir iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇatvāc ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11850: ato lohitam uṣṇīṣaṃ hiraṇyamālā ca puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11853: yady evam, puruṣāṇāṃ pradhānabhāve samākhyā na niyāmikety etad uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11854: api ca - guṇatvaśravaṇāt sarvapuruṣāṇām etad vidhānam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11855: pradhānasaṃnidhau hi guṇaḥ śiṣyamānaḥ pratipradhānam upadiṣṭo bhavati. tatra vacanena prāptaṃ kathaṃ samākhyayā vidyamānayāpi niyantuṃ śakyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11856: tasmād ubhayatra sarvartvigbhir evaṃjātīyako dharmaḥ kriyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11862: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti - yadi kāmayeta varṣet parjanya iti nīcaiḥ sado minuyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11864: yadi kāmayetādhvaryur iti, uta yajamāna iti, evaṃ saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11868: minuyād iti. tasmād ārtvijaḥ kāma iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tathā kāmaḥ syāt, yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11869: tapaḥ, yājamānaḥ kāma ity arthaḥ{*3/723*}. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11872: yajamānaḥ phalena saṃbadhyata iti gamyate. upagrahaviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11873: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetety upagrahaviśeṣāś ca minuyād ity adhvaryuḥ parārtham iti gamyate. atha yad uktam - prakṛtenārthinā sahaikavākyatvād iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11877: *{3/723: E1 gibt yājamānaḥ kāma ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11883: yathā - udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11886: yajamānagrahaṇaṃ vāśabdaś ca na samarthitau syātām. tasmād yajamānavyapadeśād ātmānam evodgātā pratinirdiśatīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11894: varcodā agne 'si varco me dehīti{*3/727*}. eṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijā uta yājamānā iti. samākhyānād ārtvijā iti prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11895: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - mantrāś caite tadvad bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11897: evam ātmābhidhāyipadaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati. āyur me varco ma iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11899: agne tvaṃ karmaphalaṃ me sādhayeti. tad iha karmaphalam utsāhārthaṃ saṃkīrtyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11906: yad utsāhaṃ janayaty avaiguṇyāya. ṛtvig api siddhe yad utsahate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11908: yajamāne cātmābhidhāyipadaṃ kalpyamānam agauṇaṃ bhavati, tasmād yājamānāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11915: iha eva san tatra santaṃ tvāgna iti. na ca proṣito 'gnibhya ṛtvig bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11916: karma kurvata eṣa vācakaḥ śabdaḥ. bhavati tu yajamāno 'gnibhyaḥ proṣito 'pi yajamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11918: śakyate ca videśasthenāpi tyāgaḥ kartum. sa eva proṣitasyopasthānaviśeṣaṃ bruvan yajamānasyopasthānaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11926: tatra dvy āmnātā mantrā ādhvaryave kāṇḍe yājamāne ca. ājyaṃ yair gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11927: pañcānāṃ tvā vātānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīty{*3/729*}evamādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11929: srucau vyūhati vājasya mā prasaveneti{*3/730*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ta ubhābhyām api kartavyā utādhvaryuṇaiveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11930: samākhyānād ādhvaryavā iti. iti prāpta ucyate{*3/731*} - ubhāv api tān prayuñjīyātām iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11932: dvābhyāṃ samākhyānād dvāv api kartārau gamyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11933: tasmād dvau brūyātām. adhvaryur etena prakāśitam anuṣṭhāsyāmīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11940: jñāte ca vācanaṃ na hy avidvān vihito 'sti // MS_3,8.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11941: vājapeye śrūyate - kḷptīr yajamānaṃ vācayaty ujjisatīr{*3/732*} yajamānaṃ vācayatīti{*3/733*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jñaś cājñaś ca sarvo vācayitavya uta jña eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11943: iti{*3/734*} prāpte brūmaḥ - jña eveti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11945: yo hy avidvān nāsāv adhikṛtaḥ sāmarthyābhāvāt. nanu prayogakāle śikṣitvā prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11946: sāmarthyād [420]{*3/735*} adhikriyeteti. neti brūmaḥ - vedādhyayanād uttarakāle prayogaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11948: anārabhyakarmaṇi vede{*3/736*} śrūyate - tasmāt svādhyayo 'dhyetavya iti. saty etasmin vacane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11949: agnihotraṃ juhuyād ityevamādibhir vedo 'dhyetavya ity etad uktaṃ bhavatīti na śakyate kalpayitum. tatra homamātre codite vedādhyāyī śakta ity adhikriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11950: nāvidvān. kiyatā punar viditena vidvān adhikriyata iti. yāvatā viditena śakto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11951: yathoktaṃ kratum abhinirvartayitum. tasmāt{*3/737*} tāvad yo veda sa tena kratunādhikriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11952: nanu vedam adhīyīteti vacanāt kṛtsno vedo 'dhyetavya iti bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11953: na vedāvayavenādhīkriyata iti. ucyate - kratūnāṃ jñānārthaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ kāryam. tatrānyasmin kratau kartavye 'nyakratujñānaṃ na dṛṣṭāya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11957: pṛthak pṛthag iti kṛtsnasya vedasyādhyayanaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11959: kathama asau vācyeta. tasmāt sādhv abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11969: yājamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,8.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11986: tāni{*3/741*} dvādaśa{*3/742*} dvāndvāni darśapūrṇamāsayor iti{*3/743*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kim etāny adhvaryoḥ karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11988: yajamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānaṃ syuḥ. viśeṣasamākhyānād yājamānānīti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11998: adhvaryur vā tadartho hi nyāyapūrvaṃ samākhyānam // MS_3,8.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12000: tad artho hy adhvaryuḥ parikrīta iti samākhyānād avagamyate. adhvaryava eva sarva ime padārthāḥ samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12002: dvandvatā ca samabhyāśakriyā{*3/744*}. tatrādhvaryuḥ padārthān kariṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12003: yajamānenāpi samabhyāśīkaraṇam{*3/745*} ity etad aśakyam. tatrāṅgaguṇavirodhe ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12004: tādarthyād iti dvandvatāguṇo bādhitavyaḥ. tasmād ādhvaryavā ete padārthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12009: idaṃ cedaṃ ca saṃpādayeti yajamāno brūyāt. keṣucic cātra padārtheṣu yajamānasyānumantaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12011: apūrvaṃ tv apakṛṣyeta. tad uktam - yathā potrīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12013: evam atrāpīti. tad ucyate - yuktaṃ tatra viśeṣa[422]{*3/746*}samākhyānāt. iha tu dvandvatā yājamānīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12014: padārthās tv ādhvaryavā eva. tasmād adoṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12020: vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ, samavāyaviśeṣād itaram anyas teṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,8.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12024: aparo hotur yuvā suvāsā iti{*3/748*} kriyamāṇānuvādī. tayoś codakaparamparayā kuṇḍapāyinām ayanaṃ prāptayor bhavati saṃdehaḥ - kaḥ punar asau?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12025: tatra ṛtviksamāsa āmnātaḥ - yo hotā so 'dhvaryur iti, kiṃ karaṇam ādhvaryavaṃ hotā kuryāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12026: kiṃ hautraṃ kriyamāṇānuvādinam iti. kiṃ prāptam? aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12027: iti prāpta uccyate - vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12029: na kriyamāṇānuvādī hotur yuvā suvāsā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12032: pratyakṣaśravaṇenādhvaryaveṣu - yo hotā so 'dhvaryur iti. evaṃ pratyakṣam adhvaryoḥ kārye codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12033: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmād ādhvaryavaṃ karaṇaṃ parivīrasīti hotā kuryāt. atha hautraṃ viruddhaṃ kaḥ kuryāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12047: prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmā barhir upasādhaya srucaś saṃmṛḍḍhi{*3/749*} patnīṃ saṃnahyājyenodehīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ya eva praiṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12050: anyaś ca praiṣārtha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12056: prāptakāle 'pi sati yuṣmadādiṣv evopapadeṣu madhyamādayo vyavasthitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12057: na puruṣasaṃskaro bhavati. ucyate - satyāṃ vivakṣāyāṃ yuṣmadādiṣu madhyamādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12058: yadā tava prāptaḥ kāla iti vivakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12059: tadā yuṣmad eva madhyamo nāsmadi śeṣe vā. yadā khalu kriyāyāḥ prāptaḥ kāla ity etāvad vivakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12062: na tadā yuṣmadādīnām anurodhena madhyamādayo bhavitum arhanti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12067: yadi vā nirjñāte padārthakāle tava kāla iti śakyate vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12068: yadi vā taveti nirjñāte padārthasya kāla iti. tatra padārthasya kālo vaditavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12073: tasmāt samākhyāyād adhvaryor eva praiṣapraiṣārthāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12074: iti{*3/750*} prāpte brūmaḥ - praiṣeṣv anyo 'nyas tadartheṣv iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12081: prāptakālatā nyāyyā. tasya hi yuṣmadartho{*3/752*} gamyamāno na vivakṣita ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12086: *{3/749: E2,4: sruvaṃ ca srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12093: idaṃ saṃdihyate - kim adhvaryur agnīdhraṃ preṣyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12094: utāgnīd adhvaryum iti. aniyamo 'viśeṣād iti prāpte brūmaḥ - adhvaryur uktapraiṣārthakārī syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12096: darśanaṃ bhavati - tiryañ ca sphyaṃ dhārayed yad anvañcaṃ dhārayed vajro vai sphyo vajreṇādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvīteti{*3/753*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12098: tasya haste sphyaḥ. sphyenādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvītety anyam adhvaryuṃ preṣakād darśayati. tasmād agnīd adhvaryuṃ preṣyed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12104: agnīdhraḥ praiṣo 'dhvaryoḥ praiṣārtha iti. kiṃ khalv adhvaryur evāgnīdhaṃ preṣyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12105: evam adhvaryuṇā praiṣaḥ praiṣārthaś cobhāv api kṛtau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12106: tatrādhvaryavam iti samākhyānugrahīṣyate. tasmād adhvaryur eva mukhyaṃ{*3/754*} syāt. kim asya mukhyatvam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12107: yad anena sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ samākhyānād iti. atha yad uktam - adhvaryuḥ pracaritā dṛśyata iti. tad ucyate - satyaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12108: na tv asya praiṣārthakaraṇe pramāṇam asti cintyamānam. tasmād etan mithyādarśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12110_0: vyāmohaḥ saḥ. yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatavijñānam. asti tv agnīdhraḥ praiṣārthakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:12110_1: pramāṇam. tasmād agnīdhraḥ pracaritā pracaritari [425]{*3 /755*} cādhvaryuśabdo dṛśyate. tasmād gauṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12111: ādhvaryave vede samāmnātān{*3/756*} padārthān karotīti kṛtvādhvaryur ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12120: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astv iti pūrvam agniṃ parigṛhṇātīti{*3/757*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ṛtvikphalam āśāsitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12126: ātmanā yajamānaṃ lakṣayet. tasmād ṛtvikphalam āśāsitavyam iti. ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12127: anayā samidhā dhāryamāṇe 'gnau yāgaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati. tatra vihaveṣu spardhāsthāneṣv ahaṃ varcasvī bhaviṣyāmīty adhvaryor vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12136: sāṅgasyāsya prayojanaṃ yajamānasya phalaniṣpattir nādhvaryoḥ supravaritur{*3/758*} api yaśaḥ. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12139: tad etad [426]{*3/759*} agnyanvādhānaṃ yajamānasya phalasaṃkīrtane kriyamāṇe 'nena mantreṇa phalasaṃbandhāt prakāśitaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12140_0: nādhvaryuyaśaḥkīrtanena. tasmād yajamānaphalam āśāsitavyam iti. atha kasmān na yājamāna
GSP28msbh1-7u:12140_1: eṣa mantro bhavatīti. ucyate - agnyanvādhānaṃ samākhyayādhvaryavam. tac caivaṃ guṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12142: tasmād ādhvaryavo mantraḥ. mama varco 'stv atyapi yajamānasya varco mameti vyapadiśati lakṣaṇayā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12143: yathā rājani jayaṃ vartamānaṃ sainikā asmākam iti vyapadiśanty evam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12150: evaṃ hy āha - yāṃ vai kāṃcana ṛtvija āśiṣam āśāsate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12151: yajamānasyaiva sety āśiṣo yajamānārthakatāṃ darśayati. tasmād api brūmaḥ - yajamānaphalam āśāsitavyam iti. pakṣoktam eva prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12153: karmārthaṃ tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ svāminaṃ pratyarthavattvāt // MS_3,8.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12154: idaṃ samadhigatam - karaṇeṣu mantreṣu svāminaḥ phalam āśāsitavyam iti. kim eṣa evotsargaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12156: kvacid ṛtvijāṃ api phalam āśāsitavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12158: yathā - [427]{*3/760*} agnāviṣṇū māvakramiṣam{*3/761*} vijihāthāṃ māmā saṃtāptam iti{*3/762*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12170: dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyādhas tāc catvāra uparavāḥ prāveśamukhyāḥ{*3/763*} pradeśāntarālāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12173: sa āha - bhadram iti. tan nau sahety adhvaryuḥ pratyāheti vyapadeśo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12174: adhvaryor yajamānasya ca. tan nau sahety ubhayor vacanam adhvaryuyajamānayoḥ. tasmād adhvaryuphalam āśāsitavyam atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12181: uta pradhānārthā iti. prakaraṇāt pradhānārthā iti. iti{*3/764*} prāpta ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12184: yathā vyākhyātam{*3/765*} evottaravivakṣayā prāptir eṣā kriyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12193_0: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3 /767*}. tatra śrūyate - barhiṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12193_1: yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇāty ājyena yūpam anaktīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ tayor ājyabarhiṣor
GSP28msbh1-7u:12196: vākyaṃ hi barhirmātrasyājyamātrasya ca dharmāṇāṃ vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12197: tad ihāpi vākyaṃ codakena prāptam. na caitad barhir ājyaṃ niṣprayojanam. tasmād atra dharmāḥ kiyerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12198: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nirdeśād vikṛtāv apūrvasyānadhikāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12200: yatra pradhānasyopakurvanti prākṛtakāryayor ājyabarhiṣoḥ. ye ca pradhānasyopakāriṇo dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12202: na dharmān. pradhānasya hi codakena sāmānyaṃ na dharmāṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12204: nānyārtha iti jñātena saṃnihitenāpy ekavākyatā bhavaty anyasaṃbandhopapattau satyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12206: puruṣo devadattasyeti. kim aṅga punar viprakṛtena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12209: padārthāpekṣāyām aṅgatvam api sādhayitavyaṃ syāt. dharmāś cāpekṣyamāṇāḥ sādhāraṇā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12210: tathoho nāvakalpeta. liṅgaviśeṣadarśanāc ca vyavatiṣṭheran dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12217: prāṇo hi sa iti. tasmād yad dvārā prakṛtau kṛtāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12219: nānyadvārāḥ. na ca yūpāvaṭas taraṇaṃ prakṛtāv asti yūpāñjanaṃ [429]{*3/768*} vā. tasmān na tatra prākṛtā dharmā bhaveyur apūrvatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12224: virodhe ca śrutiviśeṣād avyaktaḥ śeṣe // MS_3,8.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12225: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - samāvapracchinnāgrau darbhau prādeśamātrau pavitre karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12227: utānyata iti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ vedistaraṇārthād barhiṣo vidhṛtī pavitre,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12232: tasmāt tataḥ. iti prāpte brūmaḥ - anyataḥ kriyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12234: śrūyate hi - tridhā tu pañcadhā tu vā vedīṃ stṛṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12237_0: na hi saṃbhavaty ekaṃ staraṇāya vidhṛtipavitrāya ca. tad etad upadiṣṭavacanam anekaguṇatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12237_1: cobhe apy asaṃbhavinī pratijñāte syātām. tasmān na tataḥ kriyeteti. yadi na tataḥ, kutas tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12238: avyakta evaṃjātīyakaḥ śeṣe, asti tatra paribhojanīyaṃ nāma barhiḥ, tataḥ kartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12241: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - puroḍāśaśakalam aindravāyavasya pātre nidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12243: payasyāṃ maitrāvaruṇapātra iti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim anyata eṣāṃ kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12245: pūrveṇa nyāyenānyata iti. tatrocyate - tata ekadeśasyāpanayaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12247: vidyate hi tatra puroḍāśo dhānāḥ payasyā ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12254: tasmāt prakṛtasyopadeśena tat kriyeta. na cātropadiṣṭopadeśa āśaṅkyo 'nekaguṇabhāvaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12255: anyena śakalena homo 'nyaś ca pratipādyata iti{*3/772*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12263: idam āmananti - yajñārthavaṇaṃ vai kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12264: tā upāṃśu kartavyā iti. atra saṃśayaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārtham upāṃśutvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12268: yathā prakṛtau vedidharmā ājyadharmāś cāṅgapradhānārthāḥ, evam atrāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12271: pradhānārtho vā eṣa vikṛtiṣu syāt. evam idaṃ sarvārtham ucyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12273: tad evedānīṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣitam - kāmyā iṣṭaya iti. kāmyāś ca pradhānayāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12275: tasmād aṅgacoditam. yat kāmena phalavac codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12276: tad evānayopāṃśutvetikartavyatayā [431]{*3/773*} anubadhyate. tasmāt pradhānārtham upāṃśutvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12281: śyene śrūyate - dṛtanavanītam{*3/774*} ājyam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ navanītaṃ pradhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12284: tasya hi prakaraṇam iti vacanaprāmāṇyān navanītena pradhānaṃ nirvartayitavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asaṃbhava etasmiṃs tadaṅgānāṃ śyenāṅgānāṃ{*3/775*} syāt. kathaṃ asaṃbhavaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12285: somadravyakatvāt pradhānasya. nanu vacanān navanītaṃ bhaviṣyati. na śyene navanītaṃ bhavatīty eṣa vākyārthaḥ. kas tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12286: śyene navanītam ājyaṃ bhavatīti navanītājyasaṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12295: evaṃ ced dṛśyate - śyenāṅgānāṃ navanītam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12296: ādhāne 'pi pavamāneṣṭiṣu syāt. tā api hi śyenasyopakurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12300: na śyenasya prakaraṇe pavamāneṣṭayo 'gnyādhānaṃ vā śrūyate. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12302: ādhānasya ca śyenasya ca na kaścid asti [432]{*3/776*} saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12305: tasmān na pavamānahaviḥṣu navanītam. naitac chyenāṅgatve nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12306: yad ādhānam agnīnām upakaroti. yadi prakaraṇādīnām anyatamad{*3/777*} asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12307: tan nimittaṃ bhavet. tasmān na śyenāgnyādhānayoḥ saṃbandho 'stīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12313: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ navanītam uta sarveṣāṃ iti. sutyākālānāṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12314: liṅgadarśanāt. idaṃ śrūyate - saha paśūn ālabhata iti. tatra punar vacanam - agnīṣomīyasya sthāne 'gnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12317: tenāvagamyate śyenasya vacanaṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ viśeṣaṃ vidadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12323: sarveṣām eva cāṅgānāṃ navanītaṃ syāt. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, asati viśeṣe sarveṣām apy aṅgānām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12328: yac chyenasya vacanaṃ tat stutyākālānām{*3/780*} aṅgānām iti. kiṃ tu darśanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12329: tad apramāṇamūlatvān mithyādarśanaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāvat. kathaṃ tu madhye paśūnām ālambha iti. nyāyāt. ko nyāyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12330: kramānugrahaḥ. evaṃ vacanavarjitaḥ kramo 'nugṛhīto bhavatīti{*3/781*}. [433]{*3/782*} tasmāt sarveṣām aṅgānāṃ navanītam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12337: śākyānām ayanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaram. tatredaṃ samāmananti - saṃsthite saṃsthite 'hāni gṛhapatir mṛgayāṃ yāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12339: teṣāṃ tarasāḥ puruḍāśāḥ savanīyā bhavantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ savanīyānām anyeṣāṃ ca saṃbhavatāṃ puroḍāśānāṃ sthāne tarasā uta savanīyānām eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12341: na śakyate puroḍāśānāṃ ca māṃsamayatā vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12343: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmāt sarvapuroḍāśānāṃ māṃsamayateti. iti{*3/783*} prāpte ucyate - māṃsaṃ tu savanīyānāṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12344: tarasāḥ savanīyā bhavantīty ayaṃ tv anūdyate. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12346: puroḍāśaśabdas tu savanīyeṣv avakalpate. tasmāt puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvāda iti. tasmāt savanīyānāṃ dhānādīnāṃ sthāne māṃsaṃ codanāśeṣād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12351: iti cet paśyasi - savanīyeṣu puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvādo bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12359: prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome dhānādiṣv ayaṃ puroḍāśaśabdo bhāktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12361: ihāpi bhākta eva prayokṣyate. atrāpi hi savanīyaśabdena te saṃnihitāḥ. prakṛtau liṅgasamavāyāc chabdapravṛttir vikṛtāv api tathaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12364: ekaviṃśaḥ poḍaśī vairājasāmā iti prakṛtiliṅgena sāmaśabdena vairūpapṛṣṭho vairājapṛṣṭha iti gamyate. evam ihāpi savanīyānāṃ māṃsamayateti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12375: tṛtīye 'dhyāye śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānaiḥ śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam uktam. ihedānīṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthau jijñāsyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12382_0: arthavādaḥ kratvarthaḥ. prayojakaḥ kaścit puruṣārtho 'prayojakaḥ kratvarthaḥ. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:12382_1: kratvarthapuruṣārthayor jijñāseti sūtritam. tatrāthātaḥ śabdau prathama evādhyāye
GSP28msbh1-7u:12382_2: prathamasūtre varṇitau. atheti prakṛtaṃ{*4 /2*} śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam apekṣate. ata
GSP28msbh1-7u:12382_3: iti kratvarthapuruṣārthajijñāsāviśeṣaṃ prakurute. kratave yaḥ sa kratvarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12383: puruṣāya yaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. jijñāsāśabdo 'pi tatraiva samadhigataḥ - jñātum icchā jijñāseti. tad etat pratijñāsūtram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12388: yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇāvibhaktavāt // MS_4,1.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12392: pṛṣṭākoṭenopadeśe garīyasī. tad ucyate - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12393: yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya prītir bhavati{*4/5*} sa puruṣārthaḥ padārthaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12397: nānyathā. avibhakto hi puruṣārthaḥ prītyā. yo yaḥ prītisādhanaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. puruṣārthe lakṣite tadviparītaḥ kratvartha iti kratvarthasya lakṣaṇaṃ siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12398: evaṃ vā sūtraṃ varṇyate - darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - anatidṛśyaṃ stṛṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12402: godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed ityevamādīni. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim evaṃjātīyakāḥ kratvarthā uta puruṣārthā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12406: tad uktam - dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu bādarir{*4/8*} iti{*4/9*}. tasmāt kratvarthā ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12407: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya sa puruṣārtha eveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12409: tasmād ete puruṣārthā iti. nanu pratyakṣa upakāraḥ krator dṛśyata ity uktam. ucyate - satyaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12410: na tu krator upakārāyaibhyaḥ{*4/10*} saṃkīrti tebhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12412: ya upakaroti sa śeṣaḥ. yas tu yadarthaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12413: sa tasya śeṣa ity uktam{*4/11*} - śeṣaḥ parārthatvād iti{*4/12*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12415: dravyārjanam udāharaṇam. iha dravyārjanaṃ tais tair niyamaiḥ [437]{*4/13*} śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12418: vaiśyasya kṛṣyādinā. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvartho dravyaparigraha uta puruṣārtha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12419: kratvartho niyamāt. yady eṣa puruṣārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12421: niyamād aniyamāc cārjitaṃ dravyaṃ puruṣaṃ prīṇayatīti. tasmāt kratvarthaḥ. kāmaśrutibhiś cāsya sahaikavākyatā dṛṣṭā. itarathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12422: anumeyena phalavākyena sahaikavākyatāṃ yāyāt. liṅgaṃ cāpi bhavati - agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12424: yasya hiraṇyaṃ naśyed āgneyādīni nirvaped{*4/15*} ityevamādi. tad dhi dravyopaghāte codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12426: tata etad api sati saṃbandhe karmārtham ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12428: phalaṃ cāsya kalpyeta. tasmād yajatiśrutigṛhītaṃ dravyārjanaṃ yena vinā yogo na nirvartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12429: sa yāgasya śrutyā parigṛhīta iti gamyate. tasmāt kratvartha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12430: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣārtha iti. etasmin kṛte padārthe prītiḥ puruṣasya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12435: tasmād vidyamānadravyasya viniyoga ucyate. na dravyārjanaṃ śrutigṛhītam{*4/16*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12444: tatraitan nopapadyate. api vā eṣa suvargāl{*4/17*} lokācchidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12445: yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī [438]{*4/18*} sann amāvāsyāṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vātipātayed{*4/19*} iti. evaṃ ca sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12446: prayogakālād vahir{*4/20*} etad aṅgaṃ sad anupakārakaṃ syāt. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12448: tatra hi vacanam - vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti, na caitad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12451: naitāvatā puruṣārthatā vyāvartate. pratyakṣā hi sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12454: parokṣaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakaṃ bhavati. tasmān niyamavacanāt kāmam aparam adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12455: na tu dṛṣṭahānam. tasmād yat puruṣasya prayojanaṃ prītiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12456: tad arthaṃ dhanasyārjanam ity evaṃ ca sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12458: prītyartham arjitena vā kratvartham arjitena vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12463: vrīhir eva. tasmān{*4/21*} na prayogacodanāgṛhītaṃ dravyārjanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12466: asmatpakṣe tu dṛṣṭena prayogavacaneneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12469: niyamād adṛṣṭaṃ bhavatīti gamyate. yathaiva bhavadīye pakṣe. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12470: asmatpakṣe phalavata ekavākyabhāvāt{*4/22*} phalavata upakarotīti gamyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12475: atha yal liṅgam uktam - gṛhadāhādiṣu karma śrūyata iti. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12477: tathāpi dāhe nimitte phalāya vā karmāṅgabhāvāya vā jāmavatyādīnāṃ{*4/24*} vidhānam upapadyata eva. tasmāt puruṣārthaṃ dravyārjanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12483: *{4/5: E1 hat yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya, yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya pratītir bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12484: *{4/6: E2: tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇā. tasya lipsārthenaiva bhavati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12499: *{4/21: E2: eva, karmārtham upārjito 'pi vrīhivrīhir eva, tasmān}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12506: śāstrasyānatiśaṅkyatvān na ca dravyaṃ vikīrṣyate{*4/26*} tenārthenābhisaṃbandhāt kriyāyāṃ puruṣaśrutiḥ // MS_4,1.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12507: iha prajāpativratāny udāharaṇam - nodyantam ādityam īkṣeta nāstaṃyantam ityādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvarthāni prajāpativratāny uta puruṣārthānīti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12510: phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. nanu śrūyata evaiteṣāṃ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12511: etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti. ucyate - naitat phalaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12512: vartamānāpadeśa evaiṣa śabda iti. tena yatrāditya īkṣitavyaḥ prāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12513: tatrāyaṃ pratiṣedha udyato 'staṃyataś ca niyamo vā syāt kaścit karmāṅgabhūtaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12514: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tad utsarge prītyutsargo 'pi{*4/27*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12517: na karmaṇaḥ. arthaprāptena kartrā saṃbandho yaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12519: na karmasaṃbandho 'vidyamāna eva. śāstraṃ cānatiśaṅkyaṃ pitṛmātṛvacanād api pramāṇataram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12521: indriyasthānīyaṃ hi tat. na caivam ādibhir dravyasya kaścid dṛṣṭa upakāraḥ sādhyate. tasmāt tena puruṣārthenābhisaṃyogāt kriyāyām evaṃjātīyakāyāṃ puruṣaḥ śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12522: api ca, puruṣaprayatnaḥ padārthavidhimātraṃ lakṣayitum uccāryeta, svayam avivakṣitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12527: [440]{*4/29*} itarathā niyamo lakṣyeteti. kiṃ tv iha niyamaḥ śabdena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12530: nodyann āditya īkṣitavya iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12531: etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti puruṣasaṃbaddho doṣaḥ kīrtyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12532: na karmasaṃbaddhaḥ. tasmāt puruṣārthāni prajāpativratānīti. golakṣaṇāny apy evam eva kartarīkarṇyaḥ kartavyā ityevamādīni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12539: aviśeṣāt tu śāstrasya yathāśrutiphalāni syuḥ // MS_4,1.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12541: imāny api puruṣārthāni syuḥ - samidho yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12549: api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe tadartham arthasyānabhisaṃbandhāt // MS_4,1.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12552: kāraṇāgrahaṇe puruṣārthāni prajāpativratāni bhaveyuḥ. na tatra śrutyādikaṃ kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12554: tasmāt tāni puruṣārthāni. arthasya karmaṇo{*4/33*} nābhisaṃbandhaḥ prajāpativrataiḥ. iha tu samidādīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12555: yena karmārthānīti vijñāyante{*4/34*}. tasmād viṣama upanyāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12564: niṣpannakāryādiṣu prayojanavatsu yad asaṃyuktaṃ phalena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12565: tat tadaṅgaṃ vijñāyata iti manyamānā upavāsaṃ japaṃ vā [441]{*4/35*} upadiśyaiva kṛtino manyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12568: tathā cāpare 'pi manyamānā na duruktaṃ manyante. tasmāt samidādīni karmāṅgāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12575_0: tatrāmnāyate - sphyaś ca kapālāni cāgnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpaṃ ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12575_1: colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣac copalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti{*4 /36*}. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:12578: kim eṣa vidhir utānuvāda iti. vidhau sati pradānam anuvāde sati yathārthasaṃbandhaḥ. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12581: itarathā vādamātram anarthakam. pradāne caiṣāṃ yajñāyudhaśabdo 'nugṛhītaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12583: yajñasya sādhanānīti. itarathoddhananādīnām āyudhāni bhaveyuḥ śravaṇena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12586: itarathā nānārthasaṃbandhād daśeti saṃkhyā nāvakalpate. tasmāt pradīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12587: aviśeṣeṇa vihitaṃ prakaraṇena pradhānasya bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12591: svena tv arthena saṃbandho dravyāṇāṃ pṛthagarthatvāt, tasmād yathāśruti syuḥ // MS_4,1.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12602: prokṣitābhyāṃ dṛṣadupalābhyāṃ pinaṣṭīty evaṃ svena svena vākyenoddhananādiṣu prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12603: prāptānāṃ vacanam anuvādaḥ. prakaraṇam api vākyena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12608: vispaṣṭaṃ caitad uddhananādibhiḥ sphyādīni prayuktānīti. bhavati hi tatra vidhiḥ - sphyenoddhantītyevamādiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12609: na tu yajñāyudhāni kartavyānīti. tasmād uddhananādiṣu vākyena prāptānām anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12619: tāny api vikalperan. tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12621: sphyādīnāṃ ca. evaṃ vā codyante cārthakarmasu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12623: paridhānīye karmaṇi - āhitāgnim agnibhir dahanti yajñapātraiś ceti. yadi pradīyeraṃs tatra na bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12627: liṅgadarśanena ca - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12628: trayodaśām āvāsyāyām iti. tasmād apy anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12634: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśuṃ ālabhata iti{*4/43*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12638: vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhata iti{*4/44*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ vivakṣitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12640: utāvivakṣitam iti. tatraikatvam ayajñāṅgabhūtaṃ na vivakṣitam ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12642: nālambhasya guṇabhūtā saṃkhyā niyojanasya vā. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12643: paśor anaḍuhoḥ kapiñjalānāṃ ca. vibhaktir hi śrutyā prātipadikārthagataṃ saṃkhyārthaṃ brūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12645: vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasī. tasmān na yajñāṅgaṃ vivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12650: paśvādīnām aṅgenoktenānuktena vā kiṃcit prayojanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12651: yajñāṅgena hy avipannena prayojanam. vipanne 'pi hi paśvādyaṅge 'viguṇa eva kratur bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12652: yajñāc ca phalaṃ na paśvādeḥ. tasmāt paśvāder guṇenājñātena jñātena vā na kiṃcit prayojanam astīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12654: yad dhi prayojanavat tad vivakṣitam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12661: yena vijñāyate na tad vivakṣitam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12662: yadi somam apahareyur ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād iti{*4/45*}. yadi vivakṣitaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12666: dhenū dva ity{*4/46*} atrāpi dva iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12667: avivakṣitam avīti dvitvam [444]{*4/47*} iti. trīn lalāmān ity{*4/48*} atrāpi trīn iti vacanaṃ liṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12685: na ca śabdād gamyamānam ṛte kāraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12689: naitad evam, satyaṃ pratīyate, na tv ayaṃ śabdārtho vyāmohādoṣā pratītiḥ. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12691: vākyaṃ ca śrutyā bādhyate. tasmād aśabdārtho 'yaṃ yajña ekatvād iti. śabdārtho 'pi hi pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12693: pūrvo dhāvatīti. sa pūrva ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12696: aparo gamyate. na tv aparo dhāvatīti śravaṇāt pratīyate. evam ihāpi paśum ity ekatvaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12697: na tu yajñe. yathaiva hi pūrvam ity ukte 'paro gamyata eva kevalaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12698: na tu sa vidhīyate kasmiṃścid arthe. evam ihāpi saṃkhyā pratīyate eva kevalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12699: na tu kartavyatayā yajñe vidhīyate na paśau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12700: kathaṃ na paśau vidhīyata iti cet. vidhāyakasyābhāvāt. ākhyātaśabdo vidhāyako bhaviṣyatīty etad api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12701: dravyadevatāsaṃbandhasya sa vidhāyakaḥ sann ālabhata iti na saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum arhatīti. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmād avivakṣitā saṃkhyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12706: śabdavat tūpalabhyate tadāgame hi tad dṛśyate tasya jñānaṃ yathānyeṣām // MS_4,1.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12708: na yajñe saṃkhyā śabdena śrūyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12710: loke paśum ānayety ekavacane sati ekatvapaśuviśiṣṭam ānayanaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12713: dvitvam upajāyate. yasya cāgame yad upajāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12714: sa tasyārtha iti gamyate. tasya jñānaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12721: yad uktam - śrutyā vākyārtho bādhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12729: tatraikārthatvād ekavākyam avakalpate. paśau hi saṃkhyāyāṃ vidhīyamānāyām eka ākhyātaśabdo na śaknuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12731: saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyasaṃbandhaṃ ca. tasmād yajñe vivakṣitā saṃkhyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12737: teṣām aindrāgno daśama iti{*4/50*}. yadi tritvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadaindrāgno daśamo bhavati. tathā kṛṣṇā bhaumāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12741: siddhās tārakā iti{*4/53*} prakṛtya āha - ardhamāsānāṃ vaitad rūpaṃ yat pañca[446]{*4/54*}daśina iti{*4/55*}. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12742: vivakṣitā saṃkhyeti. yat tūktam - ekāṃ gām ity avivakṣāṃ darśayatīti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12746: godakṣiṇāsaṃbandho vihito gamyeta. tasmād vivakṣite 'pi vācyam etat. avī dve dhenū dve trīn lalāmān iti cānuvādāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12756: evaṃ ca kṛtvā samānaśrutikaṃ liṅgam api vivakṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12759: grīṣme mādhyaṃdine siṃhīm aindrīṃ śarady aparāhṇe śvetāṃ bārhaspatyām iti{*4/56*}. tatra śrūyate - garbhiṇyo bhavtīti{*4/57*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12761_0: tena striyo darśayatīti bhaviṣyati. tathā aśva ṛṣabho vṛṣṇir vastaḥ{*4 /58*} puruṣa
