GSP28msbh1-7u:12761_1: iti te prājāpatyā iti{*4 /59*}. tatra śrūyate - muṣkarā{*4 /60*} bhavanti sendriyatvāyeti{*4 /61*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12770: strīvacanāt somakrayaṇīty avivakṣitam eva liṅgaṃ pratīyate. nanu kathaṃ mṛgīm ānayeti na mṛga ānīyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12771: naivam, aśābdaṃ tu tat, pūrvo dhāvatīti yathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12772: liṅgaṃ vivakṣitaṃ vā{*4/63*} vākyārthasya śrutyāpratiṣiddhatvāt. tathā ca liṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12774: tathā ca muṣkarā bhavanti [447]{*4/64*} iti. yad uktam - strī gauḥ somakrayaṇīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12776: tathā prajāpataye puruṣān hastina ālabhata iti puruṣagrahaṇam avivakṣitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12777: vispaṣṭo hi nyāya ukto liṅgavivakṣāyām. tasmād vivakṣitaṃ liṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12790: atrāśrayiṇaḥ padārthā udāharaṇam uttamaḥ prayājaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ sviṣṭakṛd ity ete yāgā udāharaṇam{*4/65*}. eṣu saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yajimātraṃ saṃskāro devatāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12791: uta yajinādṛṣṭaṃ devatāyāṃ kriyata iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12792: āśrayiṣv aviśeṣeṇa bhāvo 'rthaḥ pratīyata{*4/66*} ity{*4/67*} āśrayiṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣv apūrvasya bhāvo 'rthaḥ pratyetavyo 'viśeṣād anyair ākhyātaśabdaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12796: *{4/65: E1 hat uttamaḥ prayājaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ sviṣṭakṛd ity ete yāgā udāharaṇam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12800: codanāyāṃ tv anārambho vibhaktatvān na hy anyena vidhīyate // MS_4,1.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12807: dṛṣṭārthaś cāyam. asmin hi yāge kriyamāṇe devatā [448]{*4/68*} smaryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12808: sviṣṭakṛty api dravyaṃ pratipādyate. na cānyena śabdenātrāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate. tasmād yajimātraṃ saṃskāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12812: syād vā dravyacikīrṣāyāṃ bhāvo 'rthe ca guṇabhūtatāśrayād dhi guṇībhāvaḥ // MS_4,1.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12816: mantreṇa tatra devatā smaryate. tasmin mantreṇa dṛṣṭe 'rthe kriyamāṇe tyāgo 'paro 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12818: devatāśrayāt tu devatāgataṃ tad apūrvam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12822: ataḥ prabhṛti dravyāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ cārthe prayojane{*4/69*} samavaiṣamyaṃ vakṣyate. kvacit sāmyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12835: cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve śrūyate - tapte payasi dadhy ānayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12836: sā vaiśvadevy āmikṣā vācibhyo{*4/71*} vājinam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ tapte payasi dadhyānayanam āmikṣā prayojayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12843: dadhyānayane ca kṛta ubhayaṃ niṣpadyate. āmikṣāpi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12844: tata eva yājinam api{*4/72*} tatrānyatarārthaṃ kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12845: yadi vinigamanāyāṃ hetur bhavet. agamyamāne viśeṣa ubhayārtham ānayanam iti gamyate. tasmād ekāsāv ubhābhyām api prayojitā niṣpattir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12850: saṃsargarasaniṣpatter āmikṣā vā pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,1.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12851: naitad asti, ubhayaṃ prayojakam iti, āmikṣā prayoktrī. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12853: tad dhaviḥ. yadi tad dhaviḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12854: ubhayaṃ tābhyām eva niṣpadyata iti gamyata{*4/73*} viśeṣaḥ. kiṃ tarhi havir iti. payo dadhisaṃsṛṣṭam. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12855: sā vaiśvadevīty ucyate, na tato yan niṣpadyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12861: ity ucyate - tad eva hi payas taptaṃ dadhisaṃyuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12862: āmikṣā bhavati. tasmāt strīliṅgam adoṣaḥ. āha - yadi payo dadhisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ haviḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12864: āmikṣā prayojiketi. ucyate [450]{*4/74*} - āmikṣāyāṃ dadhipayasī vidyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12867: tatra hi dadhipayasoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayo rasa upalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12868: tena tatra dadhipayasī ity anumānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12871: tapte payasi dadhany ānīyamāna ubhayaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12872: dadhnā ca payaḥ saṃsṛjyate vājināc ca vivicyate. tatra saṃsargaś cikīrṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12876: sarvanāma ca pūrvoktena śabdenaikavākyatāṃ yāti. itarasmin pakṣe payasi dadhyānayanaṃ vājinavivekalakṣaṇārthaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12877: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā. tasmād āmikṣārthaṃ dadhyānayanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12880: yatra tapte payasi dadhyānīyate. tasmād āmikṣikā prayoktrī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12891: asati prayojake 'narthakaṃ bhavatīti prayojakaṃ kalpyate. tatraikasminn api prayojake siddhe 'rthavaty upadeśe nānyad api prayojakaṃ bhavitum arhati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12903: āmikṣā stūyate - mithunaṃ vai dadhi ca śṛtaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12904: atha yat saṃsṛṣṭaṃ maṇḍam iva mastv{*4/77*} iva pari ca dadṛśe{*4/78*} [451]{*4/79*} garbha eva sa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12907: na garbhodakam. tasmād apy āmikṣā prayojiketi manyāmahe. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12922: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇātīti{*4/81*}. tatredam aparaṃ śrūyate - ṣaṭ padāny anuniṣkrāmatīti{*4/82*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12924: saptamaṃ padaṃ gṛhṇātīti. idam aparam - yarhi havirdhāne prācī pravartayeyus tarhi tenākṣam añjyād{*4/83*} iti{*4/84*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ somakrayaṇyānayanaṃ padapāṃsvartham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12928: tasmād ubhayaṃ prayojakam. na hi gamyate viśeṣa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12929: tad uktam - ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti{*4/85*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12930: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - padakarmāprayojakam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12932: na hi nayanam antareṇa viśiṣṭe deśe kraya upapadyate. tasmāt krayeṇa tāvan nayanaṃ prayuktam iti gamyate. krayaprayuktaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12935_0: ekahāyanyāḥ padapāṃsavo grahītavyā iti nāsti śabdaḥ. nanu prakṛtaikahāyanī padapāṃsugrahaṇavākyena{*4 /86*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12935_1: [452]{*4 /87*} saṃbhantsyate. neti brūmaḥ - ekahāyanyā krīṇātīti viśiṣṭena vākyena kraye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12938: ekahāyanī krayaṇārthaṃ saṃkīrtitā satī saṃnihitatvāt prasaṅgam upajīvatā padapāṃsuvākyena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12940: etasyāḥ padaṃ grāhyam iti. tasmāt krayapayuktaṃ nayanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12945: tadā punar ekahāyanī nīyeta saptamāya padāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12947: tadā naikahāyanī punaḥ ṣaṭ padāny anuniṣkrāmayayitavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12957: arthābhidhānakarma ca bhaviṣyatā saṃyogasya tannimittatvāt tadartho hi vidhīyate // MS_4,1.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12959: tathā - puroḍāśakapālena tuṣān upavapatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ubhayaṃ kapālāni prayojayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12967: puroḍāśārthaṃ kapālaṃ puroḍāśakapālam. katham etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12969: yena vartamānaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kapālena syāt. tenaiva hetunā na bhūtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12970: sa eṣa kapālasya puroḍāśeṇa bhaviṣyatā [453]{*4/89*} saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12971: bhaviṣyatā saṃbandhaś ca tan nimittasya bhavati. tasmāt puroḍāśena prayuktaṃ yat kapālam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12972: tena tuṣā upavaptavyā iti. evaṃ ca sati carau puroḍāśābhāve yadā tuṣānupavaptuṃ kapālam upādīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12973: na tat puroḍāśakapālaṃ syāt. na cen na tena tuṣā upavaptavyā bhavanti. tasmān na tuṣopavāpaḥ kapālānāṃ prayojakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12980: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agniṣomīyaḥ. tatra śrūyate - hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyaty atha jihvāyā ityevamādi{*4/90*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12984: kiṃ hṛdayādibhir avadānair ijyā paśoḥ prayoktrī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12985: uta śakṛt saṃpravyādho lohitanirasanaṃ ca tad api prayojakam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12986: ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād{*4/93*}, ubhayaṃ prayojakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12993: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/96*}. śakṛllohite paśoḥ prakaraṇena bhavetām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12994: prakaraṇaṃ ca vākyena bādhyate. nanv ete śakṛllohite pratipādyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12995: tena yāgārthasya paśor nānyasyeti niścayaḥ. evaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12996: aprayojake śakṛllohita iti. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:12997: sāmye sati śakṛllohitābhāve 'nyaḥ paśur ālambhanīyaḥ, śakṛllohitayor aprayojakatve lopaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13005: *{4/95: E2 om. śakṛl lohitayor aprayojakatvam, na hi tadarthaḥ paśor ālambhaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13010: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ{*4/99*} śrūyate - uttarārdhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatīti{*4/100*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13012: sviṣṭakṛd aprayojaka utobhayam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13013: ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti{*4/101*}. evaṃ prāpte brumaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13025: sato modakāc chakalam upādadīteti. tasmād anyārthaṃ dravyaṃ tasyottarārdhād avadeyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13026: asti cāgnyarthaḥ puroḍāśaḥ. tasmād viṣṭakṛd aprayojaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13038: agniṃ prati nirdeśāt tasya puroḍāśasya{*4/103*} sviṣṭakṛd artham anyaḥ puroḍāśa utpādayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040_0: tasyāgnaye saṃkalpitasya neṣṭe yajamānaḥ. katham asau tad anyasyai devatāyai dadyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040_1: katham agniṃ prati nirdeśa iti. idaṃ śrūyate - aṅgiraso vā ita uttamāḥ suvargaṃ loka[455]{*4 /104*}māyaṃs
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040_2: te yajñavāstv abhyāyaṃs te puroḍāśaṃ kūrmaṃ bhūtvā sarpantam apaśyaṃs tam abruvann
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040_3: indrāya dhriyasva bṛhaspataye dhriyasvādityāya dhriyasva sa nādhriyata tam abruvan
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040_5: cācyuto bhavatīti{*4 /106*}. tasmāt tena sviṣṭakṛto na saṃbandhaḥ. evaṃ cet tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13051: so 'rthād upādyate. saṃnihite ca śeṣe sati sidhyaty uttarārdhād grahaṇam. tasmān nārthād dravyam utpādayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13053: tasyaivottarārdhād grahītavyam. uttarārdhamātraṃ hi sviṣṭakṛte śrūyate nāmuṣya dravyasyeti. na caitāvatā vyavahāro bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13056: saṃnihitaṃ ca parārtham. tasmāt parārthād dravyāt sviṣṭakṛd ijyā. ataś cāprayojiketi. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13060: sa śakyaḥ kartum. dānaṃ hy utsargapūrvakaḥ parasya svatvasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13064: karmanimittaś ca sviṣṭakṛto bhāga iti śrūyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13065: devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13066_0: so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai [456]{*4 /107*} bhāgo me 'stv iti vṛṇīṣvety abruvan so 'bravīd
GSP28msbh1-7u:13066_1: uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti. karma kurvato bhāgo 'yam uttarārdhād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13066_2: iti stutir bhavati. yady āgneyasyottarārdhād ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13070: prayojakatve cāsati sādṛśye stutisāmañjasyaṃ na syāt. tasmād aprayojakaḥ puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛdyāga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13075: liṅgam api bhavati - tad yat sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13076: tasmād idam udare viśvarūpam annaṃ samavadhīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13078: tadā satsaṃnidhānāviśeṣāt sarvebhyo 'vadīyata ity upapadyate. prayojakatve tv ekasmād evāvadīyeta. tasmād apy aprayojakaḥ. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgam - śeṣād iḍām avadyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13079: śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīti. nanv ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13080: nātra vidhivibhaktir vartamānāpadeśo hy ayam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13082: abhighāraṇe viprakarṣād anuyājavat pātrabhedaḥ syāt // MS_4,1.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13084: vāyapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti. tatra śrūyate - saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13087: prājāpatyānāṃ kratupaśūnāṃ ca samuccayo vakṣyate - prajāpātyeṣu cāmnānād iti{*4/109*}. asti [457]{*4/110*} tu prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13088: prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣy abhighārayatīti{*4/111*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighārayituṃ prayājaśeṣasya dhāraṇārthaṃ pātram aparam utpādayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13091: naiva tataḥ prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighāraṇīyā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13093: prātaḥsavane ca prayājaśeṣo viprakṛṣṭakāle{*4/112*} mādhyaṃdine savane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13094: brahmasāmakāle prājāpatyānām ālabhyaḥ śrūyate - tān paryagnikṛtān utsṛjanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13096: vyāpṛtā ca juhūr bhavati. tasmāt pātrāntaram utpādanīyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13108: na vāpātratvād apātratvaṃ tv ekadeśatvāt // MS_4,1.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13109: na vā prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighāryāḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13110: śeṣābhāvāt. kathaṃ śeṣābhāva iti cet. apātratvāt. katham apātratā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13111: ekadeśatvāt, prayājārthasya hi gṛhītasyājyasya sa ekadeśaḥ śeṣaḥ. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13112: yady evam, ekadeśavyāpāraḥ śrūyamāṇo nāvayavinam upādeyatvena codayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13116: ekadeśatvād abhighāraṇaṃ dravyam eva na prayuṅkta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13121: ājyaprādhānye punar juhvā riktatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13124: nābhighṛtena haviṣā. tasmāt prājāpatyānām abhighāritābhir vapābhiḥ prayojanam eva nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13136: ity arthānatareṇa vapābhighāraṇam anugṛhṇan nehāstīti darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13139: abhāvaṃ khalv apy abhigdhāraṇasya darśayati - savyā vā etarhi vapā yarhy anabhighṛtāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13147: saty eva hy abhighāraṇe bhavaty etat savyavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13148: asti hi vapāyā anyad abhighāraṇam - upastṛṇāty ājyaṃ hiraṇyaśakalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13149: vapā hiraṇyaśakalaṃ tato 'bhighārayatīti{*4/116*}. tasmin sati kathaṃ savyā bhaveyuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13151: tasmān naitac chakyam avagantum rūkṣās tā vapā dṛśyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13154: rūkṣās tā iti darśanaṃ vyāmoha iti{*4/118*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13159: *{4/118: E2: pratyakṣam arūkṣās tāḥ. ato rūkṣāvacanaṃ vyāmoha iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13164: saty abhighāraṇe savyā iti vacanam aliṅgam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13173: yad asmābhiḥ kāntārān nirgatair devadattasya gṛhe snigdham bhuktam{*4/120*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13175: satsv apy anyeṣu snigdheṣv eva bhojaneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13176: evaṃ tasyārūkṣākaraṇasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvād rūkṣā iti vacanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13177: asmiṃs tu sati nopapadyate. tasmād api prayājaśeṣeṇābhighāraṇaṃ prājāpatyānāṃ nāstīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13182: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*4/121*}. yadi prathamasyābhāvāt savyā iti vacanaṃ bhavaty anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13183: tarhy anyasya prathamasya vidyamānatvāt. katamat tat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13184: yac chrapyamāṇāyā aparam udvāsitāyāḥ. atrocyate - syāt tasya mukhyatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13187: saty api śrapyamāṇāyā abhighāraṇa udvāsitāyāś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13196: tan na snehayati. tad idaṃ snehanasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvāt savyatāvacanam upapadyata ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13200: *{4/121: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13204: samānayanaṃ tu mukhyaṃ syāl liṅgadarśanāt // MS_4,1.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13205: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - atihāyeḍo barhiḥ prati samānayatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13206: kiṃ samānayanam ājyasya dharmāṇāṃ ca prayojakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13210: pūrveṇa nyāyenāprayojakatā prāptā. tad ucyate - mukhyaṃ samānayanaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13212: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīty ātithyāyāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13214: tatas tatraikaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ samānīyate. ekam apy anuyājānāṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13215: tataś cātithyeḍāṃ tā saṃtiṣṭhata ity anuyājābhāva upabhṛti samānayanārtham ekaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ grāhyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13216: na tv anuyājārtham. tatra bahūnāṃ caturgṛhītānāṃ darśanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13217: itarathā hy anuyājābhāve naivopabhṛti catur gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13218: tatra caturgṛhītānīti bahuvacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmāt prayojakaṃ samānayanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13220: ucyate - dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ prayājau dvau yaṣṭavyau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13221: tatra juhvām ājyena prayojanaṃ nopabhṛti riktāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13222_0: upabhṛto recanam adṛṣṭārthaṃ juhvāṃ nidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham eva. tena prayājahomārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:13222_1: ājyasamānayanam aupabhṛtam ājyaṃ [461]{*4 /124*} prayojayati. tad api hi prayājārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:13230: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti. yadā samānayanaṃ na prayājārtham iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13234: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti hetuvan nigado nopapadyeta. tasmāt prayājārthaṃ samānayanaṃ prayojakam aupabhṛtasyājyasya. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13238: aprayojanakatve na niyogato 'rdhaṃ yāvat tādvat vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13241: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāty aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīti{*4/125*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13246: athavā aupabhṛtaṃ prayājebhyo 'nuyājebhyaś ceti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13248: yad yad ājyena kriyate, tasmai tasmai bhavitum arhaty aviśeṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13259: ṛtavo vai prayājā iti jauhavavacanam anuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ prayājān saṃkīrtayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13264: nāsty asyānuyājapratiṣedhe sāmarthyam iti. ucyate - na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13265: pratiṣedhakam etad iti. kiṃ tūtpattivākya ājyānāṃ naiva prayojanābhisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13267: anuyājaprayojanatāsya vacanābhāvād eva na gamyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13278: na tv aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. tad api tathā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13281: yad upabhṛti gṛhṇāty anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇāti chandāṃsi hy anuyājā iti. anuyājārthatāsyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13286: evaṃ hi śrūyate - yad aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇāti prayājānuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīti{*4/128*}. nanūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13288: juhūpratiṣedhān nityānuvādaḥ. ubhayasminn aupabhṛte jauhave ca{*4/129*} ubhayārthe prāpte jauhavam anuyājebhyaḥ pratiṣiddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13290: tad aupabhṛtasyobhayārthatāyāṃ satyām anu[463]{*4/130*}yājārthatāvacanaṃ nityānuvādo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13293: tasmād aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. samānayanaṃ ca tato juhvāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13294: tasmād api prayājārthatā na śakyā bādhitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13297: *{4/129: E1 gibt aupabhṛte jauhave ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13301: aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīti{*4/131*} śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13302: kiṃ tad aupabhṛtam ājyam aṣṭasaṃkhyena grahaṇena saṃskriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13303: uta catuḥsaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā dvayor grahaṇayor iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13304: aṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā, na catuḥsaṃkhye dve iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13313_0: anugrahavādaś ca bhavati - caturgṛhītaṃ vā etad abhūt tasyāghāram āghārya triritaḥ{*4 /132*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13313_1: prācīnaṃ{*4 /133*} prayājān yajati samānayate caturgṛhītatvāyeti caturgṛhītānugrahaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13313_2: kathaṃ syād iti. kiṃ caturgṛhītaṃ bhavati samānayanena?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13317: yad avaśiṣṭaṃ catuḥsaṃkhyam eva tasya grahaṇam āsīt. kiṃ tarhi caturgṛhītatvāyeti. caturgṛhītasyānugrahārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13319: tat paryāptaṃ kathaṃ syād iti. evaṃ caturgṛhītaśabdenālpam iti lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13320: alpatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ kasyacid apekṣya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13321: yadi hy aupabhṛtam aṣṭasaṃkhyam evaṃ caturgṛhītam [464]{*4/134*} alpaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13322: tatra{*4/135*} caturgṛhītaśabdena alpatā śakyate lakṣayitum. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13328: *{4/135: E2 om. caturgṛhītam alpaṃ bhavati, tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13330: dvayos tu hetusāmarthyaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca samānayane // MS_4,1.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13336: asatsv apy anuyājeṣv etad aṣṭagṛhītam evaupabhṛtaṃ bhavet. yadāṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13337: na tadā dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoś caturgṛhītān{*4/137*} ājyānīti bahuvacanam ājyeṣūpapadyate. tasmāc caturgṛhīte dve iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13339: liṅgam etat prāptir ucyatām iti. tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13342: tena prayājānuyājeṣv api na tad aṣṭagṛhītena śakyate bādhitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13348: tad etad ihāṣṭatvam grahaṇe bhavati. kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte home sampādayet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13350: aṣṭagṛhīte gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyete. caturgṛhīte dve nāgṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ{*4/138*} kaścit sampādayet. tasmād dve ete caturgṛhīte iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13355: kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte syātām iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13356: aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīty upabhṛti samānīte dve caturgṛhīte kathaṃ syātām iti. itarathāsaty aṣṭaśabde nānāpātrayor gṛhyeyātām. tasmād aṣṭaśabdaśravaṇam adoṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13359: dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoḥ samānayane 'rdhaṃ samānetavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13360: aṣṭagṛhīte sati na niyogato 'rdham. tathā yatrānuyājārthaṃ na grahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13362: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā ca siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13367: *{4/138: E2: na hi dve caturgṛhīte agṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13372: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/140*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13375: rohite badhnātīti. tat saṃnidhāv idam aparam āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13376: svaruṇā paśum anakti yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13379: uta yūpaṃ kriyamāṇam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. tatredaṃ tāvan naḥ parīkṣyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13383: bhedena yūpān niṣpādyeta. na cet prayojakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13384: yūpaṃ niṣpadyamānam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahīṣyata iti. sa kathaṃ prayojakaḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13385: kathaṃ vā na prayojaka iti. yady eṣā vacanavyaktiḥ, svaruśabdavācyaṃ bhāvyate. kathaṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13390: svaruṇā paśum anaktīty anavagataḥ svaruḥ. etāvad asya{*4/142*} vijñāyate 'ñjanaṃ tena kriyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13392: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti yūpaikadeśaṃ svarukārye 'ñjane viniyuṅkta iti tato 'prayojakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13397: svakarmaśabdatvāt. svo hy asya karmaśabdaḥ svarutāyā vidhāyako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13398: svaruṃ karotīti. evaṃ ca yūpakāṣṭāvayavasya svarutvaṃ kriyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13402: svaruṃ karotīti svarum utpādayatīti. yūpāvayavopādānaṃ vākyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13403: vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasīti. tasmād evaṃ sati na niyogato yūpakāṣṭhād eva svarur utpādayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13404: nirapekṣād anyasmād api vṛkṣāt kartavyo bhedeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13412: itaś ca nirapekṣasya svaror utpattir iti gamyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13413: jātyantarād apy āśaṅkā bhavati, vṛkṣāntarāt{*4/144*}. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13417: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na hi yūpam anuniṣpannasya garhaṇe jātyantarāśaṅkāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13418: yūpaśakalo hi svarukārye tadānīṃ viniyujyate. tasmād api bhedena yūpāt svarur utpādayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13422: tad ekadeśo vā svarutvasya tannimittatvāt // MS_4,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13423: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yūpaikadeśo hi yūpam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13424: evam āmnāyate - yady anyasya vṛkṣasya svaruṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13426: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na cātrāyam artho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13428: svarukāryaṃ kartuṃ yam upādatte, taṃ yūpād iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13451: yūpasyeti tu śabdo 'vivakṣitārtho bhavati. tatra śrutir api bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13452: vākyam api. na tv asmatpakṣe kiṃcid avivakṣitārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13454: yūpaśakalo vidhāyiṣyate. svaruśabdaś cāñjanārthena śakale upacarita iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13455: avayavaprasiddhiś caitam arthaṃ gamayiṣyati. bhavati hi brāhmaṇam - atha kasmāt svarur nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13465: itaś ca yūpam anuniṣpannasya grahaṇam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13469: sa svaruḥ kārya iti. śakalaś caikadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13471: saṃbandhiśabdatvāt. tāvatā ca vyavahārāt samudāyāpekṣiṇaḥ. tatra prakaraṇād anyārthena khadirādinā joṣaṇādikarmaviśiṣṭena yāgārthena prakṛtenāsyaikavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13474: takṣati ca. tatra yaḥ śakalaḥ prathamaḥ parāptitas taṃ ca svarum añjanārthaṃ karotīti. svaruśabdaṃ ca tatrānuvadann evopacarati. tasmān naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13476: [469]{*4/148*} yenānyasmād api vṛkṣād iti śaṅkyate. tasmāj jātyantarāśaṅkāvacanaṃ nityānuvādo yūpaśakalastutyarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13481: itaś ca na pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ svaruḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13485: anupūrvaṃ svarubhiḥ paśūn samajya{*4/149*} madhyame raśanāguṇe sve sve{*4/150*} svaṃ svaṃ yūpaśakalam upagūhatīti svarubahutvaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13487_0: eka evaikādaśinyāṃ tantreṇa kāryaṃ sādhayet. yūpam anuniṣpannasya tu grahaṇe prakṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:13487_1: svayūpaśakalenāñjanaṃ kṛtam ity ekādaśinyām api codakaḥ svayūpaśakalam eva prāpayatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13487_2: bahutvam upapannaṃ bhavati. svayūpaśakalagrahaṇaṃ ca prākṛtasya grahaṇād adhyavasīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13490: na viśiṣṭa iti. tasmāt svarur utpatter na prayojaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13493: *{4/150: So E1,6, E2 (Fn.); E2 om. sve sve}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13502: svarum ādatta iti. yathā kāṣṭhāni karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13506: *{4/151: Die Ausgaben wiederholen zwischen MS 4.2.6 und 4.2.7 noch einmal MS 4.2.1-6 mit kürzerer,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13512: prācīm āharaty udīcīm āharati prāgudīcīm āharatīti{*4/152*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ digvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13513: uta śākhāvāda iti. digvāda iti prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13515: śākhāvāde lakṣaṇeti. tasmād digvāda iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13522: vākye śākhāśabdasyābhāvād anupapanno 'yaṃ saṃbandhaḥ. atha prakṛtā śākheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13523: tataḥ prācīśabdena tasyā evābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13525: prakaraṇāc chākhāśabdena bhavet. ubhayathātra prācīśabdo lakṣaṇayā prakṛtāṃ vā śākhāṃ lakṣayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13534: sarvasyaiva deśasya kutaścit prāgbhāvāt. tathā śākhāśabdo 'pi saṃbandhiśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13535: vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate. yadā vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13539: tathā ca saṃvyavahāro 'vakalpate. yat tu śākhāvāde [473]{*4/154*} lakṣaṇeti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13540: bhavati lakṣaṇayāpi śabdārthaḥ. tasmāc chākhāvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13543: *{4/153: E2: īpsitatamaṃ yuktam; E6, E2 (Fn.): īpsitamayuktam; E2 (Fn.): īpsitatamaṃ saṃyuktam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13546: śākhāyāṃ tatpradhānatvād upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ syād vaiṣamyaṃ tat // MS_4,2.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13548: mūlataḥ śākhāṃ parivāsyopaveṣaṃ karotīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13555: ubhayaṃ ca prayojanavat. agreṇa vatsāpākaraṇādi kariṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13562: śākhāpradhānatvād{*4/156*} upaveṣeṇa vibhāgo bhavet. śākhām anuniṣpanno gṛhyate. kathaṃ tatprādhānyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13563: śākhāṃ parivāsyeti dvitīyānirdeśāt. nanūpaveṣaṃ karotīty api dvitīyā. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13564: nāsau parivāsayateḥ karma. kasya tarhi? karoteḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13568: śākhāśabdaś ca yathaivāgre tathā mūle 'pi. tatrāyam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13576: nanu prakṛtatvān mūlam upaveṣaśabdena saṃbadhyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13577: ubhayasaṃbandhe virodhaḥ. virodhe ca prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. atha saṃnihitena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13578: tathāpi śākhāprayuktenety āpatati. ataḥ{*4/159*} siddham eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13579: uvaveṣo{*4/160*} na prayojayati chedanam iti. etad atra vaiṣamyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13591: śākhayā dohayatīty{*4/162*}evamādiṣu śākhāgrahaṇeṣu nopaveṣasya vyāpāras tataḥ śākhāśabdo 'paiti. na hi tanmūlaṃ śākhety ācakṣate. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13596: amūlaparivāsitatvāt. yac caivaṃ saṃskṛtayā śākhayā kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13597: tadarthaṃ chedanam. na copadhānaṃ mūlaparivāsitayā kriyate. tasmān na tadarthaṃ chedanam. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13598: paurṇamāsyām api śākhotpādyā, yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā siddhāntaḥ, tathā notpādayitavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13604: haraṇe tu juhotir yogasāmānyād dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvāt // MS_4,2.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13605: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13608: haraṇe tu juhotiḥ syāt, arthakarmety arthaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13611: saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. sahayoge yatra tṛtīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13613: yatra dvitīyā tasya prādhānyam. prastare ca vispaṣṭo yajiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13614: śākhāpi tasminn eva yajau prastarasya viśeṣaṇam, samānayogitvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13619: dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvād utpattyā cikīrṣitasya śeṣabhūtāny eva dravyāṇy upadiśyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13620: bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. tasmād anekaguṇataiva dravyānāṃ nyāyyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13625: pratipattir vā śākhāpraharaṇam, śabdasya tatpradhānatvāt. śabdo 'tra śākhāpradhānaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13632: yadi śākhāpi prahriyate. tena tulyayoge sahaśabdo 'yam. yadi prastaraḥ praharaṇe pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13634: na tarhi{*4/165*} tulyayogaḥ. tasmād yaḥ prastare dvitīyārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13638: tasyām anyatropadiśyamānāyām anekaguṇabhāvaḥ{*4/166*}. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13639: dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ hitvādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. kṛtaprayojanāyāḥ śākhāyā apanayanena vedivivecanāt sukhapracāro dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13640: na tu prahareṇa kiṃcit sūkṣmam api dṛṣṭam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13643: nanu tṛtīyāśravaṇāt parārthena śākhoccāraṇena bhavituṃ nyāyyam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13646: tataḥ prastarasya kālaparicchedāya kīrtyamānā parārthā uccāryeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13648: nirjñātakālaḥ prastaro 'nirjñātakālā śākhā. tasmāt saty api tṛtīyāśravaṇe prastara eva śākhāyāḥ kālaṃ paricchetsyati. yathā dvitīyānirdiṣṭaḥ{*4/168*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13651: tathā prastaraḥ. sāmarthyaṃ hi balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13660: āha, nanu guṇabhāve 'pi dvitīyā bhavati{*4/170*}, yathā saktu mārutaikakapāleṣu{*4/171*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13665: na, tasyānadhikārād arthasya ca kṛtatvāt // MS_4,2.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13668: iha ca śākhayānyasyārthasya kṛtatvād vatsāpākaraṇādeḥ. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13669: nanu punaruktam etat saktvādīnāṃ pradarśanaṃ samādhiś ceti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13672: granthabhayena{*4/172*} punaruktaṃ necchanti. arthāgrahaṇāt tu{*4/173*} bibhyataḥ punar{*4/174*} punar abhidhīyamānaṃ bahu manyanta eva. kiṃ cintāyāḥ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13673: yady arthakarma, paurṇamāsyām api śākhotpādyā, atha pratipattir notpādayitavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13681: utpattyasaṃyogāt praṇītānām ājyavad vibhāgaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13682: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - apaḥ praṇayaty āpo vai śraddhā śraddhām evālabhya yajata iti{*4/176*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13687: kim ubhayam āsāṃ prayojakaṃ saṃyavanaṃ ninayanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13688: uta saṃyavanārthānāṃ ninayanaṃ pratipattir iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13690: ubhābhyām utpannānāṃ saṃyogaḥ. tasmān na gamyate viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13692: kaścid yāgaḥ{*4/179*} saṃyavane kaścin ninayana iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13694: yathā sarvasmai vā etad yajñāya gṛhyate yad dhruvāyām ājyam iti{*4/180*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13697: *{4/177: E2: praṇītānām utpannānāṃ vyāpāraḥ śrūyate, praṇītābhir}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13702: saṃyavanārthānāṃ vā pratipattir itarāsāṃ tatpradhānatvāt // MS_4,2.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13706: dvitīyānirdeśāc ca ninayane prādhānyam. cintāyāḥ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13713: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat yajñāyātiṣṭhamānā sā vanaspatīn prāviśat saiṣā vāg vanaspatiṣu vadati. yā dundubhau yā ca{*4/182*} tūṇave yā ca{*4/183*} vīṇāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13714: yad dīkṣitāya daṇḍaṃ{*4/184*} prayacchati vācam evāvarundhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13715: krīte{*4/185*} some maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ prayacchatīti{*4/186*}. maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ prayacchatīty etad udāharaṇam. tatra saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13716: kiṃ dīkṣitadhāraṇe śeṣabhūtasya daṇḍasya maitrāvaruṇadhāraṇaṃ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13719: dīkṣitadhāraṇe kṛtārthatvāt. daṇḍena dīkṣayantīti{*4/187*} śeṣabhūtasyānyatra vyāpāraḥ{*4/188*} pratipattir nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13720: yathā cātvāle kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāṃ prāsyatīti kaṇḍūyane śeṣabhūtāyāḥ prāsanaṃ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13721: evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. dvitīyā ca daṇḍe vibhaktiḥ. tasmāt prādhānyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13734: kartṛsaṃyogo bhavati. maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam iti kartṛdaṇḍasaṃyogo bhavati{*4/189*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13736: puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ. puruṣaṃ hi sa pracarituṃ samarthaṃ karoti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13737: yathā pūrvaṃ{*4/190*} tamo 'vagāhate 'paḥ sarpati{*4/191*} gāṃ ca sarpaṃ ca vārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13738: avalambanaṃ ca bhavati. ataḥ puruṣaprādhānyān na pratipattiḥ. sragvac ca draṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13739: yathā srajam udgātre dadāti [479]{*4/192*} ity{*4/193*} asaty apy upakāre puruṣasya prayojanavattvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13742: evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān na pratipattir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13743: atha yad uktam - dvitīyāśravaṇād daṇḍaprādhānyam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13744: tathā yuktaṃ{*4/194*} cānīpsitam iti dvitīyā draṣṭavyā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13745: maitrāvaruṇe caturthīnirdeśāt. saṃpradāne hi caturthī bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13746: saṃpradānaṃ ca karmaṇābhipreyate. tatra daṇḍād abhipretataro maitrāvaruṇa iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13748: *{4/189: E1,6 und E2 (Fn.); E2 om. kartṛdaṇḍasaṃyogo bhavati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13757: tena pracarato daṇḍaṃ pradarśayati. tad arthakaramaṇi saty upapadyate. pratipattau tu daṇḍo maitrāvaruṇāya dattas tato 'pavṛjyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13758: kṛtaṃ ca kartavyam iti na{*4/195*} tena prayojam iti na dhāryeta. tatraitaddarśanaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13760: ahis tvāṃ daśatīti maitrāvaruṇaṃ brūyād ahir iva hy eṣa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13762: muśalyan vāheti. muśalaśabdaś ca daṇḍe prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13763: yathā kva nu khalu{*4/197*} muśalino māṇavakā gaṅgāṃ avatareyur{*4/198*} iti. tasmād apy arthakarma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13765: *{4/195: E2: 'pavṛjyeta. tatkarma kartavyaṃ ca kṛtam iti na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13766: *{4/196: E2: iva yena draṣṭavya iti. tathā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13770: utpattau yena saṃyuktaṃ tadarthaṃ tac chrutihetutvāt tasyārthāntaragamane śeṣatvāt pratipattiḥ syāt // MS_4,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13775: [480]{*4/199*} tat tadartham eva nyāyyam. tasyānyatra gamane pratipattir ity etad upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13776: yadi na dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ bhavati. iha tu dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya dhāraṇae{*4/200*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13779: viṣāṇāyāḥ kaṇḍūyanaṃ prāsanaṃ cobhayam api prayojakam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13780: ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti. utttaraḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13781: kaṇḍūyane tṛtīyānirdeśād viṣāṇāyā guṇabhāvaḥ. prāsane ca dvitīyānirdeśāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13790: varuṇagṛhītaṃ vaitad yajñasya yadṛjīṣaṃ yadgrāvāṇa yadaunduvarī{*4/203*} yadabhiṣavaṇaphalake,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13791: tasmād yatkiṃcit somaliptaṃ dravyaṃ tenāvabhṛthaṃ yantīti{*4/204*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13795: kṛtārthatvāt, kṛtārthāny etāni dravyāṇi tatra tatra, teṣām avabhṛthagamanaṃ pratipattir nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13810: pratipattir vā tan nyāyatvād deśārthāvabhṛthaśrutiḥ // MS_4,2.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13814: tad iha yadi somaliptaṃ dravyam avabhṛthe karaṇaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13816: tataḥ pratipattiḥ. na hy atra somaliptaṃ vidhīyate 'vabhṛthe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13817: tathā saty avabhṛthasomaliptasaṃbandho 'bhyavayantīty anenākhyātena vidhīyeta. tatra vākyena vidhānaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13819: yāne 'munā vidhīyamāne{*4/205*} śrutyā vidhānam. tat parigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13827: taṃ deśaṃ yantīti. tasmāt pratipattir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13832: idaṃ śrūyate - paśubandhasya yajñakratoḥ ṣaḍ ṛtvijaḥ{*4/206*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13849: tena prayogacodanayaiva prāptānām anuvādaḥ. nanu viṣamādipratiṣedhārtham etad vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13868: tasmād vidhir iti. nanu prayogāṅgatvāt prāpta eveti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13875: na tadā samaḥ. sa eṣa samaḥ prāptaś cāprāptaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13877: sa pakṣo vidhiṃ prayojayati. ato viṣamacikīrṣāyām api samo vidhīyate. tasmād viṣamasyāprāptir vidhau sati bhavatīti samo vidhīyate. evam itareṣv api, tasmād vidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13880: adhikaraṇapradeśo 'yam{*4/215*}. idam āmamanti - vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ{*4/216*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13881: somāraudraṃ ghṛte caruṃ nirvapec chuklānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ brahmavarcaskāmaḥ{*4/217*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13883: nairṛtaṃ caruṃ nirvapet kṛṣṇānāṃ vrīhīṇām iti{*4/218*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13888: pakṣe prāptasya niyamārtha{*4/219*} iti. pakṣoktaṃ prayojanam ubhayor apy adhikaraṇayoḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13897: ayam apy adhikaraṇāpradeśaḥ. darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - vrīhīn avahanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13909: yajati dadāti juhotīty evaṃlakṣaṇam. atha kiṃlakṣaṇako yajatijuhotir{*4/220*} dadātiś ceti. yajaticodanā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13916: dravyadevatākriyasyārthasya yajatiśabdena pratyāyanaṃ [484]{*4/225*} kriyata iti. lakṣaṇakarmaṇi prayojanaṃ na vaktavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13921: *{4/222: E2: dravyaṃ devatām uddiśya tyajyate, tasya ca kriyā, yathā kriyayā tayoḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13922: *{4/223: E1 gibt yayā tayoḥ saṃbandho bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13923: *{4/224: E1 gibt samuditeṣv eṣu in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13926: tadukte śravaṇāj juhotir āsecanādhikaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13927: atha kiṃlakṣaṇako juhotir iti. tad ukte yajaty ukte 'rthe{*4/226*} juhotiḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13929: hutam anenety evaṃjātīyake vaktāro bhavanti loke. vede 'pi yajaticoditaṃ juhotinānuvadati - saṃgrāmiṇaṃ caturhotrā yājayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13932: atha dadātiḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaka iti. ātmanaḥ svatvavyāvṛttiḥ parasya svatvena saṃbandhaḥ. yajatidadātijuhotiṣu sarveṣūtsargaḥ samānaḥ. tatra yajatir devatām uddiśyotsargamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13934: dadāti{*4/227*} utsargapūrvakaḥ parasvatvena saṃbandha ity eṣa eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13937: *{4/226: E1 gibt yajaty ukte 'rthe in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13941: vidheḥ karmāpavargitvād arthāntare vidhipradeśaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13954: sa viṣṇumitrasya kartavya iti devadattād ācchidya viṣṇumitrāya dīyata iti. ataḥ paradravyasyopdeśa iti. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13955: tathā saty ātithyāyāṃ tasya vidhānaṃ yat pūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13960: tathā saty arthavad ātithyāyāṃ tad vacanam. niriṣṭikena{*4/231*} tūpasadaḥ kartavyā bhavanti{*4/232*}. na caiṣa śiṣṭānām ācāraḥ. na ca sarve codakaprāptā dharmā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13961: ato brūmaḥ - vidheḥ karmāpavargitvād arthāntare vidhipradeśaḥ syāt. tad barhiḥ parisamāptāyām ātithyāyām apavṛktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13963_0: upasatkāle{*4 /234*} ātithyāsaṃbandhas tasya nāsti. bhūtapūrveṇātithyayā karmaṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13963_1: lakṣyeta. lakṣaṇā[486]{*4 /235*}śabdaś ca na nyāyyaḥ. tasmād ātithyābarhiṣa āñjasyābhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13964: tad dharmakam upasadām agnīṣomīyasya ceti nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13974: api votpattisaṃyogād arthasaṃbandho 'viśiṣṭānāṃ prayogaikatvahetuḥ syāt // MS_4,2.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13975: api veti pakṣo vyāvartate. utpattisaṃyoga evaiṣo 'sya barhiṣaḥ. yadi hy utpannam ātithyāyāṃ barhir viśiṣṭaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13977: na tu tad asti kenacid vākyena. evaṃ{*4/236*} prakṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13979: vidhṛtī caikṣavyāv iti. tena na paravihitaṃ barhir ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13981: na kutaścid dharmā pratidiśyante. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13989: sādhāraṇo barhiṣaḥ prayogaḥ. evaṃ śrutiḥ śabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13992: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt trayāṇāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ barhir iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14000: dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syāt // MS_4,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14003: sarasā asyāhutayo bhavanti. yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14004: na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīti. yasyāśvatthy upabhṛd bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14007: praty evāsyāhutayas tiṣṭhanti. atho praiva jāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14010: nāsyāparūpam ātman jāyata iti{*4/240*}. tathā jyotiṣṭomasaṃskāre{*4/241*} phalaśrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14017: mṛtā vā eṣā tvag amedhyaṃ vāsyaitad ātmani śamalaṃ tad evopahate medhya eva medham evam upaiti{*4/243*}. karmaṇi phalaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14018: abhīṣū vā etau yajñasya yad ādhārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14019: cakṣuṣī vā etau yajñasya yad ājyabhāgau{*4/244*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14023: atra saṃdehaḥ, kim ime phalavidhayaḥ, utārthavādā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14029: evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ. phalārthavādā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14035: āghārāv ājyabhāgau prayājānuyājāś cāgneyādiṣu. yadi phale 'pi guṇabhāvaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14036: anyatropadiṣṭānām anyatra punar guṇabhāva upadiṣṭa iti pratijñāyeta. na caitan nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14052: *{4/249: E2 gibt juhvā homam abhinirvartayati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14055: athocyeta - puruṣam api prati guṇabhāva upadiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14056: yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotītyevamādibhir vākyair iti. tac ca na. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14059: pālāśyā juhvāpāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ{*4/251*} kriyata iti na{*4/252*} kaścic chabda āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14065: tasyāpāpaślokaśravaṇam iti. tatra juhvā tat kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14066: juhūr vā tadartheti, naitac chabda āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14069: yatas tasyāṃ satyāṃ tad bhavatīti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14075: tatraiva kāryakāraṇasaṃbandhaḥ. iha tu tadbhāve [489]{*4/254*} bhāvo jñātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14076: nābhāve 'bhāvaḥ. yasya pālāśī na bhavati tasyāpāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ nāstīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14082: lakṣaṇam etat puruṣasya gamyate, tasmān nānumānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14083: api ca, yasyāpi juhūḥ pālāśī bhavati, tasyāpi pāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ bhavati. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14084: pratyakṣataḥ. nanv evaṃ saty agnihotreṇāpi phalaṃ na sādhyeta. na{*4/255*} hutāmātreṇa phalaṃ dṛśyata iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14086: tāvataiva phalaṃ bhavatīti. iha tu vartamānāyāṃ juhūsattāyāṃ vartamānasya pāpaślokaśravaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ. tasmān na tatrānumānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14088: idaṃ kāraṇam iti. agnihotrādiṣu tu śabdenaiva kāryakāraṇasaṃbandha ucyate. tasmāt tatra tatkāle 'dṛśyamāne 'pi phale,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14093: na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīty evam ukte tat eva tat phalaṃ bhavatīti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14094: tasmād ihāpi kālāntare phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14096: pramāṇaṃ tatra kim iti vicārayāmaḥ. na tāvat pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14099: no khalv api śabda ity etad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14102: tad uktam - tadbhūtānām kriyārthena samāmnāya iti{*4/256*}{*4/257*}. tasmād apramāṇamūlatvān mithyāvijñānam etat. laukikeṣu tu vākyeṣv athaivaṃ{*4/258*} gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14103_0: tāni hi vijñāte 'rthe prayujyamānāny adhyāhāryapadāni gauṇāni vipariṇatavyavahitārthāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:14103_1: ca prayujyante. tasmāt tatsādṛśyād vacanāvagamyeṣv apy artheṣu bhavati tattvarūpo mithyāpratyayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14109: tasmān na khādirasruvādisadbhāve tatphalaṃ bhavet. tad evam āpatati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14110: khādirādau sati bhavati tatphalaṃ nāpi bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14111: asaty api bhavati vā na veti. naivaṃ vijñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14112: kutas tatphalam iti. tasmād evaṃjātīyakeṣūccariteṣu na kvacit pravṛttir na kutaścin nivṛttir ity ānarthakyam akriyārthatvāt. arthavāde tu sati bhavati prayojanaṃ khadirādeḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14113: sruvādiṣu karmārtheṣu prayojanavatsu. yady eṣāṃ kratuṃ prati prayojanavattā na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14114_0: tata etad eva phalaṃ kasyācic chabdavṛttyā bhaved vā na veti vicāryeta. sati tu pārārthye
GSP28msbh1-7u:14114_1: naiva kācic chabdapravṛttir āśrayituṃ śakyate. kaimarthye hi sā kalpyeta. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14115: arthavādatve cāvartamāne lakṣaṇayā vartamānaśabdaḥ praśaṃsārtha upapatsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14135: na ca vartamānāpadeśinī. tasmāt tatrāvirodha iti. evaṃ hi padavākyārthanyāyavidaḥ ślokam āmananti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:14136: kuryāt, kriyeta, kartavyam, bhavet, syād iti pañcamam/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14138: vidhivibhaktiṃ hi vidhāyikāṃ liṅgaṃ manyamānāḥ ślokam imaṃ samāmananti{*4/260*}. asti cātra vidhivibhaktiḥ. tasmād anupavarṇanam etad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14144: naimittike vikāratvāt kratupradhānam anyat syāt // MS_4,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14156: mārtikena pratiṣṭhākāmasyety etāni naimittikāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14165: taiḥ prakṛtaiḥ saṃnihitair etāni nirākāṅkṣīkriyanta ity etan nyāyyam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14177: upaspṛśyate ca. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. athavā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14181: tad akāmasaṃbaddhaṃ godohanena praṇayanaṃ prāpayati. na ca śakyaṃ śrutam utsraṣṭum. yo 'py ayam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14187: avivakṣitam iti śakyaṃ vaditum. bhavanti ca dviṣṭhāni{*4/266*} vākyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14190: alambusānāṃ yāteti. tasmān naimittikāny eva nityārthe bhavitum arhantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14191: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, naimittike śrūyamāṇe kratvartham anyat syād iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14192: vikāratvād viśeṣe śrutatvād ity arthaḥ{*4/267*}. viśeṣe hi tatra naimittikaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14193: tad asati tasmin viśeṣe na bhavitum arhati. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14195: avaśyaṃ kartavyatvāt kariṣyante. yat tu nānyad eṣāṃ vihitaṃ sādhanam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14196: sāmānyavihitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na doṣaḥ. kiṃ tat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14200: saṃnihitaiḥ prakṛtair naimittikair brahmasāmādīni saṃbhatsyanta iti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14203: etad api nopapadyate. yady api prakṛtāni nityāni stotrādīni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14207: saṃnidhānād vākyād avagato 'yam artha iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14208: evaṃjātīyako vākyārthaḥ sāmānyaṃ padārthaṃ{*4/268*} bādhitum arhati. nimittasaṃyoge hi bārhadgirādīnām arthavattā. tasmāt tatra tatrānyan naimittikād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14210: avāntaravākyena godohanam api prāpitaṃ na śakyam utsraṣṭum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14215: na hi, idaṃ yugapad bhavati, paripūrṇena cārthābhidhānam avāntaravākyena ceti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14216: praṇayatīti prapūrve nayatau vidhivibhaktiḥ svapadagatam arthaṃ śrutyā vidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14218: vākyena ca. vastu phalasya godohanādeś ca saṃbandhaḥ. sa hitvā śrutyartham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14220: godohanādeś ca phalena saṃbandhaṃ vadatīty ucyate. na{*4/271*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14221: dvyarthābhidhānād bhidyeta nitarāṃ vākyam, na caitan nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14224: bhavet tatra viśeṣānavagamād ubhayārthāvagatiḥ. iha tu gamyate viśeṣaḥ kamipadoccāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14227: kamipadaṃ pramādo bhavet. na cāyaṃ pramādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14228: naivāvāntaravākyārthe vivakṣite kamipadasaṃbandho 'vakalpate. tasmān na dviṣṭhaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14230: na nityakārye bhavitum arhatīti, evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14237: *{4/267: E1 gibt viśeṣe śrutatvād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14239: *{4/269: E1 gibt avivakṣitaṃ kalpayitum in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14247: dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyād iti. tathāgnīṣomīye paśāv āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14250: khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kuryād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14253: pūrveṇa nyāyenānyad iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ekasyobhayatve nityatve naimittikatve ca{*4/273*} saṃyogapṛthaktvaṃ kāraṇam. tad iha saṃyogapṛthaktvam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14259: khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti. tasmān nityārthe kāmāya ca dadhikhādirādīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14262: *{4/273: E1 gibt nityatve naimittikatve ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14265: iti cet paśyasi, kasmān na pūrvasyāyam api śeṣo bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14270: tathā khādirasya vīryam. tac cedaṃ caikaṃ vākyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14277: tathā khādirasya badhnātinā saṃyogo vīryeṇa ca. dvāv etāv arthau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14279: arthaikatvāc caikaṃ vākyaṃ samadhigatam. ihārthadvayena bhidyeta vākyam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14283: tad asaṃbhave guṇaphalasaṃbandham. tatra hy atyantāya śrutir utsṛṣṭā vākyānurodhena syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14284: na ca yugapat saṃbhavāsaṃbhavau saṃbhavataḥ. tasmād yad eva naimittikaṃ tad eva nityārtham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14289: dravyāṇāṃ tu kriyārthānām saṃskāraḥ kratudharmaḥ syāt // MS_4,3.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14294: uta krator iti. prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyena viniyuktaḥ puruṣasyeti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14295: puruṣāṇāṃ kriyārthānāṃ śarīradhāraṇārtho balakaraṇārthaś cāyaṃ saṃskāro vrataṃ nāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14297: prakaraṇānugrahāya. nanu vākyāt puruṣadharma iti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14299: kḹptam itaratra. prayogavacanenopasaṃhṛtaṃ hi tatpradhānasya. tasmāt kratudharmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14314: codanāyāṃ phalāśruteḥ karmamātraṃ vidhīyeta na hy aśabdaṃ pratīyate // MS_4,3.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14318: sarvebhyo vā eṣa devebhyaḥ sarvebhyaś chandobhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya ātmānam āgurate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14320: sa viśvajitātirātreṇa sarvapṛṣṭhena sarvastomena sarvavedasadakṣiṇena yajetety{*4/280*} evaṃlakṣaṇake śrute,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14325: phalāśruteḥ, śabdapramāṇake karmaṇy evaṃjātīyake. na hy aśabdaṃ pratīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14326: nanu vaidikāni karmāṇi phalavanti bhavantīty evam uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14328: na vaidikatvāt. evaṃ tarhi kartavyatāvagamāt phalavantīty adhyavasyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14331: sākṣād dhi tad duḥkhaphalam agacchāmaḥ. na caivaṃjātīyakaṃ pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14337: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmān niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14341: kāmaṃ vākyam anarthakam iti nyāyyaṃ vacanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14344: ṣaḍapūyā{*4/282*} ity evaṃjātīyakāni. nanu viśvajidvyāpāraḥ sukhaphala iti. uttaram{*4/283*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14350: na padārthaḥ. na cātra phalasaṃbaddhaṃ vākyam asti. tasmān nāyam apūrvasya vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14352: sa ca vyāpāro na tadātve sukhaphalaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14355: phalaṃ ca kalpayitvāpūrvam. evam itaretarāśrayaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14356: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na{*4/285*} prakalpante. tasmān niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14367: yathā gacchatu bhavān aneneti. paripūrṇam evedaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14369: evam idam api paripūrṇaṃ vākyaṃ nādhyāhāram arhati. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14374: ekārthaṃ ca vākyaṃ samadhigatam. tasmād anarthakam evaṃjātīyakaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14390: api vāmnānasāmarthyāc codanārthena gamyetārthānāṃ hy arthavattvena vacanāni pratīyante 'rthato hy asamārthānām ānantarye 'py asaṃbandhas tasmāc chrutyekadeśaḥ saḥ // MS_4,3.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14391: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. na caitad asti, aphalam iti, phalacodanā, arthena gamyeta. katamenārthena?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14393: nanu vyāpārasya pratyakṣaviruddhā kartavyatā. na vyāpārasyocyate. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14398: saṃvriyatām apāvriyatām iti{*4/291*}. kathaṃ punar avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14415: ānantaryeṇa manasi viparivartamānam alam eva bhavati viśeṣam upajanayitum. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:14416: itaḥ paśyasi dhāvantaṃ dūre jātaṃ vanaspatim/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14417: tvāṃ bravīmi viśālākṣi yā pinakṣi jarad gavam// [499]{*4/293*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14420: etaiḥ padair vyavahitena jarad gavam ity anena śabdena vyavadhāyakāny apodya saṃbadhyamānaḥ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14421: arthānāṃ hy arthavattvena hetunā vyavahitāny api vacanāni saṃbadhyante. yāni punar arthato hy asamarthāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14422: tāny ānantarye 'pi sati na paraspareṇa saṃbandham arhanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14423: yathā yā pinakṣi jarad gavam ityevamādīni. tasmān na pauruṣeyatā bhaviṣyati. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14427: ananatarāpekṣāyām asaṃbhavantyām āmnānasāmarthyād itarāpekṣāvṛttir āśrīyate. tasmāc chruty ekadeśaḥ saḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14428: phalakāmapadaṃ dūre 'pi sat tasya vākyasyaikadeśabhūtam ity arthaḥ{*4/296*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14435: *{4/296: E1 gibt phalakāmapadaṃ dūre 'pi sat tasya vākyasyaikadeśabhūtam ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14438: indrāya rājñe śūkara{*4/297*} iti{*4/298*} yathā vākyāntarasthena vidhiśabdena guṇavidhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14440: yathā varuṇo vaitam agre pratyagṛhṇād iti{*4/299*} vyavadhāraṇakalpanā. evam{*4/300*} idam api draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14448: tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyuḥ karotīti{*4/301*}. viśvajitā yajeteti phalavad evaṃvidhaṃ karmety etat samadhigatam. idaṃ tu saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14454: idaṃ nāma phalam iti. asti cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14461: ekaṃ phalaṃ{*4/303*} syāt, na vā sarvārtham. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14463: sakāṅkṣatvād etad arthipadena saṃbadhyata ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14467: na tad apareṇāpi saṃbandham arhati. tasmād ekaiva kartavyatācodanā{*4/304*} nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14473: sa svargaḥ syāt, sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt // MS_4,3.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14475: ekaṃ phalam iti. idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14477: uta svarga iti. yatkiṃcid iti prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14481: sarve hi puruṣāḥ svargakāmāḥ. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14482: prītir hi svargaḥ, sarvaś ca prītiṃ prārthayate. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14484: aviśeṣavacanaḥ śabdo na viśeṣe vyavasthāpito bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14485: yajeta kuryād iti. tasmāt svargaphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14491: anādiṣṭaphale karmaṇi svargaḥ phalam iti pratyayo loke,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14497: ittham anena nyāyena svarge saṃpratyayo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14498: yasmāt svargaphaleṣu karmasu kartavyeṣu phalavacanaṃ naivoccārayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14512: phalārthavādasarūpā ete śabdā iti. kiṃ sārūpyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14518: *{4/307: E2: vā ya etā rātrīr upayanti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14522: phalamātreyo nirdeśād aśrutau hy anumānaṃ syāt // MS_4,3.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14523: ātreyaḥ punar ācārya evaṃjātīyakebhyaḥ, phalam astīti mene, na phalārthavāda iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14525: phalacodanayā vākyaśeṣabhūtayā bhavitavyam. tasmād anyā vyavahitā satī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14528: pratiṣṭhayā brahmavarcasasattayā ca samabhivyāhāra āsāṃ pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14530: [502]{*4/310*} āha, kathaṃ kevalaṃ vidhivibhaktimātram anyato bhaviṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14531: yad anena pratiṣṭhādinā dhātvarthena saṃbhantsyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14533: na kevalam. tasmād adoṣaḥ. athavā rātrīṇāṃ yā vidhāyikā vibhaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14534: sā imam api pratiṣṭhādiviśeṣaṃ vidhāsyati prayogavacanena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14535: stutir vā saha pratiṣṭhādibhir vidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14541: yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatītyevamādiṣu{*4/311*} phalaśrutir arthavādo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14546: dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syād iti{*4/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14551: kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargo yathā yajñāṅge kratvarthaḥ // MS_4,3.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14553: sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāma ityevamādīnīti{*4/313*}{*4/314*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14554: kim eṣāṃ svargaḥ phalaṃ kāmaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14556: kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargaḥ syāt. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14557: sarvapuruṣārthābhidhāyī sāmānyavacanaḥ śabdo na viśeṣe 'vasthāpito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14558: śakyate hy asya dūrasthenāpi svargakāmaśabdena saṃbandhaḥ. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14564: kāṣṭhāharaṇe [503]{*4/315*} śākāharaṇam upādhiḥ kriyata iti. kim idam upādhiḥ kriyata iti. kāṣṭhāharaṇādhikārasamīpe dvitīyaṃ karmopadhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14566: idam aparaṃ kartavyam iti. evam ihāpi svargaphale phalam aparam upadhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14567: brahmavarcasakāmo yāgena svargam abhinirvartayed iti. na hi tatra brahmavarcasaphalavacanaṃ svargaphalasya pratiṣedhakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14569: godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed iti. yaḥ paśukāmaḥ sa godohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14577: vītāyāṃ phalecchāyām avāpte vā phale samāptiniyamo dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14581: śvobhūte juhuyād iti{*4/316*}. yadi na svargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14582: kim arthaḥ samāptiniyamo bhavet. tasmān nityaḥ svarga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14592: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmāt kāma eva phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14597: yuktam aṅge guṇatvāt. pratyakṣas tatra ṛtunā saṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14599: sa godohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayed iti. na tv atra pratyakṣaḥ śabdo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14601: sa yāgena [504]{*4/318*} svargam abhinirvartayed iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14602: yo brahmavarcasakāmaḥ syāt, sa tad yāgena nirvartayed iti. tasmān nāṅgavad bhavitum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14610: avāpte vā phale samāptiniyamo dṛśyata iti. tatra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14616: prākramiko 'yaṃ kāpuruṣa iti vadantaḥ. ye hi devebhyaḥ saṃkalpya haviḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14619: tasmād avaśyaṃ samāpayitavyam. tatraitad darśanaṃ yuktaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14620: yadi varṣet tāvaty eva juhuyād iti{*4/319*}. tasmāt kāmyānāṃ kāma eva phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14642: varṣet parjanya iti nīcaiḥ sado minuyād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14643: tad vihitam evedam abhidhīyata ity anuvādaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyāmahe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14652: pradhānābhidhānena ca pradhānasya sarvaphalavattā vihitā. tasmān nānuvādaḥ. athāṅgakāmān aṅgāṅgakāmāṃś cāpekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14654: śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā garīyasī. tasmāt prayogavacanena vidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14658: pradhāne sarvakāmānāṃ vidhir iti. idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14661: sakṛt prayoge sarve kāmā iti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14665: ko 'tra khalu kāmo na bhaviṣyatīti. tasmād yaugapadyena sarve kāmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14671: na caitad asti, sarve yugapat kāmā iti, paryāyo yogasiddhiḥ, paryāyeṇa bhaveyuḥ kāmā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14681: ye sarve kāmās tebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭomaś ceti. na sarve kāmāḥ karmaṇaḥ śrūvante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14682: ye sarve kāmās tebhyo hi karma vidhīyate. tasmān na kāmānāṃ sāhityaṃ gamyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14689: vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrahāyaṇīṃ{*4/326*} nirvaped grāmakāma iti{*4/327*}. teṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14696: na hy anantaranirvṛtte{*4/329*} karmaṇi phalam upalabhyate paśvādi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14700: tatkālaṃ mardana[507]{*4/330*}sukham. yac ca kālāntara upalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14701: tasyāpy anyad eva kāraṇam asti pratyakṣam{*4/331*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14702: śarīragrahaṇasya tu nādṛṣṭādṛte kiṃcit kāraṇam asti. tasmād viśiṣṭendriyaśarīrādi phalaṃ paśusaṃbandhasamarthaṃ paśuphalāt karmaṇo bhavatīty evaṃ boddhavyam. tad dhi darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14706: amuṣmai kāmāya yajñā āhriyanta iti janmāntaraphalatāṃ darśayati. tasmāj janmāntaraphalāni kāmyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14714: *{4/328: E1 gibt amuṣmil loke in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14727: iha janmani na saṃbhavatīti. yac cānantaraṃ nopalabhyata iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14729: śabdena tv asti gatiḥ{*4/336*}. yat tu kālāntare 'nyat kāraṇam iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14731: etad api. yac cāmuṣmai kāmāya yajñā āhriyanta iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14733: iha yasya phalaṃ tena tvāṃ na yājayāmi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14734: yasyāmutra phalaṃ tena ca yājayiṣyāmīti. tasmād etat parihṛtam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14744: uta kālārthaḥ saṃyoga iti. aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandha iti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14747: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmād agnyaṅgaṃ sautrāmaṇī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14755: evaṃ cet paśyasi, aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandha iti, atha kālavidhānaṃ kasmān na bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14756: kālavidhirūpo hi śabdaḥ, citvā cayane 'bhinirvṛtta{*4/340*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14761: naitad evam, asamavāyāt. śabdaprayojanena śabdārthenety arthaḥ{*4/341*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14763: *{4/341: E1 gibt śabdārthenety arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14766: tenāsamavāyaḥ syāt saugrāmaṇyā vājapeyena ca bṛhaspatisavasya. prakaraṇaṃ ca bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14769: itarathā tayoḥ prakaraṇe 'nyasya dharmaḥ kālo gamyeta. tasmād aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14773: saṃsthāpya paurṇamāsīṃ vaimṛdham anunirvapatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14778: prakaraṇa [509]{*4/342*} ubhayor āmnānasāmarthyāt, kālavidhisārūpyāc ca saṃsthāpyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14785: ekasminn eva vākye na dvau saṃbandhau śaknoti vidhātum. vaimṛdhasya darśapūrṇamāsābhyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14786: pūrṇamāsīkālena ca. ekārthatvād dhy ekaṃ vākyaṃ samadhigatam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14789: prakaraṇād iti yad uktam, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14794: tad darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ vā prakaraṇād ekavākyabhāvam iyāt. pratyakṣaṃ vā paurṇamāsyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14797: parokṣaḥ kālena. tasmāt paurṇamāsyāṅgaṃ vaimṛdha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14799: anutpattau tu kālaḥ syāt prayojanena saṃbandhāt // MS_4,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14800: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś caranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14801: prahṛtya paridhīñ juhoti hāriyojanam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14804: kālavidhāne lakṣaṇā. tasmād aṅgavidhānam iti prāpte [510]{*4/343*} brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14807: anuyājāḥ paśvaṅgam. tatra na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. tathā paridhayaḥ paśvaṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14808: hāriyojanam anyad eva pradhānam. anuyājā āgnimārutaṃ ca prāptam. ānantaryam eva tayor na prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14809: tad vidhīyate. tathā hāriyojanasya paridhigrahaṇasya ca. evaṃ ca sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14810: na hāriyojanasya paridhipraharaṇena kaścid upakāraḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14811: hāriyojanena vā paridhipraharaṇasya. nanu paridhipraharaṇasyopariṣṭād bhāvena tasyopakriyeteti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14812: na hy uparibhāvārthaṃ paridhipraharaṇam anuṣṭheyam. vidyata evaitat paśvartham. tasmiṃś ca sati tasyoparibhāvo vidyata eveti. tasmāt kālārthaḥ saṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14816: utpattikālaviṣaye kālaḥ syād vākyasya tatpradhānatvāt // MS_4,3.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14818: darśapūrṇamāsau{*4/344*} iṣṭvā somena yajeteti{*4/345*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14825: vākyasya tatpradhānatvāt. kālapradhānaṃ hy etad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14831: sā tasya devatā bhavati. śrutyā hi devatā gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14832: na pratyakṣādibhiḥ. tasmān nāpūrvasya yāgasya vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14834: vihitadevatāko hy anūdyate. tasmād [511]{*4/347*} atra kālārthaḥ saṃbandha iti. tac ca darśayati - eṣa vai devaratho yad darśapūrṇamānsau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14836_0: rathaspaṣṭa evāvasāne vare devānām avasyatīti. pradarśite mārge rathena yātuṃ{*4 /348*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14836_1: sukhaṃ bhavati. evaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāv iṣṭvā somena yaṣṭuṃ{*4 /349*} sukhaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14836_2: darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtīni tasya dīkṣaṇīyādīni svabhyas tāni bhavanti. evam arthavādo 'rthavān bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14840: *{4/346: E2: katham atatparatāsya; E2 (Fn.): kathaṃ vāgrūpāvacanād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14845: phalasaṃyogas tv acodite na syād aśeṣabhūtatvāt // MS_4,3.38 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14846: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta iti{*4/350*}. tatra{*4/351*} saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14849: nemāni phaladāni parasya bhavanti karmāṇi. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14851: yathā yady ekaṃ kapālaṃ naśyed eko māsaḥ saṃvatsarasyāpetaḥ syāt. atha yajamānaḥ pramīyeta dyāvāpṛthivīyam ekakapālaṃ nirvapet. yadi dve naśyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14852: dvau māsau saṃvatsarasyāpetau syātām. atha yajamānaḥ pramīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14853: āśvinaṃ dvikapālaṃ nirvapet. saṃkhyāyodvāsayati yajamānasya gopīthāyeti{*4/352*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14854: kapālanāśe nimitta ātmaniḥśreyasaphalaṃ karma darśayati. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14858: phalavacanaṃ śeṣabhūtaṃ putrasya, na pituḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14860: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte. yad aṣṭākapālo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14863: trivṛtaivāsamiṃs tejo dadhāti. yad daśakapālo virājaivāsmin annādyaṃ dadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14864: yad ekādaśakapālas triṣṭubhaivāsminn indriyaṃ dadhāti. yad dvādaśakapālo jagatyaivāsmin paśūn dadhāti. yasmiñ jāta etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14865: pūta eva sa tejasvy annād indriyāvī paśumān bhavatīti{*4/354*}. yo jātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14867: nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. tasmāt putrasya phalam iti. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14868: na parasya phaladāny etāni karmāṇīti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14872: etām evātmanaḥ prītim abhipretya bhavati vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14875: ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14879: yasmiñ jāta etām iṣṭaṃ nirvapati pūta eva sa tejasvy annād indriyāvī paśumān bhavatīti. tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14886: yady ekaṃ kapālaṃ naśyed ityevamādi. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14888: nānyathā. na hi kapāle naṣṭe tad anveṣaṇārthā iṣṭir yuktā. na hi kākinyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ tad anveṣaṇaṃ kārṣāpaṇena kriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14892: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta iti{*4/356*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14894: uta kṛte jātakarmaṇīti. jātamātra iti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14895: saṃprāpte hi nimitte naimittikena bhavitavyam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14897: sāmarthyāt. kṛte hi jātakarmaṇi prāśanaṃ tasya vidhīyate. yadi prāg jātakarmaṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14899: prāśanakālo viprakṛṣyeta. tatrāsya śarīradhāraṇaṃ na syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14901: saṃprāpte nimitte hi naimittikena bhavitavyam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14905: tac ca nimittam. kṛte 'pi jātakarmaṇi nāpaiti. itarasmin pakṣe kālo 'peyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14906: lakṣaṇā cāsmin pakṣe syāt. tasmāt kṛte jātakarmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14907: atha kim antardaśāhe yasmin kasmin vāhani, uta svakāla iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14908: yasmin kasmin vāhanīti, evam aniyamaḥ prāptaḥ. atrocyate, paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14911: ya iṣṭvā{*4/357*} paśunā somena vā yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14912: sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā yajeteti. nātibhāro vacanasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14913_0: itarasmin pakṣe kālo 'peyāt. lakṣaṇāpy asmin pakṣe syāt. anyasyāṃ tithāvantardaśāhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:14913_1: vā kurvan sarvāṇy aṅgāny upasaṃhartuṃ na śaknuyāt. kālaṃ śaucaṃ ca [514]{*4 /358*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14913_2: nopasaṃgṛhṇīyāt. tasmād atīte daśāhe paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kuryād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14923: aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandha ity uktam. etad idānīṃ saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14926: uta svakāle kartavyam iti. tathā vājapeye kiṃ bṛhaspatisave,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14927: uta svakāla iti. mukhyakālatvam anayoḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14928: pradhānākālatvād aṅgānām. eko hi kālaḥ pradhānānām aṅgānāṃ ceti vakṣyate{*4/360*}. aṅgāni tu vidhānatvāt pradhānenopadiśyerann iti. agnicayanaṃ kṛtvā na tāvaty eva sthātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14929: sautrāmaṇīsaṃjñako 'paro yāgaḥ kartavya iti. tathā vājapeyam abhinirvartya naitāvatā kṛtī syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14935: apavṛtte tu codanā tatsāmānyāt svakāle syāt // MS_4,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14937: apavṛttiś ca sarveṣu yāgāṅgeṣv akṛteṣu na bhavati. na yathā bhavān manyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14945: na tv evam asti. tasmād yathoktāni sarvāṇy aṅgāni kṛtvety arthaḥ. evaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14947: atikrānte vājapeyakāle yāga prayujyate. tasya codanāsāmānyāj jyotiṣṭaumike vidhyante prāpte svena codakaprāptena kālena bhavitavyam. sautrāmaṇyāś codanāsāmānyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14950: vājapeye tāvad iṣṭvetivacanād yāgam abhinirvartyeti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14951: agnau tu nopapadyate. tatra citvetivacanāc cayanam abhinirvartyety arthaḥ syāt. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14952: naitad evam. agniṃ citveti hi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14953: agni cayanena saṃskṛtyety arthaḥ{*4/363*}. agnir iti jvalano 'bhidhīyate. na tasya sthalasthāpanamātram upakāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14955: tataś cayanenāgner upakāro 'sti. tam abhinirvartyeti sthalasthite 'gnau yāgam abhinirvartyeti gamyate. yāvat sthalasthite 'gnau yāgo na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14956: na tāvad agniś cayanenopakriyate. yenāgnir yajamānasyopakaroti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14957: so 'gner upakāro na sthalasthāpanamātram. tasmāt tatrāpi yāgam abhinirvartyeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14961: *{4/362: E1 gibt vājapeyena phalasya vyāpāraṃ kṛtvā in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14962: *{4/363: E1 gibt agni cayanena saṃskṛtyety arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14969: valmīkavapāyāṃ homa ityevamādīni dārvihomikāni. tathā yaṣṭauhīṃ dīvyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14975: sa eṣa rūpavatāṃ yāgānāṃ saṃnidhāv{*4/366*} arūpaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ samudāyavācakaḥ samadhigataḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14976: kiṃ sarveṣām anumatyādīnāṃ samudāyasya rājasūyaśabdo vācakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14977: uta keṣāṃcid vācakaḥ keṣāṃcin neti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14980: prakaraṇaśabdaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāno rājasūyeneti. rājā tatra sūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14981: tasmād rājasūyaḥ. rājño vā yajño rājasūyaḥ. tat prakaraṇasaṃnidhāne sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14982: viśeṣābhāve ca sarveṣāṃ vācako bhavitum arhati. yaś ca rājasūyaśabditas tataḥ phalaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sarvāṇi pradhānānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14989: api vāṅgam anijyāḥ syus tato viśiṣṭatvāt // MS_4,4.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14990: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. yā anijyās tā aṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14991: yathā videvanādayaḥ. rājasūyasaṃjñakena yāgena svārājyaṃ kuryād ity ucyamāne yāgenaiva svārājyaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14992: nāyāgena. ayāgāś ca videvanādayaḥ. tasmād aṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14997: yaṣṭauhīṃ dīvyatīti videvanādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ. te kim abhiṣecanīyasyāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15002: sarvāsāṃ vā samatvāc codanātaḥ syān na hi tasya prakaraṇaṃ deśārtham ucyate madhye // MS_4,4.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15003: sarvāsāṃ cānumatyādīnāṃ codanānām aṅgaṃ videvanādi syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15006: tāḥ sarvāḥ phalavatyaś ca pradhānabhūtāḥ. sarvāsām āsāṃ prakaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15007: na hy abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya. kramād{*4/368*} abhiṣecanīyasya prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15009: prakaraṇaṃ ca kramād balīyaḥ. tasmān nābhiṣecanīyasya kevalasyeti. abhiṣecanīyasya tu madhye sthānaṃ videvanādīnām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15013: *{4/368: E2: kevalasya. kāmād abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya. kāmād; E6: kevalasya. kāmād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15016: prakaraṇāvibhāge ca vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy ubhayam // MS_4,4.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15022: utopasatkālā iti. upasadaṅgam iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15023: upasatsaṃyogasya śrutatvāt, kālavidhau sati lakṣaṇā syāt. tasmād upasadaṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15028: upasacchabdasaṃyogād upasadaṅgatā bhaviṣyati. purastācchabdasāmarthyāc ca pūrvādiṣu prayoga iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15030: na śaknoty upasadām ity eṣa śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15033: pūrvādīṃś ca. bhidyate hi tathā vākyam. tasmān na kālavad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15037: api vā kālamātraṃ syād adarśanād viśeṣasya // MS_4,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15038: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. kālamātraṃ syāt, nāṅgaprayojanasaṃbandhaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15040: nānyaiḥ kālābhidhānair asya kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15041: āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantītyevamādibhiḥ. atrāpi hi saumyādayo vihitā upasado 'pi. idam ānupūrvyam avihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15047: phalavad voktahetutvād itarasya pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15048: vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrahāyaṇīṃ nirvaped grāmakāma iti. tatrāmanahomāḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15049: āmanasyeti{*4/372*} tisra āhutīr juhotīti. atra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15053: tulyahetutvād itarasya. tulyaṃ hi yajimattvam. nanv aphalā homāḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15054: grāmakāma ity atrānupajyate{*4/373*}. tasmāt samapradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15056: phalavad voktahetutvād itarasya pradhānaṃ syāt. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15057: samapradhānabhūtā homā iṣṭyā iti. phalavad dhy aphalasya pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15065: ugro 'sy ugrastvaṃ deveṣv adhyugro 'haṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsaṃ priyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15066: sajātānām ugraś cet tā vasuvid ityevamādibhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15068: āmanasyeti{*4/374*} tisra āhutīr juhotīty āmananti. tasmāt sāṃgrahāyaṇyā aṅgam āmanahomā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15078: yāṃ vai kāṃcid adhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca devatām antaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15086: na ca nityo 'ntarāyaḥ. tasmān naimittika iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15091: yad uktam, naimittika iti, tad gṛhyate, kiṃ tu nityaś ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15094: jyeṣṭho vā eṣa grahāṇāṃ yasyaiṣa gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15095: jyaiṣṭhyam eva gacchatīti{*4/377*}. jyeṣṭhaśabdaś ca prādhānye prāthamye vā syāt. eṣa{*4/378*} prathamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15098: na jātu calācalaṃ hi{*4/379*} praśaṃsanti. tasmān nityaś ca naimittikaś ceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15108: sarveṣāṃ vaitad devānāṃ rūpaṃ yad eṣa graho yasyaiṣa gṛhyate sarvāṇy evainaṃ rūpāṇi paśūnām upatiṣṭhanta iti{*4/380*}. na hi devatārūpam asmākaṃ kiṃcid anyat pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15109: anyad ato nityatvāt. tasmād api nityaś ca naimittikaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15113: nityo vā syād arthavādas tayoḥ karmaṇy asaṃbandhād bhaṅgitvāc cāntarāyasya // MS_4,4.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15118: devatāntarāye nimitte śrūyata iti. na devatāntarāyo nimittatvena gamyate. tayor adhvaryuyajamānayoḥ{*4/381*} karmaṇy antarāyeṇa saṃbandhāt. na hy etac chrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15121: antarāye sati dadhigraho grahītavya iti. vinaiva saṃyogena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15123: antarāyasamādhānaṃ tv asya prayojanam iti. tad etan nityavad grahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15125: anityam antarāyaṃ samādhātum iti nāvakalpate. tatra prayojane 'nityatvād grahaṇe nityavac chrutir bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15126: arthavādatve tu na bādhyate. na hi tad antarāyaṃ samādhātuṃ gṛhyate. anyad eva prayojanam asyāstīti praśaṃsitum abhidhīyate. dadhigrahasya tu somāṅgataiva prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15128: bhaṅgī cāntarāyo 'nityo nityapraśaṃsārthaṃ saṃkīrtyate. tasmān naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15133: vaiśvānaraś ca nityaḥ syān nityaiḥ samānasaṃkhyatvāt // MS_4,4.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15135: ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/382*}. tatra śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15139: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ purastān nirvapet. saṃvatsaro vāgnir vaiśvānaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15140: yathā saṃvatsaram āptvā kāla āgate vijāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15141: evam eva saṃvatsaram āptvā kāla āgate 'gniṃ cinute,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15143: eṣā vāgneḥ priyā tanūr yad vaiśvānaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15144: priyām evāsya tanūm avarundha iti{*4/384*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15149: vaiśvānareṇa vihanyata iti. nityaiś cāsya samānasaṃkhyatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15151: traya ime lokā eṣāṃ lokānām ārohāyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15152: lokānāṃ haviṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāsti. yadi yathā lokā nityās trayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15154: evaṃ lokaiḥ saṃstavo ghaṭate. tasmān nityo vaiśvānara iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15161: utpannasya nimitta ukhyābharaṇe nirghātena saṃyogaḥ. nāsaṃyuktasyotpannasya doṣanirghātaprayojanatā. tasmād iha na dadhigrahavad virodho 'sti. tena nārthavādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15165: tritvāl lokānāṃ haviṣāṃ ca sāmānyād arthavādo bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15169: ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/385*}. tatra [523]{*4/386*} śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15170: saṃvatsaro vainaṃ pratiṣṭhāyai nudati yo 'gniṃ citvā na pratitiṣṭhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15171: pañca pūrvāś citayo bhavanti. atha ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ cinuta iti{*4/387*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15172: kiṃ yo 'yaṃ nitya evāgniḥ sa evāyaṃ ṣaṭcitika ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15174: tasminn eva nitye 'gnau ṣaṣṭhī citir eṣā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15175: nityāyām eva ṣaṣṭhyām eṣo 'rthavādaḥ. yo 'pi na pratiṣṭhārhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15176: so 'py anayā ṣaṣṭhyā cityā pratiṣṭhātum arhatīti citipraśaṃsā. kim artham evaṃ varṇyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15178: ekasyāṃ hi citau ṣaṣṭhīśabdo na sāmañjasyena syāt. tasmāt ṣaṭcitiko 'gnir nitya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15185: tābhiś ca pūrvābhir asyās tulyavat prasaṃkhyānaṃ bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15187: oṣadhayaḥ purīṣam. antarīkṣaṃ vāva dvitīyā citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15188: vayāṃsi purīṣam. asau vāva tṛtīyā citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15189: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣam. yajño vāva caturthā{*4/388*} citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15190: dakṣiṇā purīṣam. yajamāno vāva pañcamī citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15191: prajāḥ purīṣam. saṃvatsaro vāva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15194: yathā - devā ṛṣayo gandharvās te 'nyata āsan. asurā rakṣāṃsi piśācāḥ te 'nyata āsann iti{*4/390*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:15195: tulyavac cāmūṣāṃ citīnām anukramaṇam anayā ṣaṣṭhyā. tasmād etayā tattulyayā bhavitavyam. yadi ca yasminn eva kratau [524]{*4/391*} tāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15197: tata etābhis tulyā. tasmād api sa eva nityo 'gniḥ ṣaṭcitika iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15211: tad ekacitike 'gnau na sāmañjasyena vacanaṃ bhavati. tasmān nitya eva ṣaṭcitikaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15215: ekacitir vā syād apavṛkte hi codyate nimittena // MS_4,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15222: na vartamāne bhavitum arhati. nanu citveti cayane nirvṛtte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15224: naitat padārthe nirvṛtte citveti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15226: agneś cayanenārtham abhinirvartyeti. kṛte ca yāge cayanenāgner artho nirvartito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15230: tasmān nirvṛtte yāga ity ucyate. tasmād vacanād ekacitir agniḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15237: [525]{*4/394*} arthavādopapatteś ceti{*4/395*}. tābhir nityābhiḥ{*4/396*} samānasaṃkhyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15238: arthavādaś copapatsyate. pañca pūrvāś citayo bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15240: atheyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣṭhārtham iti. tāś ca sapurīṣā apekṣya dvādaśatvena saṃstavo bhaviṣyati. vipratiṣedhād ekasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15241: ṣaṭsaṃkhyāyā dvādaśasaṃkhyāyāś ceti. atulyānām api tulyavad anukramaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15242: yathā - devā manuṣyāḥ pitaras te 'nyata āsann iti{*4/397*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15245: *{4/395: E1 gibt dvayoḥ sūtrayor idam uttaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15253: amāvāsyāyām aparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñena carantīti{*4/398*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15258: nanu phalavat saṃnidhāv aphalaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15261: amānāsyayaikavākyatvān na śakyaḥ svargaḥ kalpayitum iti. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15263: lakṣaṇayāpi tāvat karmaikavākyatvaṃ saṃbhavati. svarge kalpye na lakṣaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15266: pitṛbhya etad yajñaṃ niṣkrīya yajamāno devebhyaḥ pratanuta iti{*4/399*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:15276: yathā tad etat{*4/404*} purastād upasadāṃ saumyena carantīti{*4/405*} ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15277: kāla{*4/406*} evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ śabdo na karmaṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15279: śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā balīyasī. yac coktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15280: laksaṇayā karmaikavākyatā bhaviṣyatīti, tac ca na. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15282: na vidhau. vidhiś cāyam. tasmān nāmāvāsyākarmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15283: ekasmin kāle dve karmaṇī paraspareṇāsaṃbaddha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15303: mahāyajñais tulyavat prasaṃkhyāyate. kāsya mahāyajñatā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15312: piṇḍapitṛyajñenaivāmāvāsyāyāṃ prīṇātīti{*4/409*}. asatyām amāvāsyāyāṃ piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15313: tadanaṅgatva upapadyate. tasmād api nāṅgaṃ piṇḍapitṛyajña iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15323: tathā na kartavya iti. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:15324: ādhānaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ced vṛtte darśe kariṣyate/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15325: anaṅgaṃ pitṛyajñaś cet tatraiva{*4/411*} na kariṣyate// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15332: paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā syāt tadāgame vidhānāt // MS_4,4.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15334: āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśum upākarotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15339: paśvāgame hi vidhīyate. paśunāsyāḥ saṃbandha utpattivākye śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15340: parivyāṇaṃ kṛtvopākaroti paśuṃ nānyatheti. evaṃ śrutir bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15346: raśanā hi yā ca yāvatīṃ ca draḍhimno mātrāṃ yūpasya saṃjanayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15347: draḍhimnā ca prayojanaṃ yūpasya. tasmād yūpasyaiva draḍhimne raśanā syāt. dvitīyā ca vibhaktis tatprādhānya eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15348: raśanāyāṃ ca tṛtīyā. tṛtīyā ca guṇatve tasyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15353: dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ śrutiḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15354: vākyaṃ bādheyātām iti. yat tu lakṣaṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15362: yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ. taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya unnayanti svādhyo manasā devayanta iti{*4/414*}. tasmād yūpāṅgaṃ raśaneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15365: ekayūpa ekādaśa paśavo niyojyā iti. pratipaśu raśanā kāryā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15366: yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. siddhānte dvairaśanyam eva. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:15367: paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā cet, yady ekasmin bahūn niyuñjīta/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15368: pratipaśu raśanā kāryā, yūpe ced dvairaśanyaṃ syāt// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15374: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/415*}. tatra śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15375: svaruṇā svadhitinā vā paśum anaktīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15380: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ{*4/416*}. evaṃ sa yūpo bhavatīti, yathā caṣālam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15384: *{4/416: E1 gibt svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15389: apaśyan ha sma vai purā ṛṣayo ye yūpaṃ prāpayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15394: niṣkrayaśravaṇāt tadaṅgatā vijñāyate. tasmād yūpāṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15398: tasya hy añjanārthena svaruṇā prayojanam. tathā hi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15399: svaruṇā paśum anaktīti. tad añjanaṃ paśoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15400: svaror utpattiṃ prayojayati. yadi tadartha eṣaḥ svaruḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15402: adṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ{*4/418*} tataḥ kalpyam. tasmāt paśvaṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15411: tena{*4/419*} yūpaḥ prakṣipyata iti sa eṣa niṣkaya iva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15416: pūrvasmin pakṣe. sarveṣāṃ siddhānte. ślokaś ca bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:15417: svarur yūpāṅgam iti ced ekasmaiva samañjanam/
GSP28msbh1-7u:15418: bahūnām ekayūpatve, sarveṣāṃ tu samañjanam// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15434: uta kecid guṇabhūtā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15435: darśapūrṇamāsayor yāvatya ijyās tāḥ sarvāḥ pradhānabhūtā iti. yajeta svargakāma ity aviśeṣeṇa yāgebhyaḥ phalaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15437: sarve cāmī yāgāḥ. tasmāt sarve pradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15439: api vāṅgāni kānicid yeṣv aṅgatvena saṃstutiḥ sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavaḥ{*4/421*} // MS_4,4.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15440: api vā kānicid aṅgāni bhaveyuḥ. kāni punas tāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15443: abhīṣū vā etau yajñasya yad āghārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15445: yat prayājānuyājāś cejyante varma vā etad yajñasya kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15449: varma varmavataḥ. sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavo yuktaḥ. yadi cāṅgāni tāni saṃstutāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15450: tataḥ saṃstavo 'rthavān bhavati. tasmād aṅgasaṃstutāny aṅgānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15460: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*4/425*}. na ca prayājān yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15465: aviśiṣṭaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ pradhāneṣu guṇasya vidyamānatvāt // MS_4,4.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15473: pādau pādāvata iti sarvasyaivāṅgatvena saṃstutir iti sarvam evāṅgaṃ prāpnoti. tat{*4/426*} pradhānaṃ na syāt. asati pradhāne kasyāṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15481: na tat sādhakaṃ bhavati. parārthaṃ hi tad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15482: na dṛśyamānasya prayājādeḥ prāpaṇārtham. tasmād anyad asya pramāṇam anveṣṭavyaṃ śrutyantaraṃ nyāyo vā. tasminn asati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15499: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti{*4/428*}. kāni punar darśapūrṇamāsaśabdakāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15501: āgneyādīni tāni. nanv amāvāsyāśabdakānāṃ naiva phalaṃ śrūyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15507: kathaṃ paurṇamāsy amāvāsyeti ca dviśabdaḥ śrūyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15508: dvyarthavad vyapadeśāc ca. kathaṃ tad vyapadeśaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15509: dvivacannirdeśāt, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti, ekārthau ca darśāmāvāsyāśabdau. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15511: pūrṇamāsa uttaras tayor atha yat pūrṇamāsaṃ pūrvam ārabhate tad ayathāpūrvaṃ prakriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15514_0: pūrṇamāsaḥ sarasvān. ubhāv etau yathāpūrvaṃ kalpayitvārabhata ṛddhyai ṛdhnoty evārtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:15514_1: mithunatvāyeti{*4 /429*}. tatra darśaśabdena prakṛtyāmāvāsyāśabdena bruvann ekārthatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:15514_2: darśayati. śakyate ca candrasyādarśanenāmāvāsyā darśa iti lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15515_0: yathā cakṣuṣor abhāve sati cakṣuṣmān iti cakṣurbhyāṃ lakṣyate. [533]{*4 /430*} etasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:15515_1: vyapadeśāc ca śrutitaś ca loke śravaṇād{*4 /431*} ekārthatām evādhyavasyāmaḥ. tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:15520: itikartavyatāviśeṣaṇatvena paripūraṇasamarthaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati. akalpyamāne vākyaśeṣe phalaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15524: kiṃ tu darśapūrṇamāsavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣam eva syāt. anyāsyetikartavyatāśrutā kalpyeta. eṣām api prayājādīnām anyā kalpyeta. etad itikartavyatāvagamyamānotsṛjyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15526: kāraṇaṃ bhāgīti. eṣāṃ anyena phalena saṃbandho 'śrutaḥ. tasmān na sarvāṇi samapradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15532: *{4/431: E1 gibt loke śravaṇād in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15534: guṇāś ca nāmasaṃyuktā vidhīyante nāṅgeṣūpapadyante // MS_4,4.35 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15540: asmin pañcahotreti vibhāgāvijñānāc cedaṃ nopapadyeta. bhavati caivaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ guṇavidhānam. tasmād asmatpakṣa eveti. api cāṅgatvenādhārādīnāṃ saṃstutir upapannā bhaviṣyati.
