GSP28msbh1-7u:15546: tulyā ca kāraṇaśrutir anyair aṅgāṅgisaṃbandhaḥ // MS_4,4.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15547: atha yad uktam, āgneyādīnām apy aṅgatvena saṃstutir aṅgatvaṃ khyāpayed iti. tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15549: utpattāv abhisaṃbandhas tasmād aṅgopadeśaḥ syāt // MS_4,4.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15551: pradhānānām{*4/434*} apy eṣāṃ satām utpattyapekṣā{*4/435*} śirādistutir abhiviṣyatīti{*4/436*}. jāyamānasya{*4/437*} hi puruṣasyāgre śiro jāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15556: agnīṣomīyaḥ paścād iti. etasmāt sāmānyādoṣā stutir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15566: itarathā na caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15567: na vāmāvāsyāyāṃ trayodaśeti. tasmād āgneyādīni pradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15570: jyotiṣṭome tulyāny aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_4,4.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15572: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. [535]{*4/438*} tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayaś ca yāgā vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15580: phalavac ca pradhānam. tasmāj jyotiṣṭome sarve yāgāḥ pradhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15584: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandhāt kāraṇaśrutis tasmāt somaḥ pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:15585: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandho bhavati. keṣāṃ guṇānām?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15589: na yāgamātrāt. yatra ca jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15594: trivṛt pañcadaśasaptadaśaikaviṃśā etāni vā jyotīṃṣi. tāny etasya stomā iti{*4/440*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:15597: grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15601: sa jyotiṣṭoma iti. yaś ca jyotiṣṭomas tataḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15602: yataś ca phalaṃ tad eva pradhānam iti. kathaṃ punas trivṛdādayo jyotīṃṣi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15606: jyotiḥśabdena tāvad uktāni. [536]{*4/441*} vacanamātreṇāpi śabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15607: viśeṣato lakṣaṇāyām. api ca dyotater vā dīptikarmaṇo jyotayater vā{*4/442*} jyotiḥśabdaṃ labhante. dyotyate{*4/443*} hi taiḥ śabdaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15608: dyotayantīti vā stutyām{*4/444*}. tasmāt somayāgo jyotiṣṭomaḥ. sa ca pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15619: śiro vā etad yajñasya yad dīkṣaṇīyetyevamādi ca liṅgaṃ dṛśyate. tathā guṇāś ca jyotiṣṭomavikāre dīkṣaṇīyādayo dṛśyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15622: tulyatve na pravartayiṣyante dīkṣaṇīyādayaḥ. tasmād api somayāgaḥ pradhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15629: tan na prasmartavyam. ihedānīṃ kramaniyamalakṣaṇam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15631: śrutyādīnāṃ ca balābalam. āditas tu śrutikramaś cintyate. kiṃ yathāśruti padārthānāṃ krama āstheyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15635: avaśyaṃ bhāvini krame lāghavāt prayogaprāśubhāvāc cāniyama ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15636: śrutilakṣaṇam ānupūrvyaṃ tatpramāṇatvād iti. śrutir grahaṇam{*4/446*} akṣarāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15638: sa sādhuḥ kramaḥ. śrutipramāṇakā hi vaidikā arthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15639: naiṣām anyat pramāṇam astīty{*4/447*} uktam. kim ihodāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15641: ya ṛtvijas te yajamānā ity{*4/449*} uktvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15650: tatas taṃ neṣṭā{*4/450*} dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15654: tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā padino{*4/451*} dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15659: brahmacārī vācāryapreṣita iti. aniyamena kramaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15660: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15662: tatrāha, anyāyyaṃ śrutivacanam iti. ucyate, kim ayaṃ{*4/453*} na sādhuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15663: na, na sādhur iti brūmaḥ. nyāyyaṃ tarhi. na brūmaḥ, na sādhuḥ krama iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15665: sādhor vacanaṃ bahuśo 'py ucyamānaṃ nyāyyam eva. asādhos tu sakṛd apy anyāyyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15666: sakṛdvacanena jñātasya punarvacane na prayojanam astīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15667: bhavaty aprasmaraṇam{*4/454*} api prayojanam ity uktam. vṛttikāreṇa tat kāryam iti cet. sūtrakārasyāpy aviśeṣo vṛttikāreṇa.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15669: tatra hy anya eva saṃśayo vicāro nirṇayaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15671: anyapramāṇaka iti saṃśayaḥ. pratyakṣādīnām adhigamya nimittatvān na tatpramāṇakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15672: atīndriyatvāc codanālakṣaṇa iti vicāraḥ. codanālakṣaṇa eveti nirṇayaḥ. iha tu siddhe tatprāmāṇye vyavahārakramasya{*4/455*} sādhutvāvadhāraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15673: athavā - śrutivicāro{*4/456*} 'yam. kiṃ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15674: kiṃ vā kramo vidhīyata iti. anekārthavidhānānupapatteḥ krame{*4/457*} 'nuvādaḥ padārthānāṃ{*4/458*} vidhiḥ. avadānavākyeṣv iva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15677: tasmān na kramo vidhīyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. nanv avadānavākyeṣu kramo vidhīyate. satyaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15680: ya{*4/459*} ṛtvijas te [539]{*4/460*} yajamānā iti tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15682: kramavidhānārthā śrutir iti siddhāntaḥ. tasmād apunaruktam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15687: *{4/449: E2: ye yajamānās ta ṛtvija ity}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15701: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ sarvatra śrutivaśenaiva bhavitum arhatīti. uktaṃ hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15704: arthāc ca sāmarthyāc ca{*4/462*} kramo vidhīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15707: sa tasya guṇabhūtaḥ. yasmiṃś cāśrīyamāṇe padārtha eva na saṃpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15710: na vaiguṇyam. evaṃ pratyakṣaḥ kramasya guṇabhāvo yatra,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15717: tato varo deya iti. tathā vimokaḥ pūrvam āmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15719: arthād viparītaḥ kāryaḥ. yājyānuvākye tu viparyayeṇāmnāte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15720: viparyayeṇa kartavye. nātra pāṭhakramo mīyate{*4/463*}. yato devatopalakṣaṇārthānuvākyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15721: pradānārthā yājyā. agnihotraṃ juhotīti pūrvam āmnātam. odanaṃ pacatīti paścāt. asaṃbhavāt pūrvam odanaḥ paktavyaḥ. praiṣapraiṣārtho tu viparyayeṇāmnātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15726: *{4/462: E1 gibt sāmarthyāc ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:15732: yathā darśapūrṇamāsayor yājamānānāṃ prayājānumantraṇādīnāṃ nānāśākhāntarasamāmnātānāṃ vasantam ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmītyevamādīnām{*4/465*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:15746: uta yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ sa eva niyamyeteti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15748: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, krameṇaiva niyamyetaikasmin kratāv iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15757: evaṃ kṛte devas tuṣyatīti. tam anyaḥ pratibrūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15761: dhūpadānasya prāthamyam anenoktam iti. tasmād vācanika eṣām eṣa krama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15768: iti cet paśyasi, athaivaṃ gamyamāne 'śabda eva kramaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15772: yadi padārthānāṃ{*4/469*} samūhasya śravaṇaṃ pratyāyakam arthasya syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15774: ity uktaṃ tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāya ity{*4/470*} atra. tasmāt kramasya vācakaśabdābhāvād vyāmoha eṣa kramo 'vagamyate. evaṃ cāpūrvāsattir anugrahīṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15775: itarathā sāpi viprakṛṣyeta ghaṭīyantra iva. darśayiṣyati ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15778: atha vakṣasa iti. yadi niyāmakaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15780: niyāmake hi pāṭhakrame pāṭhakramād eva prāpnuyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15786: kratvekatve parārthatvāt svena tv arthena saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15792: parārtho hi vedo yad yad anena śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15793: tasmai tasmai prayojanāyaiṣa samāmnāyate. śakyate cānena padārtho vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15794: śakyate ca kriyākāle pratipattum. tasmād vedaḥ padārthāṃś ca vidhātum upādeyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15795: kriyākāle ca pratipattum. na gamyate{*4/471*} viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15797: na pratipattum iti. agamyamāne viśeṣa ubhayārtham upādīyata [542]{*4/472*} iti gamyate. pratipattuṃ cānena krameṇa śakyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15798: nānyena. ata eva ca kṛtvā pāṭhakramāpacāre,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15801: tasmin nirvartamāna eva kiṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt. adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15802: tac cānyāyyaṃ dṛṣṭe sati. tasmāt svaśabdaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15803: ya eva padārthānāṃ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, sa eva kramasyāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15810: vyatyastam ṛtavyā upadadhāti{*4/473*}. vyatyastaṃ ṣoḍaśinaṃ śaṃsati{*4/474*}. āśvino daśamo gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15811: taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhotīti. yady aniyamenopadhānaṃ śaṃsanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15812: vyatyastavacanam anarthakaṃ syāt. na hi kathaṃcid avyatyāsa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15816: prāṇān evāsya pratīcaḥ pratiyautīti{*4/476*} kvacit pratilomaṃ vidadhad anulomaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15820: pratilomadarśanaṃ nopapadyeta. tathā caturthottamayoḥ pratisamānayatīty ukte sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15831: vājapeye saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti śrūyate. teṣu paśuṣu codakaprāptāḥ prokṣaṇādayo dharmāḥ. tatra [543]{*4/477*} prathamaḥ padārtho yataḥ kutaścid ārabdhavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15832: dvitīyādiṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tata eva dvitīyo 'pi padārtha ārabdhavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15833: uta dvitīyādiṣv aniyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15837: tata eva dvitīyādayo 'pi padārthā ārabdhavyā{*4/478*} iti. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15839: sarve hi padārthāḥ pradhānakālān na viprakraṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15841: kṛtaṃ vā teṣāṃ{*4/479*} nimittam. sahavacanaṃ hi bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15844: tathāpi tu yāvadbhir nāvyavahitaḥ śakyaḥ padārthaḥ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15846: tato 'bhyadhikena{*4/480*} na vyavadhātavyam iti. yadi dvitīyaṃ padārtham anyata ārabheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15848: tathā prayogavacanaṃ bādheta. nanu tathā sati kaścid alpair vyavahito bhaviṣyati. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15849: anumatānāṃ vyavadhāyakānāṃ tyāgena kaścid abhyadhiko guṇo bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15861: sarvaṃ tarhi guṇakāṇḍam ekasminn apavarjayitavyam, yathā sauryādiṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15864: naitad evam, sahaprayoga eva hi nānuṣṭhitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15870: atha yad uktam, yathā kratvantareṣu sauryādiṣv iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15874: yo niyamyeta. aṅgāśrayo hi niyamo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15882: trayastriṃśena pratiṣṭhākāmam{*4/484*} ityevamādi śrūyate. tatrāgamena saṃkhyāpūraṇam iti vakṣyate{*4/485*}. tatrāgame kriyamāṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15887: tatraitāsāṃ prāpnuvatīnāṃ pāṭhakramo nāstīti. evaṃ prāpta ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15889: tenaitā atra niyamyante. yāḥ pūrvaṃ samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15890: tāḥ pūrvam eva prayoktavyāḥ. ānupūrvyasya hi dṛṣṭam etat prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15891_0: yad uttarasphuraṇaṃ{*4 /488*} tad api cikīrṣitam eveti. trinavādiśabdair{*4 /489*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:15891_1: atirātre yaugapadyenāsāṃ prāpteḥ pāṭhakramasyāviṣaya [545]{*4 /490*} ity adhikaraṇāntaram iti bhavati matiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15892: samāmnāyapāṭhakramād evātra niyama iti punaruktatā gamyata ity anyathā varṇyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:15905: saha paśūn ālabhata iti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ samadhigataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15906: savanīyakāle trayāṇām ālambha iti. athātra pāṭhakramāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15908: uta sthānakramāt pūrvaṃ savanīya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15913: savanīyasthānaṃ vyāhanyeta. āśvinaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyeti. nanv itaratrāpi pāṭhakramo bādhyeta. bādhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15922: etad vai daivyaṃ mithunam iti{*4/493*} śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15924: uta puṃdevatyasyeti. niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvād aniyamaḥ. iti prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15927: praṇo devī sarasvatīti{*4/494*}. tasmāt strīdevatyasya pūrvaṃ pradānena [546]{*4/495*} bhavitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15928: tasmāt strīdevatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ. tathā hi pradhānakālatā bhavaty aṅgānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15942: uta yathāpāṭham iti. mukhyakramānugraheṇājyasya pūrvām. iti prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15945: so 'nyathā kriyamāṇe bādhitaḥ syāt. sahatvasya punarupasaṃgrāhakaḥ prayogavacanaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15946: svakrameṇa padārthe saṃnikṛṣyamāṇe na bādhito bhaviṣyati. api ca pāṭhakrame svaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15951: mantratas tu virodhe syāt prayogarūpasāmarthyāt tasmād utpattideśaḥ saḥ//5.1.16//
GSP28msbh1-7u:15958: [547]{*4/498*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, mantrapāṭho balīyān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15959: prayogarūpasāmarthyāt. prayogāya mantrasya rūpasāmarthyam. tad asya sāmarthyaṃ yena mantraḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15960: tasya ca prayujyamānasya kramo dṛṣṭāya bhavati{*4/499*}. nanu ca brāhmaṇapāṭhasyāpi tad eva prayojanam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15962: aparam api tasya prayojanaṃ karmotpattyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:15971: sarasvaty ājyabhāgo syād bārhaspatyaś carur iti{*4/500*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15972: kim āgneyavikārasya bārhaspatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15978: tadvacanāt. teṣāṃ sākṣād vacanakramo vikṛtau. tena saṃnihitānām upasaṃhārakaḥ{*4/501*} prayogavacano hi pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15980: codakena hi sa prāptaḥ. tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ prayogavacano balavattaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15987: mukhyāṅgakramavipratipattau vā, yathā prakṛtau, tathaiva vikṛtau bhavitum arhatīti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:15990: mukhyakrameṇa kriyamāṇā na prakṛtivat kṛtāḥ syuḥ. codako hi prayoga[548]{*4/502*}vacanād balavattaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15991: sa hy utpādayati prāpayati ca. prāpitān abhisamīkṣya prayogavacana upasaṃharati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15992: sa prāpteṣu utpannaḥ prāptinimittaka uttarakālaṃ{*4/503*} pūrvaprāptaṃ na bādhitum arhati codakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:15995: yathāprāptān evopasaṃhariṣyati. tasmāt pūrvaṃ bārhaspatyasya dharmāḥ, tata ājyasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16005: marudbhyo gṛhamedhibhyaḥ sarvāsāṃ dugdhe sāyamodanam iti{*4/504*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16011: tathā vikṛtiḥ syāt. prakṛtidharmā hi sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16016: *{4/505: E1 (Fn.): yā yā vikṛtiḥ, sā sā dvyahakālā bhavitum arhatīti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16018: api vā kramakālasaṃyuktā sadyaḥ kriyeta tatra vidher anumānāt prakṛtidharmalopaḥ syāt//5.1.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16024: aparāhṇe [549]{*4/506*} modakān bhakṣayatīty ekasminn ahanīti gamyate. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaṃjātīyakā vikṛtayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16035: yathaiteṣu kāleṣu sāṅgam. na ca dvyahakālatāyā bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16037: dvitīyasya prātar yakṣyeta. evaṃ sāṃtapanīyā{*4/507*} pūrvedyur madhyāṃdina upakraṃsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16038: aparedyur madhyaṃdine yakṣyate. tathā gṛhamedhīye sāyam upakramaṇaṃ pūrvedyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16039: sāyaṃ yāgo 'paredyur iti. nanu vākyād ekam ahar gamyata ity uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16040: padārthasāmarthyajanito hi vākyārtho bhavati. na cātra padārthasāmarthyam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16047: tatsaṃbandhāt, ekakālasaṃbaddhāni pradhānāny aṅgaiḥ saha śrūyante. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16049: tathā madhyaṃdine sāyaṃ ca. nāṅgāni prātaḥkālādiṣu. tatrānyakāleṣv aṅgeṣv anyakāleṣu ca pradhāneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16050: na sāṅgaṃ teṣu kāleṣu kṛtaṃ syāt. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaitā vikṛtaya iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16051: dvy ahaṃ sākamedhair iti śrūyate. tat sadyaskālāsūpapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16061: tiṣṭhantaṃ paśuṃ prayajantīty apakarṣaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16065: apakarṣe ca prayājāntam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16067: aṅgānāṃ mukhyakālatvāt. evam anyeṣāṃ pradhānakālatā bhaviṣyatīti. tatra sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16070: tadādy utkarṣe, tadantam apakarṣe gamyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16072: tat pradhānād antaraṃ{*4/511*} prayogavacanena prāptaṃ bādhitvā pāṭhasāmarthyād anuyājebhyaḥ parastāt kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16074: sa tataḥ parastāt. evam eka utkṛṣyamāṇaḥ sarvaṃ guṇakāṇḍam utkarṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16082: pratiprasthātaḥ savanīyān [551]{*4/512*} nirvapasveti preṣyatīti savanīyānāṃ nirvāpakālaḥ. asti ca bahiṣpavamāne stute,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16086: kiṃ prātaranuvākakāle savanīyān nirūpya pracaraṇīhomādayaḥ saumikāḥ padārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16087: uta pauroḍāśāḥ{*4/513*} prāg alaṃkaraṇād iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16092: prayujyamānam eva hi pūrvapadārtham abhiniyacchati. sa tasya parastāt samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16093: parastāt kartavyaḥ. saumikasya tu padārthasya pracaraṇīhomasya vacanāt kramo bādhitaḥ. alaṃkaraṇaṃ ca bahiṣpavamānasya parastāt samāmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16094: tasmāt tasya pūrvaḥ padārtho nirvapaṇādīnām antaḥ. tata uttare saumikāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16101: alaṃkurv ity uktaḥ prokṣaṇādīn pratipadyeta. asmatpakṣe tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16102: alaṃkurv ity ukte 'laṃkaraṇam eva pratipatsyate. tatrālaṃkaraṇe prāptakāle prāptakālavacano loḍanto 'nugrahīṣyate. tasmād atra prāvṛttikaḥ krama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16104: asaṃyogāt tu vaikṛtaṃ tad eva pratikṛṣyeta//5.1.27//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16105: asti darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtike paśāv agnīṣomīye vaikṛtaṃ yūpakarma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16107: dīkṣāsu yūpaṃ chinattīti. tat pratikṛṣyamāṇam arvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni prati[552]{*4/514*}karṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16113: tat pratikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'rvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni na pratikraṣṭum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16116: tataḥ prācīnaṃ saumikam. na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. na saumikaḥ padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16117: pāśukasyopakārakaḥ paśor vā. yadi hi tayor upakārakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16118: tatas tasyopakurvataḥ kramo 'py asya sāhāyyaṃ kurvan guṇabhūtaḥ syāt. na tv etad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16119: tasmān naiṣāṃ paraspareṇa krame niyamaḥ. ato yūpamātraṃ pratikṛṣyate. api ca yūpamātraṃ pratikṛsya kṛtārthe śabde saumikānāṃ svakramabādho na bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16126: āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantīti. anuyājā utkṛṣyamāṇā dākṣiṇāgnikau homāv utkarṣanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16133: teṣām artho nirvartita iti. padārthānāṃ ca kramo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16135: yaugapadyena hi padārthā upakurvantīti vakṣyāmaḥ. padārthānāṃ cotpattiḥ kramavatī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16138_0: yugapat prayogavacanenābhihitatvāt. ato 'nuyājotpatter utkarṣikāyā abhāvād dākṣiṇāgnikau
GSP28msbh1-7u:16138_1: homau notkṛṣyeyātām iti. api cānuyājamātram utkṛṣya [553] kṛtārthe śabde dākṣiṇāgnikayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:16147: pūrvedyur amāvāsyāyāṃ vediṃ karotīti. sā tv apakṛṣyamāṇā tato 'rvācīnān padārthān apakarṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16152: aprakṛtir pūrvikāyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vedikaraṇaṃ pūrvedyur āmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16153_0: ubhayor api śvobhūte havir abhivāsanam. abhivāsanaṃ kṛtvāmāvāsyāyāṃ vediḥ kartavyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:16153_1: na śrutyādīnām anyatamat{*4 /519*} kāraṇam asti. tasmān nābhivāsanāntāḥ pratikraṣṭavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:16160: sā daivān mānuṣād vā pratibandhād{*4/521*} utkṛṣyamāṇā agnihotram utkarṣet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16162: sāṃtapanīyā tūtkarṣed agni[554]{*4/522*}hotram savanavad vaiguṇyāt. yadi notkarṣet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16163: agnihotrasavana 'gnihotrakāla{*4/523*} uddhṛte 'gnāv agnihotraṃ viguṇaṃ syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16165: yathā prātaḥsavanaṃ daivān mānuṣād vā pratibandhād{*4/524*} utkṛṣyamāṇaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam utkarṣatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16175: evaṃ sāṃtapanīyam agnihotreṇa na vyavahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16176: tatra kramo 'nugrahīṣyate. kramabhede ca doṣaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16178: yad anyasya tantre vitate 'nyasya tantraṃ pratīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16184: na sāṃtapanīyāyā vāgnihotram. tena nāsāv agnihotrasya purastāt kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16199: utkarṣe 'pi vaiguṇyaṃ kālānyatvāt. aṅgāprāpter jaghanyaḥ kālavidhir bādhyatām iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16203: anupādeyatvena śravaṇāt. saptamī hy ādhārādiṣv asaṃbhavān nimittasaptamī draṣṭavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16204: atha yad uktam - savanavad utkraṣṭavyam iti{*4/530*}. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16213: saṃbaddhaṃ hi savanaṃ savanena, ekakratusaṃbandhāt, tad utkṛṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16218: taṃ parāñcam ukthyebhyo vigṛhṇātīti{*4/531*}{*4/532*}. yadā daivān manuṣād vā pratibandhād{*4/533*} ukthyāny utkṛṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16222: evaṃ stotraṃ svasmin kāle ṣoḍaśinaḥ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16223: samayādhyuṣite sūrye ṣoḍaśinastotram{*4/535*} upakarotīti. tasmād anutkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16224: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, ṣoḍaśī cotkraṣṭavyaḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16227: taṃ parāñcam ukthyebhyo vigṛhṇātīti{*4/536*}. tasmād utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśī. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16229: stotrakramam anurudhyamānasya pradhānakramo virudhyeta. tasmān na stotrakramo 'nuroddhavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16231: grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti [556]{*4/539*} śrūyate. tasmād utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16243: saṃnipāte pradhānānām ekaikasya guṇānāṃ sarvakarma syāt//5.2.1//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16245: saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti{*4/540*} śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16246: agnīṣomīye ca paśau paśudharmāḥ samāmnātāś codakena prāptāḥ. teṣu saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16247: kim ekasyāder ārabhya dharmān sarvān kṛtvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16253: itarathā pradhānāsattir viprakṛṣyeta. yathā bahuṣv aśveṣu pratigṛhīteṣu ye puroḍāśāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16264: nanv evaṃ sati pūrvasya padārthasyottaraḥ padārthaḥ paśvantaravyāpāreṇa vyavadhīyate. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16265: evam api kṛtam evānupūrvyam. yo 'sau paśvantare vyāpāraḥ sa evāsau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16278: ekajātīyānusamaye hi kriyamāṇe sahasrasyādhiśrayaṇe kṛte prathamaḥ śuṣyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16279: tasya ca prathamaṃ na śakyeta kartum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16285: anekasahasrāśvapratigrahe tantrānuṣṭhānam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. kāṇḍānusamayo 'bhyupetavya iti siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16288: muṣṭyādiṣu saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ muṣṭinānusamayaḥ, uta caturbhir muṣṭibhir iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16290: ekamuṣṭinirvāpo hy ekaḥ padārthaḥ, na caturmuṣṭinirvāpaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16291: ekasmin muṣṭau nirupte yatībhāvaḥ{*4/543*} paryavasyati. na śakyaṃ vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16292: na kiṃcin niruptam iti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16294: na ca muṣṭimātreṇa niruptena na prayojanam. na hy [559]{*4/544*} ekasminn anirupte catvāraḥ saṃbhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16312: muṣṭisaṃbandhe sati vākyabhedaḥ prasajyeta. anirvāpāṅgaṃ ca syāt. tathopadhānādiṣv api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16313: aṣṭākapālam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapatīti nirdeśāt. dvir avadyati{*4/545*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:16315: ekaviṃśatyā pāvayatīti{*4/546*} saṃkhyādīnāṃ kriyāguṇatvaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyenānusamaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16320: saṃyukte tu prakramāt tadaṅgaṃ syād itarasya tadarthatvāt//5.2.6//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16333: itarathāvadyater adṛṣṭārthatā [560]{*4/548*} syāt. saṃkhyāviśeṣavidhānārthaṃ ca punarvacanam. tasmāt padārthāvayavo 'vadānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16348: añjanādi yajamāno yūpaṃ nāvamṛjed āparivyāṇād iti{*4/550*}. na ca śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16356: sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyata iti padārthenānusamayaḥ. anavasargaś ca prakṛtāv arthāt kṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16359: arthāt kṛtaṃ codakaḥ prāpayati. tasmād yūpāntareṇocchrayitavyena{*4/551*} kāraṇenāvasṛjet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16360: yathā pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīty arthāt tasya dhāraṇārthaṃ pātraṃ bhidyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16366: na vā śabdakṛtatvān nyāyamātram itarad arthāt pātravivṛddhiḥ{*4/553*}//5.2.9//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16368: parivyāṇāntena padārthakāṇḍenānusamayaḥ syāt. śabdakṛtaṃ hi prakṛtāv anavasarjanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16370: adhvaryur yūpam ucchrayitum. saukaryam iti cet. vidhiśabdo bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16374: codakas tato balīyān. pātravivṛddhis tv arthāt kartavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16380: kim ekaikasya paśor daivatāny avadāya tataḥ sauviṣṭakṛtāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16381: tata aiḍāni. atha daivatair devatānām anusamayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16383: aiḍair aiḍānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16386: etat kṛtaṃ prājāpatyeṣv api codakenaiva prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16389: naitad evam, daivatair devatānām, sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām, aiḍair aiḍānām iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16391: yac ca vacanāt prakṛtau kṛtsnāvadānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16392: daivatāny [562]{*4/554*} avadāya na tāvaty eva hotavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16393: sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadeyāni. sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya na tāvaty eva hotavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16394: aiḍāny avadeyānīti prakṛtau śrūyate. tad iha daivatair daivatānām anusamayaṃ kurvan nainaṃ{*4/555*} prākṛtaṃ dharmaṃ bādheta. daivatāny avadāya naiva juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16395: sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadyatīti. atha sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya naiva juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16403: itarathā paryāyeṇaiva syāt. tasmād daivatair daivatānāṃ sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16411: somāya vanaspataye śyāmākaṃ carum ityevamādi{*4/558*}. asti tu tatra prākṛto 'vahantiḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16415: tato bhedaḥ. atha kṛṣṇājināstaraṇādis taṇḍulanirvṛttyanta ekaḥ padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16416: tatas tantram iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16418: paryāyeṇa vibhavāt. ekasyopādānena siddher dvitīyasyopādānam anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16427: niyataṃ hy ānupūrvyaṃ pāṭhakṛtaṃ sahatve saty upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16430: adhastaraṇādibhiś{*4/560*} ca padair abhidhānāt. tasmād vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16437: staraṇādir hanter upakramaḥ phalīkaraṇāntaś ca tasyaiva śeṣaḥ{*4/561*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:16438: yato hantis taṇḍulaniṣpattyarthaḥ. evaṃ staraṇādīnāṃ hanteś ca nādṛṣṭārthatā bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16446: kiṃ prayājānuyājānām ekaṃ pātram ājyasya pṛṣadājyasya ca dhāraṇārtham, uta bhidyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16449: prakṛtāv ekam, prakṛtivad ihāpy ekena bhavitavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16450: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pātrabhedaḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16455_0: śuddhe 'nuyājānām. na caikasmin pātre viviktaṃ śakyaṃ kartum. maryādāyām api kriyamāṇāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:16455_1: pradīyamānaṃ saṃsṛjyeta. api cākārabhedād upabhṛta upabhṛttvaṃ vihanyeta. prāṇimātrapuṣkarā{*4 /564*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16457: pṛṣadājyam apy ājyam eveti na miśratvaṃ doṣāyeti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16459: yad ājyasyāpareṇa dravyeṇāsaṃsargaḥ. evaṃ ced anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16460: yat prayājā pṛṣadājyenejyerann iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16461: evaṃ saty avaśyaṃ haviṣaḥ kācin mātrāpanīyate. na ca śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16463: prakṛtāv ekakālaṃ grahaṇam. ihāpy ekakālam eva kartavyam. tasmāt pātrabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16469: prakṛte pūrvoktatvād apūrvam ante syān na hy acoditasya śeṣāmnānam//5.2.17//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16471: agnaye kṛttikābhyaḥ puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped{*4/567*}. so 'tra jūhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16473: kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhetyevamādi{*4/568*} homāḥ samāmnātāḥ. santi tu prakṛtau nāriṣṭahomāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16478: coditasya paripūrṇasya śeṣa āmnāyate, yathā jātasya putrasya krīḍanakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16487: mukhyānantaryam ātreyas tena tulyaśrutitvād aśabdatvāt prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ syāt//5.2.18//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16490: paścāt tu prākṛtaṃ prayujyeta. pradhānānantaraṃ vaikṛtasya pāṭhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16491: tasmāt pūrvam upahomās tato nāriṣṭhahomā iti. prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16495: bādarāyaṇas tv ācāryo manyate sma, ante vaikṛtānāṃ prayoga iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16500: so 'tra juhoty agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhetyevamādi. tasmāt pratyakṣād eva kramān nāriṣṭahomebhyaḥ parāṃ copahomā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16504: adhvarasya pūrvam athāgner upapraity etat karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16505: yad agnikarmeti. paścāt samāmnātasya paścāt prayogaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16507: kṛtadeśāt tu pūrveṣāṃ sa deśaḥ syāt tena pratyakṣasaṃyogān nyāyamātram itarat//5.2.21//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16513: ante tu bādarāyaṇa ity ante prayogaḥ kartavya iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16516: māhendrasya stotraṃ pratyabhiṣicyata iti pratyakṣānugrahāyābhiṣekāt pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam. nyāyamātram itarat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16525: ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/573*}. tatra dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sāvitrahomāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16527: iṣṭakāḥ paśuś cety etad āmnātam. kiṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16530: ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16537: iṣṭakāḥ paśur ukhāsaṃbharaṇaṃ ca. tasmāt teṣāṃ pūrvaṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16543: [567]{*4/574*} tasminn eva krame codakena dīkṣitasaṃskārāḥ prāptāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16550: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dīkṣitasaṃskārāḥ pūrvaṃ kartavyā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16553: tathobhaye 'pi parastād dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ kāryāḥ. yas teṣāṃ parasparāpekṣaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16554: tatra na kaścid ukhāsaṃbharaṇasyeva pratyakṣaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ pūrvatvaṃ sādhayati. asti tu saṃskāraṇāṃ prakṛtau pūrvaṃ pāṭhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16557: ante vaikṛtam iti. atha kim arthaṃ saṃnipāta āśaṅkyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16558: nanv ayaṃ saṃnipāta eva vyaktaḥ. asaṃdigdhe saṃdigdhavacanam etat. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16560: śāstrāṇi cet pramāṇaṃ syuḥ, prāptās te paramāṃ gatim// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16571: vivṛddhiḥ karmabhedāt pṛṣadājyavat tasya tasyopadiśyeta{*5/2*} // MS_5,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16578: kiṃ prati prayājam ekādaśasaṃkhyā praty anuyājaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16585: saṃkhyā śrūyate. pradhānasaṃnidhau ca guṇaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ pratidhānaṃ bhidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16586: yathā{*5/9*} pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīti pratyanuyājaṃ pṛṣattā guṇo bhidyate, evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16597: api vā sarvasaṃkhyatvād vikāraḥ pratīyeta // MS_5,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16609: ekasya kriyamāṇā sarveṣāṃ tantreṇopakarotīti{*5/11*}. [569]{*5/12*} tasmād avaśyaṃ bhettavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16610: tantreṇa tūpakaroti saṃkhyā. itarāpekṣā hi sā bhavati. evaṃ sati sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16617: upasatsu saṃdehaḥ. kim āvṛttir daṇḍakalitavat, uta svasthānād vivardhanta iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16619: yad uta daṇḍakalitavat. yo hy ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16621: sa ādita ārabhya parisamāpya punar ādita ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16623: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, svasthānād vivardhitum arhati. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16627: tata uttameti. tatra yadi daṇḍakalitavad āvṛttiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16628: uttamāṃ kṛtvā punarādyāyā abhyāse kriyamāṇe 'sthāne sā vivṛddhiḥ kṛtā bhavati. svasthānavivṛddhau naiṣa doṣaḥ. tasmāt svasthāne vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16632: samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhāyyāḥ syur dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt // MS_5,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16633: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sāmidhenyaḥ sāmidhenīr anvāheti{*5/14*}. [570]{*5/15*} tatra kāmyāḥ sāmidhenīkalpāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16635: tatrāgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇaṃ vakṣyate{*5/17*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16637: uta samidhyamānavatīṃ{*5/18*} samiddhavatīṃ{*5/19*} cāntareṇa niveśa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16640: ity anena nyāyeneti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16641: samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa niveśa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16642: dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ{*5/21*}. iyaṃ vai samidhyamānavatī{*5/22*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:16646: ity antarikṣasaṃstute{*5/24*} 'sminn{*5/25*} antarāle vidhīyante. tasmān nānte syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16655: *{5/21: E1 gibt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16663: tās tatra bhavitum arhanti. tena hi śabdena tatra saṃstavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16667: uṣṇikkakubhau dhyāyye iti. kāḥ punar etā dhāyyā iti{*5/27*} nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16668: nāsya śabdasya prasiddhim upalabhāmahe. ucyate, sāmidhenyo dhyāyyāḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16669: evaṃ hi bhagavataḥ pāṇiner vacanam - pāyyasāṃnāyyanikāyyadhāyyā mānahavirnivāsasāmidhenīṣv{*5/28*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16670: asmād vacanāc chrutim anumimīmahe. katamāsu sāmidhenīṣv iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16671_0: aviśeṣāt sarvāsvati gamyate. iha tu samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhyāyyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:16671_1: syur iti. sarvāsu sāmidhenīṣu satīsu dhyāyyāvacanād viśiṣṭānāṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ dhāyyāśabda iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16672: nanu pāṇinivacanād viśeṣeṇa sarvā dhāyyāḥ. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16673: viśiṣṭāsv api vacanam upapadyata eva. yadi viśiṣṭāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16676: tās tāvad dhāyyāḥ. tāsu ca dhāyyāsu satīṣu vacanam arthavad bhavati. arthavati ca sati vacane nānyā dhāyyāḥ, pramāṇābhāvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16685: yaj jagatyā paridadhyād antaṃ{*5/30*} yajñaṃ gacchet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16686: atha yat triṣṭubhā paridadhāti nāntaṃ gacchatīti. nanu triṣṭub atrānte dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16688: triṣṭubham evāyam uṣṇikkakumāv iti brūte. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16689: triṣṭubho vīryam ity evaṃ ante{*5/31*} saṃstuteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16690: triṣṭubho vā etad vīryaṃ yad uṣṇikkakubhāv iti kāraṇe kāryavad upacāraḥ kṛtaḥ//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16692: *{5/30: E2 om. uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ca ante prayogo dṛśyatem yaj jagatyā paridadhyād antaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16695: stomavivṛddhau bahiṣpavamāne purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ syus tathā hi iṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe // MS_5,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16697_1: pratiṣṭhākāmam iti{*5 /33*}. tatrāgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇaṃ vakṣyate{*5 /34*}. atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:16697_2: bahiṣpavamāne vaikṛteṣv ānīyamāneṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ vaikṛtānām ante niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16698: uta prāk paryāsād iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16699: purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ syuḥ. tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16701: vṛṣaṇvantastṛcā bhavanti. tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16714: nadīparyāsa iti. evaṃ paryāso 'nte kṛto bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16717: ante vaivaṃjātīyakaṃ vaikṛtaṃ syāt. uktam, ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti{*5/36*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16726: stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ vṛṣaṇvantas tṛcā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16727: tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti. na hi vacanasyātibhāro 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16733: na cāyaṃ tadvikāraḥ, yat tato dharmān gṛhaṇīyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16736: yo 'pi tadvikāraḥ, tatrāpy anta eva niveśaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16746: ihāpi vivṛddhastomakāḥ kratava udāharaṇam. tatrottarayoḥ [573]{*5/40*} pavamānayoḥ sāmnām āgama iti vakṣyate{*5/41*}. tatrāgamyamāneṣu sāmasu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16749: anta uttarayor dadhyāt. ukto 'tra nyāyaḥ, ante bādarāyaṇa iti{*5/42*}. tasmād ante niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16758: trīṇi ha vai yajñasyodarāṇi gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭub iti. atra hy evāvapanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16759: ata evodvapantīti vacanenāsty upālambhaḥ. tasmān naiṣām ante niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16762: aupānuvākye kāṇḍe grahā iṣṭakāś ca samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16764: yo dābhyaṃ{*5/43*} gṛhītvā somāya yajata iti{*5/44*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16765: parā vā etasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'śuṃ gṛhṇātīti. tatheṣṭakāś citriṇīr upadadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16768: kiṃ graheṣṭakamaupānuvākyaṃ savanaśeṣaś citiśeṣaś ca. atha kiṃ kratuśeṣo 'gniśeṣaś ceti. [574]{*5/47*} kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16770: grahaiḥ savanāny ārabhyante, iṣṭakābhiś citayaḥ, yac ca yenārabhyate tat tad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16782: ya evaṃ{*5/48*} vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*5/49*}. na citiś cetavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16785: yo dābhyaṃ{*5/50*} gṛhītvā somāya yajata ity adābhyasya yajatinā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16786: tathāṃśoḥ. tasmāt sakṛd yāgasaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16787: śrutaṃ saṃbandham abhinirvartya. tathā sakṛd agnisaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtī manyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16790: parārthaṃ hi tayoḥ śravaṇam. kiṃ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16805: pañcabhyām eveṣṭakāḥ kṛtakramāḥ, anyā naitābhir vyaveṣyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16810: āvapanaṃ vottamā citiḥ. anyā iṣṭakā upadadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16819: tāsāṃ madhyamā citir āmnāyate. yāṃ vai kāṃcid brāhmaṇavatīm iṣṭakām abhijānīyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16820: tāṃ madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadadhyād iti. nanu sarvā eveṣṭakā brāhmaṇavatyaḥ. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16821: aparā liṅgakramāt samākhyānāc ca. tasmād etā nānte syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16828: madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadheyā iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16831: ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti{*5/56*}. evaṃ prāpte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16840: vidhir evāyaṃ saṃstaveneti{*5/60*} gamyate. tasmāt prāg lokaṃpṛṇāyāḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16854: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ. santi ca niyatāni karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16859: āhitamātreṣv asāv agniṣu karmāṇi kartuṃ samartho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16861: āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād iti. darśayati{*5/62*} ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16862: agniṃ vai sṛṣṭam agnihotreṇānudravantīty āhitamātreṣv agnihotraṃ darśayati. tasmān na pavamāneṣṭayaḥ pratīkṣitavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16863: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pavamāneṣṭibhiḥ saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇi varteran. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16867: āhavanīyādiṣu pratipattiḥ syāt. tasmāt saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16871: klinnaṃ dārvabhyādadhyād ityevamādīny āhitāgnivratābhyāhitamātreṣv eva bhavantīti darśayati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16875: āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād{*5/63*}ityevamādi. yuktam{*5/64*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:16878: āhitamātreṣv āhitāgniḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. tasmād anantaraṃ vrataṃ syāt, tadbhūtatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16887: tasya kaḥ parihāra ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16895: arthasya vidyamānatvāt. vidyamāno hi tatrānya evāgnihotrahomaḥ. kathaṃ hotavyam agnihotraṃ na hotavyam iti mīmāṃsante brahmavādinaḥ. yad yajuṣā juhuyād ayathāpūrvam āhutī juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16896: yadi na juhuyād agniḥ parāpatet. tūṣṇīm eva hotavyam iti. tasya tūṣṇīṃ homasya praśaṃsārtho 'yam arthavādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16899: nyāyavipratiṣedhaś ca bhavet. yady anantaram agnihotrādayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16902: na vā tāsāṃ tadarthatvād iti. tasmāt saṃskṛte karmāṇi bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16906: saṃcite tv agnicid yuktaṃ prāpaṇān nimittasya // MS_5,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16909: tasmād agnicitā pakṣiṇo nāśitavyā ityevamādayaḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante. teṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16910: kiṃ saṃcitamātre pratipattavyā uta kratvanta iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16911: saṃcitamātra eveti. agniṃ yaś citavān so 'gnicid iti tasya śrūyamāṇāś citavato 'nantaram eva prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16912: prāpte nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyam. tasmād anantaram eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16918: prayogavacano hy atra tān padārthān prāpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16919: yeṣāṃ kratvarthatvam. na caiṣāṃ kratvarthatvam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16923: na striyam upeyād ityevamādi. na ca kratvarthā ete prasaktāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16925: nanu puruṣārthā api citavataḥ śravaṇāc cayanānantaraṃ prāptāḥ. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16929: yad agneḥ svaṃ kāryaṃ kurvataḥ sāhāyye vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16930: tat tadartham. kaś ca tasya svārthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16932: siddhe ca yāge cayanenopakṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt siddhe yāge 'gnicit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16937: pareṇāvedanād dīkṣitaḥ syāt sarvair dīkṣābhisaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16939: āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped dīkṣiṣyamāṇa iti{*5/70*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16944: atha veṣṭyante dīkṣita iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16949: dīkṣām asya karotīty arthaḥ{*5/73*}. yadīṣṭyante dīkṣitaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16950: [579]{*5/74*} katham asya daṇḍena dīkṣāṃ kuryāt. teneṣṭyā na dīkṣitaḥ. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16953: tasmān na tāvati dīkṣitaḥ syāt. na ca saṃbhavati sam-uccaye vikalpo nyāyyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16954: pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt. tatra prayogavacano bādhyeta. tasmād bhinneṣv api dīkṣāsaṃbandhavākyeṣu prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatety āvedanakāle dīkṣitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16959: *{5/73: E1 gibt dīkṣām asya karotīty arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16962: iṣṭyante vā tadarthā hy aviśeṣārthasaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16963: iṣṭyante vā dīkṣitaḥ syāt, tadarthā hi sā dīkṣaṇārthā{*5/75*}. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16966: evaṃ sā dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya. tasmād vākyād avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16968: dīkṣākāraṇe padārthe nirvṛtte kim iti na dīkṣitaḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16969: vākyaṃ hi nirapekṣaṃ dīkṣita iti jñāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16971: dīkṣāsaṃbandho daṇḍena dīkṣayatīti. kathaṃ sa dīkṣitatve syād iti daṇḍenaivaṃ dīkṣitaṃ saṃpādayatīty{*5/76*} avagacchāmaḥ. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16972: anantaraṃ dīkṣitaśabdo nāstīti. na śabdasyāprayogo 'rthābhāve hetuḥ. saty apy arthe tadavasarābhāvān na prayujyate śabdaḥ. anyena ca dīkṣita ity avagamyate vākyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16973: āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped dīkṣyamāṇa iti. yac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16974: āvedanakāle dīkṣitaśabda iti. iṣṭyante 'pi dīkṣitasyāsāv aviruddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16985: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ, iṣṭadīkṣaṇārthā, iṣṭyante ca pravṛttir iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16986: samākhyānaṃ ca tadvad iti yadvan nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16988: yathā snānīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ceti. tasmāc ca paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16993: iha kāmyā iṣṭaya udāharaṇam. aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped{*5/78*} ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17002: tad eva prayoge bhavitum arhati. evaṃ pāṭhakramo 'nugṛhīto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17009: na vā, ayaṃ{*5/79*} kramo niyamyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17010: asaṃbandhāt. pṛthak pṛthag eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ prayogavacanāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17011: tāni svapadārthānām upasaṃhārakāṇi. yo yasya nopakārakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17014: tasyopakurvataḥ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. na caitāni karmāṇy anyonyasyopakurvanti. tasmān naiṣāṃ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. tasmād asaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17021: kāmyāni caitāni karmāṇi, kāmāś ca krameṇotpadyante, tena nimittasyākramatvān na kramavanta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17025: tad eva punar ucyate parihartum. evaṃ krameṇa pāṭho 'rthavān bhaviṣyatīti. etad ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17027: syād vidyārthatvād yathā pareṣu sarvasvārāt // MS_5,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17031: karmāvabodhanārthāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ kramaniyamādṛṣṭaṃ tadāśrayam eva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17036: tasyāpi sarvasvārāt pareṣāṃ sarvasvāreṇa yaḥ kramas tasyādṛṣṭārthatāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17040: eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*5/81*} yaj jyotiṣṭomaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17041: ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta gartapatyam eva taj jāyate pra vā mīyata iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17042: ya eteneti kasya [582] ayaṃ vāda iti praśnenaivopakramaḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17044: prakaraṇāt, tasya hi prakaraṇe bhavaty etad vacanam. prakṛtavācīni ca sarvanāmāni bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17052: agniṣṭomasya hi bhavanti navatiśataṃ stotrīyāḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17055: tāni catvāri. sā ekonasaptatiḥ. pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17058: caturaśītyā saha dvipañcāśac chatam. saptadaśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17059: tena ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śataṃ nava ca. ekaviṃśaṃ yajñāyajñīyam iti tad etan navatiśatam agniṣṭomasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17066: athānyeneti kiṃ saṃsthānāṃ vādaḥ, atha jyotiṣṭomavikārāṇām evaikāhādīnām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17068: saṃnidhānāt, saṃnihitās tasmin prakaraṇe saṃsthāḥ, tāsāṃ vādaḥ prakaraṇānugrahāya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17070: tatprakṛter vāpattivihārau hi na tulyeṣūpapadyete // MS_5,3.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17073: na tulyaśabdeṣv eva jyotiṣṭoma[583]{*5/84*}śabdakeṣu. naivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17078: na hi śabdasyārthaḥ samīpagatena kṛtaprayojanenaikadeśe 'vasthāpayitavyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17079: na hi vākyena śrutir bādhyate. atha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17081: tato natarāṃ saṃsthāvādaḥ. kathaṃ punar āpattivihārau?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17083: sa uttarān ekāhān asṛjata te sṛṣṭvā abruvan{*5/85*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17084: na vai svenātmanā prabhavāma iti. tebhyaḥ svātantryaṃ prāyacchat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17086: yathā vā idam agner jātād adhyagnayo{*5/86*} vihriyante. evaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17088: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17095: sa tam ityevam āhur eko yajña iti. ete vai sarve jyotiṣṭomāḥ bhavantīti. evaṃ vaikṛtānāṃ saṃkīrtanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17096: teṣām eva vāda iti gamyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17108: yady evaṃ na tarhi tadvikārāṇāṃ vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17111: yadi hi{*5/87*} gavādayo{*5/88*} vihriyeran prakaraṇādīni bādhyeran. tadāpattiḥ pratyakṣaviruddhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17120: vidhipratyayād vā na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt // MS_5,3.42 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17123: te{*5/90*} tathāpi codakena vidhīyete. ye prakṛtau kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17124: te codakavacanād vikṛtāv api kartavyā gamyante. tadāpattivihārāv iva yatra bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17125: tenānyeneti gamyate. na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17127: sa katham anayā praśaṃsayā lakṣyetetyevamarthā praśaṃsā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17140: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17144: sa tam. trivṛdādaya ekastomakāḥ. tasmāt teṣāṃ vāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17146: *{5/91: E2: kim ekastomakasya. krator eṣa vāda utaikastomakasyānekastomakasya ceti. kiṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17151: sarveṣāṃ vā codanāviśeṣāt praśaṃsā stomānām // MS_5,3.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17152: sarveṣāṃ caiṣa{*5/95*} vādaḥ, ekastomakānām anekastomakānāṃ ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17153: aviśeṣavacanād anyaśabdasya. nanv ekastomakāḥ kratavaḥ saṃkīrtyante. satyaṃ saṃkīrtyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17156: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17165: kramako yo 'rthaśabdābhyāṃ śrutiviśeṣād arthaparatvāc ca // MS_5,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17166: iha pāṭhakramasya śrutyarthakramābhyāṃ saha bādhāṃ prati vicāraṇam{*5/98*}. kiṃ pāṭhakramas tābhyāṃ tulyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17169: pāṭho 'pi hi kāraṇaṃ śrutyarthāv api. na ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17170: tasmād aniyama iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17171: pāṭhakramo hi bādhyate śrutyā, arthena ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17176: evam abhinirvartayitavyam ity avagamyate. tasyārthavattvenaikayopapattyā tasyaivānuṣṭhānam{*5/99*}. śrutyā punar anuṣṭhānam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17181: pradhānam abhinirvartayatīti sarvaṃ kriyate. tasmāt pāṭhas tābhyāṃ bādhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17189: yadi pāṭho balavān. siddhānte śrapaṇaṃ pūrvam, tato homaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17204: uta mukhyakrameṇa pūrvam āgneyasyeti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17205: aniyama ity. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, avadānādiṣu prāvṛttikena pūrvaṃ dadhna iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17206: evam anujñātebhyo vyavadhāyakebhyo nābhyadhiko 'nyo vā vyavadhāyakaḥ kalpito bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17207: darśayati ca dadhnaḥ pūrvam eva deyam{*5/103*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17212: yathāpradānaṃ vā kartavyāni, yasya pradānaṃ pūrvam, tasyāvadānāni pūrvam, tasmād āgneyasya. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17214: pradānopakramā ete na pṛthakpadārthā ete{*5/105*} ity uktam. abhighāraṇam avadānaṃ ca tasya pradānacikīrṣayaiva kriyate. āsādanam api pradānārtham evāsann akaraṇam{*5/106*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17215: evaṃ dṛṣṭārthatā bhavati. tasmān mukhyakrameṇāṅgānāṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17217: dadhnaḥ pūrvaṃ pravṛttir iti. arthāt pūrvaṃ pravṛttiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17218: na pāṭhāt. prāvṛttikāc ca mukhyakramo balīyān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17219: mukhyakrame gṛhyamāṇe prathama ekaḥ padārtho viprakṛṣṭakālaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17220: prāvṛttike punar gṛhyamāṇe sarveṣāṃ viprakarṣaḥ. tasmān mukhyakramo balīyān iti. atha yal liṅgam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17226: *{5/106: E1 gibt āsann akaraṇam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17233: tato hi prathamāv ājyabhāgau yakṣyan bhavatīti. tasmād api mukhyakrameṇa niyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17251: somaś caikeṣām agnyādheyasyartunakṣatrātikramavacanāt tadantenānarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_5,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17253: kiṃ tu somaś caikeṣāṃ{*5/111*} pūro{*5/112*} darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17255: nartuṃ sa{*5/113*} pratīkṣen na nakṣatram iti. yaḥ somayāgaṃ kartum ādadhīt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17256: sa na pratīkṣeta nakṣatraṃ nāpy ṛtuṃ tāvaty evādadhītety ānantaryam ucyate. itarathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17258: ānantarye 'napekṣyamāṇe yasyaivartunakṣatre ukte tasyaiva tayor anādaraḥ kīrtitaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17259: tasmād asti somādhānayor ānantaryam iti. api ca vispaṣṭā cādyatanī vibhaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17263: tatrāyaṃ śabdo vipratiṣidhyeta. tasmād ānantaryavivakṣety avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17274: yaḥ somena yajeta sa agnim ādadhīteti ca. sarvair apy asau yakṣyamāṇo 'gnim ādhatte somenāgnihotrādibhiś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17275: nāsati somasya viśeṣe somārthatā syāt. ayam asau viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17278: ayakṣyamāṇasya ca pavamānahaviṣāṃ kālanirdeśād ānantaryād viśaṅkā syāt // MS_5,4.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17281: sa purā saṃvatsarād dhavīṃṣi nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17283: sarvasya vihitatvāt. tasmād anantaram ayakṣyamāṇa iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17286: idaṃ prayojanasūtraṃ varṇyate. kṣīṇam adhikaraṇam. kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17287: iṣṭir ayakṣyamāṇasya somena nirabhisaṃdhika ādhāne. tadarthatve tu somapūrvatvam{*5/116*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17298: kiṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17301: brāhmaṇasyobhau kalpāv iti. atha vā karmāntaram idam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17304: brāhmaṇasyobhāv eva kalpāv iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17305: trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17306: aviṣeśāt. na kiṃcid viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17311: sa someneṣṭvāgnīsomīyo bhavati. yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ haviḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17313: tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. kim iva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt. tasmād brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17318: yad uktam, brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eveti, tan na, tasyāpy ubhau kalpau. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17320: na hi kalpayor brāhmaṇasya kaścid viśeṣa āmnāyate. nanv idānīm evoktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17325: tatra na nyāyaḥ kramate. tulyayor ekadeśa utkṛṣṭe nūnam aparo 'py ekadeśa utkṛṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17332: kevalā paurṇamāsy utkṛṣyata iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17335: itarathā na syāt phalam. ekadeśatvāt paurṇamāsyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17336: kevalāyām utkṛṣyamāṇāyām avaśiṣṭasya pūrvatra kriyamāṇasya na phalaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17338: aphalatvāc coktam api na kriyeta. samudāye cotkṛṣyamāṇe bhavati phalam. tasmād arthāt samudāyasyotkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17344: yad evaṃ samudāyasyāsati vacana utkarṣaḥ parikalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17346: ūrdhvaṃ somāt syāt. evam ekadeśasyāśrutaṃ phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati. nāmadheyaṃ tu dvayoḥ karmaṇor ekam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17347: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣā iti yathā. paurṇamāsadharmakaṃ vā karmāntaraṃ codyata iti karmavidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17349: tad vākyasya bādhakam. tasmāt karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17354: karmāntarasyaitadvācakam iti pramāṇābhāvaḥ. prakṛtasya karmaṇo vācakam iti pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17357: anyāyaś cānekārthatvam. dharmagrahaṇe lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ śrutisaṃbhave kalpyaḥ syāt. api cāsya rūpaṃ na gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17358: rūpāvacanān na karmāntaram. tasmāt prasiddhena nāmnā prakṛtasya karmaṇo grahaṇaṃ kālavidhānārthaṃ syāt. phalavattvāc ca kṛtsnasyotkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17363: vākyārtho 'pi tāvat tatra gṛhyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17364: iha phalasya śravaṇam asti. kalpyaṃ phalam iti yad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17366: phalavacanam{*5/122*} antareṇa. tatra phalavacanaḥ śabdaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17367: tena ca sahaikavākyatā. kālavacanena tu saha pratyakṣeṇaikavākyateti. tasmān na karmāntaram. sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam adhikaraṇam{*5/123*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17375: nartuṃ sa{*5/124*} pratīkṣen{*5/125*} na nakṣatram iti. atra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17378: ādhānasya kālabādhaḥ, svakāle syāt somaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17382: na pradhānasya. aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyād iti vakṣyate{*5/126*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17392: yad ahar evainaṃ śraddhopanamet{*5/128*} tad ahar ādadhīteti{*5/129*}. aprāptam eva tad ādhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17393: yat pratiṣidhyate. tasmāt somasya kālabādha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17401: paurṇamāsy ūrdhvaṃ somād brāhmaṇasya vacanāt // MS_5,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17408: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17409: nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. tasmāt paurṇamāsīmātram utkṛṣyeta. yat tu phalaṃ nāstīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17416: ekaṃ vā havir utkṛṣyeta, na kṛtsnā paurṇamāsī. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17419: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havir iti śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17422: nānyad api. prāk somāt kṛtsnaṃ vidhīyate. tato yad vacanenotkṛṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17425: tat prāg bhavitum arhati. tasmād ekaṃ havir utkraṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17430: puroḍāśas tv anirdeśe tadyukte devatābhāvāt // MS_5,4.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17434: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17435: tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. yasmāt tasmin kāle so [594]{*5/133*} 'gnīṣomīyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17436: na prācīne kāle tasmād ado havir anunirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17437: agnīṣomīyatvaṃ vidhāya dvidevatākatvaṃ hetutvena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnīṣomīyaṃ havir hetumat syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17440: na prāk sāsya devateti bhavati puruṣasyāpi yaṣṭur devatābhisaṃbandhaḥ. tasmāt puroḍāśo 'gnīṣomīyo nānyad dhavir iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17445: iti cet paśyasy agnīṣomīyatvāt puroḍāśa iti, ājyam api hy agnīṣomīyam. tasmāt tad apy utkṛṣyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17451: vaiṣṇavam iti ca. puroḍāśas tv agnīṣomīya eva. na tv atra miśradevatasya vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17452: miśradevatasya hi prāg api bhāvo 'vakalpyate. yad api tadānīṃ yajamāno nāgniṣomīyas taddevatārhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17455: viṣṇuṃ vā. tasmāt tasyordhvabhāve na eṣa hetur agnīṣomīyatvaṃ nāma. yathā caturdhākaraṇaṃ miśradevatatvād aindrāgnena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17458_0: tad dhitaḥ sākāṅkṣān notpadyata iti. evam ihāgnīṣomīyaśabdena na śakyam ājyaṃ vaditum
GSP28msbh1-7u:17458_1: agnīṣomīyo hi asau{*5 /134*}. tasmāc chakyaṃ prāg yajamānena kartum iti. tasmān na
GSP28msbh1-7u:17466: vikṛteḥ prakṛtikālatvāt sadyaskālottarā vikṛtis tayoḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt // MS_5,4.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17468: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped ityevamādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17473: paurṇamāsī cānyaḥ kālaḥ. sa yadi vā prakṛtyā gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17477: na pratyakṣaśrutaḥ prākṛtasyeti nyāyyam. tasmāt sadyaskālā etā vikṛtayo bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17481: tasmād dvaiyahakālyaṃ syāt. codakas tathānugṛhīto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17484: uttaram ahar devatāṃ yajatīti. tasmād dvyahakālam ekam abhinirvartyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17488: naitad evam, dvyahakālā vikṛtayo bhaveyur iti, sadyaskālāḥ syuḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17490: iṣṭyā{*5/137*} paśunā somenāgrayaṇena vā yakṣyamāṇaḥ sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17491: sāṅgasyaitad vacanam. tasmāt sāṅgaṃ paurṇa[596]{*5/138*}māsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kurvīteti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17502: brāhmaṇo vasante brahmavarcaskāma ity{*5/141*}evamādyaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17503: kim ete prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17509: codakena ebhir api ūrdhvaṃ somāt bhavitavyam. sānnāyyasya ūrdhvaṃ somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17512: āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatayā sa someneṣṭvā bhavati{*5/142*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17516: tadvikṛtir api somād ūrdhvaṃ bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17525: kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca prayoktavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17532: darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti{*5/144*}. codakenaiṣa dharmo gavādiṣv apy ekāheṣu prāpnoti. tasmāt te 'pi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvaṃ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17541: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādi samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17547: yajetety api. atra svargakāmayāgayoḥ saṃbandho gamyate. tasmiṃś ca saṃbandhe kiṃ yāgaḥ sādhanatvena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17549: tatra yadi svargakāmasya puruṣasya yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17551: svargecchāviśiṣṭasya sa sidhyatīti gamyate. svargecchā tatra puruṣasya yāgaṃ pratyupadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17552: tena tasya sa sidhyati nānyasyeti. yaḥ svargakāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17555: tato yāgaviśiṣṭā kartavyateti yāgaḥ sādhako 'bhyupagamyate. sa cāyam ubhayor apy artha ekasmād uccaritād vākyād gamyate{*5/146*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17556: yāgo vā kartavyaḥ kāmo veti. na caitad yaugapadyena saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17562: [599]{*5/147*} tathedam aparaṃ saṃdigdham. kiṃ prītiḥ svargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17563: uta dravyam iti. yadi dravyaṃ svargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17568: nāsty atra kāmasya guṇatvena prādhānyena vā śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17574: karma pradhānata iti. tatra tāvad{*5/148*} varṇayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17576: sarveṣām eva śabdānām arthajñāne laukikaḥ prayogo 'bhyupāyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17577: tasmiṃś ca laukike prayoge dravyavacanaḥ svargaśabdo lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17580: dvyaṣṭavarṣāḥ striyaḥ svarga iti. yad yat prītimad dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17581: tat tat svargaśabdenocyate. tena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prītimad dravyaṃ svarga iti mānyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17582: upamānāc chabdapravṛttir iti cet. na hi kasmiṃścid anupamite{*5/150*} loke prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17584: tasmān nopamānam. ato dravyaṃ svarga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17589: tad eva hi dravyaṃ kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na svargaśabdo 'bhidhāti. prītiṃ tu na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na{*5/151*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17592: naitad asti, prīter abhidhāyakaḥ svargaśabda iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17597: nābhidheyaḥ. evam eṣa na prītivacanaḥ prītisādhanavacanas tv eṣa svargaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17598: nanu svargaśabdo loke prasiddho viśiṣṭe deśe. yāsmin noṣṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17608: na tarhi sa pratyakṣo deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17611: te cākhyātavanta iti cet. na tatra pramāṇam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17613: te ca dṛṣṭvācakṣīrann iti. tasmād evaṃjātīyako deśa eva nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17614: nanu ca lokād ākhyānebhyo vedāc cāvagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17615: deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ svarga iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17616: puruṣāṇām evaṃvidhena deśenāsaṃbandhād apramāṇaṃ vacaḥ. ākhyānam api puruṣapraṇītatvād anādaraṇīyam. vaidikam api svargākhyānaṃ vidhiparaṃ nāsty eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17617: bhavati tu vidhyantareṇaikavākyabhūtaṃ stutiparam. yady api kevalasukhaśravaṇārthāpattyā tādṛśo deśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17619: prītisādhane svargaśabda iti. tena deśena vyavahārābhāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17624: yāgo 'tra kartavya iti śrūyate svargakāmasya. tatrāvaśyaṃ svargasya yāgasya ca saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17626: bhavyaṃ karma. bhūtasya ca bhavyārthatā nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17631: [601]{*5/158*} yadā kāmasyāpi kartavyatāsmād vākyād avagamyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17634: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmād ayam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17635: svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti svargakāmasya yāgaḥ kartavya iti. kartavyaś ca sukhavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17636: akartavyo duḥkhavān. kartavya iti cainaṃ brūte. tasmāt sukhaphalo yāgo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17638: tasya sidhyati nānyasyeti gamyate. tena svargecchā yāgasya guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17641: dṛṣṭenaiva dvāreṇa. iha tu svargasaṃjñakadravyecchaiva niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17642: yathaiva sā guṇabhūtā prāptā. tathaiva sati niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17644: nādṛṣṭenopakāreṇa. tena svargechayā guṇabhūtayā svargadravyaṃ prati yatiṣyate yāgaṃ sādhayitum. athāpy adṛṣṭena, tathāpi na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17650: *{5/150: E1 (v.l.): nety āha, na hi kasmiṃścid anupamāne}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17661: tuśabdena pakṣo vyāvartyate. tata etāvat{*5/159*} tāvad varṇayanti, prītiḥ svarga iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17663: prītiviśiṣṭe dravye svargaśabdo vartata iti. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17664: pūrvaṃ tarhi prītau vartitum arhati. tāṃ hi sa na vyabhicarati. vyabhicarati punar dravyam. yasyaiva prītisādhanasya dravyasya vaktā svargaśabaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17665: tad eva yadā na prītisādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17672: sa daṇḍasya vācakaḥ. iha punaḥ svargaśabdaḥ eva prīter abhidhātā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17673: prītivacanaś cet, yāgo guṇabhūtaḥ prītiḥ pradhānam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17676: tena na [602]{*5/160*} prītir yāgasādhanam iti vijñāyate. dravyaṃ hi yāgasādhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17678: yasmād dravyadevatākriye yajatiśabdo vartate. asatyām api prītyāṃ bhavati yāgaḥ. yadi ca yāgo na prītyartho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17692: pratyakṣeṇa ca duḥkhadaḥ. kartavyatāvacanād anumānena sukhado bhavatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17693: anumānaṃ ca pratyakṣavirodhān na pramāṇam. tasmād akartavyo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17696: saṃbadhyamāno{*5/163*} 'py avidhīyamāno na samīpavacanamātreṇa phalavān vijñāyate. tasmād anarthako mā bhūd iti svargasya kartavyatā gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17697: puruṣaprayatnaś ca yāgaviśiṣṭa iti yāgas tasya karaṇaṃ syāt. tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ yāgo guṇabhūtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17706: pratyarthaṃ cābhisaṃyogāt karmato hy abhisaṃbandhas tasmāt karmopadeśaḥ syāt//6.1.3//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17707: na kevalam ānarthakyabhayād yāgasya guṇabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17708: svargasaṃjñakam arthaṃ prati karaṇatvena yāgo vidhīyate. nanu yāgaḥ kartavyatayā śrutyā vidhīyate. satyam evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17712: tasmin niṣphale vidhīyamāno 'pi niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. tatrāsya [603]{*5/164*} upadeśavaiyarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17713: dvayoś ca vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhayor vākyabhedaḥ prasaṅgaḥ{*5/165*}. ato na svargakāmapadena svārtho vidhīyate. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17714: uddiśyate. tatra vākyād avagatasya kāmasya kartavyatāvagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17715: yāgasya ca karaṇatā. evaṃ ca yāgakartavyatāyāṃ{*5/166*} na pratyakṣavirodho bhaviṣyati. tasmāt karmopadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17719: etad ato bhavati. na hy anupadiṣṭo 'rthaprāptaś ca guṇo bhavati. tasmāt svargaḥ pradhānataḥ, karma guṇata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17722: sa yāgaṃ nirvartyed ity asaṃbaddham iva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17726: tataḥ svargo bhavatīti saṃbandhād idaṃ gamyata{*5/168*} iti. na śabdapramāṇakāmām antareṇa śabdam avagatir nyāyyā. vākyād evāsmād imaṃ saṃbandham avagacchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17727: yathā kāṣṭhāny āhartukāmo 'raṇyaṃ gacched iti yadi brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17729: dṛṣṭaṃ tatra pramāṇāntareṇāraṇyāgamanasya kāṣṭhāharaṇasāmarthyaṃ vidyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17731: upadeśānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd ity arthāpattir bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17734: yāgasya prītiḥ phalam avagamyeta. kāmam asyānarthakyaṃ bhavatu{*5/170*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:17735: na jātucit sāmarthyam asya jāyate. na hi dagdhukāmasyodakopādānam asati dāhe 'narthakam iti dahanaśaktim asya janayet. atha vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17736: svargakāmasya yāgo vidhīyata iti pakṣāntarāvalambenāsyārthavattā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17737: nanv itarasminn api pakṣe svargakāmasya yāgo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17738_0: na yāgāt svargaḥ. naitad evam. tasmin khalu pakṣe svargaṃ prārthayamānasyānuṣṭhānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:17738_1: anūdya yāgas tasyopāyatvena vidhīyata iti na [604]{*5 /171*} doṣaḥ. tad anuṣṭhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17738_2: svargaṃ pratīti nāsti vacanam iti cet. iṣṭam arthaṃ praty anuṣṭhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17740: tadanuṣṭhānaviśeṣagrahaṇārtham eva svargakāmaviśeṣaṇagrahaṇam iti niravadyam. tasmāt svargakāmasya yāgakarmopadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17743: yajeteti vacanam. ity adhikāralakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17747: *{5/166: Jha (2,969) schlägt mit einer HS evam ayāgakartavyatāyāṃ vor}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17761: sarvādhikāraḥ, aviśeṣāt. nanu vṛkṣādayo na kiṃcit kāmayante, katham teṣām adhikāraḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17764: tiraścas tv adhikṛtya yajeteti brūyāt. nanu tiryaṃco 'pi na kiṃcit kāmayante. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17778: [605]{*5/172*} samānāhārāṇām apy anyasmin kāle 'darśanāt. liṅgāni ca vede bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17779: devā vai satramāsatety{*5/173*}evamādīni devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ vanaspatīnām adhikāraṃ darśayanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17780: nanu kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartuṃ na śaknuvantīty anadhikṛtāḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17783: viṣṇukramādivacanāni{*5/174*} tv aśaktān nādhikariṣyanti. tatra yo 'nupadiṣṭaviṣṇukramādikaḥ sa kevalaṃ yāgaṃ kariṣyati, kas tasya doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17786: ṛṣabhasya grāma ity upacārād asty eveti. tasmād amanuṣyāṇām api śaknuvatām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17792: kartur vā śrutisaṃyogād vidhiḥ kārtsnyena gamyate//6.1.5//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17793: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, tiryagādīnām apy adhikāra iti. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17794: yaḥ samarthaḥ kṛtsnaṃ karmābhinirvartayitum. na caite śaknuvanti tiryagādayaḥ kṛtsnaṃ karmābhinirvartayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17795: tasmād eṣāṃ na sukhasyābhyupāyaḥ karmeti. kathaṃ yo na śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17798: na hy ātmānam upadiśya tyāgaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17801: ārṣeyābhāvāt. na bhṛgvādayo bhṛgvādibhiḥ sagotrā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17803: [606]{*5/175*} api ca niryañco na kālāntaraphalenārthinaḥ, āsannaṃ hi te kāmayante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17806: śunaḥ śyenāṃś caturdaśyām aṣṭabhyāṃ copavasata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17809: ye vedam adhīyate ta etad viduḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17811: idaṃ phalam amutra prāpnotīti. na caite vedam adhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17813: nāpy anyebhyo 'vagacchanti. tasmān na vidanti dharmam. avidvāṃsaḥ katham anutiṣṭheyuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17816: ucyate, rogād arucir eṣām. kathaṃ punar niyate kāle rogo bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17819: yathā tṛtīyakāś cāturthakāś ceti. tasmān manuṣyāṇām adhikāra iti. na ca tiraścāṃ dravyaparigrahaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17820: na hy ete dravyaṃ svecchayopayuñjānā dṛśyante. tasmād anīśānā dhanasya. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17822: upacāramātraṃ tat. tasmād api na tiraścām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17826: vidyate hi vidhir anyas teṣu sarveṣu. na ca vidher vidhinaikavākyabhāvo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17832: kim aṅga punar vidvāṃso manuṣyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17833: nanu viṣṇukramādiṣv anadhikṛtāḥ kevalaṃ yāgaṃ kariṣyanti. [607]{*5/176*} naivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17836_0: tena yāgamātre kriyamāṇe vaiguṇyam iti na phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāt. kathaṃ punar yāgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17836_1: praty upadiśyanta iti cet. itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya yāgavacanasyāntikād upanipatitāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17837: itarathā hi kartṝn adhikurvatsu guṇavacaneṣv anivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ phalavacanam anarthakam eva syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17839: tatra sākāṅkṣatvād vākyam uparotsyate. athaitad eva vākyaṃ samarthānāṃ saguṇaṃ karma vidhāsyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17842: sākāṅkṣaṃ hi tad itikartavyatāṃ prati. tasmāt sāṅgayāgopadeśaḥ sa iti niraṅgayāgopadeśābhāvaḥ. tasmān manuṣyāṇām evādhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17844: kecid āhuḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaraṃ karma na niyogato divaseṣu kalpayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17846: siddhānte tatra saṃbhavad api{*5/180*} divaseṣv eva kalpayitavyam iti. tat tūpariṣṭād{*5/181*} vyākhyāsyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17857: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajetetyevamādi samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17858: kiṃ svargakāmaṃ pumāṃsam adhikṛtya yajetety eṣa śabda uccaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17862: liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśāt. puṃliṅgena viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo [608]{*5/183*} bhavati svargakāmo yajeteti{*5/184*}. tasmāt pumān ukto yajeteti, na strī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17866: *{5/184: E1 gibt puṃliṅgena viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo bhavati svargakāmo yajeteti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17870: tasmād avijñātena garbheṇa hatena bhrūṇahā bhavatīti. bhrūṇahā pāpakṛttamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17874: sa yajñasādhanabadhakārī{*5/185*}. tasmād yajñaṃ bhrūṇaśabdenābhidadhāti. sa hi bibharti vā sarvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17876: sa puṃyuktatvād anuvādo 'vakalpate. avijñāte garbhe hanyamāne kadācit pumān hanyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17877: tatra yajñādhikṛtasya hatatvād yajñabadho{*5/187*} bhrūṇahatyā syāt. itarathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17879: tato vijñāte cāvijñāte ca yajñavadhaḥ{*5/188*} syāt. tatrāvijñātagrahaṇam atantram iti kalpyeta. tasmād vivakṣitā puṃliṅgasya vācikā vibhaktir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17883: atra kukṣāv{*5/189*} asyā vidyata ity ātreyī. tasmād api puṃso 'dhikāro gamyate. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17885: liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśāt{*5/191*}. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17895: jātiṃ tu bādarāyaṇo 'viśeṣāt, tasmāt stry api pratīyeta jātyarthasyāviśiṣṭatvāt//6.1.8//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17898: jātiṃ tu bhagavān bādarāyaṇo{*5/193*} 'dhikṛtāṃ manyate sma. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17899: kim ayaṃ [609]{*5/194*} svargakāma iti jātiśabdaḥ samadhigataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17901: yaugikaḥ, svargecchāyogena vartate. kena tarhi śabdena jātir uktā, yādhikṛteti gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17903: jātivacana iha śabdo 'dhikāraka iti. kiṃ tarhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17905: ato na vivakṣitaṃ puṃliṅgam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17906: aviśeṣāt, na hi śaknoty eṣā vibhaktiḥ svargakāmaṃ liṅgena viśeṣṭum. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17910_0: tena lakṣaṇenādhikṛto yajeteti śabdenocyate. tac ca lakṣaṇam aviśiṣṭaṃ striyāṃ puṃsi
GSP28msbh1-7u:17910_1: ca. tasmāc chabdenobhāv api strīpuṃsāv adhikṛtāv iti gamyate. tatra kenādhikāraḥ striyā nivartyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17912: puṃvacanatvāt strīnivṛttāv aśaktiḥ. puṃso vibhaktyā punarvacanam anarthakam iti cen. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17914: parisaṃkhyāyāṃ svārthahāniḥ parārthakalpanā prāptabādhaś ca. na cānarthakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17915: nirdeśārthatvāt. tasmāt stry api pratīyeta jātyarthasyāviśiṣṭatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17925: evam ihāpi puṃliṅgavacanasāmarthyāt pumān adhikriyate yāgavacaneneti. tat parihartavyam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17928: tataḥ striyā api yāga ukto na puṃvacanena nivartyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17929: idaṃ tu paśutvaṃ yāgasya viśeṣaṇātvena śrūyate. tatra paśutvasya yāgasya ca saṃbandho na dravyayāgayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17932: so 'yam anekaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ śrūyate. sa yathāśruty eva kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17939: ātreyī ca na hantavyeti. itthaṃ garbho na hantavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17940_0: yad avyaktenāpy enasvī bhavati. puṃliṅgavibhaktiḥ śrūyamāṇā na śaknoti striyaṃ nivartayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17940_1: kim aṅga punar avijñātagarbhavacanaṃ liṅgam. tathā gotrapraśaṃsārtham ātreyā abadhasaṃkīrtanam{*5 /198*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17941: gotraṃ hy etat. na hy atraśabdādayaṃ taddhita utpannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17942: samarthānāṃ hi taddhita utpadyate. na cātraśabdasya sāmarthyam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17962: vikrītatvāc ca pitṛdhanānām anīśiyaḥ. krītatvāc ca bhartṛdhanānām. vikrayo hi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17965: etad dṛṣṭārthe saty ānamane 'dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavitum arhati. evaṃ dravyaiḥ samānayogitvaṃ strīṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17971: yā patyā krītā saty athānyaiś caratīti krītatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17978: yad anayā bhaktotsarpaṇena vā kartanena vā dhanam upārjitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17985: na tat parityajya svakarmārhati kartum. yat tayānyena prakāreṇopārjyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17986: tat patyur eva svaṃ bhavitum arhatīti. evaṃ smarati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:17987: bhāryā dāsaś ca putraś ca nirdhanāḥ sarva eva te/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17988: yat te samadhigacchanti, yasya te tasya taddhanam iti//{*5/202*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17993: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17999: phalārthinyā yaṣṭavyam. yadi smṛtim anurudhyamānā paravaśā nirdhanā ca syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18000: yajetety ukte sati na yajeta. tatra smṛtyā śrutir bādhyeta. na caitan nyāyyam. tasmāt phalārthinī satī smṛtim apramāṇīkṛtya dravyaṃ parigṛhṇīyād yajeta ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18003: arthena cāsyāḥ samavetatvaṃ bhavati. evaṃ dānakāle saṃvādaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18004: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavyeti. yat tūcyate{*5/203*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18017: nāsau kraya iti. krayo hi uccanīcapaṇyapaṇo{*5/205*} bhavati. niyataṃ tv idaṃ dānaṃ śatam atiratham{*5/206*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18018: śobhanām aśobhanāṃ ca kanyāṃ prati. smārtaṃ ca śrutiviruddhaṃ vikrayaṃ nānumanyante. tasmād avikrayo 'yam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18024: patnī vai pāriṇayyasyeṣṭe patyaiva gatam anumataṃ{*5/207*} kriyate{*5/208*}. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18027: bhāsadā vā etāḥ paragṛhāṇām aiśvaryam avarundhata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18035: svavantāv ubhāv api daṃpatī ity evaṃ tāvat sthitam. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18038: uta saṃbhūya yajeyātām iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18040: ekavacanasya vivakṣitatvāt. upādeyatvena kartā yajeteti śrūyate{*5/212*}. tasmād ekavacanaṃ vivakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18041: yathā na dvau puruṣau saṃbhūya yajeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18045: vacanāt tayoḥ sahakriyā. evaṃ hi smaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18046: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca [613]{*5/213*} nāticaritavyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18049: smṛtivacanena na śrutivacanaṃ yuktaṃ bādhitum. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18052: yatra patnyavekṣitena yajamānāvekṣitena cājyena homa ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18055: striyā yajamānāyāḥ patnyavekṣitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18063: pumāṃś ca striyaṃ tv avekṣitrīm iti. tac ca na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18067: na krītaḥ. tasmāt strīpuṃsayor ekam evaṃjātīyakaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18069: yayā kayācit saha{*5/214*} saṃbhūya yajeteti prāpte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18071: yas tvayā kaścid dharmaḥ kayācit saha kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18073: tena na śrutivirodhaḥ smṛter iti gamyate. atha yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18075: kevalāyāś ca striyā yajetety ekavacanasya vivakṣitatvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18076: tat parihartavyam. idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18078: kathaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir ṛtvigbhiḥ saha yāgo bhavatīti. evam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18082: ādhvaryavān eva kurvan adhvaryur yajatīty evam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18083: yathā saṃbharaṇam eva kurvatī sthālī paktiṃ karotīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18084: yasya ca kārakasya ya ātmīyo vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18085: sa ekavacane vivakṣita ekena kartavyo bhavatīti. evaṃ ced yāvān vyāpāro yajamānasya sa{*5/216*} tāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18087: ekenaiko yājamāno 'pareṇāparaḥ. dvādaśo vā śata ekena ṣaṭpañcāśat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18088: apareṇāpi ṣaṭpañcāśad iti. iha tu patnīvyāpāro 'nya eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18089: na tatra patnī pravartamānā yajamānasyaikatvaṃ vihanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18090: yathādhvaryur ādhvaryaveṣu pravartamānaḥ. avaśyaṃ ca saha patnyā yaṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18094: tathā hi dvitīyayā patnyā vinā tyāgo naivāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18096: tatra kratvarthān ekā kariṣyati. kartṛsaṃskārārtheṣu naiva doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18109: mekhalayā yajamānaṃ mithunatvāyeti{*5/217*}. yadi strīpuṃsāv ekatra,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18110: yoktrasya mekhalāyāś ca vibhāgo vākyād gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18112: tad etat strīpuṃsasādhanake karmaṇy upapadyate, nānyathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18117: sthitād uttaram ucyate. tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18139_0: saṃ patnī patnyā sukṛtena gacchatāṃ yajñasya dhuryāyuktāv abhūtām. saṃjānānau vijahītām
GSP28msbh1-7u:18139_1: arātīr divi jyotir ajaramāram etām iti{*5 /220*} daṃpatyoḥ phalaṃ darśayati. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:18145: ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti. tatredam āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18146: kṣaume vasānāv agnim ādadhīyātām iti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18147: kiṃ dvau puruṣāv ādadhīyātām utaikaḥ puruṣa iti. kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18150: vasānāv ādadhīyātām iti. tatra vacanam arthaprāptaṃ punaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18152: uta kṣaumavidhyartham iti. ubhayor vidyamānatvād bhavati saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18154: ubhau puruṣāv ādhāsyete. atha kṣaumasaṃbandhārthaṃ tata ekaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18158: etena dvau [616]{*5/221*} rājapurohitau sāyujyakāmau yajeyātām iti dvayoḥ puruṣayor dviyajño bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18161: vasānāv iti śravaṇād eva puruṣau gamyete. na padāntaragatena kṣaumeṇāsya saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18164: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. vasānaśabdagataś cārtha ādhānena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18167: vasānāv iti nāyaṃ kevalaṃ puṃliṅga eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18169: yathā kukkuṭaś ca kukkuṭī ca kukkuṭau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18170: śūkaraś ca śūkarī ca śūkarāv iti. evaṃ vasānaś ca vasānā ca vasānau syātām iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18174: nāsty anuvādas{*5/222*}. tatra dvau pumāṃsau gamyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18175: yathā dvāv ānayety uktaḥ pumāṃsāv ānayati. dve ānayeti striyau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18176: tena striyo vācakam ekārāntaṃ dvivacanam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18177: aukārāntam api dvayoḥ puṃsor vācakam iti. yatredānīṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ prayujyamānam aukārāntaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18178: tatra kiṃ pumān sadvitīyas tasya nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18182: ihāpi pumān sadvitīyo 'rthaḥ. tasmāt puṃnimittam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18183: atrāha, prayogo yadi dṛsṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ dvayoḥ puṃsor dṛṣṭaḥ, katham ekasmin syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18185: puṃsi ca dvitve ca dṛṣṭa iti śakyate vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18187: puṃbhāvaṃ dvitvaṃ caiṣa śabdo na vyabhicarati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18188: dravyaṃ punar vyabhicarati. api ca yugapadadhikaraṇavacanāyā{*5/224*} dvaṃdvasmṛter dvivacanabahuvacanopapatteś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18189: [617]{*5/225*} pra mitrayor varuṇayor iti ca darśanāt. itaretarayoge cārthe samāsavidhānād dvandvāpavādatvāc caikaśeṣasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18190: yathaiva khadirau ca dhavalau{*5/226*} ceti nirdarśanaṃ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18191: evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmāt puṃsi dvitve ca vartata iti gamyate. na ca strīdvitve dṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18196: anyāyaś conekārthatvam iti pumān sadvitīyo 'syārtho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18197: strīpuṃsau cety anyāyyam. athedānīṃ sadvitīyasya puṃso vidhau ko 'nyaḥ sahāya{*5/227*} iti. striyā anabhidheyatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18201: itaro 'pītareṇeti dvāv eva pumāṃsāv upādīyete. tasmād iha dvau pumāṃsāv ādhāne vidhīyeta ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18202: nanu strīpuṃsayor vācakam aukārāntaṃ dvivacanaṃ smaranti. naiṣā smṛtir astīti brūmaḥ. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18205: na pāṇiner vacanam kukkuṭāv ity aukāraḥ strīpuṃsayor vācaka iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18207: tatra sadvitīyo vā pumān iti kṛtvākārāntasyaukāraḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18208: sadvitīyā vā strīti kṛtvaikāraḥ. puṃśabdas tatra sādhur na strīśabda iti pāṇiner vacanam. pumān śiṣyata iti ca brūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18210: puṃsor vācaka aukāra iti. tasmād dvayoḥ puṃsor adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18215: na kṣaume ādadhīyātām iti. tasmāt saṃnikṛṣṭam api na tatsaṃbaddham ādhānena. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18216: vasānaśabdena saha saṃbadhyamānam arthavad bhaviṣyati. vasānasaṃnikṛṣṭe api kṣaume na vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18217: vidhāyakasya śabdasyābhāvāt. na hi vasānaśabdo vidhāyakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18219: nānayoḥ samudāyaḥ. kas tarhi vidhātuṃ śaknoti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18230: ādadhīyātām ity ādhānam utsṛjya vidadhāno 'tyantāya śrutiṃ jahyāt. ādhānasaṃnikṛṣṭe ca liṅge vidhātavye śrutir viprakṛṣṭaṃ na kṣaumavasānasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum utsahate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18232: kṣaumavasānasaṃbandhe vidhīyamāne kṣaumaṃ vasānasyāṅgaṃ syān nādhānasya. tatra kṣaumābhāve 'pi nādhānaṃ viguṇam iti kṣaumābhāve 'py ādhānaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18238: na śakyata ubhayaṃ vidhātuṃ kṣaumaṃ liṅgaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18239: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmāt akṣaumayoḥ{*5/232*} kṣaumaśabdo 'nuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18241: vasānau pumāṃsāv ity arthaḥ. te ca prāyeṇa viceṣṭamānasya maline kṣaumasadṛśe bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18242: viceṣṭamānasya vā vasane śabdavatī bhavata iti. tasmād dvayoḥ puṃsor adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18259: guṇasya tu vidhānatvāt patnyā{*5/234*} dvitīyaśabdaḥ syāt//6.1.23//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18261: yad uktaṃ dvau puruṣāv ādadhīyātām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18263: ekavacanaṃ hi vivakṣitam. tasmād eka evādadhīta. nanv idaṃ vacanaṃ dvau pumāṃsāv ādadhīyātām iti. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18267: gamyate hi viśeṣaniyamaḥ. itarathā kṣaumavacanam anuvādamātraṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18269: na caikapakṣavacana eṣa śabdaḥ. gauṇatve ca sādhāraṇaṃ sādṛśyam. tasmāt pramādādhyayanam{*5/237*} avagamyeta vinaiva hetunā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18275: vākyagamyaṃ ca kṣaumaṃ bādheyātām iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18277: prāpta evātra sadvitīyaḥ pumān so 'nūdyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18279: tasya patnyā dvitīyaśabdaḥ syāt. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18285: ādadhīyātām iti tad vidhāsyati. nanv etad ādhānaṃ śrutyā vidhātuṃ samartham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18290: atas tadasaṃbhavāt kṣaumasya vidhāyikā liṅ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18291: vākyasāmarthyāt. yat tv asmin pakṣe 'tyantāya svārthaṃ jahātīti. nātyantāya hāsyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18292: ādhāne vāsaḥ kṣaumaṃ kuryād iti. asmin pakṣe puṃśabdaḥ strīpuṃsayor vṛtta iti gamyate. asti hi tatra tasya nimittaṃ pumān sadvitīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18293: evamādi ca dṛṣṭvā bhagavatā pāṇininā sūtraṃ praṇītam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18295: tasya viṣayaḥ puṃśabdaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ sādhur bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18296: na strīśabda iti. tasmād ekaḥ pumān ādadhīta na dvāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18305: tasyā yāvad uktam āśīr brahmacaryam atulyatvāt//6.1.24//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18307: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādiṣv etad uktaṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ sahādhikāra iti. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18309: uta yāvad uktam āśīr brahmacaryaṃ ceti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18310: sarvaṃ yājamānaṃ patnyāḥ syāt, sāpi hi yajamānā, tulyatvāt. tasmāt sarvaṃ tasyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18311: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tasyā yāvad uktaṃ syāt, vacanaprāmāṇyāt, āśīḥ brahmacaryaṃ ca syāt. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18312: atulyatvāt, atulyā hi strīpuṃsāḥ, yajamānaḥ pumān vidvāṃś ca, patnī strī cāvidyā ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18314: yady evaṃ hy etad{*5/240*} atulyatvam. etad ato bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18318: yāni ca kratvarthāni samantrakāṇi teṣv avidyatvāt patnī na syāt. tat patnyā adhyayanasya prayojakaṃ syād iti yady ucyeta. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18319: asaty api prayojakatve tasya nirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. asti hi tasya pumān nirvartakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18321: tad ekena yena kenacin nirvartayitavyam. tasmāt pratiṣiddhasya patnyā adhyayanasya punaḥ prasave,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18322: na kiṃcid asti pramāṇam. atas tad api patnī na kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18327: anyatarasya hi saṃskāro hīyeta. na ca tatropādeyatvena yajamānasya śravaṇam. tasmāl liṅgam apy avivakṣitam. ata āśīr brahmacaryaṃ cobhayor api syāt. yac cāhatyocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18329: patnyājyam avekṣata iti. tasmād atulyatvād asamānavidhānā patnī yajamānena bhavitum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18338: utāpaśūdrāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18339: cāturvarṇyam adhikṛtya, yajeta, juhuyād ityevamādi śabdam uccarati vedaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18340: aviśeṣāt, na hi kaścid viśeṣa upādīyate. tasmāc chūdro na nivartate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18345: nirdeśād vā trayāṇāṃ syād agnyādheye hy asaṃbandhaḥ kratuṣu, brāhmaṇaśrutir ity ātreyaḥ//6.1.26//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18346: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, trayāṇām adhikāraḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18352_0: śūdrasyādhāne śrutir nāstīty anagniḥ śūdro 'samartho 'gnihotrādi nirvartayitum. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:18352_1: agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ityevamādiṣu śūdrasya prāpikā śrutir nāsti. brāhmaṇādīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:18356: saṃskāraśabdatvāc cāhavanīyādīnām. tasmād anadhikṛto 'gnihotrādiṣu śūdra ity ātreyo manyate{*5/245*} sma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18366: sarvaṃ hy arthinam adhikṛtya yajetety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18367: so 'sati pratiṣedhavacane śūdrān na vyāvarteta. yat tv asamartho 'gnyabhāvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18371: nanv agnyādheyacodanā brāhmaṇādisaṃyuktā na śūdrasyeti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18372: nimittārthena tāḥ śrutayo na prāpikāḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18376: vaiṣyaḥ śaradīti brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vasantādibhiḥ saṃbandho gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18377: tena vasantādisaṃbandhārthā brāhmaṇādaya [623]{*5/247*} ity eva gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18378: tathā cādadhātir na vākyena śūdrād vyāvartito bhaviṣyati. tasmād bādariḥ sarvādhikāraṃ śāstraṃ manyate smeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18384: api veti pakṣo vyāvartyate. yathāśruty eva pratīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18392: śūdrasya sāma nāmananti. tathā payovrataṃ brāhmaṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18397: dvādaśasu vaiśya iti. evam abrahmasāmakam avratakam aprakramakaṃ ca śūdrasya prayuktam api karma niṣphalaṃ syāt. tasmān na śūdro juhuyād yajeta vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18401: śūdrasyāgnyabhāvād anadhikāro 'gnihotrādiṣv iti. asti hi śūdrasyādhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18402: ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti śāstraṃ sāmānyena. idam api nimittārthaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18407: abrahmasāmakam avratakam aprakramakaṃ ca śūdrasya karma prayuktam api phalaṃ na sādhayed viguṇam iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18418: tad dhi anārabhya kiṃcid āmnātam aviśeṣeṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18422: mastv eva śūdrasya. tasmāc cāturvarṇyam adhikriyeta.
