GSP28msbh1-7u:18428: vrate ca viśeṣo 'vagamyate tatprādhānyaṃ puruṣaprādhānyaṃ hi vrate{*5/252*}. kim ataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18432: tasyādhikāraṃ vyāvartayitum. tat katham iti. yajeteti hi svargakāme 'bhidhīyamāne tatkāmaḥ śūdro nābhihita iti kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18433: kiṃ hi sa yāgasya puruṣanirvartyaṃ na nirvartayati. vratam iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18436: nānyasya. eṣa{*5/253*} eva hi vratasyāṅgabhāvo yat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18437: kartāraṃ samarthaṃ karoti. yasya tu tena prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18438: sa tadanapekṣyaiva yāgam abhinirvartayati. tasmād api na śūdravarjanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18440: *{5/252: E1 gibt puruṣaprādhānyaṃ hi vrate in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18446: na ca sūtrakāreṇa tad vyapadiṣṭam. naimittikeṣv api teṣu satsu śakya eva śūdraparyudāso vaktum iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18448: hetvantaraṃ vyapadiṣṭam. api veti pakṣavyāvartanam. [625]{*5/254*} evam api sati naimittike 'pi brāhmaṇādiśravaṇe saty apaśūdrāṇām evādhikāraḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18454: vedābhāvād asamarthaḥ śūdro yaṣṭum. tasmān nādhikriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18477: vedādhyāpanena cācāryo bhavati. tasmād vedādhyayane brāhmaṇādayaḥ śrutāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18487: avaidyatvād{*5/259*} asāmarthyād anadhikṛtaḥ [626]{*5/260*} śūdra iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18491: śakyate hy anuktam{*5/261*} apy adhyetum. tasmāc cāturvarṇyasyāpy adhikāraḥ//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18506_0: tathāpy anagnitvād abhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt. atha katham anagniteti. prāpakāṇi hi brāhmaṇādīnām
GSP28msbh1-7u:18506_1: ādhāne vākyāni. nanu ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta ity ādhānasya vidhāyakam. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:18507: vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti nimittārthāni vacanānīti gamyate. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18508: brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhīteti śrutyā vidhānaṃ gamyate. ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti stutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18509: tad ānumānikaṃ pratyakṣaśrutād durbalam. tasmāt prāpakāṇi vacanāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18518: anyārthadarśanaṃ ca bhavati, yathā na śūdrasyādhyayanam iti. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18521: tasmāc chūdrasamīpe nādhyeyam ity anadhyayanaṃ śūdrasya darśayati. tasmād apaśūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ. nanv āhavanīyād vināpi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18524: kiṃ tarhi svargaphalatā viśiṣṭasya yāgasya. tasmād asaṃbhavaḥ śūdrasyāgnihotrādiṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18532: na hi śaknoty adravyo dravyasaṃyuktaṃ karmānuṣṭhātum. tasmād adravyasyānadhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18534: anityatvāt tu naivaṃ syād arthād dhi dravyasaṃyogaḥ//6.1.40//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18535: naivaṃ syāt, yad uktam, adravyasyānadhikāra iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18538: na hi kaścij jātyādravya eva puruṣaḥ. asty upāyo yena dravyavān bhavati. yaḥ śaknoti yaṣṭum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18540: yo na kathaṃcid api śaknoti yāgam abhinirvartayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18541: taṃ nādhikaroti yajeta śabadaḥ{*5/268*}. yas tu kenacit prakāreṇa śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18542: na taṃ varjayitvā pravartate. arthāc ca dravyasaṃyogo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18543: jīviṣyati vinā dhanenety etad anupapannam. tasmād{*5/269*} arthād eva dravyasaṃyogaḥ{*5/270*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18548: *{5/269: E2: vipratiṣiddham. tad idam abhidhīyate. tasmād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18555: uta neti. tatrāpy adhikaraṇātideśaḥ. asamartha iti kṛtvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18556: śakter vidyamānatvād uttaraḥ. tad{*5/272*} idam abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18569: śaktyabhāvāt, nāsau kenacid api prakāreṇa śaknoti yaṣṭum, tasmāt tasyādhikāro na gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18575: etān padārthān prati cakṣurvikalādīnām anadhikāra iti. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18581_0: puruṣasya cākhyātenānabhidhānād iti. uktam{*5 /274*} etad vidhir vā saṃyogāntarād{*5 /275*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:18581_1: ity atra. taiś ca [629]{*5 /276*} vinā viguṇaṃ karma prayuktam api na phalaṃ sādhayet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18594: na pañcāti vṛṇīta iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18595: kim atryārṣeyasyādhikāra uta neti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18603: na pañcāti vṛṇīta iti. na hy aprāptasya pratiṣedho 'vakalpate. tasmād atryārṣeyo 'py adhikriyeta{*5/278*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18604: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yo na tryārṣeyaḥ, sa nādhikriyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18606: vidhiś cāprāptatvāt. nanv ekaṃ vṛṇīta ity api viśeṣavacanam asti. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18607: vidhāyikāyā vibhakter abhāvāt. nanu stutyā vidhāsyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18611: sā tritvaṃ vidhāsyeti. ekaṃ vṛṇīta ity avayutyavādo{*5/279*} 'yaṃ trayāṇām eva. tatrāpi tritvam eva stūyate vidhātum. ekam ekavākyena vidhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. na caturo vṛṇīte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18612: na pañcātivṛṇīta [630]{*5/280*} iti nityānuvādo bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tryārṣeyasyādhikāro nānyasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18626: na{*5/281*} hi vacanasya kiṃcid akṛtyam asti{*5/282*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18631: *{5/281: E2: vacanāt. vacanam idaṃ bhavati, varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīteti. na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18638: śūdro hy asamarthatvāt pratiṣiddhaḥ. tasmāt traivarṇiko rathakāraḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18643: atraivarṇikas tv asti. tasmād vacanaprāmāṇyāt sa ādhāsyate{*5/284*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18651: tān prati varṣā ucyamānā apy asaṃbandhād ānarthakyaṃ prāpnuyuḥ. tasmād atraivarṇiko rathakāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18656: pratiṣiddhatvāc chilpopajīvitvasyeti. guṇārthena kaścid bhaviṣyati rathakāro vaitathyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18659: *{5/286: E2: rathakāraḥ, āpadi jīvanaṃ caitasya. vākyena tasyedam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18664: na nimittārthāny etāni śravaṇānīti. kim ato yadi na nimittārthāni. etad ato bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18670: etad ekaṃ nimittārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. naitad evam avakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18671: vasantādisaṃyuktaṃ tat katham iva varṣābhiḥ saṃbadhyeta. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18674: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasīti. tasmād atraivarṇikasyedam ādhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18678: saudhanvanā ity eṣa [632]{*5/287*} jātivacanaḥ śabdaḥ. saudhanvanā nāma jātir abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18688: ṛbhūṇāṃ tv iti rathakārasyādhānamantraḥ. tasmāt saudhanvanā ṛbhava iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18690: nemiṃ nayanty ṛbhavo yatheti{*5/289*} ye nemiṃ nayanti ta ṛbhava ity ucyante. rathakārāś ca nemiṃ nayanti. tasmād atraivarṇikānām aśūdrāṇām etad ādhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18698: yatra rudraḥ prajāḥ śamayed ity etām iṣṭiṃ prakṛtyocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18699: etayā niṣādasthapatiṃ yājayed iti. niṣādasthapatiṃ prati saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18709: śreṣṭho niṣādānām. tasmād adhikṛtādhikāram etac chāstram iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18712: niṣāda{*5/291*} eva sthapatir bhavitum arhati. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18714: niṣādaṃ hi niṣādaśabdaḥ{*5/292*} śaknoti vadituṃ{*5/293*} śravaṇenaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18715: niṣādānāṃ tu sthapatiṃ lakṣaṇayā brūyāt. śrutilakṣaṇā[633]{*5/294*}viśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18724: tasyāś ca daurbalyam ity uktam. samānādhikaraṇasamāsas tu balīyān. tatra hi svārthe śabdau vṛttau bhavataḥ. dvitīyā ca vibhaktis tantreṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18725: tena dvitīyānirdiṣṭo niṣādo gamyate. tatra ṣaṣṭhyarthaṃ kalpayann aśrutaṃ gṛhaṇīyāt. tasmān niṣāda eva sthapatiḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18735: kūṭaṃ dakṣiṇeti{*5/295*} niṣādasya dravyaṃ darśayati. kūṭaṃ hi niṣādānām evopakārakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18737: evaṃ svam eva tan niṣādānām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18747: saptadaśāvarāś caturviṃśatiparamāḥ satram āsīrann iti. teṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18748: kiṃ tasya tasya kṛtsnena phalenārthinaḥ satre 'dhikāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18752: ṛddhikāmā ityevamādi vidhīyamānam ṛddhilakṣiteṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu ca prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18754: tena taṃ tam adhikuryāt parṣadaṃ veti bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18756: ekaiko na samartho bahukartṛkaṃ satraṃ racayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18757: parṣadaṃ tu kartrīm arthinīm avagacchāmaḥ. na cākartuḥ phalaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18761: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tasya tasyārthinaḥ kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ satrān nirvartate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18763: sahakriyamāṇe sarva ekaikaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati tantreṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18768: ekaiko na śaknoti bahukartṛkaṃ kartuṃ iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18771: tadānyān saṃkhyānirvṛttyarthaṃ sāmādibhiḥ prayokṣyate. ekam ekaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18773: tena sarve kartāraḥ savyapekṣā bhaviṣyanti. sarve cet kartāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18779: api cotpattisaṃyogād yathā syāt sattvadarśanam, tathā bhāvo 'vibhāge{*5/299*} syāt//6.2.2//
GSP28msbh1-7u:18782: yad ekaṃ karma bahubhiḥ kriyata iti. yady ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18784: ekena karmaṇi kṛte dvitīyaḥ kiṃ kuryād iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18786: tantreṇa tu kriyāyāṃ bhavati kvacit saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18787: yathā syāt sattvadarśanaṃ tathā bhāvo 'vibhāge{*5/300*} syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18788: yathaikaikasya sattvasya hastino 'śvasya vā darśanam ekaikena kṛtsnam abhinirvartyate. evam eva satre tantrabhāvo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18790: madhyakasyāhavanīyasyopary adhvaryur apavidhyati{*5/301*}. tatra sarve kartāras tantreṇa bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18792: utpattyaiva tu saṃkhyayā karma saṃyujyate. yadi hy utpannaṃ saṃyujyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18794: utpattisaṃyoge tv etan nāsti. tasmād ekaikasya kṛtsnena phalenābhisaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18802: jyotiṣṭomena svarga[636]{*5/302*}kāmo yajeteti śrūyate. atra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18805: athavaika eva yajeteti. nanu tṛtīya uktam{*5/303*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18815: puruṣe yāgaṃ śrāvayitvā kṛtārthaḥ śabda ekasya dvayor bahūnāṃ vā yāgaṃ na vārayati. nāsau puruṣo yāge śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18817: yāgena vā phalam abhinirvartayed iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18818: yāgena phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti. yāgasya vā phalanirvṛtter vā nāṅgaṃ puruṣaḥ. yadi hy aṅgam abhaviṣyad yāge phalanirvṛttau vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18819: tadā saṃkhyā guṇabhūtā tadaṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ paricchindyāt. atha punar aṅgabhūtaṃ puruṣaṃ{*5/304*} prakāśayan lakṣaṇatvenaiva puruṣe 'bhisaṃbadhyeta{*5/305*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18821: yāvān arthī samarthaś ca tāvantaṃ sarvam adhikṛtyaitad ucyamānaṃ na śakyate ekena vacanena viśeṣayitum. kathaṃ ca puruṣaprādhānyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18829: eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti. tathā ca darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18830: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī{*5/306*} iti dvayor yajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18831: ete{*5/307*} asṛgram indava{*5/308*} iti bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti dvayor bahūnāṃ ca yāgaṃ pradarśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18847: tataś ca phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18849: katarad atra jahīma iti nādhyavasyāmaḥ. tasmād ubhayam api pratyetavyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18852: ubhayaṃ ca pratīyate. tasmād ubhayārthavacanataiva nyāyyā. yāgaṃ prati ca guṇabhāvād vivakṣitam ekavacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18855: *{5/310: E2: ced bhavān paśyatv avivakṣitam ekatvam iti. pratyarthaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18860: tādarthye puruṣe pradhānabhūte sati nāṅgabhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18864: vacanasyārthavattvāt. ato na guṇabhāvaḥ kartur avakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18866: sā yadi phalotpattiṃ yāgotpattiṃ vā vidhatte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18869: tadā yāgaḥ phalaṃ vā tādarthyena. na caitad yaugapadyena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18872: yathobhābhyāṃ bāhubhyām iṣūn asyati devadatta iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18878: tadā yāgasya phalasya vā guṇabhāvo gamyate. tatra vyāpṛtatvān na tayoḥ prādhānyam api gamyate. tasmān na yāge phale vā puruṣasya guṇabhāvaḥ. ato yāthākāmyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18879: eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18886: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ, prayogāyopadiśyeta kartā, na svārthena. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18894: śabdapramāṇakāś ca vayam īdṛśeṣv artheṣu. kathaṃ tarhi kāmasyātmasaṃbandho 'vagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18898: na parasya. yatra tūbhāv arthau vaktavyau bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18902: cātvāle kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāṃ prāsyatīti{*5/315*}. yatraivaṃ dve śrutī vidhātryau bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18903: tatra guṇabhāvaḥ prādhānyaṃ ca gamyate. na tv atraivaṃ dve vidhāyike śrutī vidyete. guṇabhūtas tu puruṣaḥ śrūyate bhāvayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18907: sukhasaṃbandhenātmanas tu kṛtyam. tasmāt saṃbandhāt puruṣaprādhānyaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18908: na śruteḥ. ato guṇabhūtasya puruṣasya saṃkhyā vivakṣiteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18916: evaṃ sati yadi svargakāmo 'nyasyāpi svargaṃ kāmayamāno bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18917: anyasya svargaṃ kāmayamāno 'py anyo yajeta. tatra pūrvokto nyāyaḥ pratyuddhṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18925: na parasya svargakāma ity{*5/318*} evaṃ na yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18927: anyasya{*5/319*} svargakāmaśabdo na vācaka iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18928: phalam asau na prāpnotīti. kathaṃ punaḥ phalasyāprāptiḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18943: āśāste 'yaṃ yajamānaḥ āyur āśāsta iti{*5/321*} prayojayitāraṃ nirdekṣyati hotā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18944: phalavidhiś ca sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti vidhānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18947: itarathādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. tasmād ānuṣaṅgikaphalārtham anyasya svargakāmo 'nyo yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18957: evaṃ svārthenādhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. na hy ādhānasya svārthatāyām asti viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18958: pradhānaphalaṃ vānuṣaṅgikaṃ vā sarvam evādhātari samavetum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18962: yadi nityaṃ nāyurādikāmaḥ. tasmān nāvasthito nyāyaḥ pratyuddhriyeta{*5/324*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:18963: na{*5/325*} ca puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūtaś codyate guṇabhāvāt tv asya vivakṣitam ekatvam. tasmād eka eva yajeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18974: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī{*5/327*} iti{*5/328*} dvayor yajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18975: ete asṛgram indava iti{*5/329*} bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ pratipadaṃ kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18976: dviyajamānake bahuyajamānake ca karmaṇi pratipad vidhāne karma tathā yuktaṃ{*5/330*} syād iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18985: samavetaṃ hi karma vidyate dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18988: teṣu pratipad vidhānam arthavad bhaviṣyati. tasmād eko yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18992: grāmakāmo yajetetyevamādi karma samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18993: kiṃ prakrāntaṃ niyogataḥ samāpanīyam utecchayā kāryaṃ heyaṃ veti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:18999: upakramād ārabhya yāvat parisamāptir ity etāvān vyāpāraviśeṣas tasyārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19000: na yathā pākas tyāga iti. tatra hi pākasattāmātraṃ nirdiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19001: nārabhya parisamāpayitavyam [641]{*5/332*} iti. evaṃ cākhyātārthaṃ laukikā api pratipadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19002: tatra nārambhe puruṣaprayatnaś codyata iti gamyate. yataś coditaṃ na niyogata ārabhante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19004: tena nobhe ārambhaparisamāptī{*5/333*} śabdārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19006: parisamāptyām arthaprāptatvād ārambhasya. tasmāt parisamāptiḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate. sā cec chabdārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19008: ārambhe nāsti kartavyatāvacanam. tena na niyogata ārambhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19009: niyogatas tu parisamāptiḥ. tenopakrānte karmaṇi yadi vīyāt phalecchā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19016: yāgasya tu kartavyatā śrutyā gamyate. tasmād grāmakāmena{*5/335*} yāga ārabdhaḥ parisamāpanīyaḥ. grāmādikāmanāvacanaṃ nimittatvena tadā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19017: nimitte cotpanne yat kartavyam ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19020: na hi tadvinaṣṭam anutpannaṃ bhavati. utpattiś ca nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19021: na bhāvaḥ. tasmād vītāyām api phalecchāyām upakrāntaṃ parisamāpayitavyam. kriyāyā hi nimittam ārambhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19027: *{5/334: E2: kartavyam iti codyate yad iṣṭaphalam. nanv}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19031: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aniyamo vā. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19034: sā hi vidhīyamānā phalasya vā yāgasya vā syāt. phalasya na tāvad vaktavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19035: na hi yo yat kāmayate tasya tat kartavyatopadeṣṭavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19040: yāgena kriyata iti. na ca yāgasya kartavyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19044: tadā na virodhaḥ. yāgakartavyatāyāṃ phalaṃ kalpyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19045: na ca kalpyamānasya pramāṇam asti. kartavyopadeśaś ca śakyādiṣv artheṣu bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19046: tasmān na yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ. phalakāmasya yad iṣṭaṃ tat kartavyam anūdya yathāprāptaṃ yāgasya sādhanatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19049: evam upakrāntaṃ nāvaśyaṃ samāpayitavyam. yat tu vākyārthaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19051: tatra vākyārtho gṛhyata ity uktam eva. tasmād aniyamaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19053: *{5/336: E1 gibt phalaṃ cikīrṣamāṇasya in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19058: niyamo vā tannimittatvāt kartus tat kāraṇaṃ syāt//6.2.15//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19060: tat kartuḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19061: satyasaṃkalpatā yo hy ārabdham evaṃjātīyakaṃ samāpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19064: śiṣṭavigarhaṇā ca doṣaḥ. tasmād ārabhya samāpayitavyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19065: śiṣṭāḥ punaḥ kim arthaṃ vigarhanta iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19074: kenacid gṛham upakrāntaṃ bhavati śakaṭaṃ ratho vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19080: yathaiva vaidikāni tathaiva tāni niyogataḥ parisamāpayīyāni. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19081: tato 'dhipuruṣajñānam, tatas tatpuruṣajñānaṃ bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19085: pūrvasyāṃ diśy etā devatā itarāsv etā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19092: teṣāṃ ca laukikānām aparādhe tais takṣabhiḥ prāyaścittaśāstram āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19093: āre bhagna indrabāhur baddhavyaḥ pāyasaṃ ca brāhmaṇo bhojayitavya iti. prāyaścittaṃ ca yady adṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19095: tato 'py adṛtam eva tad iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19100: aśāstrā tūpasaṃprāptiḥ{*5/344*} śāstraṃ syān na prakalpakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19101: tasmād arthena gamyetāprāpte vā śāstram{*5/345*} arthavat//6.2.18//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19102: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aśāstrā tv eṣām upasaṃprāptir iti brūmaḥ. smṛter asyāḥ śāstraṃ bhavatānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19104: na ca smṛtim antareṇa takṣṇāṃ grantha upapadyata iti. ata ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19106: evam idaṃ gṛhādi karma ramaṇīyaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19107: nāsmāt karmaṇo 'dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid iti. yā cāsau ramaṇīyatā sāntareṇāpi śāstram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19109: jñātvā ca smaryate. tasmāt nāsyāḥ smṛteḥ śāstraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:19112: tataḥ śāstram atrārthavad iti prakalpyeta. tasmān nedaṃ śāstroktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19113: śāstrokte ca sāmikṛte tyakte 'tyantaṃ śiṣṭā garhante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19114: devatāśraye ca. nanv atrāpi devatāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19115: asyāṃ diśīyaṃ devatā yakṣyate 'syām iyam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19117: na graham anu, tasmād adoṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19122: pratiṣedheṣv akarmatvāt kriyā syāt pratiṣiddhānāṃ vibhaktatvād akarmaṇām//6.2.19// idaṃ hy upadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19124: na laśunaṃ na gṛñjanaṃ ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19127: atha vā niyogato varjayitavyam eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19128: phalārthinā na bhakṣayitavyam, anarthino 'niyama iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19133: yadi vā bhakṣaṇaṃ na kartavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19134: yadi nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam ity abhyupagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19136: nañ bhakṣayati viśeṣaṇam. tadvyāpārāc ca kartavyatayā nañ na saṃbadhyate{*5/347*}. atha nañarthaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19139: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmād abhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19141: na tasya kartavyatāsti. tasmād yas tatra mānaso vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19143: yenopāyena nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pūrvaṃ nañbhakṣayatyoḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19145: nodyantam ādityam īkṣetetyevamādiṣu prajāpativrateṣu kurvataḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19155: *{5/347: Jha schlägt vor, mit MS nañ saṃbadhyate zu lesen}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19157: śāstrāṇāṃ tv arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate tayor asamavāyitvāt tādarthye vidhyatikramaḥ//6.2.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19159: yuktaṃ yat prajāpativrateṣu śāstrāṇām arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate. tatra niyamaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19162: yo na kartavyaḥ sa pāpodayaḥ. kathaṃ punaḥ prajāpativrateṣu niyamaḥ kartavyatayā codyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19163: tasya vratam iti prakṛtya prajāpativratāni samāmnātāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19164: vratam iti ca mānasaṃ karmocyate. idaṃ na kariṣyāmīti yaḥ saṃkalpaḥ. katamat tad vratam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19168: tasya ca pālanam. tatra tasmāt puruṣārtho 'stīty avagantavyam. tatra caitāny eva [646]{*5/348*} prakṛtyocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19174: na hi kalañjaṃ bhakṣayan pratiṣedhāvidhiṃ nātikrāmati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19175: iha punar ādityaṃ paśyan nātikrāmati vidhim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19176: na hi tasya darśanaṃ pratiṣiddham. niyamas tatropadiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19179: iha tu pratiṣidhyate kalañjādi. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19181: vratam iti prakṛtya vacanam asti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19182: na bhakṣayitavyam ity asya mānaso vyāpāro 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19183: bhakṣayitavyam iti ca bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ śabdenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19184: neti tat pratiṣidhyate śrutyaiva. evaṃ prasiddho 'rtho 'nugṛhīto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19186: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmād iha pratiṣedhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19189: doṣo 'tra na śrūyate. tasmāt pratiṣiddham apy anuṣṭhātavyam iti. kalpayiṣyata iti cet,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19314: apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/369*},

GSP28msbh1-7u:19336: vṛddhavayāḥ pratyuttheyaḥ saṃmantavyaś ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19355: kiṃ nityāny etāny utānityānīti. kiṃ prāptam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:19389: nanu jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇa iti brāhmaṇasya saṃkīrtanam. ucyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19413: nityau ca darśapūrṇamāsau. tatra yad etat kāmaśravaṇād anyad akāmaśravaṇaṃ{*5/384*} dvitīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19415: kiṃ yaḥ kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19417: uta viguṇam api tat prayoktavyam iti. ekādaśe{*5/385*} kāmasaṃyukte prathame śravaṇe cintayiṣyate sāṅge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19425: tathābhūtam eva nityam apy upadiśyate. tasmāt sarvāṅgopahāreṇa prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ. darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaś ca sāṅgasyaiva vācakaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19426: paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca sāṅgaṃ vidhīyate. yac ca paurṇamāsyāṃ vihitam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19438: api vāpy ekadeśe syāt pradhāne hy arthanivṛttir guṇamātram itarat tadarthatvāt//6.3.2//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19439: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. apy ekadeśe 'ṅgānāṃ syād eva prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19440: yataḥ sāṅgasyāpy anaṅgasyāpi prayujyamānasya pradhānād evāyam artho niṣpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19443: pradhānamātrād idam anyat phalam. tasmāt svargaprāptyarthaṃ saṃpūrṇāṅgaṃ kariṣyāmīty ārabdham. yadi kānicid aṅgāni na śaknoti kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19444: tathāpy asmād ekadeśāṅgaguṇayuktāt pradhānāt phalaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmāt pradhānamātrasya prayogam āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19445: nāṅgānām. darśapūrṇamāśabdako 'gnihotraśabdakaś ca pradhānapadārtho 'nyāny aṅgāni tadarthānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19447: tadakarmaṇi ca doṣas tasmāt tato viśeṣaḥ syāt pradhānenābhisaṃbandhāt//6.3.3//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19449: apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/388*} pradhānātikrame doṣaṃ bruvaṃs tasya nityatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19453: karmābhedaṃ tu jaiminiḥ prayogavacanaikatvāt sarveṣām upadeśaḥ syād iti//6.3.4//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19458: prayogavacanaikatvād iti jaiminir āha sma. sarveṣām upadeśakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19464: arthasya vyapavargitvād ekasyāpi prayoge syād yathā kratvantareṣu//6.3.5//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19465: ekāṅgaprayoge 'pi syād viguṇād api phalam ity arthaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19467: agnihotrasaṃjñakād darśapūrṇamāsasaṃjñakāc ca phalam iha bhavati. tad dhi kartavyatayopadiśyate. yat paurṇamāsyām upadiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19470: yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*5/390*}. tasmād agnaye puroḍāśo 'gnīṣomābhyāṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19474: amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeteti sāṅgasya vidhānāt sāṅgaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdenābhidhīyata iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19475_0: siddhe hi darśārthe pūrṇamāsārthe ca sāṅgaṃ phale vidhīyate. tasmān na sāṅgam agnihotrapadavācyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:19475_1: darśapūrṇamāsapadavācyaṃ ca{*5 /392*}. yac cāgnihotraṃ tad iha codyate kartavyatayā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19476: yau ca darśapūrṇamāsau. tasmād viguṇam api kartavyam evāgnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ca. yathā kratvantareṣu prakṛtivikṛtiṣu parasya dharmāḥ parasya na bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19477: evaṃ na kāmasaṃyuktasya dharmā nityasya bhavitum arhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19485: tad eva yādṛk{*5/393*} tādṛg hotavyam iti{*5/394*} viguṇasya samāptiṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19495: yathā bhinne juhotīti. viguṇe niṣphale sati kasyāṅgabhūtaiḥ prayojanaṃ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19496: tasmāt viguṇānām api prayogaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19501: vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrāhāyaṇīṃ{*5/398*} nirvaped grāmakāma{*5/399*} ityevamādiṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19503: utāviguṇam eva phalavad iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19504: kāmyeṣu caivaṃ syāt, viguṇam api phalavad iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19505: arthitvāt. yadi viguṇam api phalavad evam arthimātram adhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19507: viśeṣe 'vasthāpito bhaviṣyati. asamarthatvān nādhikriyata iti cet. sāṅgaṃ na samarthaḥ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19516: asaṃyogāt tu naivaṃ syād vidheḥ śabdapramāṇatvāt//6.3.9//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19518: yad uktaṃ viguṇam api phalavad iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19521: na kevalāt. tena yady api kevalam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19524: śabdapramāṇakaś cāyam artho vidhīyate. śabdaś ca sāṅgāt phalam āheti vakṣyāmaḥ{*5/401*}. tasmān na viguṇaṃ karma kartavyam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19531: yathā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ. tasmād api na viguṇam evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ karma prayoktavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19535: sa ca puroḍāśo vrīhimayaḥ kartavya iti śrūyate. tatraitac cintyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19539: dravyāntare vibhāgaḥ syāt, anyo yāgaḥ{*5/402*}. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19541: āśrayabhedād dhi gamyate viśeṣaḥ. ayam anyo nīvārāśrayo vrīhyāśrayād iti. āśrayabhedas tāvad vispaṣṭa eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19542: tadbhedād rūpam api bhinnaṃ gamyate. tasmād anyo yāgo dravyāntara iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19544: *{5/402: E1 gibt anyo yāgaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19546: api vāvyatirekād rūpaśabdāvibhāgāc ca gotvavad aikarmyaṃ syān nāmadheyaṃ ca sattvavat//6.3.12//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19547: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. aikakarmyaṃ syād dravyā[658]{*5/403*}ntare 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19548: yadā kriyā bhavati calanaṃ patanaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19550: na ca kaścit tatra vyatirikto viśeṣo hīno vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19551: no khalv apy anyad eva rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19556: anyatvat. na hi sraji vāsati vā bhinne tadbhedāt puruṣabhedo gamyate. so 'pi tasyātmā bhinna iti cet. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19557: viśeṣam upalabhamānair evaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum. na cāsya viśeṣa upalabhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19560: eko 'pi{*5/405*} vartate. na vinaṣṭa iti yad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19566: bhedānupalambhāt. kathaṃ tarhi calatīti pratyaya iti cet. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19568: tad deśāntaraṃ gacchad āgacchac ca calatīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19577: na ca śabdena nocyate. tasmād yo 'pi nīvārair yāgaṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19581: darśa iti vā pūrṇamāsa iti vāsyaiva sāmānyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19593: agnihotrādīni nityāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam. teṣu śrutadravyāpacāre bhavati saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19595: uta tadantaṃ karmotsraṣṭavyam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19599: tan nīvāraguṇakaṃ kriyamāṇam aphalakaṃ bhavati. tasmāt tadantaṃ evotsraṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19603: yadi{*5/408*} somaṃ na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti. yadi ca pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19605: vidhīyate tu. tasmād yac ca na vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19615: yajaticodanācodito hy artho na viśiṣyate vīhibhir nīvārair vā kriyamāṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19616: yāgaś cāvaśyakartavyo nityeṣv anityeṣu ca prārabdheṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19622: somābhāve bahuṣu sadṛśeṣu prāpteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19623: pūtīkā{*5/411*} evābhiṣotavyā iti. tasmāt pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19630: niyamārtham eva tad vacanam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19631: yataḥ prāptāḥ pūtīkāḥ. kathaṃ ca te prāptāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19633: tatra sādṛśyacikīrṣety{*5/412*} etad vakṣyāmaḥ{*5/413*}. taccikīrṣayā ca prāptāḥ pūtīkāḥ. tasmāt tan nityam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19634: vacanam etan niyamāya nityam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19642: yad āhavanīye juhvati tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*5/415*}. śabdo mantraḥ{*5/416*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:19649: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, na devatāgniśabdakriyāṇām apacāre pratinidhinā bhavitavyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19652: anyac ca teṣām arthaṃ na śaknuyāt kartum. kaś ca teṣām arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19655: aṣṭākapālaḥ paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca tyajyate. yac cānyeṣu haviḥṣu vihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19656: na tato darśapūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ. tatrānyoddiśyamānā na śrutāyā uddeśyāyā arthaṃ kuryāt. na hy anyasyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ. tasmān na devatā pratinidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19658: yad āhavanīye juhvatīty āvahanīyāpacāre nānyo 'gniḥ pratinidhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19660: anyārthasaṃyogāt, pratinidhīyamānam āhavanīyakārye na vartate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19667: upari yajyamānasya deśaḥ kiṃcid upakarotīti. tasmān nāgneḥ{*5/419*} pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19669: mantrāpacāre nānyo mantraḥ pratinidhīyate. mantrasya{*5/420*} hy etat prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19673: tad apacarite mantre yadi tasyārthe [662]{*5/421*} 'nyaṃ śabdam uccārayati pūrvaṃ pratīte 'rthe śabdam uccārayan,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19674: na śabdenārthaṃ pratīyāt. atha pratītam api punaḥ pratinidhiśabdoccāraṇena pratīyāc chabdāt pratītiṃ kuryāt{*5/422*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:19675: evaṃ ca pratinidhiśabdoccāraṇānurodho 'narthakaḥ syāt. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19676: śabdena pratyāpayitavyam iti kiṃcit pramāṇam asti. yad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19678: tadabhāve śabdāntarānurodho 'narthakaḥ syāt. tasmān na śabdasya pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19682: tāv anyasyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ na tadvantau bhavataḥ. tasmāt kriyāyāṃ na pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19692: *{5/422: E1 gibt chabdāt pratītiṃ kuryāt in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19701: sā. anyā tasyāḥ sthāne pratinidhīyamānā na devatā syāt. coditā hi devatā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19703: saṃbandhiśabdaś caiṣaḥ. yā yad arthaṃ codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19705: nānyasya. devateti saṃbandhiśabdo na jātiśabdaḥ. tasmād api na devatāyāḥ pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19710: ayajñiyā vai māṣā iti. kiṃ tac chrutadravyāpacāre prati[663]{*5/425*}nidhātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19713: āgamo vā codanārthāviśeṣād{*5/427*} iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19716: na yajñārhā māṣā varakāḥ kodravāś ceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19717: yajñasaṃbandha eṣāṃ pratiṣidhyate. naite yajñāṅgabhāvaṃ netavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19718: pratinidhīyamānāś cāṅgabhāvaṃ nītāḥ syuḥ. tasmān naite pratinidhātavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19725: agnihotrādīni karmāṇy udāharaṇam. teṣu svāminy apacarati saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19726: kim anyaḥ pratinidhātavyo neti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19728: āgamo vā codanārthāviśeṣād{*5/428*} iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tathā svāminaḥ syāt. ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19737: na pratinidhiḥ. sa eva hi phalena saṃbadhyate. ya utsargaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19739: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktarīti{*5/429*}. tasmān na svāminaḥ pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19748: saptadaśāvarāḥ satram āsīrann iti. teṣu kasmiṃścit svāminy apacarati saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19751: na svāminaḥ pratinidhir iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19753: apacarite kasmiṃścit svāminy anyam āgamayet. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19759: na tv āgamyamānaḥ svāmīti vakṣyāmaḥ. tenāśakyaiva sā saṃkhyopādātum iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19760: svāmigatā na hi bhaviṣyati. na hi sā śakyā kartum iti. idaṃ tu śakyaṃ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19762: ta iha saptadaśāvaraiḥ kartavyā ity etad upapāditaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmāt pratinidhātavyaṃ tatreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19765: tasminn āgamyamāna idānīṃ saṃdehaḥ, kim asau svāmī, uta karmakara iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19768: tena svāmitvena{*5/431*} saṃyogaḥ. yo hy asāv ānīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19771: tataḥ sa pratinidhiḥ kṛto bhavati. tasmāt svāmīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19780: bhṛto hy asau taiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ svāmibhiḥ prayuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19781: parikrīyamāṇo na svāmī bhavati. yaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19789: sa hy upakramaprabhṛty apavargaparyantam āha. nanu te 'pi tatra viguṇaṃ kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19790: saptadaśānāṃ svāminām abhāvāt. tasmāt te 'pi na svāminaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19793: na saptadaśāvarāḥ phalasamavāye bhaveyur iti śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19794: na saṃkhyā phalaparigrahe guṇabhūtā. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19798: aphalatve 'pi ca satyaṃ saṃkalpaṃ kartum anyam ānayanti. ānīyamānasya ca na tena prayojanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19801: tasmiṃś ca diṣṭāṃ gatiṃ gate phalaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19802: yo dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyetāpi tasya phalam iti. tasmāt karmakara iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19805: bahūnāṃ kasmiṃścid apacarite pratinidheyo 'nya ity etat [666]{*5/433*} samadhigatam. idam idānīṃ tatra saṃdigdham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19811: sa ṛtvig iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19824: śrute dravye 'pacarati pratinidhim upādāya prayoktavyam iti sthitam. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19825: kiṃ yatkiṃcid dravyam upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19831: ākṛtiś ca yady apy aṅgabhāvena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19832: tathāpi na sākṣāt tasyāḥ kriyāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvaḥ. yat tu kriyāsādhanaṃ dravyam arthād aṅgabhūtaṃ prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19835: te viśeṣā aṅgabhūtāḥ. atha tasyām ākṛtāv apacaritāyām arthaprāptaṃ dravyaṃ grahītavyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19836: yasmiṃś ca sadṛśe gṛhyamāṇe teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ kecit saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19838: tatsadṛśaṃ dravyam upādātavyaṃ bhavati. tasmād vrīhīṇām apacāre nīvārāḥ pratinidheyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19845: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*5/437*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:19847: khādire paśuṃ badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti rauhitake badhnātīti. tatra kadācit khadiraguṇake prayoga ārabdhe khadiro vinaṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19849: kiṃ vaikalpikasyopādānam uta khadirasadṛśasyeti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19851: sa hi śrutaḥ, khadirasadṛśo na śrūyate, tasmād vaikalpikasyopādānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19858: vaikalpikam anaṅgam. āśritakhadire prayoge palāśarauhitakāv anaṅgabūtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19861: aśakyaṃ cāśrutam. tasmād āśritakhadire prayoga itarau nopādeyau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19869: aśabdam evaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāc chabdavattvād vaikalpikam upādeyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19873: anaṅgaṃ tasmin prayoge vaikalpikam. āśritakhadiro [668]{*5/438*} hi sa prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19875: tasya nirdeśād itarāv aśrutau. nanu nirdeśābhāve 'ṅgabhāvavirodhaḥ. tena śrutāv iti. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19880: asati khadira itarau śrutāv iti. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19882: saṃskārāś ca khadire kartavyāḥ. khadirasadṛśe tadbuddhyā gṛhyamāṇe śrutabuddhyā kṛtā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19883: vaikalpikena tu śrutenāsaṃbaddhāḥ. tasmād upāttasadṛśo grāhya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19887: vacanāc cānyāyyam abhāve tatsāmānyena pratinidhir abhāvād itarasya//6.3.31//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19889: yadi na somaṃ vindet{*5/439*} pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19897: tat kalpāntarapekṣe 'rthavad bhavati. tasmān na pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19898: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pratinidhiḥ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19899: vinaṣṭe hi sādhane sādhyasiddhyarthaṃ sādhanāntaram upādīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19901: anyad dhi sadṛśāntaram astīti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19903: bahuṣu vāsadṛśeṣu pūtīkā alpasadṛśā niyamyante. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19905: tasyām avasthāyām antareṇaiva vacanaṃ pratinidheyaṃ dravyāntaraṃ prāptam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19906: prāpte vacanaṃ na vidhir iti gamyate. prāptasyānuvādo bhavitum arhati. kim artham anuvāda iti cet. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19917: śrute dravya upātte 'pacarite pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ prāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19921: pratinihite vinaṣṭe tatsadṛśam upādeyaṃ pūrveṇa nyāyena{*5/441*}. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19922: pratinidhau na syāt pratinidhir iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19927: na pratinidhicikīrṣayā. tasmān na pratinidhisadṛśam upādeyam upāttanaṣṭasyaiva sadṛśo 'nveṣitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19934: yadi somaṃ na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19935: pūtīkeṣu vinaṣṭeṣu pūtīkasadṛśam upā[670]{*5/442*}deyam uta somasadṛśam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19938: sa cāyaṃ śrutaḥ somābhāvaḥ{*5/443*}. tasmāt pūtīkavyaktaya upādeyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19948: tathā hi pūtīkavidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham asadṛśavidhāne 'dṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. ato yasmiṃs tad apūtīkasadṛśe 'pi dravye bhavati tad grahītavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19952: atha yatra vinaṣṭe śrute pratinidhim upādātuṃ prasthito mukhyam evopalabhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19954: uta tam eva mukhyam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19956: evaṃ saṃkalpitavān asau pratinidhim upādadāna eva satyasaṃkalpo bhavati. tasmāt pratinidhātavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19957: mukhyādhigame tam evopādadīta. abhāve hi śrutasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19968: athāgnihotrādiṣu karmasu śrutadravyāpacāre pratinidhāv upātte kṛteṣu keṣucit saṃskāreṣu yadi tad eva śrutam upalabhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19970: uta tenaiva pratinihitena samāpayitavyam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19972: āgamo hi tadabhāvād{*5/445*} iti. tasmān na pratinidhātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19978: yena hi khadirābhāve kadare paśur niyukto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19981: arthārthaṃ hi khadiropādānaṃ na khadiropādānārtham eva. tasmān na śrutam upādīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19986: asti khadiradravyam anevaṃjātīyakam. tatra kim upādeyam iti. saṃskārā na parilopsyanta iti kadara upādīyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19987: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dravyasaṃskāravirodhe dravyaṃ praty ādriyeran, na saṃskārān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19989: saṃskārā hi dravyaṃ karmayogyaṃ kurvanti. tatra saṃskāraparilope dravyam api tāvad gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19993: tadabhāve naṣṭadvāraṃ nāpūrvaṃ gaccheyuḥ. tasmāt khadiram upādadīrann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19998: asti yūpakāle khadiralatā paśor aprāgalbhye{*5/447*} na samarthāḥ{*5/448*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:20001: uta kadaradravyam iti. khadiradravyam ity āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20004: pratinidhāv aśrutakārī syāt. tasmān na pratinidhātavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20009: kadaram upādadāno dravyaśrutiṃ bādhate. arthaṃ tv anugṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20010: khadiralatām upādadāna ubhayaṃ bādhate. tasmāt kadaradravyam upādeyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20017: *{5/449: E1 gibt pratinidher utpattir in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:20022: tathā santi nīvārāḥ śeṣakāryāṇām api paryāptāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20023: tatra kim upādeyam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:20024: apy ekadeśe dvyava[673]{*5/450*}dānamātre 'pi nirvartyamāne pratinidhir upādeyaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:20029: api vārthasya śakyatvād ekadeśena{*5/451*} nirvartetārthānām avibhaktatvād guṇamātram itarat tadarthatvāt//6.3.41//
GSP28msbh1-7u:20030: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. ekadeśena vrīhīṇāṃ pradhānamātraṃ nirvartayitavyam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:20035: nāṅgānurodhena pradhānasya guṇo bādhitavyaḥ. tad dhy aṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20037: na yad apakāre vartate. tatra ca śeṣakāryāṇi kriyamāṇāni pradhāne vrīhitvaṃ guṇaṃ vihanyuḥ. vrīhitvaṃ ca pradhāne sākṣād aṅgabhūtaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20038: vrīhibhir yajeteti. tasmān na teṣv anurodhaḥ kāryaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20039: asati hy aṅgapradhānavibhāga{*5/452*} etad evaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20040: asti hy asau. tasmān na pratinidhir iti. tathā cānyārthadarśanam api bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20041: tad eva yādṛk tādṛg hotavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20054: yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vācuyato{*6/2*} bhavati{*6/3*} iti. tatra yadi dvyavadānamātram uddhṛtaṃ vyāpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20056: neti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam. dvyavadānanāśe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20062: prayojanaṃ ca yāgena. sa cāgneyena kriyamāṇaḥ śruta evābhinirvartito bhavatīti kim iti na kriyeta. tasmāc cheṣād avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20069: atha vānyad dhavir āgamayen na śeṣād avadātavyam. kutaḥ. nirdeśāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20073: dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti. tatrānyac chiṣṭaṃ madhyasya pūrvārdhasya viśeṣaṇārtham. yac ca tad dhomasaṃyuktaṃ tadvinaṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20074: tac cheṣeṇa kriyamāṇam amadhyenāpūrvārdhena ca kṛtaṃ syāt. nanv avatte yac chiṣṭaṃ tato madhyāt pūrvārdhāc ca grahīṣyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20075: kṛtsnasya yat madhyaṃ pūrvārdhaṃ ca tac coditam, na itarasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20078: yasya sarvāṇi havīṃṣi naśyeyur duṣyeyur vāpahareyur vā[675]{*6/6*}ājyena tā devatāḥ parisaṃkhyāya yajerann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20079: haviṣo nāśa ājyaṃ prāptam. tena na śeṣād avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20082: nirdiśyate hi tac chiṣṭam aparebhyaḥ śeṣakāryebhya iti. tan nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20083: na hi tāni śeṣakāryāṇi havīṃṣi prayojayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20084: na cānivṛttaprayojanaṃ havir anyatra pratipādyam. tasmān nāyam arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20089: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syād viśiṣṭakāraṇatvāt // MS_6,4.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20090: atha sviṣṭakṛd artham avattaṃ yadi vinaśyati, tatra kiṃ śeṣād avadeyam uta neti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:20095: tasmād{*6/8*} avadīyamāne śrutaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt śeṣād avadeyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20096: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, śeṣabhājāṃ syāl lopaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:20100: tasya viviktakaraṇāya pratipādyamānasya niyamo 'yaṃ sviṣṭakṛd dhomena pratipādayitavyaḥ. tathā hi sa pratipādito bhavati. sa yadi homāyoddhṛto vipadyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20101: kṛte viveke na punar grahaṇaṃ prayojayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20102: pratipādyamānaś ca sviṣṭakṛd dhomena pratipādayitavya iti. pratipādyamānābhāvāl lopa eva sviṣṭakṛtaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20103: pradhāne kṛte śiṣṭaṃ [676]{*6/9*} sarvaśeṣakāryasādhāraṇam. tatraikasyoddhṛtau śiṣṭam anyatra pratipādanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20117: yajamānapañcamā iḍāṃ bhakṣayantīti. sarveṣu bhakṣayitṛṣu{*6/13*} prāpteṣu parisaṃkhyānārtho nirdeśaḥ kriyate. iḍām evaite bhakṣayeyur iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20118: yathāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla{*6/14*} iti sarvasminn avayavini yāgāniyame prāpte dvyavadānamātraṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20123: evam eṣāṃ parisaṃkhyeti. api ca yadi prakṛtā eva bhakṣayeyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20136: sarvair vā prakṛtair eva bhakṣyeta. tad dhi bhakṣaṇaṃ puruṣasaṃskārārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20137: puruṣāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ pracariṣyantīti. teṣu vinigamanāyā abhāvād yāvantaḥ prakaraṇe samavetāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20145: tatra yajamānas teṣāṃ pañcamo vacanāt nirdiśyate. tatprāptyarthaṃ cedaṃ vacanam. tato na parisaṃkhyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20152: tad vacanaprāmāṇyāt parisaṃkhyānārtham. na hi tatra kasyacid apūrvasya vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20154: vidhiparisaṃkhyāsaṃśaye vidhir jyāyān. tatra svārthe śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20158: prāptabādhaś ceti. tasmāt prākṛtā eva bhakṣayeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20161: atha yad uktam, aśvamedhe virodhaḥ syāt, bahutvād bhakṣāṇām{*6/18*} iti, tat parihartavyam//
GSP28msbh1-7u:20167: arthāt sarvaṃ bhakṣayanto 'śvamedhaṃ na samāpayeyuḥ. tatrāśvamedhaśrutiḥ pratyakṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20168: sā virudhyamānā codakaprāptaṃ sarvabhakṣaṇaṃ bādhate. prakṛtau tu na virodhaḥ. tasmāt sarvaṃ prakṛtā bhakṣayeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20175: kiṃ kṛtsne bhinne skanne ca [678]{*6/19*} prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20176: utaikadeśe 'pi bhinne skanne ceti. kiṃ punaḥ sarvabhinnam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20180: tad ekadeśabhinnam iti. kiṃ prāptam. ekadeśabhinne 'pi prāyaścittam. kasmāt. arthasamavāyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20183: evaṃ prāpte nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20188: na tv aśeṣe vaiguṇyāt tadarthaṃ hi // MS_6,4.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20189: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. nāśeṣe bhinne{*6/21*} prāyaścittaṃ syāt. vinaṣṭasaṃskārārthaṃ hi prāyaścittam. kutaḥ. etad bhedanavatā prayojanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20191: tena saṃskṛtena{*6/22*} prayogaḥ kariṣyanta iti prāyaścittaṃ kriyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20192: tena cūrṇīkṛtena prayogaḥ śakyate kartum. tasmāt prāyaścittam anarthakam. ekadeśabhinnena tu saṃskṛtena śakyate prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20198: syād vā prāptanimittatvād ataddharmo nityasaṃyogān na hi tasya guṇārthenānityatvāt // MS_6,4.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20202: prāpte ca nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyam. yac ca uktam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:20207: tatra kathaṃ tasyopakārakaṃ bhavet. tatra ko doṣaḥ. na śakyaṃ [679]{*6/23*} nityenopakartum{*6/24*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:20208: tena nityam upakuryād iti vacanaṃ pralāpa eva. atha naimittikam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20209: na doṣo bhavati. tasmād asmatpakṣa eva. asmin pakṣe yadā bhinnam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20211: tadā naiva homo vidhīyate. bhavadīye pakṣe bhavati doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20212: nityānityayor nāsti saṃbandha iti. tasmāt bhinnamātre prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20217: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād vacanād{*6/25*} vyapāśrayaḥ syāt // MS_6,4.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20218: asti vacane na guṇo guṇārtho bhavitum arhati{*6/26*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:20219: prakaraṇataḥ sarvaṃ pradhānārtham. bhinnam api homo 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20220_0: na ca bhinnam ādhārabhāvenopadiśyate. bhinnasyādhārabhāve hi na homāntaraṃ vidhīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20220_1: pradhānasyaiva hi tadā bhinno guṇa iti gamyate. tatrāhavanīyasaṃyogo bādhyeta. vacanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:20222: homasya ca śrutyā vihitatvāt. yadā homo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20225: tadā vākyena. tasmān nādhāro bhinnaḥ. yady ucyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20227: prakṛtasyaiva homasya nimittaṃ vidhīyeteti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20228: anupādīyamānaṃ hi nimittam ity ucyate. yadi hi vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20229: nimittam eva tan na syāt. yadi ca yasyāpi nimittaṃ so 'py uddiśyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20230: tatra dvayor uddiśyamānayoḥ saṃbandha eva na syāt. na cātra bhedanaṃ kuryād iti vidhīyate. bhedane nirvṛtte yad anyac chrūyate, tad vidhīyate.

GSP28msbh1-7u:20255: tatrānarthakaḥ saṃskāraḥ. nanu tata uddhṛtyopadhāyiṣyate. neti brūmaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:20260: kṣāme tu sarvadāhe syād ekadeśasyāvarjanīyatvāt // MS_6,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20262: atha yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyatas taṃ yajñaṃ varuṇo gṛhṇāti. yadā tad dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta,

GSP28msbh1-7u:20267_0: na śakyata{*6 /32*} ekadeśakṣāmatā{*6 /33*} varjayitum. niyatam agnisaṃyoge dāhyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:20267_1: sūkṣmā{*6 /34*} avayavāḥ kṣīyante. tapteṣu ca [681]{*6 /35*} kapāleṣv adhaḥ pākārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:20269: tad avarjanīyam. nimittatvenāpi śrūyamāṇaṃ nityam eva syāt. tatra yasyeti nimittaśravaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt. tasmāt sarvakṣāme prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20279: ekadeśe kṣāyati bhavitum arhati. nimittaṃ hy upasaṃprāptaṃ{*6/36*} kṣāṇaṃ nāma. ekadeśakṣāṇam api kṣāṇam eva. yadi tatra na kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20280: śrutaṃ na kriyeta. na caitad yuktam. api ca darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20283: tenaiva haviṣā saṃsthānaṃ darśayati. tat sarvakṣāṇe nāvakalpate. tasmād ekadeśa eva kṣāyati prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20289: anyena vaitac chāstrād dhi kāraṇaprāptiḥ // MS_6,4.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20290: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20293: kiṃ tarhi. kṛtsnakṣāma eva prāyaścittam. upasaṃprāptaṃ hi nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20299: saṃsthāne nimitte prāyaścittam. yadāpy anyenāpi haviṣā tat saṃsthāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20309: anyena haviṣā yadā saṃsthāpyata iti. naivam. taddhaviḥśabdāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20310: taddhaviḥśabdo 'tra bhavati. yadā taddhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti. atrānyena haviṣā saṃsthāpyamāne taddhaviḥśabdo nāvakalpyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20312: syād anyāyatvād{*6/42*} ijyāgāmī haviḥśabdas talliṅgasaṃyogāt // MS_6,4.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20313: syād ijyāgāmī{*6/43*} haviḥśabdaḥ. taddhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta taddhaviṣka karma saṃtiṣṭheteti{*6/44*}. nanu mukhyābhāve gauṇo gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20316: tat karma tena haviṣeti vākyaṃ bhidyeta. avācakaṃ ca syāt. karmaiva hi saṃtiṣṭhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20318_0: tena nimittam{*6 /45*}. tad dhavir ity anuvādaḥ. anuvādaś ced anyahaviṣke 'pi karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:20318_1: saṃsthite prāyaścittam iti gamyate. kathaṃ punar haviḥśabdaḥ karmaṇi vartata iti. talliṅgasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20320: yathā prasahyakāritayā devadattasaṃbaddhayā{*6/47*} lakṣyate siṃhaḥ. evaṃ haviṣāpi karma lakṣyate. tasmāt kṛtsnakṣāme prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20324: *{6/44: E1 hat taddhaviṣka karma santiṣṭheta in Klammern gesetzt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:20332: yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcched aindraṃ pañcaśarāvamodanaṃ nirvaped{*6/49*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20334: utānyatarasminn iti. kiṃ prāptam. iti cet paśyasi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20337: ubhayor iti. kutaḥ. yathāśruti bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20341: itarathā yāvad eva havir iti tāvad evobhayaṃ havir iti syāt. tasmād ubhayor ārtyāṃ pañcaśarāva iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20346: *{6/51: E1 (v.l.): evaṃjātīyake kasyārtyām; E2: evaṃjātīyaka ekasyārtyām}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:20348: na tallakṣaṇatvād upapāto hi kāraṇam // MS_6,4.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20349: naitad evam. upapāto hy ārtisaṃbaddhaṃ dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20351: tad vyastaṃ samastaṃ ca nimittam. na hy ubhayaśabdena śakyaṃ viśiṣṭum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20353: haviṣa ārtau pañcaśarāvaḥ. sa cobhayasya haviṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20356: haviṣāpi te viśeṣaṇaṃ na prāpnoti. tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20358: aviśeṣyamāṇe 'narthakaṃ syāt. yasyārtim ārcched ity aviśeṣe yatkiṃcid iti gamyate{*6/53*}. tatra sarvasyaiva kiṃcid ārtim ṛcchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20359: antataś caritaṃ nimiṣitaṃ cintitam{*6/54*} iti. tatra yasyeti nimittavacanaṃ nityam anupapannaṃ{*6/55*} gamyate. tasmād avaśyam ārtir viśeṣṭavyā. sā ca haviṣā viśiṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20360: tathā haviḥ [684]{*6/56*} ārtisaṃbandhanirvṛttir animittaṃ pañcaśarāvasya. śaknoti hi śrutyā taṃ saṃbandhaṃ vaktum. havir ubhayasaṃbandhaṃ tu vākyena brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20363: ārtinirvṛttir api tatra gamyate. sā ca śrutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20364: havir ubhayasaṃbandhe 'tyantaṃ śrutir avahīyate{*6/57*}. tasmān na tatsaṃbandho nirvartyamāno nirdiśyata iti. kathaṃ tarhy ubhayaśabdaḥ. ubhayam iti nityānuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20365: ekasminn apy ārte 'parasminn api. tasmād uktaṃ yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcched iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20366: atha kasmān na padadvayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittaṃ pratīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20367: yasyobhayaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ havir ārtim ārcched iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20370: viśiṣṭārthasya saṃnidhānād viśiṣṭo 'rtha ārtisaṃnihitaḥ. kiṃ punaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20371: yady evaṃ bhavet. tata ubhayaviśiṣṭārtir{*6/58*} nimittam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20373: idaṃ tāvad devānāṃpriyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ. yasyāpi hi viśiṣṭārtha ārtisaṃnihito bhavati. kiṃ tasyāviśiṣṭo daṇḍaiḥ parāṇudyate. kim ato yan na parāṇudyate. etad ato bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20374: aviśiṣṭagatāpy{*6/59*} ārtir nimittaṃ{*6/60*} pañcaśarāvasya bhavati. nanūbhayaśabdo havir viśekṣyati{*6/61*}. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20375: haviḥśabdenāsaṃbadhyamānas tan na śaknoti viśeṣṭum. ānantaryāt saṃbhantsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20376: tarhi tathāpi na samarthaḥ. na hy asau nivṛttiṃ prayojayati{*6/62*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20380: evam abhihite kṛṣṇām{*6/63*} ānayanti. śuklaśabda enāṃ gāṃ kṛṣṇādibhyo nivartayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20386_1: tu tatrānayanaṃ pradhānam ucyate. iha punar ārtihaviṣṭvalakṣite dravye pañcaśarāvaḥ{*6 /66*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20386_2: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam. pradhānabhūta ākhyātārthe saṃhatya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20388: pradhānabhūta ākṛtir guṇo vā tatsaṃbandhārtham ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20389_0: tatrobhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa{*6 /68*} ekasmād vākyād avagamyate. tad viśiṣṭaṃ ca kṛtvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:20389_1: kṛtī bhavati. anyataraviśiṣṭaṃ kurvann aśrutaṃ kuryāt. yatra punar ākṛtilakṣite dravya
GSP28msbh1-7u:20390_0: tatra sarveṣv eva tajjātīyeṣūkto bhavati. na tatraikasmin nirvṛtte kṛtaṃ{*6 /69*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:20390_1: manyeta. aparasminn api hy ākṛtilakṣite tad uktam eva. tatroktam apratiṣiddhaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:20390_2: kim iti na kriyeta. ākhyātārthe punaḥ pradhāne na tasyākṛtilakṣitena saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20391: saguṇaṃ ca pradhānaṃ bhavati. na ca kiṃcic chrutaṃ hīyeteti. tasmāt tatra viśeṣaṇaṃ yuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20392: na tv iha tathā. iha hi havir ākṛtikasya dravyasyārtau pañcaśarāva ity uktam. tan na śakyaṃ viśeṣavacanena pratiṣedhāvācakena nivartayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20393_0: api cobhayaśabde haviṣā saṃbadhyamāne 'pi naivobhayaviśiṣṭārtiḥ pratīyate. kiṃ kāraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20393_1: haviṣobhayaśabdaḥ saṃbadhyate. nārtim ārcched ity anena padena. tatra saṃnihite 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:20394: tāvataivārtiḥ saṃbadhyate. aviśiṣṭaś ca tatrārthaḥ{*6/70*}. tasmān nobhayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20397: vibhaktisaṃyogo hi havir viśeṣaṇam ubhayaśabdaṃ śaknuyāt kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20399: nārtiviśeṣaṇam. na hy asyārtyā havir viśiṣṭasya samabhivyāhāro 'sti. [686]{*6/71*} athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20400: asaty api samabhivyāhāra ārtiśabdasaṃnidhānāt tadviśiṣṭaivārthiḥ pratyeṣyata iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20401: asatyāṃ hy ākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnidhānam akāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20403: puruṣo devadattasyeti. ekavākyagatatvāt tadviśiṣṭaṃ gamyata iti cet. naitad evam. ekasminn api vākye tadavayavabhūtasyānapekṣitasya naiva bhavati saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20409: ārtiviśiṣṭena haviṣobhayasya{*6/72*} saṃbandha iti. tad api nopapadyate. na hy ārtim ārcched iti havir viśeṣaṇatvenopādīyate. kiṃ tarhi. pañcaśarāvasya nimittatvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20410: havir ārter ubhayapañcaśarāvasaṃbandhe yaugapadyenābhyupagamyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20411: atha havir ākṛtilakṣitena saṃbaddhaṃ ārcched iti punar havir viśiṣṭenobhayaśabdena saṃbadhyeta. tathāpi vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmān nobhayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20413: yathaivākhyātārthaprādhānya ubhayaviśiṣtocyata iti nānyataraviśiṣṭā nimittam gamyate. evam itarasminn api pakṣe ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭā sā ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20415: tathāpy anyataraviśiṣṭā bhavantī na nimittaṃ bhavitum arhatīti. ko viśeṣa{*6/73*} iti. tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20420: etad ato bhavati. havirākṛtyā lakṣyate dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20421_0: tasya kiṃcid vaktavyam iti. tad alakṣitam ucyamānaṃ na vijñāyeta kasya syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20421_1: athavā sarvasyaiva dravyasyeti gamyeta. tasminn ubhayasminn apy aviśiṣṭe{*6 /75*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:20421_2: sati tasyāśrayaṃ lakṣayituṃ havirākṛtir ucyate. [687]{*6 /76*} tatra dvayam āpatati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20423: tad ubhayam iti. yadi tāvad yad dhavirākṛtikaṃ tadārtam ity apekṣyate. tato havirākṛtikam ubhayam anubhayaṃ vārtaṃ nimittaṃ gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20424: atha yad dhavirākṛtikaṃ tad ubhayam iti tato nārtir haviṣā viśeṣyate. haviṣāviśiṣyamāṇāyam{*6/77*} artāv ubhayaśabdo havir viśekṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20425: naitad avakalpate. katham iti. evaṃ kila viśeṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20429: tac ced ārtam iti. kathaṃ tena viśiṣṭenārtiḥ saṃbadhyeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20430: na{*6/78*} punar ubhayahaviḥśabdau cārtiviśeṣaṇārtham{*6/79*} uccāryeyātām. atha punaruccāraṇaṃ na kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20431: tathā yady api haviḥśabdas tantreṇārtyubhayāśrayalakṣaṇārthaṃ{*6/80*} noccāryeta. aviśiṣṭam{*6/81*} ārter lakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20432: aviśiṣṭam ubhayasya. viśiṣṭe iṣṭe punaruccāraṇaṃ kartavyam. tatra vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20435: tatrāviśiṣṭasya haviṣa ārtir nimittam syāt. atha haviḥśabdena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20437: tac caitad iti vā sarvanāmnā nirdiśyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20439_0: upādeyatve punar nānyonyaviśeṣaṇatvena prayojanam. dvayam apy ārtiṃ viśeṣṭum uccāryeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20439_1: tatra nānyataraviśiṣṭārtir nimittaṃ bhaviṣyati. lakṣaṇatve tv anyataraviśiṣṭā bhavatīty eṣa viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20442: śabdād ṛte tṛtīyena padena satyāṃ gatau saṃnihitenāpi saṃbandho na yuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20444_0: bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣo devadattasyety atra rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇam. asatyāṃ tu gatāv upādeyasyānekasyāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:20444_1: pradhānena saṃbandho 'vakalpate vyavahitenāpi. vyava[688]{*6 /82*}dhānād artho balīyān iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20445: lakṣaṇatve tu lakṣaṇadvayasaṃnipāte 'vaśyaṃ heye 'nyatam asmin{*6/83*} vyavahito guṇo vā hātavyo bhavati.

GSP28msbh1-7u:20484_1: bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate. abhiṣave kṛte home ca tatkartṛbhiḥ bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:20847: na prahartavyā bhavati. athāṅgabhūtā vināpi prastareṇa prahartavyā. asmābhir uktaṃ prastarakāle prahartavyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20849: tasmād eva kāraṇāt prastaraviprayoge 'pi śākhāyāḥ praharaṇaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20857: sāṃnyāyye saty asati ca śākhā [700]{*6/157*} vidyata ity upaveṣo sati cāsati{*6/158*} ca syāt. yathā tu siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20858: tathā sāṃnyāyyapakṣe śākhā satī hi pratipādyata iti. tatraivopaveṣo nānyatreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20865: abhyudaye kālāparādhād ijyācodanā syāt yathā pañcaśarāve // MS_6,5.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20867: vi vā enaṃ prajayā paśubhir ardhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20869: yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti{*6/160*} tredhā{*6/161*} taṇḍulān vibhajet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20871: tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20872: ye sthaviṣṭhās tān indrāya pradātre dadhaṃś carum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20874: tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum{*6/162*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ kālāparādhe yāgāntaram idaṃ codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20875: uta teṣv eva prakṛteṣu karmasu nimitte devatāpanayana iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20878: tatrejyācodanā syāt. katham. puroḍāśam agnaye dātre madhyamān kurvate{*6/163*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:20879: ye sthaviṣṭhās tān indrāya pradātre dadhani caruṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20881: yajatis{*6/164*} tu phalabhoktṛsaṃyogād{*6/165*} iti vidhānaṃ{*6/166*} gamyate. yathā pañcaśarāve dravyadevatāsaṃbandhena karmāntaraṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20888: tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20889: tān indrāya pradātre dadhaṃś carum iti. evam ihāpīti. api ca na prakṛte dravye devatā [702]{*6/167*} śrūyte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20890: śṛte carum iti hi tatra bhavati vacanam. na cābhyudayakāle śrapaṇaṃ kṛtam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20897: *{6/164: E1,6; E2: śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum iti. yajatis}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:20905: teṣu vidyamāneṣu punar devatāsaṃbandho haviṣo nopapadyate. yasyānupapattyā yāgaḥ kalpyeta. tasmān na yāgāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20911: teṣāṃ devatāntaraṃ vidhīyate. tatra dravyaṃ prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20912: aprāptā devatā vidhīyate. kathaṃ punar devatāvidhānārthe nānekaguṇvidhānadoṣo jāyeteti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20913: naivātrāneko guṇo vidhīyate kasmiṃścid vākye. taṇḍulān{*6/168*} vibhajed ity atra tāvad vibhāgamātraṃ vidhīyate. anyat sarvam anūdyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20917: teṣāṃ dadhisahitānām indro devatāsmin vākye vidhīyate. tatrārthaprāpte{*6/169*} śrapaṇe sati carutā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20919: teṣāṃ śṛtasahitānāṃ viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭo devatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20926: ātañcanābhyāsaṃ ca darśayati. katham. evaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20927: yadi [703]{*6/170*} bibhīyād abhimodeṣyatīti mahārātre havīṃṣi nirvapet. phalīkṛtais taṇḍulair upāsīta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20929: ardhaṃ na. yady abhyudiyād anenātacya{*6/171*} pracaret,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20932: upādeyatvena tadā taṇḍulā dadhi śṛtaṃ ca. tasmāl laukikāny upādeyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20933: na hy eṣa tadā prakṛtānāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20935: aparedyur āmāvāsye kriyamāṇe vidyate dadhīti nātañcanam āvarteta. tasyām evābhyuditeṣṭau dadhi vidyata iti nātañcanaṃ syāt. atha nimitte devatāpanayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20936: tatas tasmin dadhani caruḥ kṛta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20938: evam ātañcanābhyāsasya darśanaṃ devatāvidhāne yujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20949: so 'māvāsyām iṣṭvā vatsān apākuryād iti. tat parihartavyam. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20950: yuktaṃ yat tatra karmāntaravidhānam. kutaḥ. apūrvatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20951: na tatra kaścit pūrvaprāpto yāgo vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20952: so 'māvāsyām iṣṭveti hi parisamāpte tasminn idam ārabhyate. tatra dravyadevatāsaṃyukto nirvapatiśabdo nāntareṇotsargam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20953: dravyadevatayoḥ saṃbandho vidyata{*6/174*} iti yajatiṃ gamayati. na tv ihaivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20955: tasminn eva vidyamānasya dravyasya devatāsaṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20964: yuktaṃ pañcaśarāve karmāntaram. duṣṭaṃ hi tatra dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20965: yasya devatā vidhīyate. tatrāvaśyaṃ dravyam upādeyatvena codayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20966: tasminn upādīyamāne devatāntare cāpūrvaḥ saṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20967: tad yāgāntaraṃ bhavatīti. itarad iha dravyam aduṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20969: prakṛte yāge devatā vidhīyata ity uktam, tasmād adoṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20974: evaṃ cet paśyasi, sāṃnyāyye 'pi doṣaḥ. tad api hy abhyudaye tatkālāpabhraṃśād duṣṭam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20976: na tasyāduṣṭatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_6,5.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:20979: iha tādṛśam evāvatiṣthate. nanu kālāpabhraṃśena duṣṭam. na duṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20980: aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam. abhyudaye prāyaścittavidhānaṃ duṣṭe 'py upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:20981: kālāparādhe 'duṣṭe{*6/176*} 'pi tat. akāle hy abhipravṛttasya śakyate devatāvidhānam, na tu vinaṣṭasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:20988: śṛte carum iti tatra bhavati vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21000: tasminn evābhyudaye saṃśayaḥ. kim upāṃśuyāge 'pi devatāpanayo bhaven neti. kiṃ prāptam. upāṃśuyājo yathāprakṛti syāt. kasmāt. avacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21002: madhyamānām agnaye dātre puroḍāśāḥ{*6/179*} sthaviṣṭhānām indrāya pradātre dadhani caruḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21003: kṣodiṣṭhānāṃ viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caru iti. naitad upāṃśuyāje 'sti. tasmāt sa yathādevataṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21008: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. upāṃśuyājasyāpanayaḥ. kena kāraṇena. pravṛttyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21009: akāle tantrapravṛttir devatāpanayasya kāraṇam. kutḥ. na hy atrābhyudaye sati taṇḍulā vibhāgārtham upādīyante. kiṃ tarhi. abhyuditasya haviṣo vibhāga ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21012_0: aparādhaś cākāle tantrapravṛttiḥ. evaṃ ca sati na tad dhavis taṇḍulaiḥ śakyaṃ viśeṣṭum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21012_1: tasmād upāṃśuyāgasyāpi{*6 /181*} vibhāgaḥ. tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed iti hy anena
GSP28msbh1-7u:21013: vidhir hy atra vibhajed iti. vibhāgaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ{*6/182*}. katham iti. vibhāge viśeṣaparāṇy uttarāṇi vākyāni. idam idaṃ ca dravyam asyai devatāyai,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21014: idam idaṃ cāsyā iti. yasya dravyasya viśeṣavibhāgo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21015: tasyāpi vibhajed iti sāmānyavibhāgaḥ. tasmād yathaivetareṣāṃ vibhāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21017: upāṃśuyājadravyāt [706]{*6/183*} pūrveṇa vākyenāpanītā devatā. na tad apareṇa vākyena devatāntare{*6/184*} saṃyojitam. tasmāt prahīṇam eva tat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21021: *{6/182: E1 hat vibhāgaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21026: asminn evodāharaṇe saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ yadi nirupte 'bhyudayo 'vagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21028: utānirupte 'pīti. kiṃ prāptam. nirupte 'vagate 'bhyuditeṣṭiḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tatsaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21030: yasya havir niruptam iti. tasmād anirupte naitad vidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21033: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. akāle tantrapravṛttimātre syād etad vidhānam. prāptaṃ hi tāvaty eva nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21034: yasya havir abhyudetīti havir grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇatvena. yasya havir abhyudetīti havir lakṣita udayo nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21037: havir abhyudetīty ucyamāne pravṛttaṃ havir abhyudetīti gamyate. na hi tan niruptam ity etena śakyaṃ viśeṣayitum. bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam. yasya havir niruptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21038: nāniruptam{*6/185*} ity evam apekṣyaṃāṇe havir abhyudetīti na śakyate vidhātum. tasmād anirupte 'pīṣṭir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21050: lakṣaṇamātram etan niruptam iti. kasmiṃścit padārthe tasya pravṛtta ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21056: yat pūrvedyur dugdhaṃ dadhi havir ātañcanaṃ tat kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21059: tān aparāhṇe parṇaśākhayāpākaroti. tad yathaivādeḥ prajñātam āmāvāsyaṃ havir evam eva tad yady u vratacaryāṃ vā nodāśaṃseta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21060: gṛhītaṃ vā havir abhyudiyād itarathā tarhi kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21062: agṛhīte haviṣy anyaṃ vidhiṃ bruvan gṛhīte 'py anirupte vābhyudaye prāyaścittaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21066: anirupte 'bhyudite prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathyas taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt // MS_6,5.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21067: pravṛttamātraṃ nimittam iti sthitam. naimittikas tu devatāpanayo devatāntarasaṃyogaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21068: kiṃ nirvāpottarakālaṃ taṇḍulāvasthe haviṣi kartavyo nirvāpas tu prākṛtībhya eva syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21070_0: uta vaikṛtībhya eveti saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. [708]{*6 /188*} anirupte 'bhyudite
GSP28msbh1-7u:21070_1: prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathya ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ. taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21071_0: yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed ity abhyudayāvagamād
GSP28msbh1-7u:21071_1: anantaraṃ taṇḍulavibhāgam āha. so 'taṇḍulabhūteṣu nāvakalpate. tasmād anirupte taṇḍulābhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:21071_2: anapanītā devatāḥ prākṛtya iti prākṛtībhya eva nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21075: vyūrdhvabhāgbhyas tv ālekhanas tatkāritvād devatāpanayasya // MS_6,5.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21076: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. vyūrdhvaṃ yā bhajante karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21077: tābhyo nirvaped ity ālekhana ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ. tatkāritvād devatāpanayasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21081: vinirupte na muṣṭīnām apanayas tadguṇatvāt // MS_6,5.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21086: uta tūṣṇīm eveti. kiṃ prāptam. vinirupte sāminirupta ity arthaḥ{*6/189*}. na tatra devatāpanayaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tadguṇatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21089: [709]{*6/190*} sa ca nirvāpas tad devatākaḥ. kutaḥ. catuḥsaṃkhyāpūraṇārthatvād abhyāsamātraṃ kartavyam. tac cābhyāsamātraṃ punaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21090: pūrvam eva kṛte tasmin nirvāpe na devatāpanītā. sa evāyaṃ punaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21091: punar api kriyamānasyānapanītaiva devatā bhavitum arhatīti prākṛtībhya eva nirvaptavyam. na cottaro muṣṭiḥ pṛthak padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21092: yena devatāpanayo bhavet. kṛtasya nirvāpasya saṃkhyāpūraṇam etat kriyate. tasmād anapanaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21094: *{6/189: E1 hat sāminirupta ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21098: na prākṛtībhyo nirvaptavyam. kābhyas tarhi. vaikṛtībhyaḥ. kutaḥ. aprākṛtena devatāviśeṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21100: tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed iti prākṛtībhya ācchidya vaikṛtībhyo nirvaptavyo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21103: anyāś copajātāḥ. tasmād vaikṛtīnāṃ saṃyogena nirvāpaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21107: na nirvāpo bhavati devatāsaṃyuktaḥ. yadi nirvāpo 'rdhaṃ{*6/191*} anyadevatyo 'rdho 'py anyasyai devatāyai,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21108: naiva nirvāpa itaradevatāko vetaradevatāko vā{*6/192*}. tasmāt tūṣṇīm eva nirvaptavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21113: *{6/192: E1,6; E2: itaradevatākaḥ prākṛta itaradevatāko vā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21119: śṛte carum iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ saṃnayato bhavaty abhyudaye prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21120: utāviśeṣeṇeti. kiṃ prāptam. saṃnayato 'bhyudaye prāyaścittam. kutaḥ. sāṃnāyyasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21131: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. ubhayor api syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21134: ye madhyamā ye sthaviṣṭhā ye kṣodiṣṭhā iti bhavaty auṣadhasaṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21135: sa ca śakyo 'saṃnayatāpīti. tasmān nāsati kāraṇe 'saṃnayato nivarteta. ubhayor{*6/196*} api pakṣayoḥ prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21142: asaṃnayato dadhnaḥ śṛtasya cābhāvāt tadadhikaraṇatā nāsti. tasmād vaiguṇyaṃ tasmin pakṣa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21146: naitad evam. na hi dadhyadhikaraṇa caroḥ śrapaṇe śrūyate. kiṃ tu yathā sthaviṣṭhā indrāya pradātre,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21148: na carusaṃbandhārtham iti. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21150: dadhani ca te kartavyā iti. saptamīsaṃyogas tu prāpte 'rthe 'nuvādaḥ. tasmād avivakṣitaṃ teṣāṃ sāhityam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21152: na hi payo dadhi ca nāstīti sthaviṣṭhānāṃ na devatāpanayo bhavati. asaṃnayato 'py arthād apsu śrapayiṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21158: yadi satrāya dīkṣitā atha{*6/198*} sāmyut tiṣṭheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21159: somam apabhajya viśvajitā atirātreṇa sarvastomena sarvapṛṣṭhena sarvavedasadakṣiṇena yajerann iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ krītarājakasyotthāne viśvajit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21160: uta pravṛttamātrasyeti. kiṃ prāptam. sāmyutthāne viśvajit krīte syāt. kutaḥ. vibhāgasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21161: somam apabhajya viśvajitā yajerann iti. ye hy akrīte rājany uttiṣṭanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21162: teṣāṃ somavibhāgābhāvād vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. tasmāt krītarājakā uttiṣṭhanto viśvajitaṃ kuryuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21164: *{6/198: E2: dīkṣitānāṃ; E2 (v.l.), E1,6: dīkṣitā atha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21167: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. pravṛttamātrasyotthāne syāt. kutaḥ. prāpaṇān nimittasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21178: akrīte rājany uttiṣṭhanto vibhāgābhāvād viguṇaṃ kuryur iti. tat pratihartavyam. atrocayate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21179: na vibhāgo vidhīyate. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. sāmyutthāne viśvajitā yajeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21180_0: somasya tv apabhāgaṃ{*6 /201*} kṛtveti. tenāpabhajyety anuvādaḥ. katham prāptir iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:21180_1: cet. arthād uttiṣṭhatāṃ vibhāgo bhavati dhanasya. so 'yaṃ sarvadravyāṇāṃ vibhāgaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:21181: somaṃ vibhajyānyāni ca dravyāṇīty ādeśārthetarā śrutir bhavati. tasmāt krīte cākrīte ca rājany uttiṣṭhatāṃ viśvajid iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21190: dvādaśa dīkṣā iti bahūni dīkṣāparimāṇāny āmnātāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ. kim aniyamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21191: yad vā tad vā parimāṇam upādeyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21192: uta dvādaśa dīkṣā iti. kiṃ prāptam. dīkṣāparimāṇe yathākāmī syāt. nāsti niyamaḥ. kutaḥ. aviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21193: na kaścana [713]{*6/203*} viśeṣa upādīyate. tasmād yatkiṃcit parimāṇam upādeyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21199: dvādaśāha eva parimāṇam upādīyeta. kutaḥ. liṅgāt sāmarthyād ity arthaḥ{*6/204*}. kiṃ sāmarthyam. dvādaśa rātrīr dīkṣito bhṛtiṃ vanvīteti{*6/205*} nityavad āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21200: na pākṣikam. tad eva nityaṃ kurvan,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21201: na śaknoty anyat parimāṇam upādātum. tasmād dvādaśāha eva parimāṇaṃ niyamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21202: anyāni parimāṇāni vikṛtau bhaviṣyatīti naiṣām ānarthakyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21204: *{6/204: E1 hat sāmarthyād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21209: purastāt paurṇamāsyāś caturahe dīkṣerann iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kasyāḥ paurṇamāsyā iti. kiṃ prāptam. paurṇamāsyām aniyama iti. kutaḥ. aviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21218: purasāt paurṇamāsyāś caturahe dīkṣeran. ṛtumukhaṃ vaiṣā paurṇamāsī saṃvatsa[714]{*6/206*}rasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21219: yā caitrī paurṇamāsīti. atra saṃdigdheṣu vākyaśeṣād{*6/207*} iti caitrī niyamyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21225: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti caitrīti. kiṃ tarhi. māghīti. kutaḥ. ekāṣṭakāśruteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21226: kraye hy ekāṣṭakāśrutir bhavati. teṣām ekāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyata iti. tasmān māghyāḥ purastāc caturahe dīkṣitasyaikāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21227: na caityāḥ. tad etat sāmarthyaṃ nāma liṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21228: tat vākyasya bādhakaṃ bhavati. tasmān māghī paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21233: evam ekāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpatsyata iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21239: na bhaktitvād eṣā hi loke // MS_6,5.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21241: bhākto hy anyāsv aṣṭamīṣv ekāṣṭakāśabdaḥ. eṣā hi mukhyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21243: mukhyagauṇayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyayaḥ. tasmān māghy eva paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21255: dīkṣātaḥ pracyutām ekāṣṭakāṃ krayeṇa tu gṛhṇan māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā adhikāraṃ darśayati. asyāṃ ca māghyām aṣṭamyām abhījyamānāyāṃ bhavati mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21256: yāṃ janāḥ pratinandanti rātrīṃ dhenum ivāyatīm/
GSP28msbh1-7u:21257: saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā no astu sumaṅgalī//
GSP28msbh1-7u:21258: ity{*6/212*} aṣṭakāyai surādhase svāheti, yāsau māghy aṣṭamī, tām ekāṣṭakāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21265: utthāne cānuprarohaṃ darśayati. tān uttiṣṭhata auṣadhayo vanaspatayo 'nuttiṣṭhantīti{*6/213*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:21266: vasanta utthānaṃ darśayati. tasminn oṣadhayo vanaspatayaś cottiṣṭhanti. tasmād api sā niyamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21272: ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣanta{*6/214*} iti. ārtā yasmin kāle bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21273: sa ārtaḥ kālaḥ. śītena cārtā bhavanti. tasmān māghy aṣṭamy ekāṣṭaketi. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21275: ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣanta iti. ayanaparivṛttir vyastaśabdenocyate. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21276: apo nābhinandanto 'vabhṛtham abhyavayantīti caitryāṃ dīkṣitā abhinandanto 'bhyaveyuḥ. tasmād api māghī paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21282: dīkṣākālasya śiṣṭatvād atikrame niyatānām anutkarṣaḥ prāptakālatvāt // MS_6,5.38 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21287: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti. yadi{*6/216*} tu daivān mānuṣād vā pratibalād dīkṣitākāla utkṛṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21294: tāvanty ahāni muktvānyeṣv ahaḥsu kartavyāḥ. jyotiṣṭomavidhānakālāt parato 'pratiṣiddhāḥ. tasmāt kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21297: *{6/216: E1,6; E2: samāmananti, tiṣṭo dīkṣā ityevamādi. yadi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21299: utkarṣo vā dīkṣitatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_6,5.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21304: na dīkṣito yasmin kāle. lakṣaṇā hi evaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21307: ayaṃ dīkṣita eva. aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21309: tad evātikrānte 'pi. ubhayatra hi dīkṣitatvaṃ hi kāraṇam. tasmāt teṣām utkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21315: tatra pratihomo na vidyate, yathā pūrveṣām // MS_6,5.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21317: akṛteṣu homeṣu kiṃ parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21318_0: uta neti. kiṃ prāptam. parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kriyeran. kiṃ kāraṇam. avaśyakartavyatayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:21318_1: hi te vihitā homāḥ. atipannā api kartavyā eva. tathā hy eṣām avaśyakartavyatā anugṛhītā
GSP28msbh1-7u:21324: tat parisaṃkhyāya kriyate, evam idam apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21331: yathā pūrveṣām asati kālātikrame 'kṛtānāṃ na pratihomaḥ, evam eṣām apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21337: nimittatvena tasya śrutatvāt. tadabhāve vihitam eva na bhavati. pradhānamātraṃ yady api niyamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21338: tathāpi nimitte kāle. sa ca nadīvegasthānīyaḥ kāle 'tikrāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21345: ūrdhvam avabhṛthād ā udavasānīyāyā iṣṭer ye homāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21346: teṣv atipanneṣu daivena mānuṣeṇa vā pratibalena bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ pratihomaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21347: uta neti. kiṃ prāptam. kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21349: dīkṣāṇām unmocanārtho hy avabhṛthaḥ. tasmāt kartavyāḥ, te na kṛtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21353: atipannānāṃ na pratihomaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. pratiṣedhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21366: pratihomaś cet sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran // MS_6,5.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21367: eteṣv evodāharaṇeṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ pratihome sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīny ārabhyeran{*6/223*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:21368: uta prātaragnihotraprabhṛtīnīti. nanu nāsty eva pratihoma iti sthitam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21370: anyeṣu sadṛśanyāyeṣūdāharaṇeṣv asyāḥ prayojanam asti [719]{*6/224*} iti cintyate. kiṃ prāptam. aniyamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21373: sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran. kutaḥ{*6/225*}. sāyam agnihotrād ārabhyātipannāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21378: *{6/225: E2 om. sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran. kutaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21383: uta prātar iti{*6/227*}. kiṃ prāptam. sāyam agnihotreṇeti pūrvasminn adhikaraṇa uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21384: utsargeṇa sarvatraivam iti prāptam. tathā prāpta ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21386: ṣoḍaśisaṃsthe prātaragnihotrādīny atipannānīti prātaragnihotrād eva samārabhyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21389: *{6/227: E2: agnihotreṇa pratihotavyam uta prātar agnihotreṇeti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21394: bhinne juhoti skanne juhotīti. tatra kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor evaitat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21395: bhinne skanne ca prāyaścittam uta yatra bhidyate skandati ceti. kiṃ prāptam. [720]{*6/228*} prakaraṇe yat prāyaścittam evaṃjātīykaṃ kiṃcid utpannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21396: tat sarvatra yatra yatra bhidyate skandati vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21398: samānaṃ nimittaṃ skandanaṃ bhedanaṃ vā. sa evātra doṣa ity abhipretam. prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21400: prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmāt sarvatra skanne bhinne ca prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21405: prakaraṇa eva bhinne skanne vā prāyaścittam. kutaḥ. śabdahetutvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21407: eṣāṃ homānām. tato homavato yāgasya pratyāyane prakṛto yajeteti śabdo hetuḥ. evaṃ cet tadupakāreṇārthavān bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21409: phalaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ syāt. tasmāt vākyaṃ phalābhāvenaiva bādhitam iti kṛtvā prakaraṇam anugṛhītavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21413: atadvikāro 'gnihotraṃ jyotiṣṭomo vā. na darśapūrṇamāsavikāraḥ. yadi tadvikāro bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21414: tatrāpi skanne bhinne vā prāyaścittaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21416: vyāpannasyāpsu gatau yad abhojyam āryāṇāṃ tat pratīyeta // MS_6,5.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21417: vyāpannam apsu praharatīti śrūyate. kiṃ vyāpannam ity ucyata iti tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21419: dūṣitaṃ yena kāryena [721]{*6/229*} kriyate. kiṃ tat. yad abhojyam āryāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21420: keśakīṭāv apannam{*6/230*} anyena vopaghātenopahatam, tad vyāpannam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21430: vibhāgaśruteḥ prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye na vidyate // MS_6,5.49 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21431: prastotrudgātror{*6/231*} udgātṛpratihartor vā yatrāpacchedaḥ{*6/232*}. kiṃ tatra prāyaścittaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21432: neti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye na vidyate. kutaḥ. vibhāgaśruteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21433: vibhakte 'pacchede prāyaścittam āmananti. apacchedaś cāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21436: udgātrā pratihartrā vā. na ca yad apareṇa saha kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21437: tat kevalena kṛtaṃ bhavati. yadi hi kevalena kṛtaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21439: aparaḥ kiṃ kuryāt. tasmān na yugapad apacchinnayoḥ prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21445: syād vā prāptanimittatvāt kālamātram ekam // MS_6,5.50 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21446: syād vā prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye 'pi. prāptaṃ hi nimittam apaccheda udgātuḥ pratihataś{*6/234*} ca. yatra hi dvayor apacchedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21451: na ca [722]{*6/235*} kālaikyād apacchedayor aikyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt prāyaścittaṃ yugapad apacchede 'pi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21460: uta samuccaya iti. kiṃ prāptam. tatra vipratiṣedhād vikalpaḥ syāt. viruddhau hy etau kalpau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21461: sarvasvam adākṣiṇyaṃ ca. tasmād vikalpo bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21466: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21468: ubhayor vidhānāt. sarvāṅgopasaṃhārī prayogavacana evam upapadyate. vikalpe hi pakṣe bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21472: tena punar yajetety ucyate. dvis tasya prayogaḥ. tatraikasmin prayoge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21473: ekaḥ kalpaḥ. anyasminn aparo bhaviṣyati. evam avirodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21478: sa eva yāgaḥ punaḥ kriyeta. yady anyatareṇa vinā vaiguṇyam ity avadhāryeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21479: sarvasve kriyamāṇe 'dakṣiṇyābhāvād viguṇaḥ syāt. nānyasmin prayoge kriyamāṇe 'nyaḥ prayogo 'nugṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21481: guṇavatā prayogeṇa karma saṃbandhayitavyam. tasmād vikalpaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21488: utottaranimittam iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam. pūrvasya balīyastvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21490: tasmin sati tadviruddhaṃ na śakyaṃ kartum. na cāśakyam upadeśārhaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21491: pūrvavijñānaṃ prāptam iti na saṃśayaḥ. tasmāt tadavirodhenānyat kāryaṃ na viruddham. kva tarhi tat syāt. yatra kevalaṃ nimittam. tasmāt pūrvavijñānaṃ balavat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21493: paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ syāt. kutaḥ. ākhyātena hi yo 'rthaḥ kartavya ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21496: nānyathā. tena pūrvavijñānaṃ bādhitvedaṃ kartavyam iti bhavati śabdārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21499: tan mithyeti. abhūtaṃ hi tan na{*6/239*} śakyam āśrayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21500: idaṃ nāma tad iti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21501: apratiṣiddhe tasmin na pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃbhavati. tasmād apratiṣiddhaṃ bhaviṣyat{*6/240*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:21503: tadā pūrvavijñānaṃ bādhamānam evotpadyate. tad idānīṃ bādhitaṃ na śaknoty uttaraṃ bādhitum iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21504: prakṛtivat. yad dhi prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21505: tatrāpy etad eva kāraṇam. nābādhitvā pūrvavijñānaṃ vaikṛtaṃ saṃbhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21508: pratyakṣatvād vaikṛtam ānumānikaṃ prākṛtaṃ bādhata iti [724]{*6/241*} cet. pratyakṣatve 'pi sati naiva bādheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21509: yadi yathāvarṇito 'yam ākhyātārtho na bhavet. sati pūrvavijñāne 'śakyatvāt prākṛtaṃ{*6/242*} bādhetaiva. tasmāt parabalīyastvaṃ nyāyyam eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21518: yady udgātā jaghanyaḥ syāt punaryajñe sarvavedasaṃ dadyād yathetarasmin // MS_6,5.55 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21519: yadā pratihartuḥ pūrvam apacchedaḥ tata udgātuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21520: tatrādakṣiṇeneṣṭvā{*6/243*} punar yaṣṭavyam. tatra saṃdehaḥ. punar yāge kiṃ dvādaśaśataṃ dātavyam uta sarvasvam iti. kiṃ prāptam. dvādaśaśatam. kutaḥ. evaṃ hy āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21522: yat pūrvasmin dāsyan{*6/244*} syāt{*6/245*}. pūrvasmiṃś ca prayoge jyotiṣṭomadakṣiṇaiva prāptā. tasmād dvādaśaśatam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21525_0: yathetarasmin pūrvasminn ahani sarvasvam{*6 /247*}. kathaṃ tatra sarvasvam iti cet{*6 /248*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21525_1: pratihartur apacchedāt. pratihartary apacchinne dvādaśaśataṃ bādhitvā sarvasvaṃ dāsyan{*6 /249*} bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21526: nanu pūrvasminn ahani dvādaśaśatam apy asau dāsyann āsīt. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21527: sarvasvadānena ta ubhayaṃ{*6/250*} pradattaṃ bhavati. tasmāt tad deyaṃ. nanv arvāg api dvādaśaśatāt sarvasvam. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21528: adhikṛte{*6/251*} dvādaśaśate sarvasvam apy adhikaṃ bhavati. api ca pūrvasminn ahani naiva dvādaśaśataṃ dāsyan{*6/252*} bhavatīti{*6/253*}. etāvad dāsyann{*6/254*} ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21529: yasyottarakāle tāvad dānaṃ{*6/255*} bhavati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21531: tasmān na tad dāsyann{*6/256*} ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21534: [725]{*6/257*} nanu ca sarvasvam api pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21535: tad apy asau na dāsyann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21537: sābhyāsasya jyotiṣṭomasya prayogaḥ. tatra prathamaprayoge 'dākṣiṇyavirodhāt sarvasvaṃ bādhyate. dvitīyaprayoge taddānaṃ codyate. tatra virodho nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21538: tasyaiva yajñasya sa eva prayogaḥ. pratihartā ca tasminn apacchinna iti dvādaśaśataṃ bādhitvā sarvasvam eva dāsyan{*6/258*} bhavati. tasmāt sarvasvaṃ tatra deyam iti.
