GSP28msbh1-7u:21557: ahargaṇe yasminn apacchedas tad āvarteta karmapṛthaktvāt // MS_6,5.56 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21558: ahargaṇe yadā bhavati kasmiṃścid ahany udgātur apacchedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21560: uta tad evāhar iti. kiṃ prāptam. kṛtsno 'hargaṇaḥ. kutaḥ. aparair ahobhir vinā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21562: tasmād gaṇa{*6/261*} evāvarteteti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21568: na sāṅgam iti. yāny aharantarāṇi sāhāyyenopakariṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21569: vidyanta eva tāni. ataḥ{*6/262*} sāhāyyaṃ kariṣyantīti. tasmāt tad evāvarteta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21583_0: ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21583_1: kiṃ samānakalpānām bhinnakalpānāṃ ca sahādhikāra uta samānakalpānām eveti. ke punaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:21585: kecit tanūnapātkalpāḥ. tatra kiṃ tāvat prāptam. saṃnipāte bahūnāṃ yajamānānāṃ ya eva tulyakalpāḥ{*6/264*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:21586: ta eva saha satram āsīran. kutaḥ. avaiguṇyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21588: tasya vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. yathā prakṛtāv eva vinā sādguṇyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21594: vāśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21596: te 'py adhikriyeran. kutaḥ. aviśeṣeṇa{*6/265*} sarveṣāṃ yajamānānāṃ prāptiḥ. na ca bhinnakalpānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ. nanu vaiguṇyaṃ bhinnakalpānām. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21598: sāmānyavacanena bhinnakalpā api gṛhītāḥ. tatra śirovad bhādhaḥ syāt,

GSP28msbh1-7u:22401_1: jyogjīvanam{*6 /387*} apy anumāsyate. neti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. śatāyur vai puruṣa [757]{*6 /388*}

GSP28msbh1-7u:23690: yad bṛhad gāyatrīṣu kriyata iti. atathāyoni ca sāma darśayati. yādṛśī yasya yoniḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:23708_0: tasya kriyā grahaṇārtheti. tatra paricodyate. aikārthye nāsti vairūpyam iti. rathantaragīter
GSP28msbh1-7u:23708_1: bṛhadgītir arthāntaram. tena rathantaragītau gṛhītāyāṃ bṛhadgītir agṛhītā bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:23708_2: yukto rathantare gṛhīte bṛhataḥ śikṣārtham akarmakāle prayogaḥ. rathantaragītes tv
GSP28msbh1-7u:23708_3: eka evārthaḥ. tasya yonyāṃ prayoge śikṣite punar uttarāsu na śikṣitavyam. tāsv akarmakāle
GSP28msbh1-7u:23708_4: prayogaḥ saṃskārakarmatve na yukto bhavati. tasmān na saṃskārasya sāmaśabda iti sthitāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23710: syād arthāntareṣu aniṣpatter yathā pāke // MS_7,2.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23711: syād vairūpyam. kuta etat. arthānatreṣv aniṣpatteḥ. ṛgantareṣv āśrayabhedāt. yathā{*7/129*} pāke,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23712: yathaika evāyam arthaḥ [30]{*7/130*} pāko nāma. tasyārthāntare vairūpyaṃ bhavati. anyathālakṣaṇa odanasya pākaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23715: nāsāv aśikṣitvā guḍaṃ paktuṃ jānāti. tasmāt tasyāpy akarmakāle prayoga upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23721: evaṃ ca sāmaśabdānām ṛkśabdānāṃ ca sāmañjasyaṃ bhavati. kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyati{*7/131*} iti kavatīśabda ṛca eva{*7/132*} vakṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23722: rathantaraśabdaś ca sāma. itarathā kavatīśabde vā deśalakṣaṇā syāt. rathantaraśabde vā dharmalakṣaṇā. tasmād gītau sāmaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23727: uktaṃ kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra dharmapradeśāḥ syāt // MS_7,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23728: nāmnā dharmapradeśaṃ vakṣyāma ity ādau pratijñātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23730: māsam agnihotraṃ juhoti{*7/133*} iti. tatraitat samadhigatam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23731: naiyamikād agnihotrāt karmāntaram etad iti. adhunāgnihotraśabaś cintyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23732: katham ayaṃ prayukta iti. tadartham ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23733: uktam kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra vidhipradeśaḥ syād iti. uktam ādau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23734_0: kriyābhidhānaṃ karmanāmadheyam agnihotraśabda iti tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram ity atra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23734_1: tasyānyatra śrutau kauṇḍapāyinām ayanīye juhotau vidhipradeśaḥ syāt dharmapradeśaḥ{*7 /134*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23734_2: naiyamikasyāgnihotrasya ye dharmās te 'sminn anena nāmnātidiśyeran. kiṃ kāraṇam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23736_0: paraśabdasya paratra vṛttau tadvadbhāvo gamyate. sa yatra vijñāto bhavati tatrānūdyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23736_1: yathā siṃho devadatta iti. yatrāvijñātas tatra vidhīyate. yathā amī piṣṭapiṇḍāḥ siṃhāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23736_2: kriyantām iti. iha cāvijñāto 'sya juhoter agnihotravadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt sa vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23737: agnihotravaj juhotīti. kathaṃ punar asati vatipratyaye [32]{*7/135*} vatyarthaḥ śakyo 'vagantum iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23740: tatsahacaritadohanādidharmavattāṃ lakṣaṇayā śaknoti gamayitum. śaknoti ced gamayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23741: pradeṣṭum api śaknoti{*7/136*}. evam anatreṇāpi vatim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23750: vāpīti viparyāsena prayukte. api vety arthaḥ. api vāpūrve ete ubhe api karmaṇī syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23752: sādhāraṇaṃ ca nāmadheyam ubhayoḥ. kutaḥ. bhāgitvāt. ayam api juhotir bhāgī etasya nāmadheyasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23756: nāsyety atra viśeṣahetur nāsti. tasmād ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ nāmeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23761: autpattiko hi nāmināmnoḥ sambandhaḥ. yan nāma yasminn artha autpattikena saṃbandhena prasiddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23763: nānyatra ca. tathāvyavasthāyāṃ śabdārthe viśvāso na syāt. uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23764: anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. yadā ca nobhayārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23765: tadā naiyamikaṃ tāvad āha. tatsādṛśyavidhānārthaṃ cetaratrāpi prayoga upapadyata iti nāstītarābhidhānatve hetuḥ. tasmād vidhipradeśaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23770: pratyakṣād guṇasaṃyogāt kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt tadabhāve 'prasiddhaṃ syāt // MS_7,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23771: naiyamike 'gnihotre pratyakṣo guṇasaṃyogaḥ. pratyakṣavihitā dharmāḥ santi. itthaṃ dogdhītthaṃ śrapayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23778: dharmapradeśakam ity arthaḥ. asya punar juhoter na kecid dharmāḥ santi. tadabhāve teṣāṃ dharmāṇām abhāve,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23781: kim artham ayam agnihotraśabda iha prayukta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23785: agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti{*7/143*} iti. etasmāt pratyakṣād guṇasaṃyogāt kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt. karmanāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23786: itthaṃrūpo juhotir agnihotrākhya iti. athetarajuhoteḥ rūpaṃ nāsti. tadabhāve 'prasiddhaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23793: na māsenāgnihotraṃ rūpyate. tasmān naiyamikasyaitan nāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23797: anyatra śrūyamāṇaṃ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakam iti. evaṃ khalu prāptam. evaṃ prāpta idam ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23802: *{7/140: E2: juhoti, etasmin kāle juhotīty evaṃ pratyakṣād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:23808: api vā satrakarmaṇi guṇārthaiṣā śrutiḥ syāt // MS_7,3.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23811: prāyaṇīyam ahar bhavati{*7/145*} iti. asti tu dvādaśāhe prathamam ahaḥ prāyaṇīyam nāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23812: prāyaṇīyo 'tirātra{*7/146*} iti. tayor nānātvaṃ tenaiva nyāyena siddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23814: tatrāyaṃ prāyaṇīyaśabdaḥ paratrāpi śrūyamāṇo na dharmāṇāṃ grāhakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23815_0: kiṃ tarhi. guṇārthaiṣā śrutiḥ. katham. lakṣaṇayā nāmadheyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakam uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23815_1: asati ca śrutyarthe lakṣaṇārtho grāhyaḥ. iha tu śrutyartha eva saṃbhavati. guṇārtha
GSP28msbh1-7u:23815_2: eṣa{*7 /148*} śabdaḥ. guṇena kriyāyogena. tasmin karmaṇi śrutyaiva prayujyate. prayanty aneneti prāyaṇīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23816: pravartate{*7/149*} 'nena satram iti. vākyaśeṣaś cāsyaitam evārtham āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23817: jyotir eva purastād dadhāti{*7/150*} iti. yena jyotiḥ prāyaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23818: tena jyotiḥ purastāt kriyata ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23819: jyotir eva purastād dadhātīti. tasmān nāyam atideśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23828: viśvajiti sarvapṛṣṭhe tatpūrvakatvāj jyautiṣṭomikāni pṛṣṭhāny asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ // MS_7,3.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23829: viśvajit sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati{*7/151*} iti śrūyate. tatra vicāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23831: vidhir iti{*7/152*}. kiṃ prāptam. anuvāda iti. kutaḥ. yo hy asarvapṛṣṭhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23832: tasya sarvapṛṣṭhatā vidheyā. yas tu sarvapṛṣṭha eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23833_0: tasya tayā kiṃ vihitayā. ayaṃ ca [35]{*7 /153*} sarvapṛṣṭha eva. katham. tatpūrvakatvāj
GSP28msbh1-7u:23833_1: jyotiṣṭomapūrvakatvāt{*7 /154*}. jyautiṣṭomikāni stotrāṇy atra prāpyante. teṣu māhendrastotrādīni
GSP28msbh1-7u:23834: tair ayaṃ sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati. nanu na tāni pṛṣṭhāni. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23835: asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ. teṣv asti pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23843: ṣaḍahād vā, tatra hi codanāḥ // MS_7,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23844: nāyam anuvādaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. vidhiḥ. anuvādo 'pravṛttiviśeṣakaro 'rthakaḥ{*7/155*} syāt. api ca jyotiṣṭome na pṛṣṭhabahutvam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23845: yasyāyam anuvādaḥ syāt. ṣaḍahe tu tad asti. tatra hi codanāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23846: pṛṣṭhānāṃ rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati{*7/156*} ityevamādyāḥ. tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśako{*7/157*} vidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23853: liṅgaṃ caitam arthaṃ darśayati. pavamāne rathantaraṃ karoty ārbhāve bṛhat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23858: śākvaramac chāvākasyeti viniveśapare vākye ṣāḍahikāni pṛṣṭhāni{*7/158*} darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23864: asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabda iti. tatra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23867: yāny etāni pṛṣṭhānīti. jñāte ca teṣāṃ pṛṣṭhatve tad upapadyate. na ca tatra jñātaṃ. kathaṃ tarhi ayam anuvādaḥ. [36]{*7/159*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:23868: liṅgasamavāyāt. ekaṃ tatra pṛṣṭhaṃ{*7/160*} māhendrastotram iti. ṣāḍahikānāṃ punaḥ pṛṣṭhatvaṃ jñātam. katham. tatra hi codanety uktam. teṣāṃ vāde,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23869: śrautaḥ pṛṣṭhaśabdasyārthaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati. itarathā lākṣaṇikaḥ. tasmāt ṣāḍahikānāṃ pradeśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23876: ṣāḍahikānāṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ vidhir iti. naitad yuktam. kiṃ kāraṇam. dvikara evaṃ sarvapṛṣṭhaśabdo 'bhyupagamyate{*7/161*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:23877: pṛṣṭhāni ca vidadhāti. teṣāṃ ca sarvatvam. astu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23878: ko doṣaḥ. asaṃbhava ity āha. yadi pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ pṛṣṭhāni vidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23880: tathā śakyate. pṛṣṭhāni tv avihitāni bhavanti. teṣv asatsu kasya idaṃ sarvatvaṃ vidhīyate. ubhayakriyāyāś cāsaṃbhavaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23881: athātra bṛhadrathantarayor vikalpena prāptayoḥ sāmastyaṃ kevalaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23882: sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati{*7/162*} iti. ubhe api bṛhadrathantare bhavataḥ{*7/163*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:23883: naikam iti. tato 'yaṃ doṣo na bhavati. tasmād dvayor adhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23886: *{7/162: E1 hat sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:23890_0: naivam etat. kutaḥ. vyarthatvāt sarvaśabdasya. evaṃ sati sarvaśabdo vyartho bhavaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:23890_1: arthaśūnyaḥ{*7 /164*}. ayaṃ hi bahuviṣayo dvayor na yujyate. ṣāḍahikānāṃ tu vidhāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:23890_2: naiṣa doṣaḥ. nanu ca tatrāpi dvikaraḥ śabdo bhaviṣyati. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23891: na bhaviṣyati. sarvatvaṃ kevalaṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ vidhāsyati{*7/165*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:23893: pṛṣṭheṣv asatsu kasyedaṃ srvatvaṃ vidhīyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23895: tat saṃpādayitavyam. na ca pṛṣṭhāny akurvatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23896: tat saṃpādayituṃ śakyate. tatrārthāt pṛṣṭhāni kariṣyati. evaṃ na [37]{*7/166*} dvyarthaḥ śabdo bhaviṣyati. sarvaśabdaś ca samarthitaḥ. tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23904: vāruṇyā niṣkāsena tuṣaiś cāvabhṛthaṃ yanti{*7/167*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23906_0: uta saumikād avabhṛthād dharmātideśa iti. kiṃ yuktam. dārśapūrṇamāsike guṇavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23906_1: evaṃ sannihitapratyayo 'nugṛhyate. sannihito hy asau codakena prāpitaḥ. nanu nāsāv avabhṛthaḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23907: asti tatrāvabhṛthaśabda iti. eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha{*7/168*} iti. evaṃ prāpta idam āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23909: yathā ṣaḍahāt pṛṣṭhānām atideśaḥ. evaṃ saumikād avabhṛthād iha dharmātideśaḥ. kutaḥ. abhihito nyāyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23910: uktaṃ kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra vidhipradeśaḥ syād{*7/169*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23919: tasya kaḥ parihāra ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23922: naitad yuktam. kutaḥ. yato nāsti darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛthaḥ. nanu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23923: eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha{*7/170*} iti śrūyate. [38]{*7/171*} satyaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23924: na tv evam avabhṛthatvam asya bhavati. katham. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23925: eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha ity etasya vākyasya dvayī vacanavyaktiḥ. nirjñātāvabhṛthatvasya padārthasya vā darśapūrṇamāsasaṃbandha{*7/172*} ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23926: yathā devadatto yajñadattasya putra iti nirjñātaputratvasya devadattasya yajñadattasaṃbandhaḥ ucyate. nirjñātasaṃbandhasya vānirjñātāvabhṛthatvasyāvabhṛthatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23929: nirjñātayajñadattasaṃbandhasyāmrasya putratvam ucyate. tad asyāpāṃ vyutsekasya darśapūrṇamānasaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇān nirjñātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23930: nāvabhṛthatvam. ato 'syāvabhṛthatvam ucyate. na cāyam avabhṛthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23931_0: nanv ayam apy avabhṛtho bhavatu. naitad yuktam. anyāyo hy anekārthatvam. kathaṃ tarhi
GSP28msbh1-7u:23931_1: śabdaprayogaḥ. sādṛśyāt. kiṃ sādṛśyam. apsu saṃbandhaḥ. sa eṣa bhaktyā praśaṃsāvādo 'pāṃ vyutsekasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23933: yathāmre putravādaḥ. tasmān nāsti darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛthaḥ. ato nātra guṇavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23940: liṅgaṃ caitam arthaṃ darśayati. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. evam āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23943: na vā gamanamantraṃ japati{*7/173*} iti. saumikāvabhṛthadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣedhaṃ brūvaṃs taddharmaprāptiṃ darśayati. tasmāt saumikād avabhṛthād dharmapradeśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23949: dravyādeśe taddravyaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt puroḍāśas tv anādeśe tatprakṛtitvāt // MS_7,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23951: saumikād avabhṛthād dharmāṇāṃ grāhaka ity yuktam. tatredaṃ cintyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23953: uta tuṣaniṣkāsadravyaka iti. kiṃ prāptam. puroḍāśadravyaka iti. kutaḥ. nāmnā puroḍāśaḥ prāpyate. nanu pratyakṣaśrutaṃ tuṣaniṣkāsam. satyaṃ pratyakṣaśrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23954: na tu śakyate vidhātum. avabhṛtho 'tra vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23955: avabhṛthaṃ yantīti. yadi tuṣaniṣkāsam aparaṃ vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23957: tac ca tuṣaniṣkāseneti. tuṣaniṣkāsaśravaṇam idānīṃ kim artham. anarthakam, saṃbandhābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23965: nanu puroḍāśo 'pi pratyakṣaśruto nāmnā. yady api pratyakṣaśrutaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:24536_0: mayūrasya nṛtyato 'nyadapāvriyate 'nyat saṃvriyate. evam ihāpīdaṃ saṃvriyate tadapāvriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24536_1: naiṣa doṣaḥ. pratyakṣas tasya tatra bhāvaḥ. iha punar ānumānikaḥ. na cānumānikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:24536_2: pratyakṣaṃ bādhate. iha tarhi na prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24538: yadi virodhaḥ syāt. na tv asti virodhaḥ. tatrāpi bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24543: aṣṭame prakṛtiniyamaṃ kariṣyati. iyam asya prakṛtir iti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24544: vidhyanto vā prakṛter iva pravarteta. yā yā tasya karmaṇaḥ{*7/294*} prakṛtir iti yasyāgneyaḥ prakṛtiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24547: atha kasmān na laukiko vidhyantaḥ kalpyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24548: laukikasya vidher abhāvād vidhyanta eva nāsti. kutas tat kalpaneti. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24551: vaidikī hy atretikartavyatā na laukikī. kasmāt. tathā hi liṅgadarśanaṃ prayājādi samarthitaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24564: tena tarhy aliṅge laukikaṃ syāt. yatra karmaṇi kiṃcil liṅgaṃ nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24572: liṅgasya pūrvavattvāc codanāśabdasāmānyād ekenāpi nirūpyeta yathā sthālīpulokena // MS_7,4.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:24575: yadi liṅgahetuko vaidika upāyaḥ syāt. na tv asau liṅgahetukaḥ. kiṃhetukas tu. vidhyantahetukaḥ. vidhyanto 'pi nyāyapūrvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24576: sa ca nyāyas tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vaikṛtānāṃ liṅgavatām{*7/296*} ca. kutaḥ. codanāśabdasāmānyāt. karmacodanāyāṃ śābdaḥ samānaḥ. sarvatra vidhyādir asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24577: na vidhyantaḥ. tulyaś cāpekṣayānyatra śrutena vidhyantena saṃbandhaḥ. tad etan nyāyapūrvakaṃ liṅgam ekatrāpi dṛśyamānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24578: tulyanyāyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmavattāṃ jñāpayati. yathā sthālyāṃ tulyapākānāṃ pulākānām ekam upamṛdyāny eṣām api siddhatāṃ jānāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24579: tulyo hetur asya cānyeṣāṃ ca siddhatvasyeti. tasmāt sarvatra vaidikītikartavyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24582: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam etad upadiśyate. sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca yad avyabhicāri,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24583: tat pramāṇam. savyabhicāraṃ caitat. dṛṣṭā hi gaṇayāgādayo 'nevamitikartavyatākāḥ. tasmād dṛṣṭapravṛttitvād ity ahetuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24584: yat tu vaidikyā bhāgitvāt tatpūrvakāṇi liṅgāni bhaviṣyantīti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24585: bhāgitvasyāpūrvetikartavyatākatvaṃ{*7/297*} kila hetuḥ. tad bhāvaś ca tasyāḥ śabdapūrvaḥ. śabdena ca darśapūrṇamāsayor asau vijñāyate{*7/298*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:24586: na sarvatreti. tasmān na bhāgitvam. ato vidhyantenaivetikartavyatā prāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24587: nānyathā. atha kasmād etāni vaikṛtāni vākyāni nyūnāny eva nānumanyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24588: kim ebhiḥ pūritaiḥ. nyūnāny anarthakāni bhavanti. bhavantu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24589_0: ko [63]{*7 /299*} doṣaḥ. śiṣṭair eṣāṃ saṃparigraho na yujyate. pramādād bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24589_1: nāsty akṣare mātrāyāṃ vā pramādaḥ. kuto etāvati granthe bhaviṣyati. katham. tulyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:24589_2: ca sāṃpradāyikam{*7 /300*} ity uktam. vyāmoho 'pi viduṣāṃ yugasahasrāṇi bahūni nānuvarteta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24589_3: yujyate caiṣām apekṣayā pūraṇam. tasmād ūnāni nānumanyante. ato vaidikītikartavyateti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24597: dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvād aikāhikam adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavat // MS_7,4.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:24598: prajākāmā gavāmayanam upeyur{*7/301*} iti satraṃ vidhāyāmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24601: gaṇeṣu dvādaśāhasya{*7/304*} iti. tatra codakena dvādaśāhikā dharmāḥ prāpyante. ekāhānām api yathā svaṃ nāmabhiḥ prātisvikāḥ. ye tatra dvādaśāhikā aikāhikair aviruddhāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24602: te yathāprāptaṃ kriyante. viruddheṣu saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ dvādaśāhiko dharmaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24603: utaikāhika iti. kiṃ prāptam. tatra sūtreṇaivopakramaḥ. dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvāt. dvādaśāhaprakṛtitvād vidhyantenaiva prāpyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24604: nanv evaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bādhyate. na bādhiṣyate nāmadheyaṃ jyotir ādi. adhikāgamād bhaviṣyati. ye jyautiṣṭaumikebhyo 'dhikāḥ stotraśastravikārāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24606: ekāhavat. yathā tasminn eva jyotiṣy ekāhe jyotiḥśabdo 'dhikāgamād bhavati. satsu jyautiṣṭaumikeṣu jyotiṣṭome 'bhāvāt. adhikadharmārtho 'yaṃ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24607: [64]{*7/305*} na cādhikānāṃ dvādaśāhikair virodho 'sti. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ viruddhaṃ kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24608: adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavad ity etasyāparā vyākhyā. ye dvādaśāhe 'dhikā aikāhikebhyaḥ kecid dharmā ucyante. abhiplavo 'nvahaṃ bhavati{*7/306*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:24609_0: gorivītam{*7 /307*} anvahaṃ bhavatīti. teṣām adhikānām āgamāt tadākhyaṃ syāt. etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:24609_1: dvādaśāhikam aharjyotirākhyam āyurākhyaṃ vā{*7 /308*}. katham. ekāhavat. yathā tasminn
GSP28msbh1-7u:24609_2: evaikāhe 'yaṃ jyotirādiśabdo jyautiṣṭaumikebhyo 'dhikeṣu vaiśeṣikeṣu dharmeṣv āgateṣu bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24610_0: evam ihāpy adhikāgamasāmānyād gauṇo bhaviṣyati. yathā ṣāḍahikānāṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ bhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:24610_1: ekāho viśvajit ṣaḍaha{*7 /309*} ity uktam. tam ekāhaṃ ṣaḍaha ity ācakṣata{*7 /310*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:24610_2: iti. evam ihāpi. gauṇaś cen na prāpakaḥ. tasmān nāsti nāmadheyād dharmaprāptir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24625: yathā dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyām asṛg dvābhyāṃ māṃsam{*7/311*} iti. evaṃ ṣaḍdvikān anukramyāha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24627: ātmānam etan nirvadyata iti dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ dvādaśopasattvaṃ darśayati. tad upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24628: yadi dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ virodhi kartavyam. itarathā caikāhikaṃ ṣaḍupasattvaṃ{*7/312*} syāt{*7/313*}. tasmāt paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24629: dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgam. yasyātiriktam ekādaśinyām ālabheran na priyaṃ{*7/314*} bhrātṛvyam atiricyeta. atha yad dvau paśū samasyeyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24630: kanīya āyuḥ kurvīran{*7/315*}. yady ete brāhmaṇavantaḥ paśava ālambhante nāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyam atyatiricyate [65]{*7/316*} na kanīya āyuḥ kurvīteti{*7/317*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:24631_0: ekādaśinyāṃ vihāraṃ dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ darśayati. katham. vihāre saty atirekaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:24631_1: paśūnām āpadyate. atirekabhayāc ca dvayor dvayoḥ samāsaḥ. ekāhadharmaprāptau vihāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:24631_2: na syāt. tatraitaddarśanaṃ na yujyate. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24641: na vā kratvabhidhānād adhikānām aśabdatvam // MS_7,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:24642: na vā dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam. kiṃ tarhi. ekāhikam. kiṃ kāraṇam. codakena dvādaśāhikaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24643: nāmadheyenaikāhikam. nāmadheyaṃ ca codakād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ. pratyakṣatvāt. pratyakṣaṃ nāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24645: nanu vidhyanto 'pi pratyakṣaḥ. satyaṃ prakṛtau pratyakṣo vidhyantaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24650: nanv adhikāryaṃ nāmadheyam ity uktam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24651: adhikānām aśabdatvam. adhikānāṃ śabdo nāsti. ime jyotirādayaḥ śabdāḥ karmanāmadheyānīty uktam. api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yad utpattāv apūrvam avidhāyakatvād{*7/318*} iti. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24652: adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād iti. tatra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24653: vacanād adhikāgamo na nāmadheyena. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24654: teṣv asatsu śabdasyābhāvād iti. naite kadācid āyurādiṣu na santi. kathaṃ teṣām abhāve śabdasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24655: jyotiṣṭome nāsti jyotirādiḥ śabda iti. karmāntaratvāt. jyotiṣṭoma āyurādiḥ śabdo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24656_0: na dharmābhāvāt. tasmād aikāhikaṃ viruddhaṃ dharmajātaṃ kartavyam iti. adhikāgamāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:24656_1: tadākhyaṃ syāt. ekāhavad ity etasya dvitīyavyākhyāparihāraḥ. gauṇaḥ sann anu[66]{*7 /319*}vādamātram
GSP28msbh1-7u:24656_2: anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt pūrvoktena nyāyena nāmadheyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prāpakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24661: liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt tadarthāpatter dravyavat // MS_7,4.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:24664_0: tasya parihāra ucyate. liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt. liṅgam etatsaṃghātadharmaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24664_1: dvādaśāho 'haḥsaṃghātaḥ. sa phalāya codyate. dvādaśāham ṛddhikāmā upeyur iti. gavāmayanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:24664_2: api ahaḥsaṃghātāntaram. tasminn eva kārye phalasiddhau vidhīyate. tasya tatkāryāpattyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:24666: dravyavat. yathā dravye vrīhau dharmāḥ śrutās te tatkāryāpanneṣu pratinidhibhūteṣu{*7/320*} prāpyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24672_0: naitad yuktam. kutaḥ. arthadharmatvāt. apūrvadharmatvād ity arthaḥ. apūrvadharmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:24672_1: dvādaśopasattvaṃ na saṃghātadharmaḥ. kasmāt. saṃghātasya guṇatvāt. ahāny atra pradhānāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24672_2: dvādaśāheneti dvādaśatvaṃ{*7 /321*} teṣāṃ guṇaḥ. viśeṣaṇam ity arthaḥ. viśiṣya eva kāryaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24673: na viśeṣaṇe. yathā rājapuruṣa ānīyatām ity ukte puruṣa ānīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24676: na śākaṃ sūpo vā pratīyate. yad eva pradhānaṃ tat pratīyate. kim ataḥ. ato 'hāni phalavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24677: na saṃghātaḥ. phalavataś ca dharmāḥ. tasmān na dvādaśopasattvaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ. evaṃ [67]{*7/322*} cen na gavāmayane kāryāpattito dharmāḥ prāpyante. ato 'parihāro 'yam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24684_0: dravyavad iti. yuktaṃ dravyeṣu. tatra hi vrīhikāryāpannā nīvārāḥ kāryāpattitas taddharmāṃl
GSP28msbh1-7u:24684_1: labhante. iha punar dvādaśopasattvaṃ naiva saṃghātadharma ity apadiṣṭo hetuḥ. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:24685: āha, kathaṃ tarhi idaṃ liṅgadarśanam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24691: prāyaṇīyo 'tirātraḥ. tasya dharmo dvādaśopasattvam. tadupādāne mukhyasyānugrahaḥ. ṣaḍupasattvopādāne jaghanyānāṃ jyotirādīnām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24692: mukhyasya prāptakālam anugraham atikramitum kiṃcit kāryaṃ{*7/324*} nāsti. atas tadanugrahārthaṃ dvādaśopasattvaṃ bhavati. tathā mukhyayā{*7/325*} pravṛttyā niyatasyaitaddarśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24693: na codakaprāptyā. yasmāc codako nāmadheyād abalaḥ. vakṣyati ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24694: vipratiṣiddhadharmāṇāṃ samavāye bhūyasāṃ syāt sadharmatvam{*7/326*}. mukhyaṃ vāpūrvacodanāl lokavad{*7/327*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24695: atha yad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanam uktam, ekādaśinyāṃ vihāradarśanam. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24705: anārabhyaikādaśinyāṃ vihāraḥ śiṣṭaḥ. tadādiprabhavāḥ paśavaḥ{*7/329*} syuḥ. tathā{*7/330*} tān evānūcīnān aharahar ālabheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24709: vāruṇam antataḥ. atha punaḥ paryāvarteṣv{*7/331*} āgneyam eva prathame 'hany ālabheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:24712_0: vāruṇam antata iti. tad anārabhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvāj jyotiṣṭomaṃ praviṣṭam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:24712_1: tatrāhnāṃ bahutvasyābhāvād asaṃbhavād aparāṃ prakṛtiṃ dvādaśāham āgatam. tatrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:24712_2: punar jyotirādīnāṃ paryāvarteṣv ity etan na yujyata iti tṛtīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ gavāmayane
